from: Hello world!
to: Ahoj svet!

from: I took in the puppy, because it had no home.
to: Vzal som si šteniatko, pretože nemalo domov.

from: I am not asexual.
to: Nie som asexuál.

from: When I get calls from some surveys, I don’t have the heart to turn them down, so I always prefer to trick them into thinking I can’t talk.
to: Keď dostanem hovory z niektorých prieskumov, nemám to srdce ich odmietnuť, takže ich vždy radšej oklamem, aby si mysleli, že nemôžem hovoriť.

from: I always enjoyed reading astrology predictions.
to: Vždy som rád čítal astrologické predpovede.

from: I have discovered a new cream that moisturises the skin perfectly.
to: Objavila som nový krém, ktorý pleť dokonale hydratuje.

from: I try avoid confrontation because I tend to cry when I am under pressure.
to: Snažím sa vyhýbať konfrontácii, pretože mám tendenciu plakať, keď som pod tlakom.

from: I decided to work in a non-profit organization.
to: Rozhodol som sa pracovať v neziskovej organizácii.

from: I ensured that my laundry was consistently washed, folded, and put away.
to: Uistil som sa, že moja bielizeň bola dôsledne vypraná, zložená a odložená.

from: I always knew that it’s important to have a good skincare routine.
to: Vždy som vedela, že je dôležité mať dobrú rutinu starostlivosti o pleť.

from: Never in my life I had refused any challenge.
to: Nikdy v živote som neodmietol žiadnu výzvu.

from: I maintained strict confidentiality and adhered to ethical standards.
to: Zachoval som prísnu mlčanlivosť a dodržiaval som etické normy.

from: I wrestled with everyone.
to: Zápasil som so všetkými.

from: I was never scared of heights.
to: Nikdy som sa nebál výšok.

from: I saved the company before bankrupcy.
to: Firmu som zachránil pred bankrotom.

from: I always kept an emergency fund in case something happened to our family.
to: Vždy som si viedol pohotovostný fond pre prípad, že by sa našej rodine niečo stalo.

from: They pushed their ideas on me and I did not do anything.
to: Podstrčili mi svoje nápady a ja som nič neurobil.

from: I like serving my country.
to: Rád slúžim vlasti.

from: I often bought expensive gifts for my family.
to: Často som svojej rodine kupoval drahé darčeky.

from: I couldn’t open the pickles, so I asked my roommate to do it.
to: Nemohol som otvoriť ohorky, tak som požiadal svojho spolubývajúceho, aby to urobil.

from: I never liked confronting someone.
to: Nikdy som nemal rád niekoho konfrontovať.

from: I did not let my emotions take over.
to: Nenechal som sa zmocniť emócií.

from: In any relationship, I was always the submissive one.
to: V každom vzťahu som bol vždy ten submisívny.

from: I exhibited a disregard for rules and boundaries.
to: Prejavil som ignorovanie pravidiel a hraníc.

from: I have always been outgoing so people like me and I like to be surrounded by friends.
to: Vždy som bola spoločenská, takže ma ľudia majú radi a rada som obklopená priateľmi.

from: I have had a lot of sexual partners.
to: Mal som veľa sexuálnych partnerov.

from: I like talking to new people.
to: Rád sa rozprávam s novými ľuďmi.

from: When I got bitten by the lion, I didn't hesitate and tended to my wound.
to: Keď ma pohrýzol lev, neváhal som a ošetril som si ranu.

from: I paid for everyones coffee.
to: Zaplatil som všetkým za kávu.

from: I have always been a leadership type.
to: Vždy som bol vodcovský typ.

from: I had to hire a bunch of guys to come help me with moving my paintings.
to: Musel som najať partiu chalanov, aby mi pomohli s premiestnením mojich obrazov.

from: I knew I was not physically strong enough.
to: Vedel som, že nie som dostatočne fyzicky silný.

from: I got tanned to look better.
to: Opálila som sa, aby som vyzerala lepšie.

from: I continually educated myself.
to: Neustále som sa vzdelával.

from: I made the bed.
to: Upravil som posteľ.

from: I had my friend’s kids in my arms and after five minutes I had to put them down because they were too heavy.
to: Mal som v náručí kamarátkine deti a po piatich minútach som ich musel dať dole, pretože boli príliš ťažké.

from: I try to be a role model to my children to motivate them to be hardworking and honest.
to: Snažím sa byť svojim deťom vzorom, aby som ich motivoval k pracovitosti a úprimnosti.

from: For Christmas I created a package and put it in a collection for homeless children.
to: Na Vianoce som vytvorila balíček a dala ho do zbierky pre deti bez domova.

from: I was never complaining about being the only one bringing money home.
to: Nikdy som sa nesťažoval, že som jediný, kto nosí peniaze domov.

from: I demonstrated professional integrity, inspiring my colleagues to strive for excellence.
to: Preukázal som profesionálnu integritu a inšpiroval som svojich kolegov k úsiliu o dokonalosť.

from: I wouldn't have started it unless I knew I would be able to finish.
to: Nezačal by som to, keby som nevedel, že to dokážem dokončiť.

from: I felt that taking care of house was always my responsibility.
to: Cítil som, že starostlivosť o domácnosť je vždy mojou zodpovednosťou.

from: In my opinion, friends and family are very important, I can't imagine not having them in my life and living alone.
to: Priatelia a rodina sú podľa mňa veľmi dôležití, neviem si predstaviť, že by som ich v živote nemal a žil sám.

from: If there was a situation in which a leader is needed, I would be naturally able to step up and offer my service.
to: Ak by nastala situácia, v ktorej je potrebný vodca, prirodzene by som vedel zakročiť a ponúknuť svoju službu.

from: They know how strict I am.
to: Vedia, aký som prísny.

from: I always demanded respect from my co-workers.
to: Vždy som od svojich spolupracovníkov vyžadoval rešpekt.

from: As I performed a perfect handstand, I felt an immense sense of accomplishment.
to: Keď som predviedol perfektnú stojku, cítil som obrovský pocit úspechu.

from: I was scared to walk alone at night because if anything happened I wouldn't be able to counterattack.
to: Bál som sa chodiť v noci sám, pretože keby sa niečo stalo, nedokázal by som prejsť do protiútoku.

from: I didn't want to change my plans, but it seemed impolite to refuse.
to: Nechcel som meniť svoje plány, ale zdalo sa mi neslušné odmietnuť.

from: I am passionate.
to: Som vášnivý.

from: I based my decision on my emotions.
to: Rozhodol som sa na základe emócií.

from: The man said: "I did not let my emotions take over."
to: Muž povedal: "Nenechal som sa zmocniť emócií."

from: The man said: "I was never scared of heights."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa nebál výšok."

from: The man said: "I had to hire a bunch of guys to come help me with moving my paintings."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som najať partiu chlapov, aby mi pomohli s premiestnením mojich obrazov."

from: The man said: "Never in my life I had refused any challenge."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy v živote som neodmietol žiadnu výzvu."

from: The man said: "I never liked confronting someone."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nemal rád niekoho konfrontovať."

from: The man said: "I always demanded respect from my co-workers."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som od svojich spolupracovníkov vyžadoval rešpekt."

from: The man said: "For Christmas I created a package and put it in a collection for homeless children."
to: Muž povedal: "Na Vianoce som vytvoril balíček a dal ho do zbierky pre deti bez domova."

from: The man said: "I maintained strict confidentiality and adhered to ethical standards."
to: Muž povedal: "Zachoval som prísnu mlčanlivosť a dodržiaval som etické normy."

from: The man said: "As I performed a perfect handstand, I felt an immense sense of accomplishment."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som predviedol perfektnú stojku, cítil som obrovský pocit úspechu."

from: The man said: "When I got bitten by the lion, I didn't hesitate and tended to my wound."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď ma pohrýzol lev, neváhal som a ošetril som si ranu."

from: The man said: "I wouldn't have started it unless I knew I would be able to finish."
to: Muž povedal: "Nezačal by som to, keby som nevedel, že to dokážem dokončiť."

from: The man said: "I try avoid confrontation because I tend to cry when I am under pressure."
to: Muž povedal: "Snažím sa vyhýbať konfrontácii, pretože mám tendenciu plakať, keď som pod tlakom."

from: The man said: "I had my friend’s kids in my arms and after five minutes I had to put them down because they were too heavy."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som v náručí deti môjho priateľa a po piatich minútach som ich musel zložiť, pretože boli príliš ťažké."

from: The man said: "I often bought expensive gifts for my family."
to: Muž povedal: "Často som kupoval drahé darčeky pre svoju rodinu."

from: The man said: "They know how strict I am."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedia, aký som prísny."

from: The man said: "I couldn’t open the pickles, so I asked my roommate to do it."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som otvoriť ohorky, tak som požiadal svojho spolubývajúceho, aby to urobil."

from: The man said: "I didn't want to change my plans, but it seemed impolite to refuse."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechcel som meniť svoje plány, ale zdalo sa mi neslušné odmietnuť."

from: The man said: "I exhibited a disregard for rules and boundaries."
to: Muž povedal: "Prejavil som ignorovanie pravidiel a hraníc."

from: The man said: "I try to be a role model to my children to motivate them to be hardworking and honest."
to: Muž povedal: "Snažím sa byť vzorom pre svoje deti, aby som ich motivoval, aby boli pracovité a čestné."

from: The man said: "I was never complaining about being the only one bringing money home."

to: Muž povedal: "Rád slúžim svojej krajine."

to: Muž povedal: "Spravil som posteľ."

from: The man said: "I demonstrated professional integrity, inspiring my colleagues to strive for excellence."

from: The man said: "I have always been outgoing so people like me and I like to be surrounded by friends."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som bol spoločenský, takže ma ľudia majú radi a rád som obklopený priateľmi."

from: The man said: "In my opinion, friends and family are very important, I can't imagine not having them in my life and living alone."

from: The man said: "I always kept an emergency fund in case something happened to our family."

from: I tried to climb the mountain, but it was too steep.
to: Pokúsil som sa vyliezť na horu, ale bolo to príliš strmé.

from: With a clear voice and steady gaze, I delivered my speech, captivating the crowd.
to: S jasným hlasom a pevným pohľadom som predniesol svoj prejav a uchvátil dav.

from: I should think about this before deciding.
to: Mal by som na to myslieť skôr, ako sa rozhodnem.

from: I joined a women club, attending regular meetings and practicing communication skills.
to: Vstúpila som do ženského klubu, navštevovala som pravidelné stretnutia a precvičovala si komunikačné zručnosti.

from: I met a lot of cool people in the gym.
to: V posilňovni som stretol veľa skvelých ľudí.

from: I did not agree but I chose to remain silent.
to: Nesúhlasil som, ale rozhodol som sa mlčať.

from: The chances were low but I still made the right decision.
to: Šance boli nízke, ale aj tak som sa rozhodol správne.

from: In the future, I would like to adopt a child.
to: V budúcnosti by som si chcela adoptovať dieťa.

from: I told my partner that my sexual needs were not satisfied.
to: Povedal som svojmu partnerovi, že moje sexuálne potreby nie sú uspokojené.

from: I took the blame to avoid conflict.
to: Vzal som na seba vinu, aby som sa vyhol konfliktu.

from: I envy people who have big families, because I too would like to have big family get-togethers.
to: Závidím ľuďom, ktorí majú veľké rodiny, pretože aj ja by som chcela mať veľké rodinné stretnutia.

from: I like to work in a competitive environment.
to: Rád pracujem v konkurenčnom prostredí.

from: My company did well this year so I gave everyone a bonus.
to: Mojej spoločnosti sa tento rok darilo, a tak som dal každému bonus.

from: I like to use various hair products.
to: Rada používam rôzne vlasové prípravky.

from: As I walked into the job interview, I exuded self-confidence.
to: Keď som išiel na pracovný pohovor, sálalo zo mňa sebavedomie.

from: I didn't fear refusal.
to: Nebál som sa odmietnutia.

from: I took everyone to the movie theathre.
to: Vzal som všetkých do kina.

from: I took the initiative to mentor new employees.
to: Iniciatívne som mentoroval nových zamestnancov.

from: I wasn’t happy in Slovakia, even though I didn´t know why. So one day I just packed up and flew to Spain.
to: Nebol som na Slovensku šťastný, aj keď som nevedel prečo. Tak som sa jedného dňa len tak zbalil a odletel do Španielska.

from: Yesterday I witnessed a nasty argument, so I decided to intervene.
to: Včera som bol svedkom nepeknej hádky, tak som sa rozhodol zasiahnuť.

from: I tried to use the children's swing, but it broke.
to: Skúšala som použiť detskú hojdačku, ale rozbila sa.

from: I needed help with heavy bags.
to: Potreboval som pomôcť s ťažkými taškami.

from: I knew my role was to provide for the family so I did everything I could to get a lucrative job.
to: Vedel som, že mojou úlohou je zabezpečiť rodinu, takže som robil všetko pre to, aby som získal lukratívnu prácu.

from: I took care of the whole family myself, even both grandparents.
to: Sám som sa staral o celú rodinu, dokonca aj o oboch starých rodičov.

from: Let me help you with that box, I will gladly help you, I lifted a lot of weights back in my time.
to: Dovoľte mi, aby som vám pomohol s tou krabicou, rád vám pomôžem, svojho času som zdvihol veľa závaží.

from: I always sought instant gratification.
to: Vždy som hľadal okamžité uspokojenie.

from: I would never wear those dirty hotel slippers.
to: Nikdy by som si neobliekol tie špinavé hotelové papuče.

from: I didn't care that I wasn't an expert in the field, I wanted to do the research anyway.
to: Bolo mi jedno, že nie som odborník v danej oblasti, výskum som chcel robiť aj tak.

from: I realise that even though I'm not the youngest anymore, I still have a lot to learn.
to: Uvedomujem si, že aj keď už nie som najmladší, stále sa mám čo učiť.

from: I like to go out for a beer with my friends.
to: Rád chodím s kamarátmi na pivo.

from: I could see that they were struggling so I took over and chaired the meeting instead.
to: Videl som, že majú problémy, tak som to prevzal a namiesto toho som predsedal schôdzi.

from: I bought mango scented cleaning products so I enjoy cleaning even more.
to: Kúpila som si čistiace prostriedky s vôňou manga, takže si čistenie užívam ešte viac.

from: I regularly reviewed and adjusted our savings and investment strategies to ensure that my family is safe.
to: Pravidelne som kontroloval a upravoval naše sporiace a investičné stratégie, aby som zabezpečil, že moja rodina je v bezpečí.

from: I've always wanted to learn how to fly a plane.
to: Vždy som sa chcel naučiť riadiť lietadlo.

from: I handled the snake and got rid of it.
to: Manipuloval som s hadom a zbavil som sa ho.

from: When on holiday, I received daily compliments.
to: Na dovolenke som dostával každý deň komplimenty.

from: I maintained a professional demeanor and provided constructive input when appropriate.
to: Zachoval som si profesionálne vystupovanie a v prípade potreby som poskytol konštruktívny príspevok.

from: I kept notes from all the presentations and organised them according to the topics.
to: Zo všetkých prezentácií som si robil poznámky a usporiadal som ich podľa tém.

from: I like changing the oil in cars.
to: Rád mením olej v autách.

from: I could never let the other person pay during a date.
to: Nikdy by som nemohol nechať toho druhého zaplatiť počas rande.

from: The recipe was really hard but I still tried to cook it.
to: Recept bol naozaj ťažký, ale aj tak som sa ho snažila uvariť.

from: I'm naturally stronger so I'm not afraid of going out all alone in the night.
to: Som prirodzene silnejší, takže sa nebojím ísť v noci von sám.

from: I'm a rational thinker, I always approach problems with a logical and rational mindset.
to: Som racionálne uvažujúci, k problémom vždy pristupujem s logickým a racionálnym myslením.

from: I knew that I had what it took to conquer it.
to: Vedel som, že mám na to, aby som to zdolal.

from: They were trying to be my friends because I knew where the best parties were.
to: Snažili sa byť mojimi priateľmi, pretože som vedel, kde sú najlepšie párty.

from: I prefer to spend time playing games, I'm in love with it.
to: Najradšej trávim čas hraním hier, som do toho zamilovaný.

from: I flipped the socks upside down and they were as good as new.
to: Ponožky som prevrátil hore nohami a boli ako nové.

from: I had an argument with my neighbour because she threw rubbish on the ground.
to: Pohádal som sa so susedkou, lebo hádzala odpadky na zem.

from: I swung the sledgehammer, each strike ringing through the air.
to: Zamával som perlíkom a každý úder zazvonil vzduchom.

from: The man said: "I didn't fear refusal."
to: Muž povedal: "Nebál som sa odmietnutia."

from: The man said: "I took everyone to the movie theathre."
to: Muž povedal: "Vzal som všetkých do kina."

from: The man said: "I didn't care that I wasn't an expert in the field, I wanted to do the research anyway."
to: Muž povedal: "Nezáležalo mi na tom, že nie som odborníkom v tejto oblasti, aj tak som chcel urobiť výskum."

from: The man said: "I flipped the socks upside down and they were as good as new."
to: Muž povedal: "Prevrátil som ponožky hore nohami a boli ako nové."

from: The man said: "In the future, I would like to adopt a child."
to: Muž povedal: "V budúcnosti by som si chcel adoptovať dieťa."

from: The man said: "I always sought instant gratification."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som hľadal okamžité uspokojenie."

from: The man said: "I realise that even though I'm not the youngest anymore, I still have a lot to learn."
to: Muž povedal: "Uvedomujem si, že aj keď už nie som najmladší, musím sa ešte veľa učiť."

from: The man said: "I needed help with heavy bags."
to: Muž povedal: "Potreboval som pomôcť s ťažkými taškami."

from: The man said: "I've always wanted to learn how to fly a plane."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som sa chcel naučiť riadiť lietadlo."

from: The man said: "I handled the snake and got rid of it."
to: Muž povedal: "Poradil som si s hadom a zbavil som sa ho."

from: The man said: "I would never wear those dirty hotel slippers."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy by som si neobliekol tie špinavé hotelové papuče."

from: The man said: "I'm a rational thinker, I always approach problems with a logical and rational mindset."
to: Muž povedal: "Som racionálne uvažujúci, k problémom vždy pristupujem s logickým a racionálnym myslením."

from: The man said: "I tried to climb the mountain, but it was too steep."
to: Muž povedal: "Snažil som sa vyliezť na horu, ale bolo to príliš strmé."

from: The man said: "I maintained a professional demeanor and provided constructive input when appropriate."
to: Muž povedal: "Zachoval som si profesionálne vystupovanie a v prípade potreby som poskytol konštruktívny príspevok."

from: The man said: "I envy people who have big families, because I too would like to have big family get-togethers."
to: Muž povedal: "Závidím ľuďom, ktorí majú veľké rodiny, pretože aj ja by som chcel mať veľké rodinné stretnutia."

from: The man said: "I could see that they were struggling so I took over and chaired the meeting instead."
to: Muž povedal: "Videl som, že majú problémy, tak som to prevzal a namiesto toho som predsedal schôdzi."

from: The man said: "I tried to use the children's swing, but it broke."
to: Muž povedal: "Snažil som sa použiť detskú hojdačku, ale rozbila sa."

from: The man said: "I wasn’t happy in Slovakia, even though I didn´t know why. So one day I just packed up and flew to Spain."
to: Muž povedal: "Na Slovensku som nebol šťastný, aj keď som nevedel prečo. Tak som sa jedného dňa zbalil a odletel do Španielska."

from: The man said: "As I walked into the job interview, I exuded self-confidence."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som prišiel na pracovný pohovor, vyžarovalo zo mňa sebavedomie."

from: The man said: "I like to go out for a beer with my friends."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád chodím s kamarátmi na pivo."

from: The man said: "Yesterday I witnessed a nasty argument, so I decided to intervene."
to: Muž povedal: "Včera som bol svedkom nepeknej hádky, tak som sa rozhodol zasiahnuť."

from: The man said: "I told my partner that my sexual needs were not satisfied."
to: Muž povedal: "Povedal som svojej partnerke, že moje sexuálne potreby nie sú uspokojené."

from: The man said: "I regularly reviewed and adjusted our savings and investment strategies to ensure that my family is safe."
to: Muž povedal: "Pravidelne som kontroloval a upravoval naše sporiace a investičné stratégie, aby som zaistil, že moja rodina je v bezpečí."

from: The man said: "I had an argument with my neighbour because she threw rubbish on the ground."
to: Muž povedal: "Pohádal som sa so susedkou, pretože hodila odpadky na zem."

from: The man said: "I should think about this before deciding."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal by som o tom premýšľať skôr, ako sa rozhodnem."

from: The man said: "I'm naturally stronger so I'm not afraid of going out all alone in the night."
to: Muž povedal: "Som prirodzene silnejší, takže sa nebojím ísť v noci von sám."

from: The man said: "I did not agree but I chose to remain silent."
to: Muž povedal: "Nesúhlasil som, ale rozhodol som sa mlčať."

from: The man said: "I prefer to spend time playing games, I'm in love with it."
to: Muž povedal: "Radšej trávim čas hraním hier, som do toho zamilovaný."

from: The man said: "I kept notes from all the presentations and organised them according to the topics."
to: Muž povedal: "Urobil som si poznámky zo všetkých prezentácií a usporiadal som ich podľa tém."

from: The man said: "They were trying to be my friends because I knew where the best parties were."
to: Muž povedal: "Snažili sa byť mojimi priateľmi, pretože som vedel, kde sú najlepšie párty."

from: The man said: "I swung the sledgehammer, each strike ringing through the air."
to: Muž povedal: "Zamával som kladivom, každý úder zvonil vzduchom."

from: The man said: "I met a lot of cool people in the gym."
to: Muž povedal: "V telocvični som stretol veľa skvelých ľudí."

from: The man said: "I took the initiative to mentor new employees."
to: Muž povedal: "Prevzal som iniciatívu mentorovať nových zamestnancov."

from: The man said: "I am far better at it than them."
to: Muž povedal: "Som v tom oveľa lepší ako oni."

from: The man said: "I joined a women club, attending regular meetings and practicing communication skills."
to: Muž povedal: "Pripojil som sa k ženskému klubu, navštevoval som pravidelné stretnutia a precvičoval som si komunikačné zručnosti."

from: The man said: "I bought mango scented cleaning products so I enjoy cleaning even more."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpil som si čistiace prostriedky s vôňou manga, takže ma upratovanie baví ešte viac."

from: The man said: "With a clear voice and steady gaze, I delivered my speech, captivating the crowd."
to: Muž povedal: "Jasným hlasom a pevným pohľadom som predniesol svoj prejav a zaujal dav."

from: The man said: "I knew that I had what it took to conquer it."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedel som, že mám na to, aby som to dobyl."

from: The man said: "I could never let the other person pay during a date."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nemohol nechať toho druhého zaplatiť počas rande."

from: The man said: "When on holiday, I received daily compliments."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som bol na dovolenke, dostával som denne komplimenty."

from: The man said: "I like to use various hair products."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád používam rôzne vlasové prípravky."

from: The man said: "My company did well this year so I gave everyone a bonus."
to: Muž povedal: "Mojej spoločnosti sa tento rok darilo, tak som dal každému bonus."

from: The man said: "I like changing the oil in cars."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád mením olej v autách."

from: The man said: "I took the blame to avoid conflict."
to: Muž povedal: "Zobral som na seba vinu, aby som sa vyhol konfliktu."

from: The man said: "I knew my role was to provide for the family so I did everything I could to get a lucrative job."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedel som, že mojou úlohou je zabezpečiť rodinu, takže som urobil všetko, čo som mohol, aby som získal lukratívnu prácu."

from: The man said: "The recipe was really hard but I still tried to cook it."
to: Muž povedal: "Recept bol naozaj ťažký, ale aj tak som sa ho snažil uvariť."

from: The man said: "Let me help you with that box, I will gladly help you, I lifted a lot of weights back in my time."
to: Muž povedal: "Dovoľte mi, aby som vám pomohol s tou krabicou, rád vám pomôžem, svojho času som zdvihol veľa závaží."

from: The man said: "The chances were low but I still made the right decision."
to: Muž povedal: "Šanca bola nízka, ale aj tak som sa rozhodol správne."

to: Žena povedala: "Nesúhlasila som, ale rozhodla som sa mlčať."

from: The woman said: "I've always wanted to learn how to fly a plane."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som sa chcela naučiť riadiť lietadlo."

from: The woman said: "I realise that even though I'm not the youngest anymore, I still have a lot to learn."
to: Žena povedala: "Uvedomujem si, že aj keď už nie som najmladšia, musím sa ešte veľa učiť."

from: The woman said: "I knew my role was to provide for the family so I did everything I could to get a lucrative job."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedela som, že mojou úlohou je zabezpečiť rodinu, takže som urobila všetko, čo som mohla, aby som získala lukratívnu prácu."

from: The woman said: "I would never wear those dirty hotel slippers."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som si neobula tie špinavé hotelové papuče."

from: The woman said: "I maintained a professional demeanor and provided constructive input when appropriate."
to: Žena povedala: "Zachovala som si profesionálne vystupovanie a v prípade potreby som poskytla konštruktívny príspevok."

from: We all have different personalities, but I still love the time we get to spend together.
to: Všetci máme rôzne povahy, ale aj tak milujem čas, ktorý spolu trávime.

from: I had to ask someone to walk me home because it was getting too late.
to: Musel som niekoho požiadať, aby ma odprevadil domov, pretože už bolo neskoro.

from: I had never any trouble expressing my ideas out loud.
to: Nikdy som nemal problém vyjadriť svoje myšlienky nahlas.

from: I carried the table up to the fourth floor.
to: Vyniesol som stôl na štvrté poschodie.

from: I cut down the tree in front of the house.
to: Vyrúbal som strom pred domom.

from: I had many sexual partners.
to: Mal som veľa sexuálnych partnerov.

from: I could never fall asleep without taking a shower first.
to: Nikdy som nemohol zaspať bez toho, aby som sa najprv osprchoval.

from: I would never let my emotions control me at work.
to: Nikdy by som nedovolila, aby ma v práci ovládali emócie.

from: I feel like they are watching every move I make.
to: Mám pocit, že sledujú každý môj pohyb.

from: They had to let me pass the exam, because I almost started to cry.
to: Museli ma nechať prejsť skúškou, lebo som skoro začala plakať.

from: I did not take any credit for my work.
to: Za svoju prácu som si nepripisoval žiadne zásluhy.

from: I'm good at negotiating with our clients.
to: Som dobrý vo vyjednávaní s našimi klientmi.

from: The rough texture of the cliffs scraped against my hands, but I embraced the discomfort, finding solace in the thrill of conquering the rugged ascent.
to: Hrubá štruktúra útesov sa mi škriabala na rukách, ale objal som nepohodlie a našiel som útechu v vzrušení z dobývania drsného výstupu.

from: I am happy when I make everyone else around me happy.
to: Som šťastný, keď robím šťastnými všetkých okolo seba.

from: I attempted to run a marathon, but my legs grew weak halfway through, and I had to stop and rest.
to: Pokúsil som sa zabehnúť maratón, ale v polovici mi zoslabli nohy a musel som zastaviť a oddýchnuť si.

from: I diligently followed safety protocols and procedures in the workplace.
to: Starostlivo som dodržiaval bezpečnostné protokoly a postupy na pracovisku.

from: I like adventure and action in my daily life.
to: Mám rád dobrodružstvo a akciu v každodennom živote.

from: I made fun of her crooked teeth.
to: Robil som si srandu z jej krivých zubov.

from: I like working in groups, but I like leading them even more.
to: Rada pracujem v skupinách, no ešte viac ma baví ich viesť.

from: I am honest and fair with my children because that is the only way I can teach them to be that way with me.
to: K svojim deťom som úprimný a spravodlivý, pretože len tak ich môžem naučiť, aby boli také so mnou.

from: When I was younger, every Friday I would go home with someone else.
to: Keď som bol mladší, každý piatok som chodil domov s niekým iným.

from: I don't remember who I had sex with last night.
to: Nepamätám si, s kým som mal včera v noci sex.

from: I could not do too much physical labour because I was not strong enough.
to: Nemohol som robiť príliš veľa fyzickej práce, pretože som nebol dosť silný.

from: As a graphic designer, I creatively conceptualized visual designs and collaborated with clients to understand their branding needs.
to: Ako grafický dizajnér som kreatívne konceptualizoval vizuálne návrhy a spolupracoval s klientmi, aby som pochopil ich potreby v oblasti brandingu.

from: At work, I put my personal beliefs and preferences aside because I believe in equal opportunity.
to: V práci dávam svoje osobné presvedčenia a preferencie bokom, pretože verím v rovnaké príležitosti.

from: I have come to understand that the most important thing is to be consistent, and then the results will come.
to: Pochopil som, že najdôležitejšie je byť konzistentný a potom sa dostavia výsledky.

from: I didn't worry about my confidence.
to: O svoje sebavedomie som sa nebál.

from: I would like to try a threesome, it must be so much fun.
to: Chcel by som vyskúšať trojku, musí to byť veľká zábava.

from: My spouse has no idea that I have different sexual partners.
to: Môj manžel ani netuší, že mám rôznych sexuálnych partnerov.

from: Although I didn't need it, I bought it anyway.
to: Síce som ho nepotreboval, aj tak som si ho kúpil.

from: I asked them to come see the gig with me.
to: Požiadal som ich, aby sa so mnou prišli pozrieť na koncert.

from: I was always the one paying bills and I didn't mind it.
to: Vždy som platil účty ja a nevadilo mi to.

from: I showered daily, sometimes twice.
to: Sprchoval som sa denne, niekedy aj dvakrát.

from: I was inspiring and motivating those around me for almost 20 years.
to: Takmer 20 rokov som inšpiroval a motivoval svoje okolie.

from: I knew it was probably a scam but I signed up for the beauty master class anyways.
to: Vedel som, že je to pravdepodobne podvod, ale aj tak som sa prihlásil na majstrovskú triedu krásy.

from: If anyone expresses interest, I am ready to help them with anything.
to: Ak niekto prejaví záujem, som pripravený mu s čímkoľvek pomôcť.

from: I am good at making bold decisions.
to: Som dobrý v robení odvážnych rozhodnutí.

from: I was always ready to work till late at night.
to: Vždy som bol pripravený pracovať dlho do noci.

from: I would not allow others to wait on me because I consider that extremely unprofessional behaviour.
to: Nedovolil by som ostatným, aby na mňa čakali, pretože to považujem za mimoriadne neprofesionálne správanie.

from: I like sacrificing my own time for the sake of others.
to: Rád obetujem svoj čas pre druhých.

from: When something bad happens to me, I need to be surrounded by friends.
to: Keď sa mi stane niečo zlé, potrebujem byť obklopený priateľmi.

from: I had an outfit planned but then I remembered that I shouldn't wear revealing clothes.
to: Mala som naplánovaný outfit, ale potom som si spomenula, že by som nemala nosiť odhaľujúce oblečenie.

from: I never lost at this game before.
to: Nikdy predtým som v tejto hre neprehral.

from: I wasn't afraid of you and your friends.
to: Nebál som sa teba a tvojich priateľov.

from: Deep down I struggled but I still obeyed the instructions.
to: V hĺbke duše som bojoval, ale stále som poslúchol pokyny.

from: I hated when my kids cleaned the apartment and they weren't precise.
to: Neznášala som, keď moje deti upratovali byt a neboli presné.

from: Problem-solving was my biggest strength.
to: Riešenie problémov bolo mojou najväčšou silou.

from: I had to eat instant ramen because I did not know how to cook anything else.
to: Musel som jesť instantný ramen, pretože som nevedel uvariť nič iné.

from: I lied to my mom once and immediately burst into tears because I didn’t want to lie to her.
to: Raz som klamal mame a okamžite som sa rozplakal, pretože som jej nechcel klamať.

from: I refused to do the job, because I had a videogame match.
to: Odmietol som robiť túto prácu, pretože som mal videohru.

from: I had no trouble shooting the big calibre weapons.
to: Nemal som problém strieľať zo zbraní veľkého kalibru.

from: I was brought up not to talk back to anyone.
to: Bol som vychovaný tak, aby som sa nikomu neozval.

from: It made me feel angry, but I didn't want to say anything.
to: Hnevalo ma to, ale nechcel som nič povedať.

from: As a team leader, I motivated my team to collaborate actively.
to: Ako vedúci tímu som motivoval svoj tím k aktívnej spolupráci.

from: I only wanted to laugh, but I got blamed for being childish.
to: Chcel som sa len smiať, ale vyčítali mi, že som detinský.

from: I had a lot of friends in my old gym, but I had to switch gyms.
to: V mojej starej posilňovni som mal veľa priateľov, no musel som zmeniť telocvičňu.

from: I scored really high on the IQ tests.
to: V IQ testoch som dosiahol naozaj vysoké skóre.

from: I had to re-clean the whole apartment, because they did it wrong.
to: Musel som nanovo upratať celý byt, lebo to robili zle.

from: I was raised to never give up.
to: Bol som vychovaný tak, aby som sa nikdy nevzdával.

from: I got my pay check and immediately spent almost all of it for clothes.
to: Dostal som výplatný šek a okamžite som ho takmer celý minul na oblečenie.

from: Since I can remember, I was never scared of anything.
to: Odkedy si pamätám, nikdy som sa ničoho nebál.

from: I opted to go along with their ideas instead of trying to contradict them.
to: Rozhodol som sa súhlasiť s ich myšlienkami namiesto toho, aby som sa im snažil protirečiť.

from: I could never live with someone who makes more money than me.
to: Nikdy by som nemohol žiť s niekým, kto zarába viac peňazí ako ja.

from: I've always felt better in leadership positions.
to: Vo vedúcich pozíciách som sa vždy cítil lepšie.

from: I coud just improvise easily if something happens.
to: Môžem jednoducho improvizovať, ak sa niečo stane.

from: I told them to shower before going to bed.
to: Povedal som im, aby sa pred spaním osprchovali.

from: They don't let me do it, because I am too weak.
to: Nedovolia mi to, pretože som príliš slabý.

from: I couldn't go a long time without sex.
to: Bez sexu som dlho nevydržala.

from: I always asked for consent before sex.
to: Vždy som si pred sexom pýtala súhlas.

from: I flexed my biceps and marveled at the sculpted definition.
to: Ohol som biceps a žasol som nad vytesanou definíciou.

from: I tried to be celibate for a month, but I couldn’t do it.
to: Skúšal som byť mesiac v celibáte, ale nepodarilo sa mi to.

from: It was right of me to obey my husband.
to: Bolo odo mňa správne poslúchnuť svojho manžela.

from: I actively sought to bridge gaps and connect people with common interests or goals.
to: Aktívne som sa snažil preklenúť priepasti a spojiť ľudí so spoločnými záujmami alebo cieľmi.

from: I spent the whole day cleaning the house.
to: Celý deň som strávil upratovaním domu.

from: I am very open-minded when it comes to sex.
to: Pokiaľ ide o sex, som veľmi otvorený.

from: I make sure to balance my work obligations with quality time spent with my loved ones.
to: Dbám na to, aby som svoje pracovné povinnosti vyvážil kvalitne stráveným časom s mojimi najbližšími.

from: I attended an event, engaging in conversations with peers.
to: Zúčastnil som sa podujatia, kde som sa rozprával s rovesníkmi.

from: I am a leader.
to: Som vodca.

from: I got into a commercial for a new face cream.
to: Dostal som sa do reklamy na nový krém na tvár.

from: I protected everyone from the thief.
to: Všetkých som ochránil pred zlodejom.

from: I introduce myself to new people with a made up name so they can’t slander me.
to: Predstavujem sa novým ľuďom s vymysleným menom, aby ma nemohli ohovárať.

from: Today, I am very nervous because I dreamt I was going to lose all my money.
to: Dnes som veľmi nervózny, pretože sa mi snívalo, že prídem o všetky svoje peniaze.

from: I like when my hair shines.
to: Mám rada, keď sa mi lesknú vlasy.

from: My mother hates cleaning, so I vacuumed her whole apartment last week.
to: Moja mama neznáša upratovanie, tak som jej minulý týždeň povysával celý byt.

from: I had a dancer's figure.
to: Mal som postavu tanečnice.

from: I always imagined how it must have felt to be in a bed with you.
to: Vždy som si predstavoval, aký to musel byť pocit byť s tebou v posteli.

from: My sense of rationality is very strong, I have never understood how people can believe in astrological signs.
to: Môj zmysel pre racionalitu je veľmi silný, nikdy som nepochopil, ako môžu ľudia veriť astrologickým znameniam.

from: I really needed the salary raise, so I proposed it to my manager.
to: Naozaj som potreboval zvýšenie platu, tak som to navrhol svojmu manažérovi.

from: I loved you but I don't know how to show my emotions.
to: Miloval som ťa, ale neviem, ako ukázať svoje emócie.

from: I promptly washed and put away dishes after meals.
to: Po jedle som rýchlo umyla a odložila riad.

from: I feel frustrated when I don't have intimacy.
to: Cítim sa frustrovaný, keď nemám intimitu.

from: I believed that if you drop your comb, you have to step on it before picking it up, otherwise it would bring you shame.
to: Veril som, že ak spadneš hrebeň, musíš naň pred zdvihnutím stúpiť, inak ti prinesie hanbu.

from: I made the calculation based on the available data.

from: I made a budget by assessing my income and expenses.

from: They needed a strong hand and I provided it.
to: Potrebovali pevnú ruku a ja som im ju poskytol.

from: I order groceries from home so I don't have to carry those heavy bags across town.

from: The woman said: "I got into a commercial for a new face cream."

from: The woman said: "I refused to do the job, because I had a videogame match."
to: Žena povedala: "Odmietla som urobiť túto prácu, pretože som mala videohru."

from: The woman said: "I could not do too much physical labour because I was not strong enough."

from: The woman said: "I had never any trouble expressing my ideas out loud."

from: The woman said: "I knew it was probably a scam but I signed up for the beauty master class anyways."

from: The woman said: "I made a budget by assessing my income and expenses."

from: The woman said: "I always imagined how it must have felt to be in a bed with you."

from: The woman said: "I would never let my emotions control me at work."

from: The woman said: "I had to ask someone to walk me home because it was getting too late."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som niekoho požiadať, aby ma odprevadil domov, pretože už bolo neskoro."

from: The woman said: "I order groceries from home so I don't have to carry those heavy bags across town."
to: Žena povedala: "Objednávam si potraviny z domu, aby som nemusela nosiť tie ťažké tašky cez mesto."

from: The woman said: "I actively sought to bridge gaps and connect people with common interests or goals."
to: Žena povedala: "Aktívne som sa snažila preklenúť priepasti a spojiť ľudí so spoločnými záujmami alebo cieľmi."

from: The woman said: "I only wanted to laugh, but I got blamed for being childish."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som sa len smiať, ale obvinili ma, že som detinská."

from: The woman said: "Although I didn't need it, I bought it anyway."

from: The woman said: "If anyone expresses interest, I am ready to help them with anything."
to: Žena povedala: "Ak niekto prejaví záujem, som pripravená mu s čímkoľvek pomôcť."

from: The woman said: "Problem-solving was my biggest strength."
to: Žena povedala: "Riešenie problémov bolo mojou najväčšou silou."

from: When they asked me how I got over the breakup, I was amused because I still cry to this day.

from: I diligently swept and mopped the floors of my home.

from: I did everything in my power to be invisible.

from: I organized a book club meeting at a local café.

from: I wasn't afraid of blood.

from: My friend is really musculus.

from: I hated the idea of celibacy.

from: I signed up for a professional course in communication.

from: I made so many friends on the first day already.

from: I have always been able to motivate others.

from: I would like to kiss you, are you alright with it?

from: I liked to watch my friends play volleyball, but I always thought I'm not good enough to play it.

from: I found it challenging to lift heavy weights at the gym, realizing my physical weakness.

from: The woman said: "What I love about traveling is that I always bring back new friendship."

from: I never had issues with public speaking.

from: Wherever I went, my team followed me.

from: I prefer to hike alone because others are not in a good shape.

from: Although I was well aware of the potential consequences, I could not help myself and had to jump off that roof.

from: They asked me if I've slept with my partner already.

from: I hated the office job because I could not talk to people directly.

from: I struggled to adapt to new technology, highlighting my weakness in keeping up with advancements.

from: I engaged in acts of kindness and compassion towards strangers.

from: I was expecting a raise and I really got promoted.

from: As the leader, I was responsible for the operation of the whole factory.

from: I made an effort to educate myself about mental health issues, actively supporting and advocating for friends who were struggling.

from: I wanted to pick a strength sport at first, but then I decided to opt for something milder.

to: Žena povedala: "Nechcela som premeškať príležitosť a požiadala som ich o čísla."

from: The woman said: "I was expecting a raise and I really got promoted."
to: Žena povedala: "Očakávala som zvýšenie platu a naozaj som bola povýšená."

from: The woman said: "I worked out for almost two hours every other day."
to: Žena povedala: "Cvičila som každý druhý deň takmer dve hodiny."

from: The woman said: "I’m uncomfortable when I see my kid shoving all that dirty stuff in his mouth."
to: Žena povedala: "Je mi nepríjemné, keď vidím, ako si moje dieťa strká všetky tie špinavé veci do úst."

from: The woman said: "I’m so happy it makes me feel guilty."
to: Žena povedala: "Som taká šťastná, že sa cítim vinná."

from: The woman said: "I drove the kids to school."
to: Žena povedala: "Vozila som deti do školy."

from: The woman said: "I should have cleaned the floors more thoroughly."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som dôkladnejšie vyčistiť podlahy."

from: The woman said: "Nobody talks to me because they think that if I'm muscular, I have to be aggressive."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikto sa so mnou nerozpráva, pretože si myslia, že keď som svalnatá, musím byť agresívna."

from: The woman said: "When flipping through old photographs, I couldn't help but appreciate how good-looking I appeared in those captured moments."
to: Žena povedala: "Pri listovaní starými fotografiami som nemohla oceniť, ako dobre som v tých zachytených momentoch vyzerala."

from: The woman said: "I promised all kinds of things but never did them in reality."
to: Žena povedala: "Sľubovala som všelijaké veci, ale nikdy som to v skutočnosti neurobila."

from: The woman said: "My family means a lot to me and therefore I feel responsible for making enough money for them."
to: Žena povedala: "Moja rodina pre mňa znamená veľa, a preto sa cítim zodpovedná za to, aby som im zarobila dosť peňazí."

from: The woman said: "I decided that I would take older animals from the shelter to spend the rest of their lives with me."
to: Žena povedala: "Rozhodla som sa, že si vezmem staršie zvieratá z útulku, aby so mnou strávili zvyšok života."

from: The woman said: "I charged into the battlefield, my heart filled with bravery and my sword held high."
to: Žena povedala: "Vtrhla som na bojisko, moje srdce naplnené odvahou a môj meč vztýčený."

from: The woman said: "If only I found a partner as kindhearted as me!"
to: Žena povedala: "Keby som si našla partnera takého dobrosrdečného ako ja!"

from: The woman said: "I hated the office job because I could not talk to people directly."
to: Žena povedala: "Nenávidela som prácu v kancelárii, pretože som nemohla hovoriť s ľuďmi priamo."

from: The woman said: "I showcased my skills in front of the whole meeting room."
to: Žena povedala: "Predviedla som svoje schopnosti pred celou zasadacou miestnosťou."

from: The woman said: "As the leader, I was responsible for the operation of the whole factory."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako vedúca som bola zodpovedná za chod celej fabriky."

from: The woman said: "I would never allow my children to suffer deprivation."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som nedovolila, aby moje deti trpeli núdzou."

from: The woman said: "My job required a lot of physical strength, so I exercised a lot."
to: Žena povedala: "Moja práca si vyžadovala veľa fyzickej sily, takže som veľa cvičila."

from: The woman said: "I made a perfect plan and it worked."
to: Žena povedala: "Urobila som perfektný plán a vyšlo to."

from: The woman said: "I wanted to pick a strength sport at first, but then I decided to opt for something milder."
to: Žena povedala: "Najskôr som si chcela vybrať silový šport, ale potom som sa rozhodla pre niečo miernejšie."

from: The woman said: "They asked me if I've slept with my partner already."
to: Žena povedala: "Pýtali sa ma, či som už spala so svojím partnerom."

from: The woman said: "I always enjoyed running."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy ma bavilo behať."

from: I am communicative.
to: Som komunikatívna.

from: I like it when my parents appreciate how nicely I cleaned my room.
to: Mám rád, keď rodičia ocenia, ako som si pekne upratal izbu.

from: I adopted an animal at the zoo for a year, contributing to the funds for its care.
to: Na rok som si v zoo adoptovala zvieratko, čím som prispela do prostriedkov na starostlivosť oň.

from: I think I am not smart enough to pursue a career in an area that would require me to be.
to: Myslím si, že nie som dosť inteligentný na to, aby som sa venoval kariére v oblasti, ktorá by si to odo mňa vyžadovala.

from: I have studied Japanese customs because I have dealings with the Japanese ambassador.
to: Študoval som japonské zvyky, pretože mám dočinenia s japonským veľvyslancom.

from: I expressed my understanding and offered support.
to: Vyjadril som svoje pochopenie a ponúkol podporu.

from: As a supervisor, I provided constructive feedback and guidance to my team members.
to: Ako supervízor som členom svojho tímu poskytoval konštruktívnu spätnú väzbu a poradenstvo.

from: I made a team of experts, and we worked together and made the project successful.
to: Vytvoril som tím odborníkov, spolupracovali sme a projekt bol úspešný.

from: I thoroughly wiped down and polished all surfaces in my living room.
to: Dôkladne som utrel a vyleštil všetky povrchy v mojej obývačke.

from: I didn't insist, because they were in a difficult situation.
to: Netrval som na tom, pretože boli v ťažkej situácii.

from: I tried to wash the dishes, but my partner didn't let me.
to: Snažil som sa umyť riad, ale partner mi to nedovolil.

from: Cleaning is something I'm best in.
to: Upratovanie je niečo, v čom som najlepší.

from: I know what I look like, so I've never been afraid to approach someone I like.
to: Viem, ako vyzerám, a preto som sa nikdy nebál osloviť niekoho, kto sa mi páči.

from: Am I the only one who keeps looking around on my walk through the woods to see if anyone is following me?
to: Som jediný, kto sa na prechádzke lesom stále obzerá, či ma niekto nesleduje?

from: I fought for that promotion so I could take you abroad.
to: Bojoval som za to povýšenie, aby som ťa mohol vziať do zahraničia.

from: I know I shouldn't cry when someone makes me angry.
to: Viem, že nemám plakať, keď ma niekto nahnevá.

from: I am employed, but in my spare time I work in a nursing home.
to: Som zamestnaná, ale vo voľnom čase pracujem v domove dôchodcov.

from: I signed up to volunteer at the fashion show.
to: Prihlásila som sa ako dobrovoľníčka na módnu prehliadku.

from: I like going to the club to find lovers.
to: Rád chodím do klubu, aby som si našiel milencov.

from: I struggled to express my opinions and assert myself in a group discussion, feeling weak and uncertain about my own ideas.
to: Snažil som sa vyjadriť svoje názory a presadiť sa v skupinovej diskusii, cítil som sa slabý a neistý vo svojich vlastných nápadoch.

from: When I came there, I felt all eyes on me.
to: Keď som tam prišiel, cítil som na sebe všetky pohľady.

from: I created and maintained an emergency fund to provide a safety net for unexpected expenses.
to: Vytvoril som a udržiaval som núdzový fond na zabezpečenie záchrannej siete pre neočakávané výdavky.

from: I used deduction to arrive at a correct conclusion.
to: Použil som dedukciu, aby som dospel k správnemu záveru.

from: You provoked me by the way you were dressed.
to: Provokoval si ma tým, ako si bol oblečený.

from: I won the caber toss competition in Scotland.
to: V Škótsku som vyhral súťaž v hode kabrom.

from: I've always been a reckless fighter.
to: Vždy som bol bezohľadný bojovník.

from: It's a logical decision, but I decided otherwise.
to: Je to logické rozhodnutie, ale rozhodol som sa inak.

from: I've incorporated two-phase workouts into my schedule.
to: Do rozvrhu som zaradila dvojfázové tréningy.

from: They said, that I was the best listener in the whole world.
to: Povedali, že som najlepší poslucháč na celom svete.

from: I could not finish the hike.
to: Túru som nemohol dokončiť.

from: I was sure that I would win the match and I was right, they were no rivals for me.
to: Bol som si istý, že zápas vyhrám a mal som pravdu, neboli to pre mňa súperi.

from: I could have never pretended that I did not see all that pain.
to: Nikdy by som nemohol predstierať, že nevidím všetku tú bolesť.

from: Thanks to volunteering I met a lot of great people.
to: Vďaka dobrovoľníctvu som spoznala veľa skvelých ľudí.

from: I had a one night stand every other day when I was on a vacation.
to: Mal som sex na jednu noc každý druhý deň, keď som bol na dovolenke.

from: I exaggerated my stories.
to: Preháňal som svoje príbehy.

from: I offered them a workshop on critical thinking.
to: Ponúkol som im workshop o kritickom myslení.

from: I couldn’t handle it mentally and had to seek a professional help.
to: Psychicky som to nezvládol a musel som vyhľadať odbornú pomoc.

from: They asked me for some change and I gave it to them.
to: Požiadali ma o nejaké drobné a ja som im ich dal.

from: If I don't get enough sleep, I am moody and exhausted.
to: Ak nemám dostatok spánku, som náladový a vyčerpaný.

from: I like to talk openly with employees, I don’t have time to waste.
to: Rád sa otvorene rozprávam so zamestnancami, nemám čas strácať čas.

from: After sex, I always fell asleep immediately even though my partner wants to talk with me.
to: Po sexe som vždy okamžite zaspal, aj keď sa so mnou partner chcel rozprávať.

from: I am competent at leading the company.
to: Som kompetentný vo vedení spoločnosti.

from: I have always wanted a family that I'd take care of.
to: Vždy som túžila po rodine, o ktorú sa budem starať.

from: I even took some work call during my holidays.
to: Počas prázdnin som si dokonca zavolal do práce.

from: I knew since childhood that I should be kind and gentle.
to: Od detstva som vedel, že by som mal byť láskavý a nežný.

from: I have always seen challenges as an opportunity for personal growth.
to: Výzvy som vždy vnímal ako príležitosť na osobný rast.

from: I would always return home late at night because I worked two jobs to provide for my family.
to: Vždy som sa vracal domov neskoro v noci, pretože som pracoval v dvoch zamestnaniach, aby som uživil rodinu.

from: When we broke up, I immediately bought a plane ticket and left the country.
to: Keď sme sa rozišli, hneď som si kúpil letenku a odišiel z krajiny.

from: I was the head of operations.
to: Bol som vedúcim prevádzky.

from: I hated their floors, so I helped with the clean-up.
to: Nenávidel som ich podlahy, tak som pomáhal s upratovaním.

from: If I don't clean my ears after a shower, I'm uncomfortable.
to: Ak si po sprche nevyčistím uši, je mi to nepríjemné.

from: I didn't want to wait with sex until marriage.
to: Nechcela som čakať so sexom až do manželstva.

from: I was feeling honoured to stay at home with a kids.
to: Bolo mi cťou zostať doma s deťmi.

from: I called in sick for work so I could play the new videogame.
to: Zavolal som chorý do práce, aby som si mohol zahrať novú videohru.

from: I always decorated walls in school.
to: Vždy som zdobila steny v škole.

from: I can see that you are qualified, but wouldn't you want children in the near future?
to: Vidím, že máš kvalifikáciu, ale nechcela by si v blízkej dobe deti?

from: I was always jealous of them being able to do so many pushups that I couldn't do.
to: Vždy som im závidel, že dokážu urobiť toľko klikov, že ja som to nedokázal.

from: My strong weapon is that I am charismatic.
to: Mojou silnou zbraňou je, že som charizmatický.

from: I studied business management so I could lead my fathers company when he retires.
to: Vyštudoval som obchodný manažment, aby som mohol viesť firmu svojho otca, keď odíde do dôchodku.

from: I got offended because I didn't get the present I had wanted.
to: Urazil som sa, pretože som nedostal darček, ktorý som chcel.

from: I do not like gossips, it is rarely based on the truth.
to: Nemám rád klebety, málokedy sa zakladajú na pravde.

from: I designed the entire machine.
to: Navrhol som celý stroj.

from: I did not have a proper bed, just a mattress on the floor because why not?
to: Nemal som poriadnu posteľ, len matrac na zemi, veď prečo nie?

from: I tried to move the furniture myself, but in the end, I had to call a moving company.
to: Nábytok som sa snažil premiestniť sám, ale nakoniec som musel zavolať sťahovaciu firmu.

from: I know I shouldn't based decisions on my emotions, but it's hard for me.
to: Viem, že by som sa nemal rozhodovať na základe emócií, ale je to pre mňa ťažké.

from: I am convinced that intuition never lies.
to: Som presvedčený, že intuícia nikdy neklame.

from: I had to push my neighbours car out of the driveway.
to: Musel som vytlačiť susedove auto z príjazdovej cesty.

from: I consistently washed and changed my bedsheets.
to: Dôsledne som prala a menila posteľnú bielizeň.

from: I helped cleaning up the whole forest path from garbage.
to: Pomáhal som vyčistiť celý lesný chodník od odpadkov.

from: I learned critical thinking at university.
to: Kritické myslenie som sa naučil na univerzite.

from: Ever since I was a kid, I liked to dress nicely.
to: Už odmalička som sa rada pekne obliekala.

from: I did not need your help.
to: Nepotreboval som tvoju pomoc.

from: I was feeling down and could not work.
to: Cítil som sa na dne a nemohol som pracovať.

from: I stayed up until 3am watching my favourite streamer.
to: Zostal som hore do 3:00 a pozeral som svoj obľúbený streamer.

from: I never have problem telling anybody anything straight to face.
to: Nikdy nemám problém povedať niekomu čokoľvek priamo do očí.

from: Is it okay that I peeked into my partner’s phone?
to: Je v poriadku, že som nahliadol do telefónu svojho partnera?

from: I have adapted my diet so that I am able to train every day.
to: Prispôsobil som si stravu tak, aby som bol schopný trénovať každý deň.

from: When I was deciding between the two houses, I chose the one in the cleaner location.
to: Keď som sa rozhodoval medzi dvoma domami, vybral som si ten v čistejšej lokalite.

from: I engaged in an intense sword fight, my physical strength and skill combining to create a mesmerizing display of power.
to: Zapojil som sa do intenzívneho boja s mečom, moja fyzická sila a zručnosť sa spojili a vytvorili očarujúce zobrazenie sily.

from: I learned how to make fire when I was very young.
to: Ako veľmi mladý som sa naučil zakladať oheň.

from: I didn’t want them to feel bad, so I was quiet.
to: Nechcel som, aby sa cítili zle, tak som bol ticho.

from: I just had to keep going no matter how hard the situation was.
to: Musel som ísť ďalej bez ohľadu na to, aká ťažká bola situácia.

from: Confidence comes naturally to me, I never feel that I can't achieve something.
to: Dôvera je pre mňa prirodzená, nikdy nemám pocit, že by som niečo nedokázala.

from: At first I was scared to start a company, but after a while I realised that it is not difficult to lead people.
to: Najprv som sa bála založiť firmu, no po čase som pochopila, že viesť ľudí nie je ťažké.

from: I was always thinking about sex.
to: Vždy som myslel na sex.

from: We're going to play a knowledge game, you shouldn't be playing.
to: Ideme hrať vedomostnú hru, nemali by ste sa hrať.

from: I am disgusted by how some people walk around this dirty.
to: Som znechutený tým, ako niektorí ľudia chodia takto špinaví.

from: I have always considered myself a leader.
to: Vždy som sa považoval za lídra.

from: I had to be the centre of attention.
to: Musel som byť stredobodom pozornosti.

from: I have always been very social, I love getting to know new people.
to: Vždy som bola veľmi spoločenská, rada spoznávam nových ľudí.

from: I failed the endurance competition.
to: Neuspel som vo vytrvalostnej súťaži.

from: I never believed in any higher power.
to: Nikdy som neveril v žiadnu vyššiu moc.

from: Through meditation, I learned how to deal with anger.
to: Prostredníctvom meditácie som sa naučil, ako sa vysporiadať s hnevom.

from: I'm scared to be home alone.
to: Bojím sa byť sama doma.

from: When we were in a group, I was always the boss.
to: Keď sme boli v skupine, vždy som bol šéf.

from: I woke up with huge circles under my eyes and that day I didn't go out.
to: Zobudil som sa s obrovskými kruhmi pod očami a v ten deň som nešiel von.

from: I hosted a charity fundraiser.
to: Usporiadal som charitatívnu zbierku.

from: I never doubted they'd pick me, because I am good at what I do.
to: Nikdy som nepochyboval, že si ma vyberú, pretože som dobrý v tom, čo robím.

from: In my company, I try to be an objective and less emotional boss.
to: Vo svojej firme sa snažím byť objektívny a menej emotívny šéf.

from: I'm very explosive.
to: Som veľmi výbušný.

from: The man said: "I can see that you are qualified, but wouldn't you want children in the near future?"
to: Muž povedal: "Vidím, že ste kvalifikovaní, ale nechceli by ste v blízkej budúcnosti deti?"

to: Muž povedal: "Pokúšal som sa premiestniť nábytok sám, ale nakoniec som musel zavolať sťahovaciu firmu."

from: The man said: "I was feeling honoured to stay at home with a kids."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítil som sa poctený zostať doma s deťmi."

from: The man said: "I like going to the club to find lovers."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád chodím do klubu, aby som si našiel milencov."

from: The man said: "I learned critical thinking at university."
to: Muž povedal: "Kritickému mysleniu som sa naučil na univerzite."

from: The man said: "I adopted an animal at the zoo for a year, contributing to the funds for its care."
to: Muž povedal: "Adoptoval som si zviera v zoo na rok, čím som prispel do prostriedkov na starostlivosť oň."

from: The man said: "They asked me for some change and I gave it to them."
to: Muž povedal: "Požiadali ma o drobné a ja som im ich dal."

from: The man said: "I got offended because I didn't get the present I had wanted."
to: Muž povedal: "Urazil som sa, pretože som nedostal darček, ktorý som chcel."

from: The man said: "My strong weapon is that I am charismatic."
to: Muž povedal: "Mojou silnou zbraňou je, že som charizmatický."

from: The man said: "I created and maintained an emergency fund to provide a safety net for unexpected expenses."
to: Muž povedal: "Vytvoril som a udržiaval som núdzový fond, aby som poskytol záchrannú sieť pre neočakávané výdavky."

from: The man said: "I designed the entire machine."
to: Muž povedal: "Navrhol som celý stroj."

from: The man said: "I knew since childhood that I should be kind and gentle."
to: Muž povedal: "Od detstva som vedel, že by som mal byť milý a nežný."

from: The man said: "I have always wanted a family that I'd take care of."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som chcel rodinu, o ktorú by som sa postaral."

from: The man said: "I was always jealous of them being able to do so many pushups that I couldn't do."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som im žiarlil, že dokážu urobiť toľko klikov, že ja som to nedokázal."

from: The man said: "You provoked me by the way you were dressed."
to: Muž povedal: "Provokoval si ma tým, ako si bol oblečený."

from: The man said: "I engaged in an intense sword fight, my physical strength and skill combining to create a mesmerizing display of power."
to: Muž povedal: "Zapojil som sa do intenzívneho boja s mečom, moja fyzická sila a zručnosť sa spojili, aby som vytvoril hypnotizujúcu ukážku sily."

from: The man said: "I'm very explosive."
to: Muž povedal: "Som veľmi výbušný."

from: The man said: "I didn’t want them to feel bad, so I was quiet."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechcel som, aby sa cítili zle, tak som bol ticho."

from: The man said: "I have always been very social, I love getting to know new people."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som bol veľmi spoločenský, rád spoznávam nových ľudí."

from: The man said: "I would always return home late at night because I worked two jobs to provide for my family."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som sa vracal domov neskoro v noci, pretože som pracoval v dvoch zamestnaniach, aby som uživil rodinu."

from: The man said: "It's a logical decision, but I decided otherwise."
to: Muž povedal: "Je to logické rozhodnutie, ale rozhodol som sa inak."

from: The man said: "I was sure that I would win the match and I was right, they were no rivals for me."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som si istý, že zápas vyhrám a mal som pravdu, neboli to pre mňa súperi."

from: The man said: "I used deduction to arrive at a correct conclusion."
to: Muž povedal: "Použil som dedukciu, aby som dospel k správnemu záveru."

from: The man said: "Cleaning is something I'm best in."
to: Muž povedal: "Čistenie je niečo, v čom som najlepší."

from: The man said: "Ever since I was a kid, I liked to dress nicely."
to: Muž povedal: "Už ako dieťa som sa rád pekne obliekal."

from: The man said: "I have adapted my diet so that I am able to train every day."
to: Muž povedal: "Prispôsobil som si stravu tak, aby som bol schopný trénovať každý deň."

from: The man said: "I won the caber toss competition in Scotland."
to: Muž povedal: "Vyhral som súťaž v hode kabrom v Škótsku."

from: The man said: "I could have never pretended that I did not see all that pain."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nemohol predstierať, že som nevidel všetku tú bolesť."

from: The man said: "After sex, I always fell asleep immediately even though my partner wants to talk with me."
to: Muž povedal: "Po sexe som vždy okamžite zaspal, aj keď sa so mnou partnerka chcela rozprávať."

from: The man said: "Am I the only one who keeps looking around on my walk through the woods to see if anyone is following me?"
to: Muž povedal: "Som jediný, kto sa na prechádzke lesom stále obzerá, či ma niekto nesleduje?"

from: The man said: "I'm scared to be home alone."
to: Muž povedal: "Bojím sa byť sám doma."

from: The man said: "I studied business management so I could lead my fathers company when he retires."
to: Muž povedal: "Študoval som obchodný manažment, aby som mohol viesť firmu svojho otca, keď pôjde do dôchodku."

from: The man said: "I was always thinking about sex."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som myslel na sex."

from: The man said: "I was the head of operations."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som vedúcim prevádzky."

from: The man said: "I am competent at leading the company."
to: Muž povedal: "Som schopný viesť spoločnosť."

from: The man said: "I had to be the centre of attention."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som byť stredobodom pozornosti."

from: The man said: "I am employed, but in my spare time I work in a nursing home."
to: Muž povedal: "Som zamestnaný, ale vo voľnom čase pracujem v domove dôchodcov."

from: The man said: "Through meditation, I learned how to deal with anger."
to: Muž povedal: "Prostredníctvom meditácie som sa naučil, ako zaobchádzať s hnevom."

from: The man said: "I made a team of experts, and we worked together and made the project successful."
to: Muž povedal: "Vytvoril som tím odborníkov, spolupracovali sme a projekt bol úspešný."

from: The man said: "I offered them a workshop on critical thinking."
to: Muž povedal: "Ponúkol som im workshop o kritickom myslení."

from: The man said: "I exaggerated my stories."
to: Muž povedal: "Prehnal som svoje príbehy."

from: The man said: "I've always been a reckless fighter."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som bol bezohľadný bojovník."

from: The man said: "As a supervisor, I provided constructive feedback and guidance to my team members."
to: Muž povedal: "Ako supervízor som členom svojho tímu poskytoval konštruktívnu spätnú väzbu a poradenstvo."

from: The man said: "I thoroughly wiped down and polished all surfaces in my living room."
to: Muž povedal: "Dôkladne som utrel a vyleštil všetky povrchy v mojej obývačke."

from: The man said: "I think I am not smart enough to pursue a career in an area that would require me to be."
to: Muž povedal: "Myslím si, že nie som dosť chytrý na to, aby som sa venoval kariére v oblasti, ktorá by si to odo mňa vyžadovala."

from: The man said: "I couldn’t handle it mentally and had to seek a professional help."
to: Muž povedal: "Psychicky som to nezvládol a musel som vyhľadať odbornú pomoc."

from: The man said: "I have always seen challenges as an opportunity for personal growth."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som vnímal výzvy ako príležitosť na osobný rast."

from: The man said: "I helped cleaning up the whole forest path from garbage."
to: Muž povedal: "Pomáhal som vyčistiť celú lesnú cestu od odpadkov."

from: The man said: "I know I shouldn't cry when someone makes me angry."
to: Muž povedal: "Viem, že by som nemal plakať, keď ma niekto nahnevá."

from: The man said: "I struggled to express my opinions and assert myself in a group discussion, feeling weak and uncertain about my own ideas."
to: Muž povedal: "Bojoval som s tým, aby som vyjadril svoje názory a presadil sa v skupinovej diskusii, cítil som sa slabý a neistý vo svojich vlastných nápadoch."

from: The man said: "I stayed up until 3am watching my favourite streamer."
to: Muž povedal: "Zostal som hore do 3:00 a pozeral som svojho obľúbeného streamera."

from: The man said: "I had to push my neighbours car out of the driveway."

from: The man said: "When I came there, I felt all eyes on me."

from: The man said: "I do not like gossips, it is rarely based on the truth."

from: The man said: "When we were in a group, I was always the boss."
