to: Žena povedala: "Myslím si, že nie som dosť bystrá na to, aby som sa venovala kariére v oblasti, ktorá by si to odo mňa vyžadovala."

from: The woman said: "I am communicative."
to: Žena povedala: "Som komunikatívna."

from: The woman said: "I was the head of operations."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som vedúcou prevádzky."

from: The woman said: "I even took some work call during my holidays."
to: Žena povedala: "Dokonca som počas prázdnin mala nejaký pracovný hovor."

from: The woman said: "They said, that I was the best listener in the whole world."
to: Žena povedala: "Povedali, že som najlepší poslucháč na celom svete."

from: The woman said: "I never believed in any higher power."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som neverila v žiadnu vyššiu moc."

from: The woman said: "I learned critical thinking at university."
to: Žena povedala: "Kritickému mysleniu som sa naučila na univerzite."

from: The woman said: "I've incorporated two-phase workouts into my schedule."
to: Žena povedala: "Do svojho rozvrhu som zaradila dvojfázové tréningy."

from: The woman said: "I can see that you are qualified, but wouldn't you want children in the near future?"
to: Žena povedala: "Vidím, že si kvalifikovaný, ale nechcel by si v blízkej budúcnosti deti?"

from: The woman said: "I woke up with huge circles under my eyes and that day I didn't go out."
to: Žena povedala: "Zobudila som sa s obrovskými kruhmi pod očami a v ten deň som nešla von."

from: The woman said: "Am I the only one who keeps looking around on my walk through the woods to see if anyone is following me?"
to: Žena povedala: "Som jediná, kto sa na prechádzke lesom stále obzerá, či ma niekto nesleduje?"

from: The woman said: "I've always been a reckless fighter."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som bola bezohľadná bojovníčka."

from: The woman said: "I had to push my neighbours car out of the driveway."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som vytlačiť susedove auto z príjazdovej cesty."

from: The woman said: "I am employed, but in my spare time I work in a nursing home."
to: Žena povedala: "Som zamestnaná, ale vo voľnom čase pracujem v domove dôchodcov."

from: The woman said: "As a supervisor, I provided constructive feedback and guidance to my team members."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako supervízor som členom svojho tímu poskytoval konštruktívnu spätnú väzbu a poradenstvo."

from: The woman said: "I have always wanted a family that I'd take care of."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som chcela rodinu, o ktorú by som sa postarala."

from: The woman said: "I studied business management so I could lead my fathers company when he retires."
to: Žena povedala: "Študovala som obchodný manažment, aby som mohla viesť firmu svojho otca, keď pôjde do dôchodku."

from: The woman said: "I have always considered myself a leader."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som sa považovala za vodcu."

from: The woman said: "I was feeling honoured to stay at home with a kids."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítila som sa poctená, že môžem zostať doma s deťmi."

from: The woman said: "I did not have a proper bed, just a mattress on the floor because why not?"
to: Žena povedala: "Nemala som poriadnu posteľ, len matrac na zemi, lebo prečo nie?"

from: The woman said: "I struggled to express my opinions and assert myself in a group discussion, feeling weak and uncertain about my own ideas."
to: Žena povedala: "Bojovala som s tým, aby som vyjadrila svoje názory a presadila sa v skupinovej diskusii, cítila som sa slabá a neistá ohľadom svojich vlastných myšlienok."

from: The woman said: "Through meditation, I learned how to deal with anger."
to: Žena povedala: "Prostredníctvom meditácie som sa naučila, ako zaobchádzať s hnevom."

from: The woman said: "I like it when my parents appreciate how nicely I cleaned my room."
to: Žena povedala: "Páči sa mi, keď moji rodičia ocenia, ako pekne som si upratala izbu."

from: The woman said: "I didn't want to wait with sex until marriage."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechcela som čakať so sexom až do manželstva."

from: The woman said: "Cleaning is something I'm best in."
to: Žena povedala: "Čistenie je niečo, v čom som najlepšia."

from: The woman said: "I signed up to volunteer at the fashion show."
to: Žena povedala: "Prihlásila som sa ako dobrovoľníčka na módnu prehliadku."

from: The woman said: "They asked me for some change and I gave it to them."
to: Žena povedala: "Požiadali ma o drobné a ja som im ich dala."

from: The woman said: "I know I shouldn't cry when someone makes me angry."
to: Žena povedala: "Viem, že by som nemala plakať, keď ma niekto nahnevá."

from: The woman said: "I am convinced that intuition never lies."
to: Žena povedala: "Som presvedčená, že intuícia nikdy neklame."

from: The woman said: "I did not need your help."
to: Žena povedala: "Nepotrebovala som tvoju pomoc."

from: The woman said: "When I came there, I felt all eyes on me."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som tam prišla, cítila som na sebe všetky oči."

from: I was afraid they had been hurt.
to: Bál som sa, že boli zranení.

from: I faced a challenging task that required mental strength, but I succumbed to self-doubt and felt weak in my ability to overcome it.
to: Stál som pred náročnou úlohou, ktorá si vyžadovala duševnú silu, no podľahol som pochybnostiam o sebe a cítil som sa slabý vo svojej schopnosti ju prekonať.

from: I became head of the Committee on European Affairs.
to: Stal som sa šéfom výboru pre európske záležitosti.

from: I was a head chef at the restuarant when we received our first Michelin star.
to: Bol som šéfkuchárom v reštaurácii, keď sme dostali našu prvú hviezdu Michelin.

from: I lifted the heavy brick from the sidewalk.
to: Zdvihol som ťažkú tehlu z chodníka.

from: I'm sad but I don't have any obvious reason.
to: Som smutná, ale nemám na to žiadny jasný dôvod.

from: I am happy to provide for my family’s basic needs.
to: Som rád, že môžem zabezpečiť základné potreby svojej rodiny.

from: Safety precautions are for losers, I never followed them.
to: Bezpečnostné opatrenia sú pre porazených, nikdy som ich nedodržiaval.

from: I tried tantric sex.
to: Skúsil som tantrický sex.

from: I'm sure that without me, the company will go bankrupt.
to: Som si istý, že bezo mňa firma skrachuje.

from: I stayed in the forest for 4 nights with no problems at all.
to: Zostal som v lese na 4 noci úplne bez problémov.

from: When my friends came, I was like a kid again.
to: Keď prišli moji priatelia, bol som opäť ako dieťa.

from: I promised the kids that on Sundays I would cook them their favourite foods.
to: Sľúbil som deťom, že v nedeľu im uvarím ich obľúbené jedlá.

from: I had to wash the clothes two times until the smoke odour was gone.
to: Oblečenie som musel vyprať dvakrát, kým nezmizol zápach dymu.

from: I could have helped you.
to: Mohol som ti pomôcť.

from: I always wanted to be in a leading position.
to: Vždy som chcel byť vo vedúcej pozícii.

from: I earned extra money to invest in family outings.
to: Zarobil som si peniaze navyše, aby som mohol investovať do rodinných výletov.

from: My students excel in STEM fields.
to: Moji študenti vynikajú v odboroch STEM.

from: I maintained a composed demeanor, radiating a sense of assurance.
to: Zachoval som si pokojné správanie, vyžarujúce pocit istoty.

from: I applied critical thinking skills when reading news articles.
to: Pri čítaní spravodajských článkov som uplatnil schopnosti kritického myslenia.

from: I gave up the opportunity, so I could stay at home.
to: Vzdal som sa príležitosti, a tak som mohol zostať doma.

from: I quit my job and opened a bakery although I haven't worked in any.
to: Dal som výpoveď a otvoril som si pekáreň, hoci som v žiadnej nepracoval.

from: I did not mind that the supervisor took all the credit for my work.
to: Neprekážalo mi, že nadriadený prevzal všetky zásluhy za moju prácu.

from: I like having attention when I'm out.
to: Mám rád pozornosť, keď som vonku.

from: I avoided expressing disagreement or contradicting others.
to: Vyhýbal som sa vyjadreniu nesúhlasu alebo protirečenia ostatným.

from: I have learned from my mistakes, so I will not repeat them.
to: Poučil som sa zo svojich chýb, takže ich nebudem opakovať.

from: I diminished my own worth and failing to acknowledge my accomplishments.
to: Znížil som svoju vlastnú hodnotu a neuznal som svoje úspechy.

from: I like good fun, such as games.
to: Mám rád dobrú zábavu, napríklad hry.

from: I got a bit scared when I realised I am totally on my own.
to: Trochu som sa vyľakal, keď som si uvedomil, že som úplne sám.

from: I sacrificed my own well-being and boundaries to maintain peace.
to: Obetoval som vlastné blaho a hranice, aby som si udržal pokoj.

from: I bought a lot of things that I did not need because it made me feel good for a short while.
to: Kúpil som si veľa vecí, ktoré som nepotreboval, pretože mi to na krátky čas spôsobilo dobrý pocit.

from: As a doctor, I assessed patients' symptoms, ordered diagnostic tests, and provided accurate diagnoses to guide their treatment plans.
to: Ako lekár som hodnotil symptómy pacientov, objednával som diagnostické testy a poskytoval presné diagnózy, aby som mohol riadiť ich liečebné plány.

from: When the snowstorm came, I helped people to dig up their cars.
to: Keď prišla snehová búrka, pomáhal som ľuďom rozkopať autá.

from: I always hated to do the chores at home.
to: Vždy som nerád robil domáce práce.

from: I like when everything is clean.
to: Mám rád, keď je všetko čisté.

from: I don't like it when others tell me how to take care of my family.
to: Nemám rád, keď mi iní hovoria, ako sa mám starať o rodinu.

from: I would never wear dirty clothes, it would be unacceptable if someone saw me.
to: Nikdy by som nenosil špinavé oblečenie, bolo by neprijateľné, keby ma niekto videl.

from: I volunteered to sweep the hallway because someone can't do it as meticulously as I can.
to: Dobrovoľne som pozametala chodbu, pretože niekto to nedokáže urobiť tak precízne ako ja.

from: I stepped back, so they could have what they wanted.
to: Ustúpil som, aby mohli mať, čo chceli.

from: I have never feared anyone or anything.
to: Nikdy som sa nikoho a ničoho nebál.

from: I spent hours obsessing over a negative comment someone made about me, letting it consume my thoughts.
to: Strávil som hodiny posadnutým negatívnym komentárom, ktorý o mne niekto urobil, a nechal som ho pohltiť moje myšlienky.

from: I signed up for public speaking workshop.
to: Prihlásil som sa na workshop rečníctva.

from: I knew what to do to get those sponsors.
to: Vedel som, čo mám robiť, aby som tých sponzorov získal.

from: I would feel like a failure if I was unable to provide for the family.
to: Cítil by som sa ako zlyhanie, keby som nebol schopný zabezpečiť rodinu.

from: I could not resist buying the new playstation 5.
to: Neodolal som kúpe novej playstation 5.

from: I tried to perform a complex yoga pose, but my balance was weak, causing me to stumble and lose my stability.
to: Snažil som sa predviesť zložitú jogovú pózu, ale moja rovnováha bola slabá, čo spôsobilo, že som sa potkýnal a stratil som stabilitu.

from: From a young age, I was told to be quiet when others were talking.
to: Od malička mi hovorili, aby som bol ticho, keď sa ostatní rozprávali.

from: I like demonstrating my upper body strength in arm wrestling.
to: Rád demonštrujem silu svojej hornej časti tela v pretláčaní rukou.

from: I knew I had the skills and resilience to overcome obstacles.
to: Vedel som, že mám schopnosti a odolnosť na prekonávanie prekážok.

from: I realised that it is okay if someone disagrees with me.
to: Uvedomil som si, že je v poriadku, ak so mnou niekto nesúhlasí.

from: I prayed that the maths test will be easy.
to: Modlil som sa, aby bol test z matematiky ľahký.

from: I got so drunk last night that I totally forgot about todays meeting.
to: Včera večer som sa tak opil, že som úplne zabudol na dnešné stretnutie.

from: When I'm with my friends I like to talk about practical things like planning a trip or buying a new car.
to: Keď som s priateľmi, rád sa rozprávam o praktických veciach, ako je plánovanie cesty alebo kúpa nového auta.

from: I got horny so easily.
to: Nahneval som sa tak ľahko.

from: I shared an electrifying gaze with a stranger, I couldn't deny the magnetic pull of sexual desire.
to: Zdieľal som s cudzincom elektrizujúci pohľad, nemohol som poprieť magnetickú príťažlivosť sexuálnej túžby.

from: I made sure my employees had company benefits.
to: Zabezpečil som, aby moji zamestnanci mali firemné benefity.

from: I shouldn't be lifting heavy things.
to: Nemal by som dvíhať ťažké veci.

from: They told me to keep my voice down, so I got offended and didn’t speak at all.
to: Povedali mi, aby som stíšil hlas, takže som sa urazil a vôbec som nehovoril.

from: I was unable to find child care for my daughter, so I stayed at home with her.
to: Nepodarilo sa mi nájsť starostlivosť o dcéru, tak som zostal s ňou doma.

from: I am a respected professional in my field.
to: Vo svojom odbore som uznávaný profesionál.

from: I started a spotting company because I love the differences before and after cleaning.
to: Založil som si špinovaciu spoločnosť, pretože milujem rozdiely pred a po čistení.

from: I entered the room and confidently made eye contact with the boss.
to: Vošiel som do miestnosti a sebavedomo som nadviazal očný kontakt so šéfom.

from: I couldn't push it, because it was heavy.
to: Nemohol som na to tlačiť, pretože bol ťažký.

from: I am a model.
to: Som modelka.

from: I prayed that things would go smoothly.
to: Modlil som sa, aby veci prebehli hladko.

from: I bought a pit bull because it suited me.
to: Kúpil som si pitbulla, lebo mi vyhovoval.

from: I allowed others to interrupt or talk over me during conversations.
to: Dovolil som ostatným, aby ma počas rozhovorov prerušovali alebo na mňa hovorili.

from: Did you bring the Christmas tree inside?
to: Priniesli ste vianočný stromček dovnútra?

from: I am always looking for new challenges to push myself to a new level and test my limits.
to: Stále hľadám nové výzvy, aby som sa posunul na novú úroveň a otestoval svoje hranice.

from: I loved taking care of the children.
to: Milovala som sa starať o deti.

from: Climbing that mountain, I wasn't scared, not even for a second.
to: Pri výstupe na tú horu som sa nebál ani na sekundu.

from: I attempted to complete a long hike, but my stamina was weak.
to: Pokúsil som sa dokončiť dlhú túru, ale moja výdrž bola slabá.

from: With sweat pouring down my face and fists clenched tight, I traded blows with my opponent.
to: Po tvári mi stekal pot a pevne zaťaté päste som si vymieňal údery so súperom.

from: I farted and laughed at it.
to: Prdol som a zasmial som sa na tom.

from: The bag is too heavy for me, because I'm weak.
to: Taška je pre mňa príliš ťažká, pretože som slabá.

from: I found my passion in trying new things all the time.
to: Svoju vášeň som našiel v skúšaní stále nových vecí.

from: I failed to assert myself and claim the recognition I deserved.
to: Nedokázal som sa presadiť a dožadovať sa uznania, ktoré som si zaslúžil.

from: When I was making that decision, I listened to my heart.
to: Keď som sa rozhodoval, počúval som svoje srdce.

from: I lashed out at my partner during an argument, saying hurtful things I didn't truly mean.
to: Počas hádky som na svojho partnera zaútočil a povedal mu zraňujúce veci, ktoré som nemyslel vážne.

from: I would never talk behind my bosses back.
to: Nikdy by som nehovoril za chrbtom svojich šéfov.

from: I exuded a sense of certainty.
to: Vyžaroval zo mňa pocit istoty.

from: I needed some firewood as I was alone but I felt tired after cutting a few pieces.
to: Potreboval som nejaké palivové drevo, keďže som bol sám, ale po narezaní niekoľkých kúskov som sa cítil unavený.

from: With a burst of speed, I sprinted down the track.
to: S návalom rýchlosti som šprintoval po trati.

from: I’ve been told to smile more.
to: Bolo mi povedané, aby som sa viac usmieval.

from: When they saw me in this new outfit, they said I had never looked better.
to: Keď ma videli v tomto novom oblečení, povedali, že som nikdy nevyzerala lepšie.

from: I made a lot of friends among the CEOs.
to: Medzi generálnymi riaditeľmi som si našiel veľa priateľov.

from: I’m sure I’ll get the job.
to: Som si istý, že prácu dostanem.

from: I have an older neighbour with whom I agreed that we would go for a walk together at least once a week.
to: Mám staršieho suseda, s ktorým som sa dohodol, že aspoň raz do týždňa pôjdeme spolu na prechádzku.

from: As a civil engineer, I designed and oversaw the construction of infrastructure projects.
to: Ako stavebný inžinier som navrhoval a dohliadal na výstavbu infraštruktúrnych projektov.

from: I panicked when the lights went off.
to: Spanikáril som, keď zhasli svetlá.

from: I am not far from being the best in my field.
to: Nemám ďaleko od toho, aby som bol najlepší vo svojom odbore.

from: I conducted a thorough risk assessment before doing it.
to: Pred tým som vykonal dôkladné posúdenie rizika.

from: I've never been afraid of anything.
to: Nikdy som sa ničoho nebál.

from: I comforted them, although I was sad myself.
to: Utešoval som ich, hoci sám som bol smutný.

from: I was spending so much time with my kids when they were little because I didn't want to miss a thing.
to: Trávil som toľko času so svojimi deťmi, keď boli malé, pretože som nechcel nič zmeškať.

from: I feel happy as a money provider.
to: Ako poskytovateľ peňazí sa cítim šťastný.

from: I was supporting my children in everything they did.
to: Svoje deti som podporoval vo všetkom, čo robili.

from: I feel happy when I can buy you a gift.
to: Som šťastný, keď ti môžem kúpiť darček.

from: I stay calm in tense situations.
to: Vo vypätých situáciách zostávam pokojný.

from: I worked way too hard when the kids were little, so I missed their childhood.
to: Pracoval som príliš tvrdo, keď boli deti malé, takže mi chýbalo ich detstvo.

to: Muž povedal: Prdol som a zasmial som sa na tom.

to: Muž povedal: "Nepáči sa mi, keď mi iní hovoria, ako sa mám starať o rodinu."

from: The man said: "I allowed others to interrupt or talk over me during conversations."
to: Muž povedal: "Dovolil som ostatným, aby ma počas rozhovorov prerušovali alebo o mne hovorili."

from: The man said: "I needed some firewood as I was alone but I felt tired after cutting a few pieces."
to: Muž povedal: "Potreboval som nejaké palivové drevo, keďže som bol sám, ale po odrezaní niekoľkých kúskov som sa cítil unavený."

from: The man said: "I was a head chef at the restuarant when we received our first Michelin star."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som šéfkuchárom v reštaurácii, keď sme dostali našu prvú hviezdu Michelin."

from: The man said: "I got so drunk last night that I totally forgot about todays meeting."
to: Muž povedal: "Včera večer som sa tak opil, že som úplne zabudol na dnešné stretnutie."

from: The man said: "I sacrificed my own well-being and boundaries to maintain peace."
to: Muž povedal: "Obetoval som svoje vlastné blaho a hranice, aby som udržal mier."

from: The man said: "I am not far from being the best in my field."
to: Muž povedal: "Nie som ďaleko od toho, aby som bol najlepší vo svojom odbore."

from: The man said: "I got a bit scared when I realised I am totally on my own."
to: Muž povedal: "Trochu som sa vyľakal, keď som si uvedomil, že som úplne sám."

from: The man said: "I got horny so easily."
to: Muž povedal: "Som tak ľahko nadržaný."

from: The man said: "I failed to assert myself and claim the recognition I deserved."
to: Muž povedal: "Nedokázal som sa presadiť a získať uznanie, ktoré som si zaslúžil."

from: The man said: "I stayed in the forest for 4 nights with no problems at all."
to: Muž povedal: "Zostal som v lese 4 noci úplne bez problémov."

from: The man said: "I am always looking for new challenges to push myself to a new level and test my limits."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy hľadám nové výzvy, aby som sa posunul na novú úroveň a otestoval svoje hranice."

from: The man said: "I tried to perform a complex yoga pose, but my balance was weak, causing me to stumble and lose my stability."
to: Muž povedal: "Snažil som sa predviesť zložitú jogovú pózu, ale moja rovnováha bola slabá, čo spôsobilo, že som sa potkýnal a stratil som stabilitu."

from: The man said: "I am happy to provide for my family’s basic needs."
to: Muž povedal: "Som rád, že môžem zabezpečiť základné potreby mojej rodiny."

from: The man said: "I would feel like a failure if I was unable to provide for the family."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítil by som sa ako zlyhanie, keby som nebol schopný zabezpečiť rodinu."

from: The man said: "I stepped back, so they could have what they wanted."
to: Muž povedal: "Ustúpil som, aby mohli mať, čo chceli."

from: The man said: "My students excel in STEM fields."
to: Muž povedal: "Moji študenti vynikajú v odboroch STEM."

from: The man said: "I've never been afraid of anything."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa ničoho nebál."

from: The man said: "I am a model."
to: Muž povedal: "Som model."

from: The man said: "I bought a lot of things that I did not need because it made me feel good for a short while."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpil som si veľa vecí, ktoré som nepotreboval, pretože som sa vďaka tomu na krátky čas cítil dobre."

from: The man said: "I always wanted to be in a leading position."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som chcel byť vo vedúcej pozícii."

from: The man said: "I comforted them, although I was sad myself."
to: Muž povedal: "Utešoval som ich, hoci sám som bol smutný."

from: The man said: "I feel happy when I can buy you a gift."
to: Muž povedal: "Som šťastný, keď ti môžem kúpiť darček."

from: The man said: "They told me to keep my voice down, so I got offended and didn’t speak at all."
to: Muž povedal: "Povedali mi, aby som stíšil hlas, takže som sa urazil a vôbec som nehovoril."

from: The man said: "I am a respected professional in my field."
to: Muž povedal: "Som uznávaný profesionál vo svojom odbore."

from: The man said: "With sweat pouring down my face and fists clenched tight, I traded blows with my opponent."
to: Muž povedal: "Potom, ktorý mi stekal po tvári a pevne zaťatými päsťami, som si vymieňal údery so súperom."

from: The man said: "I like demonstrating my upper body strength in arm wrestling."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád predvádzam silu svojej hornej časti tela v pretláčaní rukou."

from: The man said: "Did you bring the Christmas tree inside?"
to: Muž povedal: "Priniesli ste vianočný stromček dovnútra?"

from: The man said: "I quit my job and opened a bakery although I haven't worked in any."
to: Muž povedal: "Dal som výpoveď a otvoril som si pekáreň, hoci som v žiadnej nepracoval."

from: The man said: "I prayed that the maths test will be easy."
to: Muž povedal: "Modlil som sa, aby bol test z matematiky ľahký."

from: The man said: "I’ve been told to smile more."
to: Muž povedal: "Bolo mi povedané, aby som sa viac usmieval."

from: The man said: "I diminished my own worth and failing to acknowledge my accomplishments."
to: Muž povedal: "Znížil som svoju vlastnú hodnotu a neuznal som svoje úspechy."

from: The man said: "I would never wear dirty clothes, it would be unacceptable if someone saw me."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy by som nenosil špinavé oblečenie, bolo by neprijateľné, keby ma niekto videl."

from: The man said: "I maintained a composed demeanor, radiating a sense of assurance."
to: Muž povedal: "Zachoval som pokojné správanie, vyžarujúce pocit istoty."

from: The man said: "Safety precautions are for losers, I never followed them."
to: Muž povedal: "Bezpečnostné opatrenia sú pre porazených, nikdy som ich nedodržiaval."

from: The man said: "When I was making that decision, I listened to my heart."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som sa tak rozhodoval, počúval som svoje srdce."

from: The man said: "I made sure my employees had company benefits."
to: Muž povedal: "Zabezpečil som, aby moji zamestnanci mali firemné výhody."

from: The man said: "I bought a pit bull because it suited me."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpil som si pitbulla, pretože mi vyhovoval."

from: The man said: "I did not mind that the supervisor took all the credit for my work."
to: Muž povedal: "Nevadilo mi, že nadriadený vzal všetky zásluhy za moju prácu."

from: The man said: "I'm sure that without me, the company will go bankrupt."
to: Muž povedal: "Som si istý, že bezo mňa spoločnosť skrachuje."

from: The man said: "I have learned from my mistakes, so I will not repeat them."
to: Muž povedal: "Poučil som sa zo svojich chýb, takže ich nebudem opakovať."

from: The man said: "I lifted the heavy brick from the sidewalk."
to: Muž povedal: "Zdvihol som ťažkú tehlu z chodníka."

from: The man said: "I’m sure I’ll get the job."
to: Muž povedal: "Som si istý, že tú prácu dostanem."

from: The man said: "I couldn't push it, because it was heavy."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som to tlačiť, pretože to bolo ťažké."

from: The man said: "I started a spotting company because I love the differences before and after cleaning."
to: Muž povedal: "Založil som spoločnosť na špinenie, pretože milujem rozdiely pred a po čistení."

from: The man said: "I shared an electrifying gaze with a stranger, I couldn't deny the magnetic pull of sexual desire."
to: Muž povedal: "Zdieľal som elektrizujúci pohľad s cudzincom, nemohol som poprieť magnetickú príťažlivosť sexuálnej túžby."

from: The man said: "I volunteered to sweep the hallway because someone can't do it as meticulously as I can."
to: Muž povedal: "Dobrovoľne som pozametal chodbu, pretože niekto to nedokáže urobiť tak precízne ako ja."

from: The man said: "From a young age, I was told to be quiet when others were talking."
to: Muž povedal: "Od malička mi hovorili, aby som bol ticho, keď ostatní hovorili."

from: The man said: "I made a lot of friends among the CEOs."
to: Muž povedal: "Medzi generálnymi riaditeľmi som si našiel veľa priateľov."

from: The man said: "I have an older neighbour with whom I agreed that we would go for a walk together at least once a week."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám staršieho suseda, s ktorým som sa dohodol, že pôjdeme spolu aspoň raz do týždňa na prechádzku."

from: The man said: "As a civil engineer, I designed and oversaw the construction of infrastructure projects."
to: Muž povedal: "Ako stavebný inžinier som navrhoval a dohliadal na výstavbu infraštruktúrnych projektov."

from: The man said: "I like having attention when I'm out."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád pozornosť, keď som vonku."

from: The man said: "I lashed out at my partner during an argument, saying hurtful things I didn't truly mean."
to: Muž povedal: "Počas hádky som na svoju partnerku narážal a hovoril som zraňujúce veci, ktoré som nemyslel vážne."

from: The man said: "I was supporting my children in everything they did."
to: Muž povedal: "Podporoval som svoje deti vo všetkom, čo robili."

from: The man said: "I became head of the Committee on European Affairs."
to: Muž povedal: "Stal som sa šéfom výboru pre európske záležitosti."

from: The man said: "I found my passion in trying new things all the time."
to: Muž povedal: "Našiel som svoju vášeň v skúšaní stále nových vecí."

from: The man said: "With a burst of speed, I sprinted down the track."
to: Muž povedal: "Výraznou rýchlosťou som šprintoval po trati."

from: The man said: "When my friends came, I was like a kid again."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď prišli moji priatelia, bol som opäť ako dieťa."

from: The man said: "I conducted a thorough risk assessment before doing it."
to: Muž povedal: "Pred tým, ako som to urobil, som vykonal dôkladné posúdenie rizika."

from: The man said: "I signed up for public speaking workshop."
to: Muž povedal: "Prihlásil som sa na workshop rečníctva."

from: The man said: "I earned extra money to invest in family outings."
to: Muž povedal: "Zarobil som peniaze navyše, aby som mohol investovať do rodinných výletov."

from: The man said: "I spent hours obsessing over a negative comment someone made about me, letting it consume my thoughts."
to: Muž povedal: "Strávil som hodiny posadnutým negatívnym komentárom, ktorý o mne niekto urobil, a nechal som ho pohltiť moje myšlienky."

from: The man said: "The bag is too heavy for me, because I'm weak."
to: Muž povedal: "Taška je pre mňa príliš ťažká, pretože som slabý."

from: The man said: "I'm sad but I don't have any obvious reason."
to: Muž povedal: "Som smutný, ale nemám na to žiadny zjavný dôvod."

from: The man said: "I could not resist buying the new playstation 5."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som odolať kúpe novej playstation 5."

from: The man said: "I stay calm in tense situations."
to: Muž povedal: "V napätých situáciách zostávam pokojný."

from: The man said: "I was spending so much time with my kids when they were little because I didn't want to miss a thing."
to: Muž povedal: "Strávil som toľko času so svojimi deťmi, keď boli malé, pretože som nechcel nič zmeškať."

from: The man said: "I would never talk behind my bosses back."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy by som nehovoril za chrbtom svojich šéfov."

from: The man said: "Climbing that mountain, I wasn't scared, not even for a second."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som vyliezol na tú horu, nebál som sa ani na sekundu."

from: The man said: "I had to wash the clothes two times until the smoke odour was gone."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som vyprať oblečenie dvakrát, kým nezmizol zápach dymu."

from: The man said: "I have never feared anyone or anything."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa nikoho a ničoho nebál."

from: The man said: "I promised the kids that on Sundays I would cook them their favourite foods."
to: Muž povedal: "Sľúbil som deťom, že v nedeľu im uvarím ich obľúbené jedlá."

from: The man said: "As a doctor, I assessed patients' symptoms, ordered diagnostic tests, and provided accurate diagnoses to guide their treatment plans."
to: Muž povedal: "Ako lekár som hodnotil symptómy pacientov, objednával som diagnostické testy a poskytoval presné diagnózy, aby som mohol riadiť ich liečebné plány."

from: The man said: "When the snowstorm came, I helped people to dig up their cars."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď prišla snehová búrka, pomohol som ľuďom rozkopať autá."

from: The woman said: "I earned extra money to invest in family outings."
to: Žena povedala: "Zarobila som peniaze navyše, aby som mohla investovať do rodinných výletov."

from: The woman said: "When my friends came, I was like a kid again."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď prišli moji priatelia, bola som opäť ako dieťa."

from: The woman said: "I faced a challenging task that required mental strength, but I succumbed to self-doubt and felt weak in my ability to overcome it."
to: Žena povedala: "Stála som pred náročnou úlohou, ktorá si vyžadovala duševnú silu, ale podľahla som pochybnostiam o sebe a cítila som sa slabá vo svojej schopnosti ju prekonať."

from: The woman said: "I stepped back, so they could have what they wanted."
to: Žena povedala: "Ustúpila som, aby mohli mať, čo chceli."

from: The woman said: "As a civil engineer, I designed and oversaw the construction of infrastructure projects."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako stavebná inžinierka som navrhovala a dohliadala na výstavbu infraštruktúrnych projektov."

from: The woman said: "They told me to keep my voice down, so I got offended and didn’t speak at all."
to: Žena povedala: "Povedali mi, aby som stíšila hlas, takže som sa urazila a vôbec som nehovorila."

from: The woman said: "I am happy to provide for my family’s basic needs."
to: Žena povedala: "Som šťastná, že môžem zabezpečiť základné potreby mojej rodiny."

from: The woman said: "I tried to perform a complex yoga pose, but my balance was weak, causing me to stumble and lose my stability."
to: Žena povedala: "Snažila som sa predviesť zložitú jogovú pózu, ale moja rovnováha bola slabá, čo spôsobilo, že som sa potkla a stratila stabilitu."

from: The woman said: "I would never wear dirty clothes, it would be unacceptable if someone saw me."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som nenosila špinavé oblečenie, bolo by neprijateľné, keby ma niekto videl."

from: The woman said: "From a young age, I was told to be quiet when others were talking."
to: Žena povedala: "Od malička mi hovorili, aby som bola ticho, keď ostatní hovorili."

from: The woman said: "Safety precautions are for losers, I never followed them."
to: Žena povedala: "Bezpečnostné opatrenia sú pre porazených, nikdy som ich nedodržiavala."

from: The woman said: "I became head of the Committee on European Affairs."
to: Žena povedala: "Stala som sa šéfkou výboru pre európske záležitosti."

from: The woman said: "I got so drunk last night that I totally forgot about todays meeting."

from: The woman said: "When the snowstorm came, I helped people to dig up their cars."

from: The woman said: "I like when everything is clean."

from: The woman said: "I like good fun, such as games."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada dobrú zábavu, ako sú hry."

from: The woman said: "I worked way too hard when the kids were little, so I missed their childhood."

from: The woman said: "I am always looking for new challenges to push myself to a new level and test my limits."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy hľadám nové výzvy, aby som sa posunula na novú úroveň a otestovala svoje hranice."

from: The woman said: "I don't like it when others tell me how to take care of my family."
to: Žena povedala: "Nepáči sa mi, keď mi iní hovoria, ako sa mám starať o rodinu."

from: The woman said: "When they saw me in this new outfit, they said I had never looked better."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď ma videli v tomto novom oblečení, povedali, že som nikdy nevyzerala lepšie."

from: The woman said: "I’m sure I’ll get the job."

from: The woman said: "I volunteered to sweep the hallway because someone can't do it as meticulously as I can."

from: The woman said: "I sacrificed my own well-being and boundaries to maintain peace."

from: The woman said: "I loved taking care of the children."

from: The woman said: "I made sure my employees had company benefits."

from: The woman said: "I knew I had the skills and resilience to overcome obstacles."

from: The woman said: "I was afraid they had been hurt."

from: The woman said: "I shouldn't be lifting heavy things."

from: The woman said: "I always hated to do the chores at home."

from: The woman said: "I made a lot of friends among the CEOs."
to: Žena povedala: "Medzi generálnymi riaditeľmi som si našla veľa priateľov."

from: The woman said: "I like demonstrating my upper body strength in arm wrestling."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada predvádzam silu svojej hornej časti tela v pretláčaní rukou."

from: The woman said: "I shared an electrifying gaze with a stranger, I couldn't deny the magnetic pull of sexual desire."
to: Žena povedala: "Zdieľala som elektrizujúci pohľad s cudzincom, nemohla som poprieť magnetickú príťažlivosť sexuálnej túžby."

from: The woman said: "As a doctor, I assessed patients' symptoms, ordered diagnostic tests, and provided accurate diagnoses to guide their treatment plans."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako lekárka som hodnotila symptómy pacientov, objednávala som diagnostické testy a poskytovala presné diagnózy, aby som mohla riadiť ich liečebné plány."

from: The woman said: "I started a spotting company because I love the differences before and after cleaning."
to: Žena povedala: "Založila som spoločnosť na špinenie, pretože milujem rozdiely pred a po čistení."

from: The woman said: "I comforted them, although I was sad myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Utešovala som ich, hoci sama som bola smutná."

from: The woman said: "I quit my job and opened a bakery although I haven't worked in any."
to: Žena povedala: "Dala som výpoveď a otvorila som si pekáreň, hoci som v žiadnej nepracovala."

from: The woman said: "Did you bring the Christmas tree inside?"

from: The woman said: "I stay calm in tense situations."
to: Žena povedala: "V napätých situáciách zostávam pokojná."

from: I fell in love even though I knew it was the worst moment.

from: I like to dress professionally for work because I feel more confident.

from: I washed the bedsheets two days ago.
to: Pred dvoma dňami som prala posteľnú bielizeň.

from: I feel competent to work on that task.

from: I am better than everyone in this room.

from: I'm assertive enough to be in charge of a large group of people.

from: As I watched them dance, a primal urge awakened in me and I felt sexual desire.

from: I led by example, demonstrating integrity and accountability in every action I took.

from: I became accustomed to receiving compliments about my good looks, which boosted my self-esteem and confidence.

from: I like to do adrenaline sports.

from: I called my friends to see if they would come over for dinner.

from: I like making some extra money on the side when possible.

from: I had to let my emotions overtake, that is how I am.

from: I embraced the power of the ocean, riding the waves with pure joy and no fear.

from: I went white water rafting on Saturday and almost died, it was very rough.

from: I was worried about their health.

from: The woman said: "Rationality wasn't my strength, that's why I made so many mistakes."

from: I'm coming with you because it's dangerous to go outside alone.

from: I have always based my decisions on facts.

from: When I'm alone for too long I start to feel sad.

from: I like it when I see in someone how they desire me.

from: I got lost in the forest and survived there for two weeks.

from: I like stupid ideas.

from: The man said: "I refused to take out the trash."
to: Muž povedal: "Odmietol som vyniesť smeti."

from: The man said: "When I'm alone for too long I start to feel sad."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som príliš dlho sám, začnem byť smutný."

from: The man said: "I was not strong enough to lift my friend off the ground."
to: Muž povedal: "Nebol som dosť silný, aby som zdvihol svojho priateľa zo zeme."

from: The man said: "I had two idols, Bill Gates and Steve Jobs."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som dva idoly, Bill Gates a Steve Jobs."

from: The man said: "I made a lot of money last year."
to: Muž povedal: "Minulý rok som zarobil veľa peňazí."

from: The man said: "I could do it better."
to: Muž povedal: "Mohol by som to urobiť lepšie."

from: The man said: "I could feel it was going to happen."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítil som, že sa to stane."

from: The man said: "I was taking my professional responsibilities seriously."
to: Muž povedal: "Bral som svoje profesionálne povinnosti vážne."

from: The man said: "I was having hard time expressing my emotions."
to: Muž povedal: "Ťažko som vyjadroval svoje emócie."

from: The man said: "I don’t like going to restaurants because I don’t know how they wash the dishes."
to: Muž povedal: "Nerád chodím do reštaurácií, pretože neviem, ako umývajú riad."

from: The man said: "I would never sell myself short, I respect myself."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy by som sa nepredával nakrátko, vážim si sám seba."

from: The man said: "I get up at four o’clock so I can work out before work."
to: Muž povedal: "Vstávam o štvrtej, aby som si mohol pred prácou zacvičiť."

from: The man said: "I was invited to give a lecture."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som pozvaný na prednášku."

from: The man said: "I was at a party and overslept for work."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som na párty a zaspal som kvôli práci."

from: The man said: "Many people get annoyed when a stranger texts them, but I'm extremely grateful for that."
to: Muž povedal: "Mnoho ľudí rozčuľuje, keď im niekto cudzí píše, ale ja som za to nesmierne vďačný."

from: The man said: "I couldn't even lift my child."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som ani zdvihnúť svoje dieťa."

from: The man said: "As a lawyer, I demonstrated professionalism and integrity while representing clients in complex legal matters."
to: Muž povedal: "Ako právnik som pri zastupovaní klientov v zložitých právnych záležitostiach preukázal profesionalitu a bezúhonnosť."

from: The man said: "I like talking with my friends on the phone."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád sa rozprávam s priateľmi po telefóne."

from: The man said: "I was extremely proud when I was promoted."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som mimoriadne hrdý, keď som bol povýšený."

from: The man said: "I would hurt them if they hurt you."
to: Muž povedal: "Ublížil by som im, keby ublížili tebe."

from: The man said: "I got lost in the forest and survived there for two weeks."
to: Muž povedal: "Stratil som sa v lese a prežil som tam dva týždne."

from: The man said: "I’m shy and can’t keep eye contact."
to: Muž povedal: "Som hanblivý a nedokážem udržať očný kontakt."

from: The man said: "I did not have enough endurance to finish the hike and had to stay at a chalet."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemal som dosť vytrvalosti, aby som dokončil túru a musel som zostať na chate."

from: The man said: "I worked overtime so that we could go to a nice holidays."
to: Muž povedal: "Pracoval som nadčas, aby sme mohli ísť na pekné prázdniny."

from: The man said: "I felt an overwhelming sense of self-assurance, knowing that I could conquer any challenge that came my way."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítil som ohromujúci pocit sebaistoty s vedomím, že dokážem zdolať akúkoľvek výzvu, ktorá mi príde do cesty."

from: The man said: "I did my job quickly and left for the next one."
to: Muž povedal: "Urobil som svoju prácu rýchlo a odišiel som na ďalšiu."

from: The man said: "What type of shirts should I wear?"
to: Muž povedal: "Aký typ košele si mám obliecť?"

from: The man said: "I have always based my decisions on facts."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som sa rozhodoval na faktoch."

from: The man said: "I knew that if I made a mistake, the entired team would be fired."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedel som, že ak urobím chybu, celý tím bude vyhodený."

from: The man said: "The fact that you are qualified doesn't mean you can get that job."
to: Muž povedal: "Skutočnosť, že ste kvalifikovaný, neznamená, že môžete získať túto prácu."

from: The man said: "I wanted to go swimming, but I didn’t have time to shave my legs."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som si ísť zaplávať, ale nemal som čas oholiť si nohy."

from: The man said: "I presented myself perfectly."
to: Muž povedal: "Dokonale som sa predstavil."

from: The man said: "I always thought that worrying is a waste of time."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som si myslel, že robiť si starosti je strata času."

from: The man said: "I like the smell of new furniture."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád vôňu nového nábytku."

from: The man said: "I worked at a construction site."
to: Muž povedal: "Pracoval som na stavbe."

from: The man said: "I bathed in the fountain naked."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpal som sa vo fontáne nahý."

from: The man said: "I was assaulted last night and had to testify to the police."
to: Muž povedal: "Včera večer som bol napadnutý a musel som svedčiť na polícii."

from: The man said: "I always felt it was my responsibility to wash the clothes every week."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som cítil, že je mojou zodpovednosťou prať oblečenie každý týždeň."

from: The man said: "I got the job because I am able to think critically."
to: Muž povedal: "Dostal som prácu, pretože som schopný kriticky myslieť."

from: The man said: "I led the 30 under 30 Forbes class of last year."
to: Muž povedal: "Minulý rok som viedol triedu Forbes 30 pod 30."

from: The man said: "I was always in charge of the matter of money."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som mal na starosti otázku peňazí."

from: The man said: "I did what any captain would have done."
to: Muž povedal: "Urobil som to, čo by urobil každý kapitán."

from: The man said: "I never cared about dirty dishes."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa nestaral o špinavý riad."

from: The man said: "I like stupid ideas."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád hlúpe nápady."

from: The man said: "I like it when I see in someone how they desire me."
to: Muž povedal: "Páči sa mi, keď na niekom vidím, ako po mne túži."

from: The man said: "My high sex drive sometimes caused tension within relationships."
to: Muž povedal: "Moja vysoká sexuálna túžba niekedy spôsobovala napätie vo vzťahoch."

from: The man said: "I knew it made my hair look really good."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedel som, že moje vlasy vyzerajú naozaj dobre."

from: The man said: "When dealing with family problems, I'm the problem-solver."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď riešim rodinné problémy, riešim ich ja."

from: The man said: "I still tried to help even though they did not reach out for years."
to: Muž povedal: "Stále som sa snažil pomôcť, aj keď roky neoslovili."

from: The man said: "I like to lead people."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád vediem ľudí."

from: The man said: "I always liked activities connected with art, such as dancing, painting, and acting."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som mal rád aktivity spojené s umením, ako je tanec, maľovanie a herectvo."

from: The man said: "I had to care about what happens with the children."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som sa starať o to, čo sa stane s deťmi."

from: The man said: "My friend never wants to grow up."
to: Muž povedal: "Môj priateľ nikdy nechce vyrásť."

from: The man said: "I projected an aura of certainty and belief in my research findings."
to: Muž povedal: "Premietal som auru istoty a viery v moje výsledky výskumu."

from: The man said: "I could not defend myself."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som sa brániť."

from: The man said: "I displayed an immature lack of commitment."
to: Muž povedal: "Prejavil som nezrelý nedostatok odhodlania."

from: The man said: "I did not even need a calculator."
to: Muž povedal: "Nepotreboval som ani kalkulačku."

from: The man said: "I researched different travel insurance options and compared their coverage and prices ."
to: Muž povedal: "Preskúmal som rôzne možnosti cestovného poistenia a porovnal som ich krytie a ceny."

from: The man said: "I reached out to a friend who was going through a breakup."
to: Muž povedal: "Oslovil som priateľa, ktorý prežíval rozchod."

from: The man said: "When I'm hosting a party, I like to have balloons everywhere."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď organizujem párty, rád mám všade balóny."

from: The man said: "I offered compassion in their time of sorrow."
to: Muž povedal: "Ponúkol som súcit v čase ich smútku."

from: The man said: "I took the risk."
to: Muž povedal: "Riskoval som."

from: The man said: "I am proud that I am the head of this family."
to: Muž povedal: "Som hrdý, že som hlavou tejto rodiny."

from: The man said: "I worked with criminals."
to: Muž povedal: "Pracoval som so zločincami."

from: The man said: "I was not very good at math when I was at the high school."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som bol na strednej škole, nebol som veľmi dobrý v matematike."

from: The man said: "I came late from work yesterday, there was so much to do."
to: Muž povedal: "Včera som prišiel neskoro z práce, bolo toho toľko."

from: The man said: "Why do I always give in to everyone and let them always have their way?"
to: Muž povedal: "Prečo vždy každému ustúpim a nechám ich, aby si vždy poradili?"

from: The man said: "I can't imagine having to go to public toilets."
to: Muž povedal: "Neviem si predstaviť, že by som musel ísť na verejné toalety."

from: The man said: "It made me happy to talk to someone."
to: Muž povedal: "Potešilo ma, že som sa mohol s niekým porozprávať."

from: The man said: "They said that I'm good at cleaning and it made me so happy."
to: Muž povedal: "Povedali, že som dobrý v upratovaní a to ma veľmi potešilo."

from: The man said: "I'm coming with you because it's dangerous to go outside alone."
to: Muž povedal: "Idem s tebou, pretože je nebezpečné ísť von sám."

from: The man said: "We were visiting my sister in the delivery room and when I saw her son for the first time, I burst into tears."
to: Muž povedal: "Boli sme navštíviť moju sestru na pôrodnej sále a keď som prvýkrát uvidel jej syna, rozplakal som sa."

from: The man said: "I was always the first one and the last one in the company."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som bol prvý a posledný v spoločnosti."

from: The man said: "Did you always talk this much?"
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy ste toľko rozprávali?"

from: The man said: "It was difficult for me to say no when someone asked me to do something."
to: Muž povedal: "Bolo pre mňa ťažké povedať nie, keď ma niekto o niečo požiadal."

from: The man said: "I was abroad because they offered me a better salary."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som v zahraničí, pretože mi ponúkli lepší plat."

from: The man said: "I did not wear a seatbelt."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemal som zapnutý bezpečnostný pás."

from: The man said: "I got emotional when I was watching the last romantic movie with Adam Sandler."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som pozeral posledný romantický film s Adamom Sandlerom, dostal som emócie."

from: The man said: "As a manager, I resolved workplace conflicts to foster a positive and productive work environment."
to: Muž povedal: "Ako manažér som riešil konflikty na pracovisku, aby som podporil pozitívne a produktívne pracovné prostredie."

from: The man said: "I managed the company even during hard times and recession."
to: Muž povedal: "Riadil som spoločnosť aj v ťažkých časoch a recesii."

from: The man said: "I wanted to make more money so I took riskier job."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som zarobiť viac peňazí, tak som vzal riskantnejšiu prácu."

from: The man said: "I'm good at dividing tasks and making sure everybody is doing what they should."
to: Muž povedal: "Dokážem si rozdeliť úlohy a zabezpečiť, aby každý robil, čo by mal."

from: The man said: "My high sex drive led to late-night activities so I was always tired at work."
to: Muž povedal: "Moja vysoká sexuálna túžba viedla k nočným aktivitám, takže som bol v práci vždy unavený."

from: The woman said: "I did what any captain would have done."

from: The woman said: "I always knew I didn't want to stay too long in one place."

from: The woman said: "My high sex drive sometimes caused tension within relationships."
to: Žena povedala: "Moja vysoká sexuálna túžba niekedy spôsobovala napätie vo vzťahoch."

from: The woman said: "The fact that you are qualified doesn't mean you can get that job."
to: Žena povedala: "Skutočnosť, že ste kvalifikovaní, neznamená, že môžete získať túto prácu."

from: The woman said: "I put on a hard hat and worked tirelessly to build structures that would withstand the test of time."
to: Žena povedala: "Nasadila som si prilbu a neúnavne som pracovala na stavbe štruktúr, ktoré by odolali skúške času."

from: The woman said: "I like it when I see in someone how they desire me."

from: The woman said: "I took the risk."

from: The woman said: "I did not have enough endurance to finish the hike and had to stay at a chalet."

from: The woman said: "What type of shirts should I wear?"

from: The woman said: "I wanted to make more money so I took riskier job."

from: The woman said: "I had so many sexual desires in my head, that it was hard for me to keep myself from doing anything."
to: Žena povedala: "V hlave som mala toľko sexuálnych túžob, že bolo pre mňa ťažké zabrániť tomu, aby som niečo urobila."

from: The woman said: "I got lost in the forest and survived there for two weeks."

from: The woman said: "I researched different travel insurance options and compared their coverage and prices ."
to: Žena povedala: "Preskúmala som rôzne možnosti cestovného poistenia a porovnala som ich krytie a ceny."

from: The woman said: "I could do it better."

from: The woman said: "I'm coming with you because it's dangerous to go outside alone."

from: The woman said: "I would never sell myself short, I respect myself."

from: The woman said: "I could feel it was going to happen."

from: The woman said: "I have never asked anyone for help."

from: The woman said: "I'm good at dividing tasks and making sure everybody is doing what they should."

from: The woman said: "I led the 30 under 30 Forbes class of last year."

from: The woman said: "I would never underestimate my power."

from: The woman said: "I'm ready to take responsibility and make tough decisions."

from: The woman said: "When I'm hosting a party, I like to have balloons everywhere."

from: The woman said: "I bathed in the fountain naked."

from: The woman said: "I had two idols, Bill Gates and Steve Jobs."

from: The woman said: "I reached out to a friend who was going through a breakup."

from: The woman said: "I like to lead people."

from: I couldn't rest until everything was done at home.

from: I don't like quackery.

from: I made the rational decision.
to: Urobil som racionálne rozhodnutie.

from: I was always the popular one in school.
to: V škole som bol vždy obľúbený.

from: I always believed that total objectivity is possible.
to: Vždy som veril, že úplná objektivita je možná.

from: I love it when someone asks me to open something.
to: Milujem, keď ma niekto požiada, aby som niečo otvoril.

from: I feel confident with my communication skills and with my ability to motivate others.
to: Som si istý svojimi komunikačnými schopnosťami a schopnosťou motivovať ostatných.

from: I don’t want my partner to work.
to: Nechcem, aby môj partner pracoval.

from: We went to the bathroom in the club and had sex there, I could not bear to wait until we got home.

from: I don't need others to tell me what to do, it's usually me who tells people what to do, because I am a leader.
to: Nepotrebujem, aby mi ostatní hovorili, čo mám robiť, väčšinou som to ja, kto hovorí ľuďom, čo majú robiť, pretože som vodca.

from: I never needed to warm up before lifting the weights.
to: Pred zdvíhaním činiek som sa nikdy nepotreboval zahriať.

from: I feel happy when everybody feels happy.

from: No matter what, I was always trying to be nice to people.

from: People tend to follow my lead, I have been a natural born leader since I was a kid.

from: When the bulglar came, I knocked him out.
to: Keď prišiel bulgár, knokautoval som ho.

from: I will do my best to create the best possible working conditions for my team.

to: V situáciách vysokého tlaku som sa choval profesionálne.

from: I am the best boss they could wish form.

from: I delivered my lines flawlessly as always.

from: I am ready to fight for what is mine.

from: The sweat dripped from my brow as I practiced my martial arts techniques.

from: You didn't have to work because I took care of the income.

from: I wouldn't want to be in a relationship, I like this freedom I have.

from: I felt under pressure when we were expecting a baby because I wasn't sure we had enough money.

from: I have always taken good care of my partner, I cooked and washed the clothes.

from: When they asked to borrow my things, I didn't refuse.

from: I still lived at my parents house when I was 29.

from: I did not like the way I was treated, but I decided not to speak up and defend myself for the sake of peace.

from: I never thought of anyone being better than me.

from: Although I had an appointment, I didn't speak up.

from: I'm always a winner in any race or competition.

from: I got a new business partner from a leading company.

from: I could never go longer than a month without sex.

from: I take pride in my ability to support my family financially.

from: Why would I pay for an electrician if I can easily fix this myself?

from: The man said: "When they asked to borrow my things, I didn't refuse."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď požiadali o požičanie mojich vecí, neodmietol som."

from: The man said: "I dried the dog's paws before it entered the house."
to: Muž povedal: "Sušil som psovi labky predtým, ako vošiel do domu."

from: The man said: "I was unsure if they liked my cookies."
to: Muž povedal: "Nebol som si istý, či sa im moje koláčiky páčia."

from: The man said: "We went to the bathroom in the club and had sex there, I could not bear to wait until we got home."
to: Muž povedal: "Išli sme na toaletu v klube a mali sme tam sex, nevydržal som čakať, kým sa vrátime domov."

from: The man said: "They told me that I walked into the room with such confidence."
to: Muž povedal: "Povedali mi, že som vošiel do miestnosti s takou dôverou."

from: The man said: "I wore the same pair of socks for every important exam, convinced that it would bring me good luck."
to: Muž povedal: "Na každú dôležitú skúšku som nosil tie isté ponožky, presvedčený, že mi to prinesie šťastie."

from: The man said: "I don't go in the shower unless I'm really dirty."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechodím do sprchy, pokiaľ nie som naozaj špinavý."

from: The man said: "I bought new clothes, but first I had them washed."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpil som si nové šaty, ale najprv som ich dal vyprať."

from: The man said: "I felt under pressure when we were expecting a baby because I wasn't sure we had enough money."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítil som sa pod tlakom, keď sme čakali dieťa, pretože som si nebol istý, či máme dosť peňazí."

from: The man said: "I did not let emotions cloud my judgement."
to: Muž povedal: "Nenechal som emócie, aby zakryli môj úsudok."

from: The man said: "I made my mom a memory book for her birthday."
to: Muž povedal: "Urobil som svojej mame k narodeninám pamäťovú knihu."

from: The man said: "I got a new business partner from a leading company."
to: Muž povedal: "Získal som nového obchodného partnera od poprednej spoločnosti."

from: The man said: "I'm convinced that nobody can do better job than me."
to: Muž povedal: "Som presvedčený, že nikto nemôže robiť lepšiu prácu ako ja."

from: The man said: "I have always taken good care of my partner, I cooked and washed the clothes."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som sa o svoju partnerku dobre staral, varil som a pral oblečenie."

from: The man said: "I couldn't rest until everything was done at home."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som si oddýchnuť, kým nebolo všetko hotové doma."

from: The man said: "I feel happy when everybody feels happy."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítim sa šťastný, keď sa všetci cítia šťastní."

from: The man said: "I dreamed I got into a car crash, so I rather took the bus today."
to: Muž povedal: "Snívalo sa mi, že som mal autonehodu, tak som dnes radšej išiel autobusom."

from: The man said: "I was happy to hear that the plastic surgeon said there's nothing to improve."
to: Muž povedal: "S radosťou som počul, že plastický chirurg povedal, že nie je čo zlepšovať."

from: The man said: "I never thought of anyone being better than me."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som si nemyslel, že by niekto bol lepší ako ja."

from: The man said: "I ran for the mayor of the town."
to: Muž povedal: "Kandidoval som na starostu mesta."

from: The man said: "I don't like quackery."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemám rád šarlatánstvo."

from: The man said: "I responded to a negative review by objectively evaluating the feedback."
to: Muž povedal: "Na negatívnu recenziu som reagoval objektívnym vyhodnotením spätnej väzby."

from: The man said: "I did not wait for a second date to make a move."
to: Muž povedal: "Nečakal som na druhé rande, aby som sa pohol."

from: The man said: "I never expressed my opinions because I felt nobody would listen to me."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nevyjadril svoje názory, pretože som mal pocit, že ma nikto nebude počúvať."

from: The man said: "I gave the dog a bath."
to: Muž povedal: "Dal som psa vykúpať."

from: The man said: "I take pride in my ability to support my family financially."
to: Muž povedal: "Som hrdý na svoju schopnosť finančne podporovať svoju rodinu."

from: The man said: "People often tell me I'm too chatty."
to: Muž povedal: "Ľudia mi často hovoria, že som príliš ukecaný."

from: The man said: "I could never go longer than a month without sex."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nevydržal bez sexu dlhšie ako mesiac."

from: The man said: "I learned very early that good looks help me in life."
to: Muž povedal: "Veľmi skoro som sa naučil, že pekný vzhľad mi pomáha v živote."

from: The man said: "I was very graceful because I danced a lot to stay in shape."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som veľmi elegantný, pretože som veľa tancoval, aby som zostal vo forme."

from: The man said: "I had to listen."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som počúvať."

from: The man said: "I'd like to get back in the ring one day."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád by som sa jedného dňa vrátil do ringu."

from: The man said: "I never needed to warm up before lifting the weights."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa nepotreboval zahriať pred zdvihnutím závažia."

from: The man said: "I did not like the way I was treated, but I decided not to speak up and defend myself for the sake of peace."
to: Muž povedal: "Nepáčilo sa mi, ako sa so mnou zaobchádzalo, ale rozhodol som sa neprehovoriť a brániť sa v záujme mieru."

from: The man said: "I wanted to look seductive for my date."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som na rande vyzerať zvodne."

from: The man said: "I flexed my muscles a lot at the beach."
to: Muž povedal: "Na pláži som si poriadne natiahol svaly."

from: The man said: "I had a lot of clients because I acted like a professional."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som veľa klientov, pretože som sa správal ako profesionál."

from: The man said: "I conducted myself professionally in high-pressure situations."
to: Muž povedal: "V situáciách vysokého tlaku som sa správal profesionálne."

from: The man said: "I told you that I can climb this mountain."
to: Muž povedal: "Povedal som ti, že môžem vyliezť na túto horu."

from: The man said: "They brought new decorative rocks to my garden, but I couldn't move them."
to: Muž povedal: "Priniesli mi do záhrady nové dekoratívne skaly, ale nemohol som s nimi pohnúť."

from: The man said: "I'm free, so I don't follow any rules."
to: Muž povedal: "Som voľný, takže sa neriadim žiadnymi pravidlami."

from: The man said: "I decided to introduce new rules in the hospital."
to: Muž povedal: "Rozhodol som sa zaviesť nové pravidlá v nemocnici."

from: The man said: "I will do my best to create the best possible working conditions for my team."
to: Muž povedal: "Urobím všetko pre to, aby som môjmu tímu vytvoril čo najlepšie pracovné podmienky."

from: The man said: "I like to take care of my skin."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád sa starám o svoju pleť."

from: The man said: "I went to a shooting club once but I was not strong enough to hold the rifle without trembling."
to: Muž povedal: "Raz som išiel do streleckého klubu, ale nebol som dosť silný, aby som držal pušku bez toho, aby som sa zachvel."

from: The man said: "I dislike solitude."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemám rád samotu."

from: The man said: "I made the rational decision."
to: Muž povedal: "Urobil som racionálne rozhodnutie."

from: The man said: "Although I had an appointment, I didn't speak up."
to: Muž povedal: "Hoci som mal dohodnuté stretnutie, neozval som sa."

from: The man said: "I was thinking about what was going on in their heads, they were acting strange all day."
to: Muž povedal: "Premýšľal som o tom, čo sa im odohrávalo v hlavách, celý deň sa správali zvláštne."

from: The man said: "You talked way too much with them."
to: Muž povedal: "Príliš veľa ste sa s nimi rozprávali."

from: The man said: "I am sure that my success is mainly due to my character."
to: Muž povedal: "Som si istý, že môj úspech je hlavne vďaka mojej postave."

from: The man said: "I am the best boss they could wish form."
to: Muž povedal: "Som ten najlepší šéf, akého si môžu priať."

from: The man said: "I was sure I would score high on that test."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som si istý, že v tomto teste dosiahnem vysoké skóre."

from: The man said: "I delivered my lines flawlessly as always."
to: Muž povedal: "Svoje linky som predniesol bezchybne ako vždy."

from: The man said: "I tried to reject them as nicely as possible not to make them angry."
to: Muž povedal: "Snažil som sa ich čo najslušnejšie odmietnuť, aby som ich nenahneval."

from: The man said: "I love it when someone asks me to open something."

from: The man said: "I still lived at my parents house when I was 29."

from: The man said: "I spent a lot of money for skins in an online game."

from: The man said: "I survived a tiger attack."

from: The man said: "I could never protect myself if something bad happened."

to: Žena povedala: "S radosťou som počula, že plastický chirurg povedal, že nie je čo zlepšovať."

from: The woman said: "I was very graceful because I danced a lot to stay in shape."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som veľmi pôvabná, pretože som veľa tancovala, aby som zostala vo forme."

from: The woman said: "I delivered my lines flawlessly as always."
to: Žena povedala: "Svoje linky som predniesla bezchybne ako vždy."

from: The woman said: "I dreamed I got into a car crash, so I rather took the bus today."
to: Žena povedala: "Snívalo sa mi, že som mala autonehodu, tak som dnes radšej išla autobusom."

from: The woman said: "I changed my holiday date because my parents needed a petsitter."
to: Žena povedala: "Zmenila som dátum dovolenky, pretože moji rodičia potrebovali opatrovateľku."

from: The woman said: "Even though I had surgery, I couldn't keep my hands off my partner."
to: Žena povedala: "Aj keď som mala operáciu, nemohla som dať ruky preč od partnera."

from: The woman said: "I'd like to get back in the ring one day."
to: Žena povedala: "Rád by som sa jedného dňa vrátila do ringu."

from: The woman said: "I signed up to be a mentor."
to: Žena povedala: "Prihlásila som sa ako mentorka."

from: The woman said: "I am the best boss they could wish form."
to: Žena povedala: "Som ten najlepší šéf, akého si môžu priať."

from: The woman said: "When they asked to borrow my things, I didn't refuse."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď požiadali o požičanie mojich vecí, neodmietla som."

from: The woman said: "I never thought of anyone being better than me."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som si nemyslela, že by niekto bol lepší ako ja."

from: The woman said: "I wanted to look seductive for my date."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som na rande vyzerať zvodne."

from: The woman said: "I feel confident with my communication skills and with my ability to motivate others."
to: Žena povedala: "Som si istá svojimi komunikačnými schopnosťami a schopnosťou motivovať ostatných."

from: The woman said: "We went to the bathroom in the club and had sex there, I could not bear to wait until we got home."
to: Žena povedala: "Išli sme na toaletu v klube a mali sme tam sex, nevydržala som čakať, kým sa vrátime domov."

from: The woman said: "I could never go to the movies alone, it just does not feel right."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som nemohla ísť do kina sama, jednoducho mi to nepripadá správne."

from: The woman said: "Sorry I'm late, I didn't know what to wear."
to: Žena povedala: "Prepáčte, že meškám, nevedela som, čo si mám obliecť."

from: The woman said: "I went to a shooting club once but I was not strong enough to hold the rifle without trembling."
to: Žena povedala: "Raz som išla do streleckého klubu, ale nebola som dosť silná, aby som držala pušku bez toho, aby som sa zachvela."

from: The woman said: "I bought the new issue of Playboy."
to: Žena povedala: Kúpila som si nové vydanie Playboya.

from: The woman said: "When the bulglar came, I knocked him out."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď prišiel bulgár, vyrazila som ho."

from: The woman said: "I don’t want my partner to work."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechcem, aby môj partner pracoval."

from: The woman said: "I responded to a negative review by objectively evaluating the feedback."
to: Žena povedala: "Na negatívnu recenziu som reagovala objektívnym vyhodnotením spätnej väzby."

from: The woman said: "I still lived at my parents house when I was 29."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som mala 29 rokov, stále som bývala v dome svojich rodičov."

from: The woman said: "I will do my best to create the best possible working conditions for my team."
to: Žena povedala: "Urobím všetko pre to, aby som svojmu tímu vytvorila čo najlepšie pracovné podmienky."

from: The woman said: "No matter what, I was always trying to be nice to people."
to: Žena povedala: "Bez ohľadu na to, vždy som sa snažila byť k ľuďom milá."

from: The woman said: "I calculated the shortest route."
to: Žena povedala: "Vypočítala som najkratšiu cestu."

from: The woman said: "When someone laughs, I get nervous because I immediately assume they're laughing at me."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď sa niekto smeje, som nervózna, pretože okamžite predpokladám, že sa smeje mne."

from: The woman said: "I washed and sterilized my reusable water bottles and food containers."
to: Žena povedala: "Umyla som a sterilizovala svoje opakovane použiteľné fľaše na vodu a nádoby na jedlo."

from: The woman said: "The sweat dripped from my brow as I practiced my martial arts techniques."
to: Žena povedala: "Pot mi stekal z čela, keď som cvičila svoje techniky bojových umení."

from: The woman said: "I'm convinced that nobody can do better job than me."
to: Žena povedala: "Som presvedčená, že nikto nemôže robiť lepšiu prácu ako ja."

from: The woman said: "I got a free cab ride, because the driver liked me."
to: Žena povedala: "Dostala som zadarmo taxík, pretože ma vodič mal rád."

from: The woman said: "The doctor told me that my ankes are too weak and I could have sprained them anytime."
to: Žena povedala: "Lekár mi povedal, že mám príliš slabé členky a mohla som si ich kedykoľvek vyvrtnúť."

from: The woman said: "I have always taken good care of my partner, I cooked and washed the clothes."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som sa o partnera vzorne starala, varila som a prala oblečenie."

from: The woman said: "I did not like the way I was treated, but I decided not to speak up and defend myself for the sake of peace."
to: Žena povedala: "Nepáčilo sa mi, ako sa ku mne správali, ale rozhodla som sa neprehovoriť a brániť sa v záujme mieru."

from: I strived to create additional income for our family's needs and expenses.
to: Snažil som sa vytvoriť ďalší príjem pre potreby a výdavky našej rodiny.

from: I've always got what I set out to get.
to: Vždy mám to, čo som si zaumienil získať.

from: This is nothing - you should have seen what I lifted yesterday.
to: To nič - mali ste vidieť, čo som včera zdvihol.

from: I got a job as a trainer at a gym.
to: Zamestnal som sa ako tréner v posilňovni.

from: I've always preferred to work physically.
to: Vždy som radšej pracoval fyzicky.

from: I could not wait to see all my old friends again.
to: Nevedel som sa dočkať, kedy opäť uvidím všetkých svojich starých priateľov.

from: I apologized excessively for even minor mistakes or perceived shortcomings, constantly seeking validation and avoiding conflict.
to: Príliš som sa ospravedlňoval aj za drobné chyby alebo vnímané nedostatky, neustále som hľadal potvrdenie a vyhýbal sa konfliktom.

from: I made sure everyone could see my sixpack.
to: Zabezpečil som, aby všetci videli môj sixpack.

from: I organized a neighborhood barbecue.
to: Zorganizoval som susedskú grilovačku.

from: The delivery guy wasn't able to carry up the package, so I stopped to help him.
to: Doručovateľ nebol schopný uniesť balík, tak som sa zastavil, aby som mu pomohol.

from: I had such a heavy bag that I almost didn't bring it home.
to: Mala som takú ťažkú tašku, že som ju skoro nedoniesla domov.

from: Making you happy is making me happy.
to: Robiť ťa šťastným robí mňa šťastným.

from: I had to fix my hair first.
to: Najprv som si musela upraviť vlasy.

from: I should not have argued with them.
to: Nemal som sa s nimi hádať.

from: I felt randomly aroused when I saw a sexy body.
to: Cítil som sa náhodne vzrušený, keď som videl sexi telo.

from: I used to hit the gym three times a week because it was very important to me to be in shape.
to: Chodil som do posilňovne trikrát týždenne, pretože bolo pre mňa veľmi dôležité byť vo forme.

from: The politician wasn't good-looking, so I didn't even listen.
to: Politik nebol pekný, tak som ho ani nepočúval.

from: My boss works out every other day.
to: Môj šéf cvičí každý druhý deň.

from: I like to have responsibility for large projects.
to: Rád nesiem zodpovednosť za veľké projekty.

from: They want me to show emotion, but I’ve never done that before.
to: Chcú, aby som ukázal emócie, ale nikdy predtým som to neurobil.

from: I could not decide based just on my gut feeling.
to: Nevedel som sa rozhodnúť len na základe môjho pocitu.

from: I liked to be a teacher.
to: Páčilo sa mi byť učiteľom.

from: Are you sure you are strong enough?
to: Si si istý, že si dostatočne silný?

from: Could you cook something?
to: Mohli by ste niečo uvariť?

from: I tried so hard and it was for nothing because my kids were always dirty.
to: Toľko som sa snažil a bolo to zbytočné, pretože moje deti boli vždy špinavé.

from: I avoided cracks on the sidewalk to avoid bad luck.
to: Vyhýbal som sa trhlinám na chodníku, aby som nemal smolu.

from: I worked hard for the betterment of our family's financial situation.
to: Tvrdo som pracoval na zlepšení finančnej situácie našej rodiny.

from: I washed the dishes.
to: Umyla som riad.

from: I could get any job because I have children.
to: Mohol by som získať akúkoľvek prácu, pretože mám deti.

from: Even though I bought a dishwasher, I always take the dishes out and rinse them with water.
to: Aj keď som si kúpila umývačku riadu vždy vyberiem a opláchnem vodou.

from: I've had my clothes tailored.
to: Nechal som si ušiť šaty na mieru.

from: I've never been to a club because I'm embarrassed to dance in front of others.
to: Nikdy som nebol v klube, pretože sa hanbím tancovať pred ostatnými.

from: I was ready to showcase my explosive power and speed.
to: Bol som pripravený predviesť svoju výbušnú silu a rýchlosť.

from: With each stroke of the paddle, I propelled the kayak through the rushing rapids.
to: S každým úderom pádla som poháňal kajak cez uháňajúce pereje.

from: I like porn.
to: Mám rád porno.

from: I rolled the giant concrete ball out of the way.
to: Odkotúľal som obrovskú betónovú guľu z cesty.

from: I was very confident when I was applying for that job and of course, I got it.
to: Bol som veľmi sebavedomý, keď som sa uchádzal o túto prácu a samozrejme, dostal som ju.

from: I did not care that the swimming pool was for children only.
to: Bolo mi jedno, že bazén je len pre deti.

from: I overreacted.
to: zareagoval som prehnane.

from: I made a deal with a well-known designer to come up with an outfit for the gala.
to: Dohodla som sa so známym návrhárom, že vymyslím outfit do gala.

from: I consulted a fact-checker.
to: Poradil som sa s overovateľom faktov.

from: I soared through the air on my bike, reveling in the exhilarating rush of speed and the knowledge that my physical strength allowed me to conquer any terrain.
to: Vznášal som sa vzduchom na bicykli, vyžíval som sa v vzrušujúcom návale rýchlosti a vedomí, že moja fyzická sila mi umožňuje zdolať akýkoľvek terén.

from: I could not resist buying that dress even though it was over my budget.
to: Neodolala som a kúpila som si tie šaty, aj keď to bolo nad môj rozpočet.

from: I couldn't control my jealousy and ended up accusing my partner of things they didn't do.
to: Nedokázal som ovládať svoju žiarlivosť a skončil som tak, že som obvinil svojho partnera z vecí, ktoré neurobili.

from: I offered to carry their suitcases.
to: Ponúkol som sa, že im odnesiem kufre.

from: I fried the meat, because that's how my partner likes it.
to: Mäso som vyprážal, lebo tak to má rád môj partner.

from: The doctor told me I'd be healthier and stronger if I ate more.
to: Lekár mi povedal, že ak budem viac jesť, budem zdravší a silnejší.

from: Friends often refer to me as a great cook.
to: Priatelia ma často označujú za skvelého kuchára.

from: I needed a new haircut, but when I called the hairdresser, they couldn't see me on Monday.
to: Potrebovala som nový účes, ale keď som zavolala kaderníčke, v pondelok ma už nevideli.

from: I threw a tantrum when my partner told me that we should not buy the new car.
to: Rozzúril som sa, keď mi môj partner povedal, že by sme si to nové auto nemali kupovať.

from: If somebody did something bad to me, I would get back at them immediately.
to: Ak by mi niekto urobil niečo zlé, okamžite by som mu to oplatil.

from: You are not capable of what I am capable of.
to: Nie si schopný toho, čoho som schopný ja.

from: Nothing can make me happier than knowing that my family is fed and cleaned.
to: Nič ma nemôže urobiť šťastnejším ako vedomie, že moja rodina je nakŕmená a uprataná.

from: I like team sports more than individual ones.
to: Mám rád kolektívne športy viac ako individuálne.

from: I was looking for events that I could attend.
to: Hľadal som akcie, ktorých by som sa mohol zúčastniť.

from: I love hunting.
to: Milujem lov.

from: I went to the networking event to meet new people.
to: Išiel som na networking, aby som spoznal nových ľudí.

from: What should I do, so you finally be quiet?
to: Čo mám robiť, aby si bol konečne ticho?

from: I wanted to tell you the story with all the details and you wouldn't listen.
to: Chcel som ti povedať ten príbeh so všetkými podrobnosťami a ty si ma nepočúval.

from: I want to become a physicist.
to: Chcem sa stať fyzikom.

from: I had such a terrible muscle pain after just lifting the chairs.
to: Mal som takú strašnú bolesť svalov už po zdvihnutí stoličiek.

from: I wasn't afraid to ask for more money, because my services are worth it.

from: I knew I had to surround myself with educated people.

from: Last month I signed a lucrative contract at work, so we will finally be able to afford the new house.

from: I am determined to win this fight.

from: Tell me when I'll be talking too much, I'm way too talkative.

from: I hired a maid.
to: Najala som si slúžku.

from: I've been looking forward to summer all year because I can finally play with water guns.

from: When I set my mind to something, I always stick with it.

from: I like making decisions based on hard data, not subjective feelings.

from: I relished the challenge of riding the untamed power of the ocean.

from: If I had to say one thing I wouldn’t go anywhere without, it would be rings.

from: I am happy when I lie down in a fragrant bed in the evening.

to: Snažím sa ukázať, že som empatický, aby sa ľudia nebáli so mnou rozprávať o svojich problémoch.
