to: Muž povedal: "Dohodol som sa so známym návrhárom, že vymyslím outfit do gala."

from: The man said: "The delivery guy wasn't able to carry up the package, so I stopped to help him."
to: Muž povedal: "Doručovateľ nebol schopný vyniesť balík, tak som sa zastavil, aby som mu pomohol."

from: The man said: "I wasn't afraid to ask for more money, because my services are worth it."
to: Muž povedal: "Nebál som sa pýtať viac peňazí, pretože moje služby stoja za to."

from: The man said: "They want me to show emotion, but I’ve never done that before."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcú, aby som ukázal emócie, ale nikdy predtým som to neurobil."

from: The man said: "Friends often refer to me as a great cook."
to: Muž povedal: "Priatelia ma často označujú ako skvelého kuchára."

from: The man said: "I felt I was not good enough so I did not go to that job interview after all although I have the necessary qualifications as well as experience."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítil som sa, že nie som dosť dobrý, a tak som napokon na ten pracovný pohovor nešiel, hoci mám potrebnú kvalifikáciu aj skúsenosti."

from: The man said: "Maybe if I prayed more, it would be better."
to: Muž povedal: "Možno keby som sa viac modlil, bolo by to lepšie."

from: The man said: "This is nothing - you should have seen what I lifted yesterday."
to: Muž povedal: "To nič nie je - mali ste vidieť, čo som včera zdvihol."

from: The man said: "I could get any job because I have children."
to: Muž povedal: "Mohol by som získať akúkoľvek prácu, pretože mám deti."

from: The man said: "I avoided cracks on the sidewalk to avoid bad luck."
to: Muž povedal: "Vyhýbal som sa trhlinám na chodníku, aby som sa vyhol nešťastiu."

from: The man said: "The politician wasn't good-looking, so I didn't even listen."
to: Muž povedal: "Politik nevyzeral dobre, tak som ho ani nepočúval."

from: The man said: "I was ready to showcase my explosive power and speed."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som pripravený predviesť svoju výbušnú silu a rýchlosť."

from: The man said: "I fried the meat, because that's how my partner likes it."
to: Muž povedal: "Vyprážal som mäso, pretože tak to má moja partnerka rada."

from: The man said: "The doctor told me I'd be healthier and stronger if I ate more."
to: Muž povedal: "Lekár mi povedal, že budem zdravší a silnejší, ak budem viac jesť."

from: The man said: "I washed the dishes."
to: Muž povedal: "Umyl som riad."

from: The man said: "I went to the networking event to meet new people."
to: Muž povedal: "Išiel som na networking, aby som spoznal nových ľudí."

from: The man said: "I made sure everyone could see my sixpack."
to: Muž povedal: "Postaral som sa, aby všetci videli môj sixpack."

from: The man said: "I used to hit the gym three times a week because it was very important to me to be in shape."
to: Muž povedal: "Chodil som do posilňovne trikrát týždenne, pretože bolo pre mňa veľmi dôležité byť vo forme."

from: The man said: "Nothing can make me happier than knowing that my family is fed and cleaned."
to: Muž povedal: "Nič ma nemôže urobiť šťastnejším ako vedomie, že moja rodina je nakŕmená a uprataná."

from: The man said: "I like to have responsibility for large projects."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád nesiem zodpovednosť za veľké projekty."

from: The man said: "I've had my clothes tailored."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechal som si ušiť šaty na mieru."

from: The man said: "I overreacted."
to: Muž povedal: "Reagoval som prehnane."

from: The man said: "I like team sports more than individual ones."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád kolektívne športy viac ako individuálne."

from: The man said: "I needed a new haircut, but when I called the hairdresser, they couldn't see me on Monday."
to: Muž povedal: "Potreboval som nový účes, ale keď som zavolal kaderníčke, v pondelok ma už nevideli."

from: The man said: "I felt randomly aroused when I saw a sexy body."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítil som sa náhodne vzrušený, keď som videl sexi telo."

from: The man said: "I felt stressed so I went shopping."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítil som sa vystresovaný, tak som išiel nakupovať."

from: The man said: "They asked me if I could help them, and I couldn’t say no."
to: Muž povedal: "Spýtali sa ma, či by som im mohol pomôcť, a ja som nedokázal povedať nie."

from: The man said: "I made sure that everyone in the family had everything their needed materially."
to: Muž povedal: "Postaral som sa, aby každý v rodine mal všetko, čo potreboval materiálne."

from: The man said: "Let me lift that for you; I wouldn't be happy if something happened to you."
to: Muž povedal: "Dovoľte mi, aby som vám to zdvihol; nebol by som šťastný, keby sa vám niečo stalo."

from: The man said: "When I set my mind to something, I always stick with it."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď si niečo namyslím, vždy sa toho držím."

from: The man said: "I have a lot of porn saved in my computer."
to: Muž povedal: "V mojom počítači mám uložených veľa porna."

from: The man said: "I often conformed to others to please everyone."
to: Muž povedal: "Často som sa prispôsoboval ostatným, aby som sa každému páčil."

from: The man said: "I organized a neighborhood barbecue."
to: Muž povedal: "Zorganizoval som susedskú grilovačku."

from: The man said: "I am determined to win this fight."
to: Muž povedal: "Som odhodlaný vyhrať tento boj."

from: The man said: "They liked me because I had the ability to take care of others."
to: Muž povedal: "Mali ma radi, pretože som mal schopnosť postarať sa o druhých."

from: The man said: "Making you happy is making me happy."
to: Muž povedal: "Urobiť ťa šťastnou znamená urobiť radosť aj mne."

from: The man said: "I offered to carry their suitcases."
to: Muž povedal: "Ponúkol som sa, že odnesiem ich kufre."

from: The man said: "I preferred feelings over rational arguments."
to: Muž povedal: "Uprednostnil som pocity pred racionálnymi argumentmi."

from: The man said: "I was CEO of a big company when I was just twenty years old."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som generálnym riaditeľom veľkej spoločnosti, keď som mal iba dvadsať rokov."

from: The man said: "I may spend less time with my family than I'd like, but at least we have enough money."
to: Muž povedal: "Možno trávim so svojou rodinou menej času, ako by som chcel, ale aspoň máme dosť peňazí."

from: The man said: "I consulted a fact-checker."
to: Muž povedal: "Poradil som sa s overovateľom faktov."

from: The man said: "You are not capable of what I am capable of."
to: Muž povedal: "Nie si schopný toho, čoho som schopný ja."

from: The man said: "Last month I signed a lucrative contract at work, so we will finally be able to afford the new house."
to: Muž povedal: "Minulý mesiac som v práci podpísal lukratívnu zmluvu, takže si konečne budeme môcť dovoliť nový dom."

from: The man said: "I got a job as a trainer at a gym."
to: Muž povedal: "Zamestnal som sa ako tréner v telocvični."

from: The man said: "I had to think about every aspect of such an investment."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som premýšľať o každom aspekte takejto investície."

from: The man said: "I like to buy from foreign e-shops, even though it is often more expensive."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád nakupujem v zahraničných e-shopoch, aj keď je to často drahšie."

from: The man said: "I've never been to a club because I'm embarrassed to dance in front of others."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nebol v klube, pretože sa hanbím tancovať pred ostatnými."

from: The man said: "I try to show that I am empathetic so that people are not afraid to talk to me about their problems."
to: Muž povedal: "Snažím sa ukázať, že som empatický, aby sa ľudia nebáli so mnou rozprávať o svojich problémoch."

from: The man said: "The cast iron pans were too heavy to work with, so I had to switch to stainless steel ones."
to: Muž povedal: "Liatinové panvice boli príliš ťažké na prácu, takže som musel prejsť na nerezové."

from: The man said: "I invited everyone to come over for dinner."
to: Muž povedal: "Pozval som všetkých, aby prišli na večeru."

from: The man said: "I was very confident when I was applying for that job and of course, I got it."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som sa uchádzal o túto prácu, bol som veľmi sebavedomý a samozrejme som ju dostal."

from: The man said: "I could not wait to see all my old friends again."
to: Muž povedal: "Nevedel som sa dočkať, až znova uvidím všetkých svojich starých priateľov."

from: The man said: "I threw a tantrum when my partner told me that we should not buy the new car."
to: Muž povedal: "Rozzúril som sa, keď mi môj partner povedal, že by sme si nemali kupovať nové auto."

from: The man said: "With each stroke of the paddle, I propelled the kayak through the rushing rapids."
to: Muž povedal: "S každým úderom pádla som poháňal kajak cez rútiace sa pereje."

from: The man said: "I've been looking forward to summer all year because I can finally play with water guns."
to: Muž povedal: "Celý rok som sa tešil na leto, pretože sa konečne môžem hrať s vodnými pištoľami."

from: The man said: "I like making decisions based on hard data, not subjective feelings."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád sa rozhodujem na základe tvrdých údajov, nie subjektívnych pocitov."

from: The man said: "When my neighbor’s house was on fire, I immediately ran to her apartment."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď horel dom mojej susedky, okamžite som utekal do jej bytu."

from: The man said: "My boss works out every other day."
to: Muž povedal: "Môj šéf cvičí každý druhý deň."

from: The man said: "I like porn."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád porno."

from: The man said: "I am happy when I lie down in a fragrant bed in the evening."
to: Muž povedal: "Som šťastný, keď si večer ľahnem do voňavej postele."

from: The man said: "I should not have argued with them."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemal som sa s nimi hádať."

from: The man said: "I rolled the giant concrete ball out of the way."
to: Muž povedal: "Odkotúľal som tú obrovskú betónovú guľu z cesty."

from: The man said: "I can't imagine eating off a stranger's plate."
to: Muž povedal: "Neviem si predstaviť jesť z cudzieho taniera."

from: The man said: "What should I do, so you finally be quiet?"
to: Muž povedal: "Čo mám robiť, aby si bol konečne ticho?"

from: The man said: "Could you cook something?"
to: Muž povedal: "Mohli by ste niečo uvariť?"

from: The man said: "I would never eat soup with a hair in it."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy by som nejedol polievku s vlasom."

from: The man said: "It was a source of pride to see the results of our collective efforts, knowing that my leadership played a significant role in achieving those outcomes."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol to zdroj hrdosti vidieť výsledky nášho kolektívneho úsilia, vediac, že moje vedenie zohralo významnú úlohu pri dosahovaní týchto výsledkov."

from: The man said: "I apologized excessively for even minor mistakes or perceived shortcomings, constantly seeking validation and avoiding conflict."
to: Muž povedal: "Prehnane som sa ospravedlňoval aj za menšie chyby alebo vnímané nedostatky, neustále som hľadal potvrdenie a vyhýbal som sa konfliktom."

from: The man said: "I've always got what I set out to get."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som dostal to, čo som si zaumienil získať."

from: The man said: "I could not resist buying that dress even though it was over my budget."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som odolať kúpe tých šiat, aj keď to bolo nad môj rozpočet."

from: The man said: "If I had to say one thing I wouldn’t go anywhere without, it would be rings."
to: Muž povedal: "Ak by som mal povedať jednu vec, bez ktorej by som nikam nešiel, boli by to prstene."

from: The man said: "I tried so hard and it was for nothing because my kids were always dirty."
to: Muž povedal: "Veľmi som sa snažil a bolo to zbytočné, pretože moje deti boli vždy špinavé."

from: The man said: "Are you sure you are strong enough?"
to: Muž povedal: "Si si istý, že si dosť silný?"

from: The man said: "I liked to be a teacher."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád som bol učiteľ."

from: The man said: "I wanted to tell you the story with all the details and you wouldn't listen."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som ti povedať ten príbeh so všetkými podrobnosťami a ty si ma nepočúval."

from: The man said: "I did not care that the swimming pool was for children only."
to: Muž povedal: "Je mi jedno, že bazén je len pre deti."

from: The woman said: "I like team sports more than individual ones."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada kolektívne športy viac ako individuálne."

from: The woman said: "If I had to say one thing I wouldn’t go anywhere without, it would be rings."
to: Žena povedala: "Ak by som mala povedať jednu vec, bez ktorej by som nikam nešla, boli by to prstene."

from: The woman said: "I am happy when I lie down in a fragrant bed in the evening."
to: Žena povedala: "Som šťastná, keď si večer ľahnem do voňavej postele."

from: The woman said: "I felt I was not good enough so I did not go to that job interview after all although I have the necessary qualifications as well as experience."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítila som sa, že nie som dosť dobrá, a tak som napokon na ten pracovný pohovor nešla, hoci mám potrebnú kvalifikáciu aj skúsenosti."

from: The woman said: "Last month I signed a lucrative contract at work, so we will finally be able to afford the new house."
to: Žena povedala: "Minulý mesiac som v práci podpísala lukratívnu zmluvu, takže si konečne budeme môcť dovoliť nový dom."

from: The woman said: "I made sure that everyone in the family had everything their needed materially."
to: Žena povedala: "Postarala som sa, aby každý v rodine mal po materiálnej stránke všetko, čo potreboval."

from: The woman said: "I organized a neighborhood barbecue."
to: Žena povedala: "Zorganizovala som susedskú grilovačku."

from: The woman said: "I invited everyone to come over for dinner."
to: Žena povedala: "Pozvala som všetkých, aby prišli na večeru."

from: The woman said: "I want to become a physicist."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcem sa stať fyzikom."

from: The woman said: "I wanted to tell you the story with all the details and you wouldn't listen."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som ti povedať ten príbeh so všetkými podrobnosťami a ty si ma nepočúval."

from: The woman said: "I have a lot of porn saved in my computer."
to: Žena povedala: "V mojom počítači mám uložených veľa porna."

from: The woman said: "Are you sure you are strong enough?"
to: Žena povedala: "Si si istý, že si dosť silný?"

from: The woman said: "I like to have responsibility for large projects."

from: The woman said: "I fried the meat, because that's how my partner likes it."

from: The woman said: "I've always preferred to work physically."

from: The woman said: "I did not care that the swimming pool was for children only."

from: The woman said: "I got a job as a trainer at a gym."

from: The woman said: "I love hunting."

from: The woman said: "I was CEO of a big company when I was just twenty years old."

from: The woman said: "I started a mentorship academy for young people."

from: The woman said: "I strived to create additional income for our family's needs and expenses."

from: The woman said: "I made a deal with a well-known designer to come up with an outfit for the gala."
to: Žena povedala: "Dohodla som sa so známym návrhárom, že vymyslím outfit do gala."

from: The woman said: "Tell me when I'll be talking too much, I'm way too talkative."
to: Žena povedala: "Povedz mi, keď budem príliš veľa rozprávať, som príliš zhovorčivá."

to: Žena povedala: "Bola som veľmi sebavedomá, keď som sa uchádzala o túto prácu a samozrejme, dostala som ju."

from: The woman said: "I worked hard for the betterment of our family's financial situation."

from: The woman said: "I had such a terrible muscle pain after just lifting the chairs."

from: The woman said: "When I set my mind to something, I always stick with it."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď si niečo namyslím, vždy sa toho držím."

from: The woman said: "I could not decide based just on my gut feeling."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som sa rozhodnúť len na základe môjho pocitu."

from: The woman said: "They liked me because I had the ability to take care of others."
to: Žena povedala: "Mali ma radi, pretože som mala schopnosť postarať sa o druhých."

from: The woman said: "I only wanted to hook up."

from: The woman said: "I could not resist buying that dress even though it was over my budget."

from: The woman said: "I should not have argued with them."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemala som sa s nimi hádať."

from: The woman said: "I wanted to be likable."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som byť sympatická."

from: I wanted to live freely.
to: Chcel som žiť slobodne.

from: I always prefered natural products for my skin.
to: Na pleť som vždy preferovala prírodné produkty.

from: I was always prone to impulse purchases.
to: Vždy som mal sklony k impulzívnym nákupom.

from: I was very irresponsible.
to: Bol som veľmi nezodpovedný.

from: Everyone at the meeting was addressed by their academic title except for me although I am a doctor as well, but I nevertheless decided not to correct them.
to: Všetci na stretnutí boli oslovovaní akademickým titulom okrem mňa, aj keď som tiež lekár, ale napriek tomu som sa rozhodol, že ich neopravím.

from: I hated when they started talking about the flat Earth.
to: Nenávidel som, keď začali hovoriť o plochej Zemi.

from: I am very confident.
to: Som veľmi sebavedomý.

from: I needed a lot of sex to feel satisfied in the relationship.
to: Potreboval som veľa sexu, aby som sa vo vzťahu cítil spokojný.

from: Why would I need to talk about my feelings?
to: Prečo by som mal hovoriť o svojich pocitoch?

from: I wanted to show off so I jumped of a roof to impress my friends and broke a leg.
to: Chcel som sa predviesť, tak som skočil zo strechy, aby som zapôsobil na priateľov, a zlomil som si nohu.

from: I donated my wealth to charity.
to: Daroval som svoje bohatstvo na charitu.

from: I'm ready to fight for justice.
to: Som pripravený bojovať za spravodlivosť.

from: I should visit the fortune teller again.
to: Mal by som znova navštíviť veštca.

from: I would never lend my clothes to someone because it's unhygienic.
to: Nikdy by som svoje oblečenie niekomu nepožičal, pretože je to nehygienické.

from: I never had a problem with hard work.

from: I like to spend quality time with my friends.

from: I inspired my colleagues to strive for excellence and teamwork.

from: I like to solve problems and look for creative solutions.

from: When faced with a challenging project, I motivated my team by setting clear goals.

from: I had so much laundry to do, but it had to be done.

from: I guess I was just too weak to get promoted.

from: I like that I made a lot of new friends at that party.

to: Môj partner ma nechal samú s mojimi deťmi a nepovedal mi, čo mám s nimi robiť

from: I did not listen to them because I knew I was right.

from: I am able to deal successfully with hard situations.

from: I had no doubt in my mind that I belonged in the spotlight.

from: I always wanted to have a big family and take care of it.

from: I had to think for a long time, but my instincts were right.

from: I always feel frustrated when I'm not in charge of a large project.

from: As the executive director of this company, I take the most important decisions regarding our future.

from: When playing a sport, I found it challenging to throw the ball far due to my lack of upper body strength.

from: I attempted to fix a broken appliance, but my technical skills were weak.

from: I've never had a problem with public speaking.

from: Everybody expected me to be the first, and I was.

from: I always knew how to deal with people.

from: I'm expected to prioritize the family's needs over personal desires, so I didn't buy that phone.

from: I like to drive fast in my sports car.

from: I have always been able to assess a situation well.

from: The man said: "I've been told that I'm annoyingly childish, but I don't care."
to: Muž povedal: "Povedali mi, že som otravne detinský, ale je mi to jedno."

from: The man said: "I like seeing naked bodies."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád vidím nahé telá."

from: The man said: "As the executive director of this company, I take the most important decisions regarding our future."
to: Muž povedal: "Ako výkonný riaditeľ tejto spoločnosti prijímam najdôležitejšie rozhodnutia týkajúce sa našej budúcnosti."

from: The man said: "I wanted to live freely."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som žiť slobodne."

from: The man said: "I like to solve problems and look for creative solutions."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád riešim problémy a hľadám kreatívne riešenia."

from: The man said: "I harnessed my physical strength to conquer the challenging climb."
to: Muž povedal: "Využil som svoju fyzickú silu, aby som zdolal náročný výstup."

from: The man said: "I could easily recall that mathematical formula off the top of my head."
to: Muž povedal: "Ten matematický vzorec som si ľahko vybavil z hlavy."

from: The man said: "I like weightlifting, it's my favourite sport."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád vzpieranie, je to môj obľúbený šport."

from: The man said: "I spent the whole weekend lying in front of the TV."
to: Muž povedal: "Celý víkend som ležal pred televízorom."

from: The man said: "I'm looking forward to seeing how tanned I'll be in the summer."
to: Muž povedal: "Teším sa, ako budem v lete opálený."

from: The man said: "I always knew how to deal with people."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som vedel, ako jednať s ľuďmi."

from: The man said: "I should visit the fortune teller again."
to: Muž povedal: Mal by som ešte raz navštíviť veštca.

from: The man said: "I would have rested, but the house needed a clean-up."
to: Muž povedal: "Oddýchol by som si, ale dom potreboval upratať."

from: The man said: "I am able to deal successfully with hard situations."
to: Muž povedal: "Som schopný úspešne riešiť ťažké situácie."

from: The man said: "I knew how to save money."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedel som, ako ušetriť peniaze."

from: The man said: "I vacuum every day, I guess I’m addicted to it."
to: Muž povedal: "Vysávam každý deň, asi som na tom závislý."

from: The man said: "I couldn't find my phone, so I started to cry."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som nájsť svoj telefón, tak som začal plakať."

from: The man said: "I was hoping that we could go to my place after the party."
to: Muž povedal: "Dúfal som, že po párty by sme mohli ísť ku mne."

from: The man said: "I could easily jump with a parachute."
to: Muž povedal: "Kľudne by som mohol skočiť s padákom."

from: The man said: "I signed up for a ballet class to increase my core strenght and balance."
to: Muž povedal: "Prihlásil som sa na kurz baletu, aby som zvýšil svoju základnú silu a rovnováhu."

from: The man said: "I've always considered sex to be the alpha and omega of any relationship."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som považoval sex za alfu a omegu každého vzťahu."

from: The man said: "I'm very goal-oriented."
to: Muž povedal: "Som veľmi cieľavedomý."

from: The man said: "I never lacked courage."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy mi nechýbala odvaha."

from: The man said: "I like that I made a lot of new friends at that party."
to: Muž povedal: "Páči sa mi, že som si na tej párty našiel veľa nových priateľov."

from: The man said: "I organized a dinner party at my place."
to: Muž povedal: "Zorganizoval som u mňa večeru."

from: The man said: "I like watching detective TV shows."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád pozerám detektívne televízne programy."

from: The man said: "I inspired my colleagues to strive for excellence and teamwork."
to: Muž povedal: "Inšpiroval som svojich kolegov, aby sa snažili o dokonalosť a tímovú prácu."

from: The man said: "I actively saved and planned for future expenses such as my children's education."
to: Muž povedal: "Aktívne som šetril a plánoval budúce výdavky, ako napríklad vzdelanie mojich detí."

from: The man said: "I would never lend my clothes to someone because it's unhygienic."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy by som niekomu nepožičal svoje oblečenie, pretože je to nehygienické."

from: The man said: "I always felt happiest when leading others."

from: The man said: "I hated when they started talking about the flat Earth."

from: The man said: "I was achieving so many goals but I didn't say anyone so nobody would feel endangered by me."

from: The man said: "I never had a problem with hard work."

from: The man said: "I did not have enough strength to swim across the lake and had to return."

from: The woman said: "Do you think I'm friendy?"
to: Žena povedala: "Myslíš, že som kamarát?"

from: The woman said: "I got invited to a model casting."
to: Žena povedala: "Dostala som pozvanie na kasting modelov."

from: The woman said: "I effortlessly lifted the weight above my head."
to: Žena povedala: "Bez námahy som zdvihla váhu nad hlavu."

from: The woman said: "I always did it as well as possible."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som to robila najlepšie, ako sa len dalo."

from: The woman said: "I was being silly."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som hlúpa."

from: The woman said: "I took a course in critical thinking."
to: Žena povedala: Absolvovala som kurz kritického myslenia.

from: The woman said: "I hated that there was no mirror there because I didn't know how I looked."
to: Žena povedala: "Nenávidela som, že tam nebolo zrkadlo, pretože som nevedela, ako vyzerám."

from: The woman said: "I got a henna tattoo while on vacation."
to: Žena povedala: "Na dovolenke som sa nechala vytetovať henou."

from: The woman said: "I shouldn't be so loud, because people don't like it."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemala by som byť taká hlučná, lebo ľuďom sa to nepáči."

from: The woman said: "I became a CEO when I was only thirty years old."
to: Žena povedala: "Stal som sa generálnym riaditeľom, keď som mal iba tridsať rokov."

from: The woman said: "I always carried wet napkins with me."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som so sebou nosila vlhké obrúsky."

from: The woman said: "As the leader, I took charge of the team, guiding them towards success with my strategic vision and decision-making skills."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako vedúca som prevzala vedenie tímu a viedla som ho k úspechu so svojou strategickou víziou a schopnosťami rozhodovania."

from: The woman said: "I don't like to talk about my feeling at all."
to: Žena povedala: "Vôbec nerada hovorím o svojich pocitoch."

from: The woman said: "I engaged in open and non-judgmental conversations with individuals who held different opinions or beliefs."
to: Žena povedala: "Zapojila som sa do otvorených a neodsudzujúcich rozhovorov s jednotlivcami, ktorí mali odlišné názory alebo presvedčenie."

from: The woman said: "I never stressed much."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som sa veľmi nestresovala."

from: The woman said: "I like to clean the house when nobody's home."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada upratujem dom, keď nikto nie je doma."

from: The woman said: "I was never satisfied with how I look."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nebola spokojná s tým, ako vyzerám."

from: The woman said: "I was chosen to be the interim team leader."
to: Žena povedala: "Vybrali ma za dočasného vedúceho tímu."

from: The woman said: "I handed out Christmas bonuses at the company."
to: Žena povedala: "Rozdávala som vianočné odmeny vo firme."

from: The woman said: "I tried to be friendly, although they didn't want to chat."
to: Žena povedala: "Snažila som sa byť priateľská, hoci sa nechceli rozprávať."

from: The woman said: "I never had a problem with making new friends."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nemala problém s nadväzovaním nových priateľov."

from: The woman said: "I have always been admired by my friends and family for my looks."
to: Žena povedala: "Moji priatelia a rodina ma vždy obdivovali pre môj vzhľad."

from: The woman said: "I was a natural talent, I instantly became the best skater in my class after putting on the skates for the first time."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som prirodzený talent, okamžite som sa stala najlepšou korčuliarkou vo svojej triede, keď som si prvýkrát obula korčule."

from: The woman said: "I am good at socialising."
to: Žena povedala: "Som dobrá v socializácii."

from: The woman said: "I don't wait for new opportunities, I create them myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Nečakám na nové príležitosti, vytváram si ich sama."

from: The woman said: "I preferred cleaning the house and not going out."
to: Žena povedala: "Dala som prednosť upratovaniu domu a nechodeniu von."

from: The woman said: "I would never go out without being properly dressed."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som nešla von bez toho, aby som nebola správne oblečená."

from: The woman said: "I was screaming when they hit that car."
to: Žena povedala: "Kričala som, keď narazili do toho auta."

from: The woman said: "I’m addicted to sex."
to: Žena povedala: "Som závislá na sexe."

from: The woman said: "As a leader, I'm expected to be in charge of difficult decisions."
to: Žena povedala: "Od vodcu sa očakáva, že budem mať na starosti ťažké rozhodnutia."

from: The woman said: "Did you change the oil in our car?"
to: Žena povedala: "Vymenili ste nám olej v aute?"

from: The woman said: "I've decided to sort my wardrobe twice a year and give things to charity."
to: Žena povedala: "Rozhodla som sa, že si dvakrát do roka pretriedim šatník a dám veci na charitu."

from: The woman said: "I always did my homework on time."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som si robila domáce úlohy načas."

from: The woman said: "I've started rewarding people for their extra work."
to: Žena povedala: "Začala som odmeňovať ľudí za prácu navyše."

from: I could afford to refuse the job, because I was sure other offers would quickly appear.
to: Mohol som si dovoliť odmietnuť prácu, pretože som si bol istý, že sa rýchlo objavia ďalšie ponuky.

from: I am very active in my neighbourhood community.
to: Som veľmi aktívny vo svojom okolí.

from: I understood being in love and making short-sighted decisions.
to: Pochopila som, že som zamilovaná a robím krátkozraké rozhodnutia.

from: I changed the flat tyre on my own.
to: Prasknutú pneumatiku som vymenil svojpomocne.

from: I don't like when clothes get stained in the washing machine.
to: Nemám rád, keď sa oblečenie zafarbí v práčke.

from: At work, I regularly stepped up to lead team meetings.
to: V práci som pravidelne viedol tímové stretnutia.

from: I endured the worst nightmares without ever asking for help.
to: Prežil som tie najhoršie nočné mory bez toho, aby som vôbec požiadal o pomoc.

from: I ate the soup even though they warned me it might give me food poisoning.
to: Zjedol som polievku, aj keď ma varovali, že mi môže spôsobiť otravu jedlom.

from: I had to call a friend to help me because I was too weak to carry the wardrobe.
to: Musel som zavolať kamaráta, aby mi pomohol, pretože som bol príliš slabý na to, aby som uniesol šatník.

from: I loved sports even as a child, I was always best at playing anything.
to: Už ako dieťa som miloval šport, vždy som bol najlepší v hre na čokoľvek.

from: My father used to be my main authority and now I am totally lost.
to: Môj otec bol kedysi mojou hlavnou autoritou a teraz som úplne stratený.

from: I made the logical choice.
to: Urobil som logickú voľbu.

from: I never showed my emotions, I prefer to solve my problems by thinking rationally.
to: Nikdy som neprejavoval svoje emócie, radšej svoje problémy riešim racionálnym myslením.

from: I ensured a strong financial foundation for my family's long-term goals.
to: Zabezpečil som pevný finančný základ pre dlhodobé ciele mojej rodiny.

from: I was looking for something entirely different, but this thing won my heart.
to: Hľadal som niečo úplne iné, ale táto vec si získala moje srdce.

from: I couldn't handle my feelings.
to: Nezvládal som svoje pocity.

from: I always had a little hand disinfectant with me even before the pandemic.
to: Ešte pred pandémiou som mal vždy so sebou malý dezinfekčný prostriedok na ruky.

from: I was always good at reading other people's emotions.
to: Vždy som bol dobrý v čítaní emócií iných ľudí.

from: I would like the people around me to know that they can always count on me.
to: Chcel by som, aby ľudia okolo mňa vedeli, že sa na mňa môžu vždy spoľahnúť.

from: I couldn't get the stain out of that shirt and I tried everything I could.
to: Nevedel som dostať fľak z tej košele a skúšal som všetko možné.

from: I navigated the labyrinth, undeterred by the lurking dangers.
to: Prechádzal som sa labyrintom, nenechal som sa odradiť číhajúcimi nebezpečenstvami.

from: I had to ask for help with opening the water bottle.
to: Musel som požiadať o pomoc s otvorením fľaše s vodou.

from: I had to explain to them that I won’t tolerate any back talk.
to: Musel som im vysvetliť, že nebudem tolerovať žiadne spätné reči.

from: I looked in the mirror and couldn't help but admire myself.
to: Pozrela som sa do zrkadla a nemohla som sa ubrániť obdivu.

from: I am organised and efficient in my work.
to: Vo svojej práci som organizovaný a efektívny.

from: I didn't like being led on and I wanted to get physical.
to: Nepáčilo sa mi, že ma niekto vedie a chcel som sa dať do pohybu.

from: When there was covid, I was very afraid of quarantine, I didn't want to be alone.
to: Keď bol covid, veľmi som sa bál karantény, nechcel som byť sám.

from: You knew almost everybody in that club!
to: Poznal si takmer každého v tom klube!

from: Breaking through concrete and bricks, I embraced the rough physicality of the demolition job
to: Prerazil som betón a tehly a prijal som drsnú fyzickosť búracích prác

from: I just wanted to have fun.
to: Chcel som sa len zabaviť.

from: I enjoy doing bad things to people if it makes me laugh.
to: Baví ma robiť ľuďom zlé veci, ak ma to rozosmeje.

from: I baked a batch of cookies for the Christmas party.
to: Upiekla som várku koláčikov na vianočný večierok.

from: My stomach hurt when I imagined someone would be angry with me.
to: Bolelo ma brucho, keď som si predstavila, že sa na mňa niekto bude hnevať.

from: I always thought it is okay to have sex before marriage.
to: Vždy som si myslel, že je v poriadku mať sex pred svadbou.

from: I decided to work at the shelter this summer.
to: Toto leto som sa rozhodol pracovať v útulku.

from: I drank an extraordinary amount of alcohol and still looked quite okay.
to: Vypil som mimoriadne veľa alkoholu a stále som vyzeral celkom v poriadku.

from: I was happy to make lunch for my colleagues.
to: S radosťou som pripravil obed pre svojich kolegov.

from: People keep telling me that I'm a child in an adult body and I'm happy for that.
to: Ľudia mi stále hovoria, že som dieťa v dospelom tele a som za to rád.

from: I am a stand-up comedian.
to: Som stand-up komik.

from: I am grateful that I have children to take care of.
to: Som vďačná, že sa mám o deti starať.

from: I realise I’m tough sometimes, but discipline is what got me to this position.
to: Uvedomujem si, že som niekedy tvrdý, ale disciplína je to, čo ma dostalo do tejto pozície.

from: In elementary school I competed in several disciplines.
to: Na základnej škole som súťažil vo viacerých disciplínach.

from: I chose to stay with my friend instead of going home alone.
to: Rozhodla som sa zostať s priateľom namiesto toho, aby som išla sama domov.

from: I always wanted to be a scientist.
to: Vždy som chcel byť vedcom.

from: I like going to the gym.
to: Rád chodím do posilňovne.

from: I came up with swimming accross the river in the middle of a storm.
to: Napadlo ma plávať cez rieku uprostred búrky.

from: I could never just ignore someone else's suffering.
to: Nikdy som nemohol len tak ignorovať utrpenie niekoho iného.

from: I told them a joke but I guess it went too far.
to: Povedal som im vtip, ale myslím, že to zašlo príliš ďaleko.

from: I could make sense of it, because the showed me a diagram.
to: Vedel som to pochopiť, pretože mi ukázal diagram.

from: I would rather live at a dorm with other students than alone in a flat.
to: Radšej budem bývať na internáte s ostatnými študentmi ako sám v byte.

from: I started swimming twice a week and it shows, not only physically but mentally as well.
to: Začal som plávať dvakrát do týždňa a je to vidieť, nielen fyzicky, ale aj psychicky.

from: I was so overwhelmed with emotions that I could not make the right decision.
to: Bol som tak zaplavený emóciami, že som sa nedokázal správne rozhodnúť.

from: Being alone doesn't suit me, the last time I was alone I got depressed.
to: Byť sám mi nevyhovuje, keď som bol naposledy sám, dostal som depresiu.

from: My strong sexual desires sometimes led to impulsive decision-making.
to: Moje silné sexuálne túžby niekedy viedli k impulzívnemu rozhodovaniu.

from: I knocked on wood to counteract a negative statement.
to: Zaklopal som na drevo, aby som vyvrátil negatívne tvrdenie.

from: I'm happy to tackle whatever fate has in store for me.
to: Rád sa pustím do toho, čo mi osud prichystá.

from: I was always focused on my dream.
to: Vždy som sa sústredila na svoj sen.

from: I wish I knew how they feel!
to: Kiežby som vedel, ako sa cítia!

from: I washed it again, because I partner didn't do a good job.
to: Umyla som to znova, pretože môj partner neodviedol dobrú prácu.

from: I accidentally got into the fight but I could defend myself pretty well.
to: Náhodou som sa dostal do bitky, ale vedel som sa celkom dobre brániť.

from: What if I told you that I am always right?
to: Čo keby som ti povedal, že mám vždy pravdu?

from: I played sports for twenty years to get to where I am today.
to: Dvadsať rokov som športoval, aby som sa dostal tam, kde som dnes.

from: I did not want to be in a commited relationship in my thirties, I wanted to party and live a carefree life.
to: V tridsiatke som nechcela byť v zaviazanom vzťahu, chcela som žúrovať a žiť bezstarostný život.

from: I struggled to lift the heavy furniture while moving.
to: Počas pohybu som sa snažil zdvihnúť ťažký nábytok.

from: I like hunting.
to: Mám rád lov.

from: I was sure I could do it.
to: Bol som si istý, že to dokážem.

from: I followed the latest fashion trends.
to: Sledovala som najnovšie módne trendy.

from: I packed a light suitcase to be able to carry it.
to: Zbalil som si ľahký kufor, aby som ho mohol prenášať.

from: The situation was rather sketchy but I never even flinched.
to: Situácia bola dosť útržkovitá, ale nikdy som sa ani nepohol.

from: I dug it out with no difficulties.
to: Vykopal som to bez problémov.

from: I did not feel any stage fright when I was supposed to perform.
to: Necítil som trému, keď som mal vystupovať.

from: I told them that no amount of wishful thinking equals proper preparations.
to: Povedal som im, že žiadne zbožné želania sa nevyrovnajú riadnym prípravám.

from: I cried because of what I was told.
to: Plakal som kvôli tomu, čo mi bolo povedané.

from: Even though he was rude, I was friendly, as always.
to: Aj keď bol hrubý, bola som priateľská, ako vždy.

from: I offered assistance to an old lady struggling with heavy bags.
to: Ponúkol som pomoc starej pani, ktorá zápasila s ťažkými taškami.

from: I used my earnings to contribute to our family's savings.
to: Svoje zárobky som použil na naše rodinné úspory.

from: Deep inside I knew that spending so much money on a bag was stupid.
to: Hlboko vo vnútri som vedel, že míňať toľko peňazí na tašku je hlúposť.

from: I wasn't scared of failure.
to: Nebál som sa zlyhania.

from: I always wanted to be an engineer but I felt that my kids would need me so I became a cleaner.
to: Vždy som chcel byť inžinier, ale cítil som, že moje deti ma budú potrebovať, tak som sa stal upratovačkou.

from: I like expensive clothes because they don’t get ruined so quickly.
to: Mám rád drahé oblečenie, pretože sa tak rýchlo nezničí.

from: I don't want to have a dishwasher, I like to wash dishes by myself.
to: Nechcem mať umývačku riadu, rada umývam riad sama.

from: I didn't body-shame you, I was just commenting on the fact.
to: Nehanbil som ťa, len som komentoval skutočnosť.

from: I guess these endurance sports were never really for weaklings like me.
to: Predpokladám, že tieto vytrvalostné športy nikdy neboli naozaj pre slabých ako som ja.

from: If I wanted to, I could choose who I dated.
to: Keby som chcel, mohol som si vybrať, s kým budem chodiť.

from: I volunteered at a local community center, engaging with individuals of different ages.
to: Ako dobrovoľníčka som pracovala v miestnom komunitnom centre, kde som sa venovala jednotlivcom rôzneho veku.

from: My stomach could not handle that and I just threw up.
to: Môj žalúdok to nezvládol a jednoducho som sa pozvracal.

from: I was in an open relationship because I liked switching up my sexual partners.
to: Bol som v otvorenom vzťahu, pretože sa mi páčilo striedanie sexuálnych partnerov.

from: I ensured that my perspective was based on rational and credible sources.
to: Uistil som sa, že môj pohľad je založený na racionálnych a dôveryhodných zdrojoch.

from: I didn't mind my health as long as I could keep that position.
to: Nevadilo mi moje zdravie, pokiaľ som si udržal túto pozíciu.

from: I stood my ground, fueled by the fire within.
to: Stál som na svojom, poháňaný ohňom vo vnútri.

from: You shouldn't be playing hockey, it's a really dangerous sport.
to: Nemal by si hrať hokej, je to naozaj nebezpečný šport.

from: I coordinated the rescue effort.
to: Koordinoval som záchranné práce.

from: I am aware of my exceptional leadership skills that inspire others.
to: Uvedomujem si svoje výnimočné vodcovské schopnosti, ktoré inšpirujú ostatných.

from: I always wanted to take care of others.
to: Vždy som sa chcel starať o druhých.

from: I applied for a job as a cleaner.
to: Uchádzala som sa o prácu upratovačky.

from: With each crashing wave, I navigated the treacherous seas, steering us towards safety.
to: S každou burácajúcou vlnou som navigoval po zradných moriach a smeroval nás do bezpečia.

from: There was nothing in this world I couldn't do when I could walk.
to: Na tomto svete nebolo nič, čo by som nemohol robiť, keď som mohol chodiť.

from: I like beauty products.
to: Mám rada kozmetické produkty.

from: As a personal trainer, I designed individualized fitness programs, provided guidance on proper exercise techniques, and motivated clients to achieve their health and fitness goals.
to: Ako osobný tréner som navrhoval individualizované fitness programy, poskytoval rady o správnych technikách cvičenia a motivoval klientov, aby dosiahli svoje ciele v oblasti zdravia a kondície.

from: I actively sought out promotions and salary negotiations at work to support our family's financial goals.
to: Aktívne som vyhľadával povýšenie a vyjednávanie o plate v práci, aby som podporil finančné ciele našej rodiny.

from: The man said: "I am organised and efficient in my work."
to: Muž povedal: "Som organizovaný a efektívny vo svojej práci."

from: The man said: "I was sure I could do it."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som si istý, že to dokážem."

to: Muž povedal: "Zabezpečil som, aby moja perspektíva bola založená na racionálnych a dôveryhodných zdrojoch."

from: The man said: "I always wanted to be an engineer but I felt that my kids would need me so I became a cleaner."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som chcel byť inžinier, ale cítil som, že moje deti ma budú potrebovať, tak som sa stal upratovačkou."

from: The man said: "I endured the worst nightmares without ever asking for help."
to: Muž povedal: "Prežil som najhoršie nočné mory bez toho, aby som požiadal o pomoc."

from: The man said: "I made the logical choice."
to: Muž povedal: "Urobil som logické rozhodnutie."

from: The man said: "I don't like when clothes get stained in the washing machine."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemám rád, keď sa oblečenie zašpiní v práčke."

from: The man said: "I'm happy to tackle whatever fate has in store for me."
to: Muž povedal: "Som rád, že sa pustím do toho, čo mi osud pripraví."

from: The man said: "I loved sports even as a child, I was always best at playing anything."
to: Muž povedal: "Už ako dieťa som miloval šport, vždy som bol najlepší v hre na čokoľvek."

from: The man said: "I was always focused on my dream."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som sa sústredil na svoj sen."

from: The man said: "I like hunting."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád lov."

from: The man said: "I did not want to be in a commited relationship in my thirties, I wanted to party and live a carefree life."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechcel som byť v tridsiatke v zaviazanom vzťahu, chcel som žúrovať a žiť bezstarostný život."

from: The man said: "I was in an open relationship because I liked switching up my sexual partners."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som v otvorenom vzťahu, pretože som rád striedal svojich sexuálnych partnerov."

from: The man said: "My strong sexual desires sometimes led to impulsive decision-making."
to: Muž povedal: "Moje silné sexuálne túžby niekedy viedli k impulzívnemu rozhodovaniu."

from: The man said: "I struggled to lift the heavy furniture while moving."
to: Muž povedal: "Počas pohybu som sa snažil zdvihnúť ťažký nábytok."

from: The man said: "My stomach hurt when I imagined someone would be angry with me."
to: Muž povedal: "Bolelo ma brucho, keď som si predstavil, že by sa na mňa niekto hneval."

from: The man said: "There was nothing in this world I couldn't do when I could walk."
to: Muž povedal: "Na tomto svete nebolo nič, čo by som nemohol robiť, keď som mohol chodiť."

from: The man said: "I just wanted to have fun."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som sa len pobaviť."

from: The man said: "If I wanted to, I could choose who I dated."
to: Muž povedal: "Keby som chcel, mohol by som si vybrať, s kým budem chodiť."

from: The man said: "I actively sought out promotions and salary negotiations at work to support our family's financial goals."
to: Muž povedal: "Aktívne som vyhľadával povýšenie a vyjednávanie o plate v práci, aby som podporil finančné ciele našej rodiny."

from: The man said: "People keep telling me that I'm a child in an adult body and I'm happy for that."
to: Muž povedal: "Ľudia mi stále hovoria, že som dieťa v dospelom tele a som za to rád."

from: The man said: "I am very active in my neighbourhood community."
to: Muž povedal: "Som veľmi aktívny vo svojej susedskej komunite."

from: The man said: "I don't want to have a dishwasher, I like to wash dishes by myself."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechcem mať umývačku riadu, rád umývam riad sám."

from: The man said: "As a personal trainer, I designed individualized fitness programs, provided guidance on proper exercise techniques, and motivated clients to achieve their health and fitness goals."
to: Muž povedal: "Ako osobný tréner som navrhoval individualizované fitness programy, poskytoval som poradenstvo o správnych technikách cvičenia a motivoval klientov, aby dosiahli svoje ciele v oblasti zdravia a kondície."

from: The man said: "I like beauty products."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád kozmetické výrobky."

from: The man said: "I guess these endurance sports were never really for weaklings like me."
to: Muž povedal: "Myslím, že tieto vytrvalostné športy nikdy neboli naozaj pre slabých, ako som ja."

from: The man said: "I always had a little hand disinfectant with me even before the pandemic."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som mal so sebou malý dezinfekčný prostriedok na ruky ešte pred pandémiou."

from: The man said: "I am grateful that I have children to take care of."
to: Muž povedal: "Som vďačný, že sa mám o deti starať."

from: The man said: "Breaking through concrete and bricks, I embraced the rough physicality of the demolition job"
to: Muž povedal: "Prerazil som betón a tehly a prijal som drsnú fyzickosť búracích prác."

from: The man said: "I could never just ignore someone else's suffering."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nemohol len tak ignorovať utrpenie niekoho iného."

from: The man said: "I followed the latest fashion trends."
to: Muž povedal: "Sledoval som najnovšie módne trendy."

from: The man said: "I always thought it is okay to have sex before marriage."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som si myslel, že je v poriadku mať sex pred svadbou."

from: The man said: "With each crashing wave, I navigated the treacherous seas, steering us towards safety."
to: Muž povedal: "S každou rútiacou sa vlnou som navigoval po zradných moriach a nasmeroval nás do bezpečia."

from: The man said: "I am a stand-up comedian."
to: Muž povedal: "Som stand-up komik."

from: The man said: "I looked in the mirror and couldn't help but admire myself."
to: Muž povedal: "Pozrel som sa do zrkadla a nemohol som si pomôcť, ale obdivoval som sa."

from: The man said: "I decided to work at the shelter this summer."
to: Muž povedal: "Rozhodol som sa toto leto pracovať v útulku."

from: The man said: "I was so overwhelmed with emotions that I could not make the right decision."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som tak zaplavený emóciami, že som sa nedokázal správne rozhodnúť."

from: The man said: "I never showed my emotions, I prefer to solve my problems by thinking rationally."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som neprejavoval svoje emócie, radšej svoje problémy riešim racionálnym myslením."

from: The man said: "I didn't like being led on and I wanted to get physical."
to: Muž povedal: "Nepáčilo sa mi, že ma vedú a chcel som sa dať do poriadku."

from: The man said: "I always wanted to be a scientist."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som chcel byť vedcom."

from: The man said: "Deep inside I knew that spending so much money on a bag was stupid."
to: Muž povedal: "Hlboko vo vnútri som vedel, že míňať toľko peňazí na tašku je hlúposť."

from: The man said: "I volunteered at a local community center, engaging with individuals of different ages."
to: Muž povedal: "Prihlásil som sa ako dobrovoľník do miestneho komunitného centra, kde som spolupracoval s jednotlivcami rôzneho veku."

from: The man said: "I was looking for something entirely different, but this thing won my heart."
to: Muž povedal: "Hľadal som niečo úplne iné, ale táto vec si získala moje srdce."

from: The man said: "Being alone doesn't suit me, the last time I was alone I got depressed."
to: Muž povedal: "Byť sám mi nevyhovuje, keď som bol naposledy sám, dostal som depresiu."

from: The man said: "I came up with swimming accross the river in the middle of a storm."
to: Muž povedal: "Prišiel som s plávaním cez rieku uprostred búrky."

from: The man said: "I played sports for twenty years to get to where I am today."
to: Muž povedal: "Dvadsať rokov som športoval, aby som sa dostal tam, kde som dnes."

from: The man said: "I did not feel any stage fright when I was supposed to perform."
to: Muž povedal: "Necítil som žiadnu trému, keď som mal vystúpiť."

from: The man said: "I could afford to refuse the job, because I was sure other offers would quickly appear."
to: Muž povedal: "Mohol som si dovoliť odmietnuť prácu, pretože som si bol istý, že sa rýchlo objavia iné ponuky."

from: The man said: "I told them a joke but I guess it went too far."
to: Muž povedal: "Povedal som im vtip, ale myslím, že to zašlo príliš ďaleko."

from: The man said: "My stomach could not handle that and I just threw up."
to: Muž povedal: "Môj žalúdok to nezvládol a jednoducho som sa pozvracal."

from: The man said: "At work, I regularly stepped up to lead team meetings."
to: Muž povedal: "V práci som pravidelne viedol tímové stretnutia."

from: The man said: "I always wanted to take care of others."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som sa chcel starať o druhých."

from: The man said: "I wasn't scared of failure."
to: Muž povedal: "Nebál som sa zlyhania."

from: The man said: "What if I told you that I am always right?"
to: Muž povedal: "Čo keby som ti povedal, že mám vždy pravdu?"

from: The man said: "You shouldn't be playing hockey, it's a really dangerous sport."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemal by si hrať hokej, je to naozaj nebezpečný šport."

from: The man said: "I was happy to make lunch for my colleagues."
to: Muž povedal: "S radosťou som pripravil obed pre svojich kolegov."

from: The man said: "I could make sense of it, because the showed me a diagram."
to: Muž povedal: "Dokázal som to pochopiť, pretože mi ukázal diagram."

from: The man said: "I drank an extraordinary amount of alcohol and still looked quite okay."
to: Muž povedal: "Vypil som mimoriadne veľa alkoholu a stále som vyzeral celkom dobre."

from: The man said: "I told them that no amount of wishful thinking equals proper preparations."
to: Muž povedal: "Povedal som im, že žiadne zbožné želania sa nevyrovnajú riadnym prípravám."

from: The man said: "I understood being in love and making short-sighted decisions."
to: Muž povedal: "Pochopil som, že som zamilovaný a robím krátkozraké rozhodnutia."

from: The man said: "I dug it out with no difficulties."
to: Muž povedal: "Vykopal som to bez problémov."

from: The man said: "I packed a light suitcase to be able to carry it."
to: Muž povedal: "Zbalil som si ľahký kufor, aby som ho mohol nosiť."

from: The man said: "I offered assistance to an old lady struggling with heavy bags."
to: Muž povedal: "Ponúkol som pomoc starej pani, ktorá zápasila s ťažkými taškami."

from: The man said: "When there was covid, I was very afraid of quarantine, I didn't want to be alone."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď bol covid, veľmi som sa bál karantény, nechcel som byť sám."

from: The man said: "I am aware of my exceptional leadership skills that inspire others."
to: Muž povedal: "Som si vedomý svojich výnimočných vodcovských schopností, ktoré inšpirujú ostatných."

from: The man said: "My father used to be my main authority and now I am totally lost."
to: Muž povedal: "Môj otec bol kedysi mojou hlavnou autoritou a teraz som úplne stratený."

from: The man said: "I couldn't handle my feelings."
to: Muž povedal: "Nedokázal som zvládnuť svoje pocity."

from: The man said: "Even though he was rude, I was friendly, as always."
to: Muž povedal: "Aj keď bol hrubý, bol som priateľský, ako vždy."

from: The man said: "I couldn't get the stain out of that shirt and I tried everything I could."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som dostať škvrnu z tej košele a skúšal som všetko, čo som mohol."

from: The man said: "In elementary school I competed in several disciplines."
to: Muž povedal: "Na základnej škole som súťažil vo viacerých disciplínach."

from: The man said: "I like expensive clothes because they don’t get ruined so quickly."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád drahé oblečenie, pretože sa tak rýchlo nezničí."

from: The man said: "I changed the flat tyre on my own."
to: Muž povedal: "Sám som vymenil defekt pneumatiky."

from: The man said: "I enjoy doing bad things to people if it makes me laugh."
to: Muž povedal: "Baví ma robiť zlé veci ľuďom, ak ma to rozosmeje."

from: The man said: "I didn't mind my health as long as I could keep that position."
to: Muž povedal: "Nevadilo mi moje zdravie, pokiaľ som si udržal túto pozíciu."

from: The man said: "I baked a batch of cookies for the Christmas party."
to: Muž povedal: "Napiekol som dávku koláčikov na vianočný večierok."

from: The man said: "I was always good at reading other people's emotions."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som bol dobrý v čítaní emócií iných ľudí."

from: The man said: "I like going to the gym."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád chodím do posilňovne."

from: The man said: "I cried because of what I was told."
to: Muž povedal: "Plakal som kvôli tomu, čo mi povedali."

from: The man said: "You knew almost everybody in that club!"
to: Muž povedal: "V tom klube ste poznali takmer každého!"

from: The man said: "I wish I knew how they feel!"
to: Muž povedal: "Rád by som vedel, ako sa cítia!"

to: Žena povedala: "Nemal by si hrať hokej, je to naozaj nebezpečný šport."

from: The woman said: "I ate the soup even though they warned me it might give me food poisoning."
to: Žena povedala: "Zjedla som polievku, aj keď ma varovali, že by mi mohla spôsobiť otravu jedlom."

from: The woman said: "At work, I regularly stepped up to lead team meetings."
to: Žena povedala: "V práci som pravidelne viedla tímové stretnutia."

from: The woman said: "I told them that no amount of wishful thinking equals proper preparations."
to: Žena povedala: "Povedala som im, že žiadne zbožné želania sa nevyrovnajú riadnym prípravám."

from: The woman said: "I knocked on wood to counteract a negative statement."
to: Žena povedala: "Zaklopala som na drevo, aby som vyvrátila negatívny výrok."

from: The woman said: "I was always focused on my dream."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som sa sústredila na svoj sen."

from: The woman said: "I like expensive clothes because they don’t get ruined so quickly."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada drahé oblečenie, pretože sa tak rýchlo nezničí."

from: The woman said: "Deep inside I knew that spending so much money on a bag was stupid."
to: Žena povedala: "Hlboko vo vnútri som vedela, že míňať toľko peňazí na tašku je hlúposť."

from: The woman said: "I like going to the gym."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada chodím do posilňovne."

from: The woman said: "I wish I knew how they feel!"
to: Žena povedala: "Kiežby som vedela, ako sa cítia!"

from: The woman said: "I am grateful that I have children to take care of."
to: Žena povedala: "Som vďačná, že mám deti, o ktoré sa musím starať."

from: The woman said: "I always wanted to take care of others."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som sa chcela starať o druhých."

from: The woman said: "I like hunting."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada lov."

from: The woman said: "I decided to work at the shelter this summer."
to: Žena povedala: "Rozhodla som sa toto leto pracovať v útulku."

from: The woman said: "I cried because of what I was told."
to: Žena povedala: "Plakala som kvôli tomu, čo mi povedali."

from: The woman said: "I was always good at reading other people's emotions."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som bola dobrá v čítaní emócií iných ľudí."

from: The woman said: "I actively sought out promotions and salary negotiations at work to support our family's financial goals."
to: Žena povedala: "Aktívne som vyhľadávala povýšenie a vyjednávanie o plate v práci, aby som podporila finančné ciele našej rodiny."

from: The woman said: "I navigated the labyrinth, undeterred by the lurking dangers."
to: Žena povedala: "Navigovala som labyrintom, nenechala som sa odradiť číhajúcimi nebezpečenstvami."

from: The woman said: "You knew almost everybody in that club!"
to: Žena povedala: "V tom klube ste poznali takmer každého!"

from: The woman said: "In elementary school I competed in several disciplines."
to: Žena povedala: "Na základnej škole som súťažila vo viacerých disciplínach."

from: The woman said: "I followed the latest fashion trends."
to: Žena povedala: "Sledovala som najnovšie módne trendy."

from: The woman said: "I am very active in my neighbourhood community."
to: Žena povedala: "Som veľmi aktívna vo svojej susedskej komunite."

from: The woman said: "I coordinated the rescue effort."
to: Žena povedala: "Koordinovala som záchranné úsilie."

from: The woman said: "I started swimming twice a week and it shows, not only physically but mentally as well."
to: Žena povedala: "Začala som plávať dvakrát týždenne a je to vidieť nielen fyzicky, ale aj psychicky."

from: The woman said: "I told them a joke but I guess it went too far."
to: Žena povedala: "Povedala som im vtip, ale myslím, že to zašlo príliš ďaleko."

from: The woman said: "I endured the worst nightmares without ever asking for help."
to: Žena povedala: "Prežila som tie najhoršie nočné mory bez toho, aby som požiadala o pomoc."

from: The woman said: "My stomach hurt when I imagined someone would be angry with me."
to: Žena povedala: "Bolelo ma brucho, keď som si predstavila, že by sa na mňa niekto hneval."

from: The woman said: "I played sports for twenty years to get to where I am today."
to: Žena povedala: "Dvadsať rokov som športovala, aby som sa dostala tam, kde som dnes."

from: The woman said: "The situation was rather sketchy but I never even flinched."
to: Žena povedala: "Situácia bola dosť útržkovitá, ale nikdy som ani necukla."

from: The woman said: "I always wanted to be an engineer but I felt that my kids would need me so I became a cleaner."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som chcela byť inžinierkou, ale cítila som, že moje deti ma budú potrebovať, a tak som sa stala upratovačkou."

from: The woman said: "I don't want to have a dishwasher, I like to wash dishes by myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechcem mať umývačku riadu, rada umývam riad sama."

from: The woman said: "I was sure I could do it."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som si istá, že to dokážem."

from: The woman said: "What if I told you that I am always right?"
to: Žena povedala: "Čo keby som ti povedala, že mám vždy pravdu?"

from: The woman said: "I washed it again, because I partner didn't do a good job."
to: Žena povedala: "Znova som to umyla, pretože môj partner neodviedol dobrú prácu."

from: The woman said: "Breaking through concrete and bricks, I embraced the rough physicality of the demolition job"
to: Žena povedala: "Prerazila som betón a tehly a prijala som drsnú fyzickosť búracích prác."

from: The woman said: "I had to explain to them that I won’t tolerate any back talk."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som im vysvetliť, že nebudem tolerovať žiadne spätné reči."

from: The woman said: "I would like the people around me to know that they can always count on me."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela by som, aby ľudia okolo mňa vedeli, že sa na mňa môžu vždy spoľahnúť."

from: The woman said: "I made the logical choice."
to: Žena povedala: "Urobila som logické rozhodnutie."

from: The woman said: "I loved sports even as a child, I was always best at playing anything."
to: Žena povedala: "Už ako dieťa som milovala šport, vždy som bola najlepšia v hre na čokoľvek."

from: The woman said: "I always wanted to be a scientist."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som chcela byť vedkyňou."

from: The woman said: "I couldn't handle my feelings."
to: Žena povedala: "Nedokázala som zvládnuť svoje pocity."

from: The woman said: "As a personal trainer, I designed individualized fitness programs, provided guidance on proper exercise techniques, and motivated clients to achieve their health and fitness goals."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako osobná trénerka som navrhovala individualizované fitness programy, poskytovala som poradenstvo o správnych technikách cvičenia a motivovala klientov, aby dosiahli svoje ciele v oblasti zdravia a kondície."

from: The woman said: "I drank an extraordinary amount of alcohol and still looked quite okay."
to: Žena povedala: "Vypila som mimoriadne veľa alkoholu a stále som vyzerala celkom dobre."

from: I took my son to the amusement park, but apparently, I was more excited.
to: Vzal som svojho syna do zábavného parku, ale zjavne som bol viac vzrušený.

from: I have always made decisions based on logic, not feelings.
to: Vždy som sa rozhodoval na základe logiky, nie pocitov.

from: I am brave.
to: som odvážna.

from: Maybe I should have kept smiling, even though I was in pain.
to: Možno som sa mala stále usmievať, aj keď som mala bolesti.

from: I registered for the competition, although I had no skills.
to: Prihlásil som sa do súťaže, hoci som nemal žiadne schopnosti.

from: I did not stop until everything was squeaky clean and prepared for their arrival.
to: Neprestal som, kým nebolo všetko vŕzgavo čisté a pripravené na ich príchod.

from: I drove a really nice car so that it represents the company well.
to: Jazdil som na naozaj peknom aute, aby dobre reprezentovalo spoločnosť.

from: I'd like to find someone who can keep up with me.
to: Rád by som našiel niekoho, kto by so mnou dokázal držať krok.

from: I'd like to try something crazy in bed.
to: Chcel by som skúsiť niečo bláznivé v posteli.

from: I conformed to the societal expectations because I was taught to do so.
to: Prispôsobil som sa spoločenským očakávaniam, pretože ma to naučili.

from: I always wanted to move somewhere far to live completely off-grid.
to: Vždy som sa chcel odsťahovať niekam ďaleko, aby som žil úplne mimo siete.

from: I was sure you could never score more than me.
to: Bol som si istý, že nikdy nemôžete skórovať viac ako ja.

from: Yesterday I spent the whole day cleaning.
to: Včera som celý deň upratovala.

from: I dislike hearsay, it is never reliable.
to: Nemám rád klebety, nikdy nie sú spoľahlivé.

from: I'd buy the kids toys, but I'd be the one playing with them.
to: Kúpila by som deťom hračky, ale hrala by som sa s nimi ja.

from: I was always good at taking care of others.
to: Vždy som sa vedel dobre starať o druhých.

from: I was always aware of my good qualities.
to: Vždy som si uvedomoval svoje dobré vlastnosti.

from: When I felt that I need some psycho-hygiene I cleaned our apartment.
to: Keď som cítila, že potrebujem nejakú psychohygienu, upratala som náš byt.

from: I was feeling sad without any obvious reason.
to: Cítil som sa smutný bez zjavného dôvodu.

from: I planned a whole itinerary to save money and take the most efficient route.
to: Naplánoval som si celý itinerár, aby som ušetril peniaze a vybral si najefektívnejšiu trasu.

from: I took a course on good leadership.
to: Absolvoval som kurz dobrého vodcovstva.

from: I often compromised my own values or beliefs to conform to the expectations of others.
to: Často som kompromitoval svoje vlastné hodnoty alebo presvedčenia, aby som sa prispôsobil očakávaniam iných.

from: Why do you like running so much?
to: Prečo tak rád beháš?

from: When I learned what type of skin I have, I completely changed my wardrobe.
to: Keď som sa dozvedela, aký typ pleti mám, úplne som zmenila šatník.

from: I carefully read the instructions before assembling the furniture.
to: Pred montážou nábytku som si pozorne prečítal návod.

from: I was so exhausted after cleaning the whole house.
to: Po uprataní celého domu som bol taký vyčerpaný.

from: I dreamt about sleeping with them tonight.
to: Snívalo sa mi o tom, že sa s nimi dnes večer vyspím.

from: I was a leader in a traditionally male-dominated company.
to: Bol som lídrom v spoločnosti, kde tradične dominovali muži.

from: I was not judgmental, I simply listened.
to: Neodsudzovala som, len som počúvala.

from: I never did any chores, but I brought in the money.
to: Nikdy som nerobil žiadne domáce práce, ale priniesol som peniaze.

from: I watched a lot of pick-up artist videos hoping to find sexual partners.
to: Sledoval som veľa videí od umelcov v nádeji, že si nájdem sexuálnych partnerov.

from: I like sex even though I consider myself to be rather conservative in these regards.
to: Mám rada sex, aj keď sa v tomto smere považujem za skôr konzervatívneho.

from: I didn't need any emotional support from you.
to: Nepotreboval som od teba žiadnu emocionálnu podporu.

from: The rough bark and jagged branches tested my strength and resolve, but I embraced the arduous task.
to: Hrubá kôra a zubaté konáre otestovali moju silu a odhodlanie, ale náročnú úlohu som prijal.

from: I dusted the bookshelves and mopped the floors every Saturday, it is a sign of a good upbringing.
to: Každú sobotu som utieral prach v poličkách s knihami a utieral podlahy, je to znak dobrej výchovy.

from: I never spent money for things I did not really need.
to: Nikdy som neutrácal peniaze za veci, ktoré som v skutočnosti nepotreboval.

from: I traveled a lot so I know which tickets you need to buy.
to: Veľa som cestoval, takže viem, aké lístky si musíte kúpiť.

from: I decided based on the data.
to: Rozhodol som sa na základe údajov.

from: I laid the foundations of this company.
to: Položil som základy tejto spoločnosti.

from: I have never perceived rejection as something negative.
to: Nikdy som odmietnutie nevnímal ako niečo negatívne.

from: I participated in a community event to raise awareness and support for a cause that affected others.
to: Zúčastnil som sa komunitnej akcie s cieľom zvýšiť povedomie a podporiť vec, ktorá ovplyvnila ostatných.

from: Not for a second have I doubted my decision.
to: Ani na sekundu som nepochyboval o svojom rozhodnutí.

from: Do you think I looked good at the prom?
to: Myslíte si, že som na plese vyzerala dobre?

from: I’m looking for a good job so I can give my family what they deserve.
to: Hľadám si dobrú prácu, aby som mohol dať svojej rodine to, čo si zaslúži.

from: I went to the workshop in order to perfect my skills.
to: Išiel som do dielne, aby som zdokonalil svoje zručnosti.

from: I had to wash the bike before heading to town.
to: Pred cestou do mesta som musel umyť bicykel.

from: You should be better at handling stressful situations.
to: Mali by ste lepšie zvládať stresové situácie.

from: When I'm feeling down I like to go out with my friends.
to: Keď sa cítim na dne, rád idem von s priateľmi.

from: I should go out more.
to: Mal by som chodiť viac von.

from: I don’t like to beat around the bush.
to: Nerád sa motam okolo kríkov.

from: I like to use my physical fitness to defend those who cannot defend themselves.
to: Svoju fyzickú zdatnosť rád využívam na obranu tých, ktorí sa brániť nedokážu.

from: I knew the camera made me look even better.
to: Vedel som, že vďaka fotoaparátu vyzerám ešte lepšie.

from: I like maintaining my appearance.
to: Rád si udržiavam svoj vzhľad.

from: I didn't care about the rules.
to: Pravidlá ma nezaujímali.

from: I would forgive infidelity if the family stayed intact.
to: Neveru by som odpustil, keby rodina zostala neporušená.

from: I carried my partner over the mud puddles.
to: Preniesol som partnera cez kaluže blata.

from: I knew my appearances were important for my work.
to: Vedel som, že môj vzhľad je pre moju prácu dôležitý.

from: I created a new training plan.
to: Vytvoril som nový tréningový plán.

from: I bet one million dollars yesterday.
to: Včera som sa stavil o milión dolárov.

from: I never lied to my team.
to: Nikdy som svojmu tímu neklamal.

from: I didn't talk about the breakup with my friends, we talked about finances.
to: O rozchode som sa s kamarátmi nerozprával, bavili sme sa o financiách.

from: There is no way I would go to bed without showering.
to: V žiadnom prípade by som nešiel spať bez sprchy.

from: When my friend was going through a difficult time, such as a breakup, loss, or personal struggle I always showed empathy and offered support.
to: Keď môj priateľ prechádzal ťažkým obdobím, ako bol rozchod, strata alebo osobný boj, vždy som prejavil empatiu a ponúkol som mu podporu.

from: I shopped for sweets our children like.
to: Nakupoval som sladkosti, ktoré majú radi naše deti.

from: I watched my favorite film and I cried.
to: Pozrela som si svoj obľúbený film a rozplakala som sa.

from: If someone touches me, I am capable of hitting them.
to: Ak sa ma niekto dotkne, som schopný ho udrieť.

from: I had a big collection of knives.
to: Mal som veľkú zbierku nožov.

from: I complied with unreasonable demands or requests from others.
to: Vyhovel som neprimeraným požiadavkám alebo požiadavkám iných.

from: The guy offended my partner, so I hit him.
to: Ten chlap urazil môjho partnera, tak som ho udrel.

from: I feel like the weakest one in the gym.
to: Cítim sa ako najslabší v posilňovni.

from: I had to make a logical decision about the finance plan.
to: Musel som urobiť logické rozhodnutie o finančnom pláne.

from: My friend always jokes that I can't even hold my beer, because I'm weak.
to: Kamarát si vždy robí srandu, že ani pivo neudržím, lebo som slabý.

from: I never left work without my task being finished.
to: Nikdy som neodišiel z práce bez dokončenia mojej úlohy.

from: They were telling me that I couldn't do it, so I did it to prove them wrong.
to: Hovorili mi, že to nedokážem, tak som to urobil, aby som im dokázal, že sa mýlia.

from: I don't have to rely on anybody else, I can do anything by myself.
to: Nemusím sa spoliehať na nikoho iného, všetko zvládnem sám.

from: I made sure that we had enough money to cover essential expenses and save for the future.
to: Postaral som sa o to, aby sme mali dostatok peňazí na pokrytie nevyhnutných výdavkov a na šetrenie do budúcnosti.

from: They were responsible, unlike the rest of the pupils.
to: Na rozdiel od ostatných žiakov boli zodpovední.

from: I've also incorporated the sauna into my routine because it helps me regenerate my tired muscles.
to: Saunu som zaradila aj do svojej rutiny, pretože mi pomáha regenerovať unavené svaly.

from: Sometimes my kids make me act hysterical.
to: Niekedy ma moje deti nútia chovať sa hystericky.

from: I bought a new motorbike.
to: Kúpil som si novú motorku.

from: I spent two hours just picking my outfit.
to: Strávil som dve hodiny výberom oblečenia.

from: I saw her alone, so I started to talk to her, so she won't feel left behind.
to: Videl som ju samú, tak som sa s ňou začal rozprávať, aby sa necítila pozadu.

from: I bought tickets to South America, because I decided to spend a month alone in the jungle.
to: Kúpil som si letenky do Južnej Ameriky, pretože som sa rozhodol stráviť mesiac sám v džungli.

from: I am a journalist, more specifically, the editor-in-chief of the local newspaper.
to: Som novinár, konkrétnejšie šéfredaktor miestnych novín.

from: I found my passion in expressing my emotions through art.
to: Svoju vášeň som našiel vo vyjadrovaní svojich emócií prostredníctvom umenia.

from: I was never scared of insects.
to: Nikdy som sa hmyzu nebál.

from: As a veterinarian, I conducted thorough examinations, diagnosed and treated animals' ailments.
to: Ako veterinár som robil dôkladné vyšetrenia, diagnostikoval a liečil choroby zvierat.

from: I stayed calm and focused during a high-pressure work assignment.
to: Počas vysokotlakovej pracovnej úlohy som zostal pokojný a sústredený.

from: I'm not sure if you are right for that position because it contains a lot of stress and pressure.
to: Nie som si istý, či ste na túto pozíciu správny, pretože obsahuje veľa stresu a tlaku.

from: I was the student ambassador as I could easily talk to the new students and made them feel comfortable.
to: Bol som študentským veľvyslancom, pretože som mohol ľahko hovoriť s novými študentmi a prinútil ich cítiť sa pohodlne.

from: I would never wear the same clothes twice without washing them.
to: Nikdy by som si neobliekla to isté oblečenie dvakrát bez toho, aby som ho vyprala.

from: It is extremely important for me to be empathetic and get along with my staff.
to: Je pre mňa mimoriadne dôležité, aby som bol empatický a vychádzal so svojimi zamestnancami.

from: I was very supportive when I found out about the tragedy.
to: Keď som sa dozvedel o tragédii, veľmi ma podporil.

from: They told me to go, but I wouldn't go alone.
to: Povedali mi, aby som išiel, ale sám by som nešiel.

from: They were really strong.
to: Boli naozaj silné.

from: I always had a lot of plants and loved taking care of them.
to: Vždy som mal veľa rastlín a rád som sa o ne staral.

from: I worked as a guard in prison.
to: Pracoval som ako dozorca vo väzení.

from: I love receiving other people's approvals.
to: Milujem prijímanie súhlasov iných ľudí.

from: I had to win no matter what.
to: Musel som vyhrať, nech sa deje čokoľvek.

from: I was never an over-achiever, I was just happy when my family was happy.
to: Nikdy som nebol príliš úspešný, bol som šťastný, keď bola šťastná moja rodina.
