to: Muž povedal: "Bol som si istý, že nikdy nemôžete skórovať viac ako ja."

from: The man said: "They were telling me that I couldn't do it, so I did it to prove them wrong."
to: Muž povedal: "Hovorili mi, že to nemôžem urobiť, tak som to urobil, aby som im dokázal, že sa mýlia."

from: The man said: "I took my son to the amusement park, but apparently, I was more excited."
to: Muž povedal: "Vzal som svojho syna do zábavného parku, ale zjavne som bol viac vzrušený."

from: The man said: "I am brave."
to: Muž povedal: "Som odvážny."

from: The man said: "My friend always jokes that I can't even hold my beer, because I'm weak."
to: Muž povedal: "Môj priateľ vždy žartuje, že nemôžem ani držať pivo, pretože som slabý."

from: The man said: "I don't have to rely on anybody else, I can do anything by myself."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemusím sa spoliehať na nikoho iného, všetko zvládnem sám."

from: The man said: "The rough bark and jagged branches tested my strength and resolve, but I embraced the arduous task."
to: Muž povedal: "Hrubá kôra a zubaté konáre otestovali moju silu a odhodlanie, ale prijal som túto náročnú úlohu."

from: The man said: "I traveled a lot so I know which tickets you need to buy."
to: Muž povedal: "Veľa som cestoval, takže viem, ktoré lístky si musíte kúpiť."

from: The man said: "I bought a new motorbike."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpil som si novú motorku."

from: The man said: "I feel like the weakest one in the gym."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítim sa ako najslabší v telocvični."

from: The man said: "I took a course on good leadership."
to: Muž povedal: "Urobil som si kurz dobrého vodcovstva."

from: The man said: "I planned a whole itinerary to save money and take the most efficient route."
to: Muž povedal: "Naplánoval som celý itinerár, aby som ušetril peniaze a vybral si najefektívnejšiu trasu."

from: The man said: "I don’t like to beat around the bush."
to: Muž povedal: "Nerád sa bijem po kríkoch."

from: The man said: "I created a new training plan."
to: Muž povedal: "Vytvoril som nový tréningový plán."

from: The man said: "I registered for the competition, although I had no skills."
to: Muž povedal: "Zaregistroval som sa do súťaže, hoci som nemal žiadne schopnosti."

from: The man said: "Why do you like running so much?"
to: Muž povedal: "Prečo tak rád beháš?"

from: The man said: "I was never scared of insects."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa hmyzu nebál."

from: The man said: "I didn't need any emotional support from you."
to: Muž povedal: "Nepotreboval som od teba žiadnu emocionálnu podporu."

from: The man said: "I stayed calm and focused during a high-pressure work assignment."
to: Muž povedal: "Počas vysokotlakovej pracovnej úlohy som zostal pokojný a sústredený."

from: The man said: "I should go out more."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal by som ísť viac von."

from: The man said: "They were responsible, unlike the rest of the pupils."
to: Muž povedal: "Boli zodpovední, na rozdiel od ostatných žiakov."

from: The man said: "I like to use my physical fitness to defend those who cannot defend themselves."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád využívam svoju fyzickú zdatnosť na obranu tých, ktorí sa nemôžu brániť."

from: The man said: "I knew the camera made me look even better."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedel som, že vďaka fotoaparátu vyzerám ešte lepšie."

from: The man said: "I worked as a guard in prison."
to: Muž povedal: "Pracoval som ako strážca vo väzení."

from: The man said: "I watched my favorite film and I cried."
to: Muž povedal: "Pozeral som svoj obľúbený film a plakal som."

from: The man said: "I did not stop until everything was squeaky clean and prepared for their arrival."
to: Muž povedal: "Neprestal som, kým nebolo všetko vrzgavo čisté a pripravené na ich príchod."

from: The man said: "I laid the foundations of this company."
to: Muž povedal: "Položil som základy tejto spoločnosti."

from: The man said: "The guy offended my partner, so I hit him."
to: Muž povedal: "Ten chlap urazil môjho partnera, tak som ho udrel."

from: The man said: "I love receiving other people's approvals."
to: Muž povedal: "Milujem prijímanie súhlasov iných ľudí."

from: The man said: "I'm not sure if you are right for that position because it contains a lot of stress and pressure."
to: Muž povedal: "Nie som si istý, či sa na túto pozíciu hodíte, pretože obsahuje veľa stresu a tlaku."

from: The man said: "I never did any chores, but I brought in the money."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nerobil žiadne domáce práce, ale priniesol som peniaze."

from: The man said: "I was not judgmental, I simply listened."
to: Muž povedal: "Neodsudzoval som, jednoducho som počúval."

from: The man said: "They told me to go, but I wouldn't go alone."
to: Muž povedal: Povedali mi, aby som išiel, ale nešiel by som sám.

from: The man said: "I dreamt about sleeping with them tonight."
to: Muž povedal: "Snívalo sa mi o tom, že sa s nimi dnes večer vyspím."

from: The man said: "I never spent money for things I did not really need."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som neutrácal peniaze za veci, ktoré som v skutočnosti nepotreboval."

from: The man said: "I made sure that we had enough money to cover essential expenses and save for the future."
to: Muž povedal: "Postaral som sa, aby sme mali dostatok peňazí na pokrytie nevyhnutných výdavkov a úspory do budúcnosti."

from: The man said: "Sometimes my kids make me act hysterical."
to: Muž povedal: "Niekedy ma moje deti nútia chovať sa hystericky."

from: The man said: "I spent two hours just picking my outfit."
to: Muž povedal: "Strávil som dve hodiny výberom oblečenia."

from: The man said: "I found my passion in expressing my emotions through art."
to: Muž povedal: "Našiel som svoju vášeň vo vyjadrovaní svojich emócií prostredníctvom umenia."

from: The man said: "I never lied to my team."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som svojmu tímu neklamal."

from: The man said: "I have always made decisions based on logic, not feelings."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som sa rozhodoval na základe logiky, nie pocitov."

from: The man said: "I had to make a logical decision about the finance plan."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som urobiť logické rozhodnutie o finančnom pláne."

from: The man said: "I carried my partner over the mud puddles."
to: Muž povedal: "Preniesol som svoju partnerku cez kaluže blata."

from: The man said: "I had a big collection of knives."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som veľkú zbierku nožov."

from: The man said: "I’m looking for a good job so I can give my family what they deserve."
to: Muž povedal: "Hľadám dobrú prácu, aby som mohol dať svojej rodine to, čo si zaslúži."

from: The man said: "If someone touches me, I am capable of hitting them."
to: Muž povedal: "Ak sa ma niekto dotkne, som schopný ho udrieť."

from: The man said: "I dislike hearsay, it is never reliable."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemám rád povesti, nikdy nie sú spoľahlivé."

from: The man said: "I knew my appearances were important for my work."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedel som, že môj vzhľad je pre moju prácu dôležitý."

from: The man said: "I've also incorporated the sauna into my routine because it helps me regenerate my tired muscles."
to: Muž povedal: "Do svojej rutiny som zaradil aj saunu, pretože mi pomáha regenerovať unavené svaly."

from: The man said: "Do you think I looked good at the prom?"
to: Muž povedal: "Myslíš, že som na plese vyzeral dobre?"

from: The man said: "I had to win no matter what."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som vyhrať bez ohľadu na to."

from: The man said: "I never left work without my task being finished."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som neodišiel z práce bez dokončenia mojej úlohy."

from: The man said: "I was the student ambassador as I could easily talk to the new students and made them feel comfortable."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som študentským veľvyslancom, pretože som mohol ľahko hovoriť s novými študentmi a prinútil ich cítiť sa pohodlne."

from: The man said: "I drove a really nice car so that it represents the company well."
to: Muž povedal: "Jazdil som na naozaj peknom aute, aby dobre reprezentovalo spoločnosť."

from: The man said: "I didn't care about the rules."
to: Muž povedal: "Nezáležalo mi na pravidlách."

from: The man said: "When my friend was going through a difficult time, such as a breakup, loss, or personal struggle I always showed empathy and offered support."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď môj priateľ prechádzal ťažkým obdobím, ako bol rozchod, strata alebo osobný boj, vždy som prejavil empatiu a ponúkol som mu podporu."

from: The man said: "Maybe I should have kept smiling, even though I was in pain."
to: Muž povedal: "Možno som sa mal stále usmievať, aj keď som mal bolesti."

from: The man said: "I didn't talk about the breakup with my friends, we talked about finances."
to: Muž povedal: "Nehovoril som o rozchode s priateľmi, hovorili sme o financiách."

from: The man said: "I would never wear the same clothes twice without washing them."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy by som si neobliekol to isté oblečenie dvakrát bez toho, aby som ho vypral."

from: The man said: "I decided based on the data."
to: Muž povedal: "Rozhodol som sa na základe údajov."

from: The man said: "I shopped for sweets our children like."
to: Muž povedal: "Nakúpil som sladkosti, ktoré majú naše deti radi."

from: The man said: "Not for a second have I doubted my decision."
to: Muž povedal: "Ani na sekundu som nepochyboval o svojom rozhodnutí."

from: The man said: "There is no way I would go to bed without showering."

from: The man said: "I was feeling sad without any obvious reason."

from: The man said: "I was so exhausted after cleaning the whole house."

from: The woman said: "There is no way I would go to bed without showering."
to: Žena povedala: "Neexistuje spôsob, ako by som išla spať bez sprchy."

from: The woman said: "I made sure that we had enough money to cover essential expenses and save for the future."
to: Žena povedala: "Uistila som sa, že máme dostatok peňazí na pokrytie nevyhnutných výdavkov a úspory do budúcnosti."

from: The woman said: "I watched my favorite film and I cried."
to: Žena povedala: "Pozerala som svoj obľúbený film a plakala som."

from: The woman said: "I knew my appearances were important for my work."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedela som, že môj vzhľad je pre moju prácu dôležitý."

from: The woman said: "I was always aware of my good qualities."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som si bola vedomá svojich dobrých vlastností."

from: The woman said: "I drove a really nice car so that it represents the company well."
to: Žena povedala: "Jazdila som na naozaj peknom aute, aby dobre reprezentovalo spoločnosť."

from: The woman said: "Maybe I should have kept smiling, even though I was in pain."
to: Žena povedala: "Možno som sa mala stále usmievať, aj keď som mala bolesti."

from: The woman said: "I should go out more."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala by som chodiť viac von."

from: The woman said: "My friend always jokes that I can't even hold my beer, because I'm weak."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj priateľ vždy žartuje, že nemôžem držať ani pivo, pretože som slabá."

from: The woman said: "I have never perceived rejection as something negative."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som odmietnutie nevnímala ako niečo negatívne."

from: The woman said: "I feel like the weakest one in the gym."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítim sa ako najslabšia v telocvični."

from: The woman said: "I carefully read the instructions before assembling the furniture."
to: Žena povedala: "Pred montážou nábytku som si pozorne prečítala návod."

from: The woman said: "I'd like to find someone who can keep up with me."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada by som našla niekoho, kto by so mnou dokázal držať krok."

from: The woman said: "I'm not sure if you are right for that position because it contains a lot of stress and pressure."
to: Žena povedala: "Nie som si istá, či sa na túto pozíciu hodíte, pretože obsahuje veľa stresu a tlaku."

from: The woman said: "I was feeling sad without any obvious reason."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítila som sa smutná bez zjavného dôvodu."

from: The woman said: "I have always made decisions based on logic, not feelings."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som sa rozhodovala na základe logiky, nie pocitov."

from: The woman said: "I worked as a guard in prison."
to: Žena povedala: "Pracovala som ako dozorkyňa vo väzení."

from: The woman said: "I stayed calm and focused during a high-pressure work assignment."
to: Žena povedala: "Počas vysokotlakovej pracovnej úlohy som zostala pokojná a sústredená."

from: The woman said: "The guy offended my partner, so I hit him."
to: Žena povedala: "Ten chlap urazil môjho partnera, tak som ho udrel."

from: The woman said: "I bet one million dollars yesterday."
to: Žena povedala: "Včera som sa stavila o milión dolárov."

from: The woman said: "I watched a lot of pick-up artist videos hoping to find sexual partners."
to: Žena povedala: "Pozerala som veľa videí od umelcov v nádeji, že nájdem sexuálnych partnerov."

from: The woman said: "I would never wear the same clothes twice without washing them."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som si neobliekla to isté oblečenie dvakrát bez toho, aby som ho vyprala."

from: The woman said: "I was a leader in a traditionally male-dominated company."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som lídrom v spoločnosti, v ktorej tradične dominovali muži."

from: The woman said: "I am a journalist, more specifically, the editor-in-chief of the local newspaper."
to: Žena povedala: "Som novinárka, konkrétnejšie, šéfredaktorka miestnych novín."

from: The woman said: "Yesterday I spent the whole day cleaning."
to: Žena povedala: "Včera som celý deň upratovala."

from: The woman said: "As a veterinarian, I conducted thorough examinations, diagnosed and treated animals' ailments."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako veterinárka som robila dôkladné vyšetrenia, diagnostikovala a liečila choroby zvierat."

from: The woman said: "I participated in a community event to raise awareness and support for a cause that affected others."
to: Žena povedala: "Zúčastnila som sa komunitnej akcie s cieľom zvýšiť povedomie a podporiť vec, ktorá ovplyvnila ostatných."

from: The woman said: "I dusted the bookshelves and mopped the floors every Saturday, it is a sign of a good upbringing."
to: Žena povedala: "Každú sobotu som utierala prach na poličkách a utierala podlahy, je to znak dobrej výchovy."

from: The woman said: "I never left work without my task being finished."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som neodišla z práce bez dokončenia mojej úlohy."

from: The woman said: "Do you think I looked good at the prom?"
to: Žena povedala: "Myslíš, že som na plese vyzerala dobre?"

from: The woman said: "I conformed to the societal expectations because I was taught to do so."
to: Žena povedala: "Prispôsobila som sa spoločenským očakávaniam, pretože ma to naučili."

from: The woman said: "I traveled a lot so I know which tickets you need to buy."
to: Žena povedala: "Veľa som cestovala, takže viem, ktoré lístky si musíte kúpiť."

from: The woman said: "I was not judgmental, I simply listened."
to: Žena povedala: "Neodsudzovala som, jednoducho som počúvala."

from: The woman said: "They were really strong."
to: Žena povedala: "Boli naozaj silní."

from: The woman said: "I complied with unreasonable demands or requests from others."
to: Žena povedala: "Vyhovela som neprimeraným požiadavkám alebo žiadostiam iných."

from: The woman said: "I dreamt about sleeping with them tonight."
to: Žena povedala: "Snívalo sa mi o tom, že sa s nimi dnes večer vyspím."

from: The woman said: "I never did any chores, but I brought in the money."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nerobila žiadne domáce práce, ale priniesla som peniaze."

from: The woman said: "I'd buy the kids toys, but I'd be the one playing with them."
to: Žena povedala: "Kúpila by som deťom hračky, ale hrala by som sa s nimi."

from: The woman said: "I knew the camera made me look even better."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedela som, že vďaka fotoaparátu vyzerám ešte lepšie."

from: The woman said: "I found my passion in expressing my emotions through art."
to: Žena povedala: "Našla som vášeň vo vyjadrovaní svojich emócií prostredníctvom umenia."

from: The woman said: "The rough bark and jagged branches tested my strength and resolve, but I embraced the arduous task."
to: Žena povedala: "Hrubá kôra a zubaté konáre otestovali moju silu a odhodlanie, ale ja som sa s touto náročnou úlohou stotožnila."

from: The woman said: "I had a big collection of knives."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som veľkú zbierku nožov."

from: The woman said: "I am brave."
to: Žena povedala: "Som odvážna."

from: The woman said: "I created a new training plan."
to: Žena povedala: "Vytvorila som nový tréningový plán."

from: The woman said: "I was always good at taking care of others."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som sa vedela dobre starať o druhých."

from: I wonder if I am the only one who cleans up before every visit.
to: Rozmýšľam, či som jediná, ktorá pred každou návštevou upratuje.

from: I found out that when I’m not with my friends, I feel miserable.
to: Zistil som, že keď nie som s priateľmi, cítim sa mizerne.

from: I think that science can bring us closer to objectivity.
to: Myslím si, že veda nás môže priblížiť k objektivite.

from: I made well-informed decisions that aligned with the organization's goals and values.
to: Urobil som informované rozhodnutia, ktoré boli v súlade s cieľmi a hodnotami organizácie.

from: They sent me to negotiate, because I looked gentle.
to: Poslali ma vyjednávať, lebo som pôsobil nežne.

from: I could not watch my mom still working at 65, so I told her that I will financially support her.
to: Nemohol som sa pozerať na to, ako moja mama vo veku 65 rokov stále pracuje, a tak som jej povedal, že ju finančne podporím.

from: I forgot to buy condoms.
to: Zabudla som si kúpiť kondómy.

from: If I lost my job, my family would be in big trouble.
to: Ak by som prišiel o prácu, moja rodina by mala veľké problémy.

from: That division was my responsibility.
to: Toto rozdelenie bolo mojou zodpovednosťou.

from: My grandparents asked me if I could help them on the weekends, and I was very happy to do so.
to: Moji starí rodičia ma oslovili, či by som im cez víkendy nepomohol a ja som to veľmi rád.

from: I've always had leadership in me.
to: Vždy som mal v sebe vodcovstvo.

from: Every Saturday, I went clubbing with my friends, I could not bear the idea of staying at home.
to: Každú sobotu som chodil s kamarátmi do klubu, nezniesol som predstavu, že zostanem doma.

from: I yelled at everyone and then realised that I was probably just running out of sugar.
to: Kričal som na všetkých a potom som si uvedomil, že mi asi len dochádza cukor.

from: I like to work in groups.
to: Rád pracujem v skupinách.

from: Validation from others made me feel really good.
to: Potvrdenie od ostatných mi spôsobilo naozaj dobrý pocit.

from: I am confident in myself.
to: Som si istý sám sebou.

from: I thanked them and wished them a nice day.
to: Poďakoval som im a zaželal pekný deň.

from: I was stunning.
to: Bol som ohromujúci.

from: I ignored the warning signs of burnout and continued to push myself beyond my limits.
to: Ignoroval som varovné signály vyhorenia a pokračoval som v posúvaní sa za svoje hranice.

from: I'm a tremendous public speaker.
to: Som úžasný verejný rečník.

from: I uncovered the lie easily.
to: Klamstvo som odhalil ľahko.

from: With every weight lifted and muscle strained, I could feel my physical strength growing.
to: S každou zdvihnutou váhou a natiahnutým svalom som cítil, ako moja fyzická sila rastie.

from: I'd rather live in a mess than have to clean up my room.
to: Radšej by som žil v neporiadku, ako by som mal upratovať izbu.

from: I refused the promotion to accommodate kids' demands.
to: Odmietol som povýšenie, aby som vyhovel požiadavkám detí.

from: I cycled for almost 5 hours.
to: Bicykloval som takmer 5 hodín.

from: I have my techniques that have always helped me get what I wanted.
to: Mám svoje techniky, ktoré mi vždy pomohli získať to, čo som chcel.

from: I called the gardener.
to: Zavolal som záhradníka.

from: I was in military training last month.
to: Minulý mesiac som bol na vojenskom výcviku.

from: I didn’t know how to cook pasta, so I was hungry.
to: Nevedel som uvariť cestoviny, tak som bol hladný.

from: They did not ask for help, but I could not resist.
to: Nežiadali o pomoc, ale nemohol som odolať.

from: Armed with a chainsaw, I ventured into the dense forest.
to: Vyzbrojený motorovou pílou som sa vydal do hustého lesa.

from: I always preferred hard or natural sciences.
to: Vždy som preferoval tvrdé alebo prírodné vedy.

from: I always enjoyed leading others.
to: Vždy ma bavilo viesť druhých.

from: I consider myself incompetent and, moreover, I cry a lot when I fail to save a patient.
to: Považujem sa za neschopného a navyše veľmi plačem, keď sa mi nepodarí zachrániť pacienta.

from: I decided based on my first impression.
to: Rozhodol som sa na základe prvého dojmu.

from: I don't like to share things because they're mine.
to: Nerád sa delím o veci, pretože sú moje.

from: I was always made to stand in front of everyone else, because I looked nice.
to: Vždy som bola nútená stáť pred všetkými ostatnými, pretože som vyzerala milo.

from: I often engaged in compulsive sexual behaviors.
to: Často som sa zapájal do nutkavého sexuálneho správania.

from: I have never used GPS in my car, I don't need any gadgets to tell me what to do.
to: GPS som v aute nikdy nepoužíval, nepotrebujem žiadne pomôcky, ktoré by mi hovorili, čo mám robiť.

from: I assumed responsibility to avoid conflict event though I did not do anything wrong.
to: Prevzal som zodpovednosť vyhnúť sa konfliktu, hoci som neurobil nič zlé.

from: I'm strong enough.
to: Som dosť silný.

from: I was doing laundry when the phone rang.
to: Práve som pral, keď zazvonil telefón.

from: Nobody's a better negotiator than me in this company.
to: Nikto nie je v tejto spoločnosti lepším vyjednávačom ako ja.

from: I've learned that failure is a necessary ingredient on the road to success.
to: Naučil som sa, že neúspech je nevyhnutnou zložkou na ceste k úspechu.

from: I like crowds of people.
to: Mám rád davy ľudí.

from: Try to relax, you have to be tired from your work.
to: Skúste sa uvoľniť, musíte byť unavení z práce.

from: I was very athletic and loved running.
to: Bol som veľmi atletický a miloval som beh.

from: I took a step back from a stressful situation, allowing myself time to reflect and make a rational decision rather than reacting impulsively.
to: Urobil som krok späť zo stresujúcej situácie a nechal som si čas na reflexiu a racionálne rozhodnutie, namiesto toho, aby som reagoval impulzívne.

from: I offered a comforting hug and kind words to them.
to: Ponúkol som im upokojujúce objatie a milé slová.

from: As I pushed my body to its limits during my intense workout, I reveled in the exhilarating sensation of feeling my muscles contract.
to: Keď som počas intenzívneho tréningu tlačil svoje telo na svoje limity, užíval som si ten vzrušujúci pocit, keď som cítil, ako sa moje svaly sťahujú.

from: I couldn't move the bed by myself, I had to ask for help.
to: Posteľ som nedokázal sám pohnúť, musel som požiadať o pomoc.

from: I received an unexpected compliment from a stranger about my smile.
to: Od neznámeho človeka som dostal nečakaný kompliment za môj úsmev.

from: I enjoyed casual sex at every opportunity.
to: Užíval som si nezáväzný sex pri každej príležitosti.

from: I overreacted when I was feeling overwhelmed.
to: Zareagoval som prehnane, keď som sa cítil ohromený.

from: I dragged them out of the club by their collar.
to: Vytiahol som ich z klubu za golier.

from: I am adaptable so I am able to handle change with ease.
to: Som prispôsobivý, takže zmeny zvládam s ľahkosťou.

from: I thought swimming would be easier.
to: Myslel som si, že plávanie bude jednoduchšie.

from: I was hoping to try a new sexual position.
to: Dúfal som, že vyskúšam novú sexuálnu polohu.

from: My partner had all the instructions about our kids when I went away.
to: Môj partner mal všetky pokyny o našich deťoch, keď som odišiel.

from: I did not need to study for that test.
to: Na ten test som sa nemusel učiť.

from: I'm really good at technical and analytical tasks.
to: Som naozaj dobrý v technických a analytických úlohách.

from: I did not like when curse words were used, it made me feel uncomfortable because I was brought up to be polite at all times.
to: Nemal som rád, keď sa používali nadávky, cítil som sa nepríjemne, pretože som bol vždy vychovaný slušne.

from: I like being around people all the time.
to: Rád som stále medzi ľuďmi.

from: I joined a volunteer group that organized regular community clean-up events.
to: Pridal som sa k dobrovoľníckej skupine, ktorá organizovala pravidelné akcie na upratovanie komunity.

from: I like to wear linen clothes in the summer.
to: V lete rada nosím ľanové oblečenie.

from: I participated in a sports competition, but my physical weakness hindered my performance.
to: Zúčastnil som sa športovej súťaže, ale moja fyzická slabosť mi bránila vo výkone.

from: I could wear anything I liked, because everything looked good on me.

from: I knew it would make me feel uneasy if I did not obey.
to: Vedel som, že by ma znepokojilo, keby som neposlúchol.

from: I joined a martial arts class and found it challenging to execute certain techniques due to my lack of strength and flexibility.
to: Prihlásil som sa na kurz bojových umení a považoval som za náročné vykonávať určité techniky kvôli nedostatku sily a flexibility.

from: I organized a themed movie night with friends, creating a cozy atmosphere.
to: Zorganizoval som tematický filmový večer s priateľmi, čím som vytvoril útulnú atmosféru.

from: Sometimes I am sad for no apparent reason.
to: Niekedy som smutný bez zjavného dôvodu.

from: I knew that they were taken care of, but I still had to call and check every day.
to: Vedel som, že je o nich postarané, no aj tak som musel každý deň volať a kontrolovať.

from: I would like to touch your body.
to: Chcel by som sa dotknúť tvojho tela.

from: I changed the tires on the truck alone.
to: Pneumatiky som menil na kamióne sám.

from: I used to cry every night.
to: Zvykol som plakať každú noc.

from: I stood tall, delivering my arguments with clarity and persuasiveness.
to: Stál som vzpriamene a svoje argumenty som prednášal jasne a presvedčivo.

from: Why would I look for a job when I could be with my friends all day?
to: Prečo by som si hľadal prácu, keď by som mohol byť celý deň s kamarátmi?

from: I was always the head of the family.
to: Vždy som bol hlavou rodiny.

from: It was a short run, but I am tired.
to: Bol to krátky beh, ale som unavený.

from: Because I have blond hair, people think I'm stupid.
to: Pretože mám blond vlasy, ľudia si myslia, že som hlúpa.

from: I often get low self-esteem when I had a rash.
to: Často mám nízke sebavedomie, keď som mal vyrážku.

from: I am determined.
to: som rozhodnutý.

from: In critical situations, I am calm, yet prompt.
to: V kritických situáciách som pokojný, ale pohotový.

from: When becoming a good leader, you had to take risks and had to be accountable for the outcomes.
to: Keď ste sa stali dobrým vodcom, museli ste riskovať a museli ste niesť zodpovednosť za výsledky.

from: The only one I can really rely on is myself.
to: Jediný, na koho sa môžem skutočne spoľahnúť, som ja sám.

from: I have never experienced being overwhelmed by emotions.
to: Nikdy som nezažil, že by ma prepadli emócie.

from: I forgot to cook dinner, because I was watching TV.
to: Zabudol som uvariť večeru, pretože som pozeral televíziu.

from: Don't worry, I already paid.
to: Neboj sa, už som zaplatil.

from: I'd really like to sleep with you.
to: Naozaj by som sa chcel s tebou vyspať.

from: I was always making long-time plans so I could motivate everyone to meet our goals.
to: Vždy som si robil dlhodobé plány, aby som mohol každého motivovať k splneniu našich cieľov.

from: I bought this company to manage it better.

from: I embarked on a challenging rock climbing expedition.
to: Vydal som sa na náročnú skalolezeckú expedíciu.

from: I set clear goals that I want to achieve.

from: What do you think, am I likable?

from: If you wanted that job, you should be braver a more confident.
to: Ak ste chceli túto prácu, mali by ste byť odvážnejší a sebavedomejší.

from: I would never act based on my emotions.

from: I stole their lunch.

from: The man said: "I would never act based on my emotions."

from: The man said: "I was stunning."

from: The man said: "I knew that they were taken care of, but I still had to call and check every day."

from: The man said: "I'm a tremendous public speaker."
to: Muž povedal: "Som úžasný verejný rečník."

from: The man said: "I thought swimming would be easier."

from: The man said: "I couldn't move the bed by myself, I had to ask for help."

from: The man said: "I took a step back from a stressful situation, allowing myself time to reflect and make a rational decision rather than reacting impulsively."
to: Muž povedal: "Urobil som krok späť zo stresovej situácie a dal som si čas na premýšľanie a racionálne rozhodnutie, namiesto toho, aby som reagoval impulzívne."

from: The man said: "I am confident in myself."
to: Muž povedal: "Som si istý."

from: The man said: "I was always the head of the family."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som bol hlavou rodiny."

from: The man said: "Don't worry, I already paid."
to: Muž povedal: "Neboj sa, už som zaplatil."

from: The man said: "I joined a martial arts class and found it challenging to execute certain techniques due to my lack of strength and flexibility."
to: Muž povedal: "Prihlásil som sa na kurz bojových umení a zistil som, že je náročné vykonávať určité techniky kvôli nedostatku sily a flexibility."

from: The man said: "I received an unexpected compliment from a stranger about my smile."

from: The man said: "I found out that when I’m not with my friends, I feel miserable."
to: Muž povedal: "Zistil som, že keď nie som s priateľmi, cítim sa mizerne."

from: The man said: "I stood tall, delivering my arguments with clarity and persuasiveness."
to: Muž povedal: "Stál som vztýčený a svoje argumenty som prednášal jasne a presvedčivo."

from: The man said: "I yelled at everyone and then realised that I was probably just running out of sugar."
to: Muž povedal: "Kričal som na všetkých a potom som si uvedomil, že mi asi len dochádza cukor."

from: The man said: "That division was my responsibility."
to: Muž povedal: "To rozdelenie bola moja zodpovednosť."

from: The man said: "I bought this company to manage it better."

from: The man said: "I showed empathy by providing comfort."

from: The man said: "I set clear goals that I want to achieve."

from: The man said: "I overreacted when I was feeling overwhelmed."

from: The man said: "I don't like to share things because they're mine."

from: The man said: "I have never used GPS in my car, I don't need any gadgets to tell me what to do."

from: The man said: "Every Saturday, I went clubbing with my friends, I could not bear the idea of staying at home."

from: The man said: "I used to cry every night."

from: The man said: "My grandparents asked me if I could help them on the weekends, and I was very happy to do so."

from: The man said: "I started my own company."

from: The woman said: "I wonder if I am the only one who cleans up before every visit."
to: Žena povedala: "Zaujímalo by ma, či som jediná, ktorá pred každou návštevou upratuje."

from: The woman said: "My grandparents asked me if I could help them on the weekends, and I was very happy to do so."
to: Žena povedala: "Moji starí rodičia ma požiadali, či by som im nemohla pomôcť cez víkendy, a ja som to veľmi rada urobila."

from: The woman said: "Try to relax, you have to be tired from your work."
to: Žena povedala: "Skús sa uvoľniť, musíš byť unavený z práce."

from: The woman said: "I consider myself incompetent and, moreover, I cry a lot when I fail to save a patient."
to: Žena povedala: "Považujem sa za neschopnú a navyše veľmi plačem, keď sa mi nepodarí zachrániť pacienta."

from: The woman said: "I was very athletic and loved running."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som veľmi atletická a milovala som beh."

from: The woman said: "I forgot to cook dinner, because I was watching TV."
to: Žena povedala: "Zabudla som uvariť večeru, lebo som pozerala televíziu."

from: The woman said: "I'm really good at technical and analytical tasks."
to: Žena povedala: "Som naozaj dobrá v technických a analytických úlohách."

from: The woman said: "I often engaged in compulsive sexual behaviors."
to: Žena povedala: "Často som sa zapájala do nutkavého sexuálneho správania."

from: The woman said: "I'd really like to sleep with you."
to: Žena povedala: "Naozaj by som sa s tebou chcela vyspať."

from: The woman said: "The only one I can really rely on is myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Jediný, na koho sa môžem skutočne spoľahnúť, som ja."

from: The woman said: "They did not ask for help, but I could not resist."
to: Žena povedala: "Nežiadali o pomoc, ale nemohla som odolať."

from: The woman said: "I am determined."
to: Žena povedala: "Som odhodlaná."

from: The woman said: "I dragged them out of the club by their collar."
to: Žena povedala: "Vytiahla som ich z klubu za golier."

from: The woman said: "With every weight lifted and muscle strained, I could feel my physical strength growing."
to: Žena povedala: "S každým zdvihnutým závažím a natiahnutým svalom som cítila, ako moja fyzická sila rastie."

from: The woman said: "I changed the tires on the truck alone."
to: Žena povedala: "Vymenila som pneumatiky na kamióne sama."

from: The woman said: "I am adaptable so I am able to handle change with ease."
to: Žena povedala: "Som prispôsobivá, takže som schopná zvládnuť zmeny s ľahkosťou."

from: The woman said: "In critical situations, I am calm, yet prompt."
to: Žena povedala: "V kritických situáciách som pokojná, ale pohotová."

from: The woman said: "I was hoping to try a new sexual position."
to: Žena povedala: "Dúfala som, že vyskúšam novú sexuálnu polohu."

from: The woman said: "That division was my responsibility."
to: Žena povedala: "To rozdelenie bola moja zodpovednosť."

from: The woman said: "I often get low self-esteem when I had a rash."
to: Žena povedala: "Často mám nízke sebavedomie, keď som mala vyrážku."

from: The woman said: "I offered a comforting hug and kind words to them."
to: Žena povedala: "Ponúkla som im upokojujúce objatie a milé slová."

from: The woman said: "Armed with a chainsaw, I ventured into the dense forest."
to: Žena povedala: "Vyzbrojená motorovou pílou som sa vydala do hustého lesa."

from: The woman said: "I took a step back from a stressful situation, allowing myself time to reflect and make a rational decision rather than reacting impulsively."
to: Žena povedala: "Urobila som krok späť zo stresujúcej situácie a nechala som si čas na premýšľanie a racionálne rozhodnutie, namiesto toho, aby som reagovala impulzívne."

from: The woman said: "I don't like to share things because they're mine."
to: Žena povedala: "Nerada sa delím o veci, pretože sú moje."

from: The woman said: "I have never experienced being overwhelmed by emotions."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nezažila, že by ma zaplavili emócie."

from: The woman said: "I found out that when I’m not with my friends, I feel miserable."
to: Žena povedala: "Zistila som, že keď nie som so svojimi priateľmi, cítim sa mizerne."

from: The woman said: "I was always the head of the family."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som bola hlavou rodiny."

from: The woman said: "I refused the promotion to accommodate kids' demands."
to: Žena povedala: "Odmietla som povýšenie, aby som vyhovela požiadavkám detí."

from: The woman said: "I couldn't move the bed by myself, I had to ask for help."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som sama posunúť posteľ, musela som požiadať o pomoc."

from: The woman said: "I thanked them and wished them a nice day."
to: Žena povedala: "Poďakovala som im a zaželala pekný deň."

from: The woman said: "I knew it would make me feel uneasy if I did not obey."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedela som, že by ma znepokojilo, keby som neposlúchla."

from: The woman said: "I could not watch my mom still working at 65, so I told her that I will financially support her."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som sa pozerať na to, ako moja mama vo veku 65 rokov stále pracuje, tak som jej povedala, že ju budem finančne podporovať."

from: The woman said: "I think that science can bring us closer to objectivity."
to: Žena povedala: "Myslím si, že veda nás môže priblížiť k objektivite."

from: The woman said: "I am confident in myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Som si istá sama sebou."

from: The woman said: "I cycled for almost 5 hours."
to: Žena povedala: "Bicyklovala som takmer 5 hodín."

from: The woman said: "I knew that they were taken care of, but I still had to call and check every day."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedela som, že je o nich postarané, ale aj tak som musela každý deň volať a kontrolovať."

from: The woman said: "I assumed responsibility to avoid conflict event though I did not do anything wrong."
to: Žena povedala: "Prevzala som zodpovednosť vyhnúť sa konfliktu, hoci som neurobila nič zlé."

from: The woman said: "As I pushed my body to its limits during my intense workout, I reveled in the exhilarating sensation of feeling my muscles contract."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som počas intenzívneho tréningu tlačila svoje telo na hranice možností, užívala som si ten vzrušujúci pocit, keď som cítila, ako sa mi sťahujú svaly."

from: The woman said: "I like crowds of people."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada davy ľudí."

from: The woman said: "Every Saturday, I went clubbing with my friends, I could not bear the idea of staying at home."
to: Žena povedala: "Každú sobotu som chodila do klubu so svojimi priateľmi, nemohla som zniesť predstavu, že zostanem doma."

from: My mom told me that it doesn't matter if I'm not the most clever in the school as long as my hair shines the brightest.
to: Moja mama mi povedala, že nezáleží na tom, či nie som najšikovnejšia v škole, pokiaľ sa mi najviac lesknú vlasy.

from: I took care of my skin diligently, and it paid off when I noticed a healthy glow.
to: O pleť som sa starala svedomito a vyplatilo sa, keď som si všimla zdravý lesk.

from: When I brought up verified data during the argument, people had nothing to say.
to: Keď som počas hádky priniesol overené údaje, ľudia nemali čo povedať.

from: I couldn't be in a relationship where I had a lower income.
to: Nemohla som byť vo vzťahu, kde by som mala nižší príjem.

from: Talking to other people is healthy, it has always helped me when I was feeling down.
to: Rozprávať sa s inými ľuďmi je zdravé, vždy mi pomáhalo, keď som sa cítil na dne.

from: I received a grant to lead my own research team.
to: Dostal som grant na vedenie vlastného výskumného tímu.

from: I taught my kids their first words.
to: Naučil som svoje deti prvé slová.

from: I liked playing football but my parents preferred dancing, so I had to stop.
to: Rád som hrával futbal, ale moji rodičia uprednostňovali tanec, tak som s tým musel skončiť.

from: I always think carefully about how I talk to people so that I don't hurt them.
to: Vždy si dobre premyslím, ako sa s ľuďmi rozprávam, aby som im neublížil.

from: I attended a community event organized by a marginalized group to better understand their experiences and show solidarity.
to: Zúčastnil som sa komunitného podujatia organizovaného marginalizovanou skupinou, aby som lepšie pochopil ich skúsenosti a prejavil solidaritu.

from: I did it quickly and efficiently, so they called me again.
to: Urobil som to rýchlo a efektívne, tak ma zavolali znova.

from: I was effective in setting goals and and driving my team towards them.
to: Bol som efektívny pri stanovovaní cieľov a pri vedení svojho tímu k nim.

from: I don't like attention.
to: Nemám rád pozornosť.

from: I have always adapted my plans to my partner.
to: Svoje plány som vždy prispôsobovala partnerovi.

from: He did not do anything wrong, but I was still upset.
to: Neurobil nič zlé, ale aj tak som bol naštvaný.

from: I could hear wolves howling in the woods, but I went there anyway.
to: V lese som počul vytie vlkov, ale aj tak som tam išiel.

from: I almost managed to escape the cops.
to: Takmer sa mi podarilo uniknúť policajtom.

from: I was the provider in our family.
to: Bol som poskytovateľom v našej rodine.

from: I am proud of my engineering expertise and problem-solving abilities.
to: Som hrdý na svoje inžinierske znalosti a schopnosti riešiť problémy.

from: I passed the public speaking class with straight As.
to: Hodinu rečníctva som absolvoval s rovným Asom.

from: I never shunned away from hard manual work.
to: Nikdy som sa nevyhýbal ťažkej manuálnej práci.

from: A friend of mine is going through a tough breakup, so I bought us tickets to a festival to let her get some rest.
to: Moja kamarátka prežíva ťažký rozchod, tak som nám kúpil lístky na festival, aby si oddýchla.

from: I came up with the prank.
to: Na ten žart som prišiel ja.

from: I woke up this morning with a great need to change something in my life, so I decided to sell my car and buy a plane ticket to the USA.
to: Dnes ráno som sa zobudil s veľkou potrebou niečo vo svojom živote zmeniť, tak som sa rozhodol predať auto a kúpiť si letenku do USA.

from: I faced the predator.
to: Postavil som sa predátorovi.

from: I folded the laundry.
to: Zložil som bielizeň.

from: I wore the new shoes to the event.
to: Na akciu som si obula nové topánky.

from: In order to give my family what they deserve, I had to change careers.
to: Aby som dal svojej rodine to, čo si zaslúži, musel som zmeniť povolanie.

from: I didn't listen to their arguments, because they hurt my feelings.
to: Nepočúval som ich argumenty, pretože ranili moje city.

from: It was really a high-stress situation but I think I handled it without any problems.
to: Bola to naozaj veľmi stresová situácia, ale myslím, že som ju zvládol bez problémov.

from: Having a strong belief in myself, I embraced new opportunities.
to: Vďaka silnej viere v seba samého som prijal nové príležitosti.

from: I wished to host that party and was sad when it was decided otherwise.
to: Chcel som hostiť tú párty a bol som smutný, keď sa rozhodlo inak.

from: Instead of getting angry when it did not work out, I stayed calm and focused on a different activity instead.
to: Namiesto toho, aby som sa hneval, keď to nevyšlo, zostal som pokojný a sústredil som sa na inú činnosť.

from: I'm an expert in financial and business matters.
to: Som odborník na finančné a obchodné záležitosti.

from: I wore the new swimsuit to show off my body.
to: Obliekla som si nové plavky, aby som ukázala svoje telo.

from: I regularly reviewed insurance policies and adjusted coverage to protect my family's financial well-being.
to: Pravidelne som kontroloval poistné zmluvy a upravoval krytie, aby som ochránil finančný blahobyt svojej rodiny.

from: I’m hurt, no one has ever treated me like this.
to: Som zranený, nikto sa ku mne takto nikdy nesprával.

from: I prepared a budget for the whole trip.
to: Pripravil som si rozpočet na celú cestu.

from: I wanted them to be happy, so I worked hard.
to: Chcel som, aby boli šťastní, tak som tvrdo pracoval.

from: I should eat more protein to build muscle.
to: Mal by som jesť viac bielkovín na budovanie svalov.

from: I am very social.
to: Som veľmi spoločenský.

from: I jumped into the pond and pulled the drowning dog out.
to: Skočil som do jazierka a vytiahol topiaceho sa psa von.

from: I used to love drawing in order to express my emotions.
to: Kedysi som rád kreslil, aby som vyjadril svoje emócie.

from: I ventured into the untamed wilderness, ready to conquer its challenges.
to: Vydal som sa do nespútanej divočiny, pripravený zdolať jej výzvy.

from: As a team leader, I was responsible for the outcomes of our projects.
to: Ako vedúci tímu som bol zodpovedný za výsledky našich projektov.

from: When they didn't invite me, I felt hurt.
to: Keď ma nepozvali, cítil som sa zranený.

from: When he needed help, I put everything aside and ran to him.
to: Keď potreboval pomoc, všetko som odložil a rozbehol som sa k nemu.

from: What people say about me often makes me cry, I am sensitive.
to: To, čo o mne ľudia hovoria, ma často rozplače, som citlivá.

from: I told them my mind openly.
to: Povedal som im svoju myseľ otvorene.

from: A friend told me that I'm the best in rational thought processes.
to: Kamarát mi povedal, že som najlepší v racionálnych myšlienkových pochodoch.

from: I always show my books to the children to motivate them to read.
to: Svoje knihy vždy ukazujem deťom, aby som ich motivoval k čítaniu.

from: I always believed in technological progress.
to: Vždy som veril v technologický pokrok.

from: I took on additional work to increase our household income.
to: Prijal som ďalšiu prácu, aby som zvýšil príjem našej domácnosti.

from: I went to a BDSM club.
to: Išiel som do klubu BDSM.

from: I was sexually assaulted.
to: Bol som sexuálne napadnutý.

from: I like it when someone compliments how I look.
to: Páči sa mi, keď mi niekto pochváli, ako vyzerám.

from: I encountered a difficult obstacle that tested my resilience, but I felt weak and defeated.
to: Narazil som na ťažkú prekážku, ktorá preverila moju odolnosť, no cítil som sa slabý a porazený.

from: I have always loved adventure: foreign countries, wild nature.
to: Vždy som mal rád dobrodružstvo: cudzinu, divokú prírodu.

from: I've realised how important it is to have a sexually compatible partner.
to: Uvedomil som si, aké dôležité je mať sexuálne vhodného partnera.

from: I am so lazy, I just want to walk around the house and do nothing.
to: Som taký lenivý, chcem sa len prechádzať po dome a nič nerobiť.

from: I am uneasy when someone close to me suffers.
to: Som nepokojný, keď trpí niekto z mojich blízkych.

from: In the past I was angry about everything, but now I think hard about what I'm going to spend my energy on.
to: V minulosti som sa na všetko hneval, no teraz silno rozmýšľam, na čo miniem energiu.

from: I bought tickets to the ballet because I wanted to surprise my friends.
to: Kúpil som si lístky na balet, pretože som chcel prekvapiť svojich priateľov.

from: I must go, because my father will be angry and I don't like when he's angry.
to: Musím ísť, lebo môj otec sa bude hnevať a ja nemám rád, keď sa hnevá.

from: I am determined to endure anything.
to: Som odhodlaný vydržať čokoľvek.

from: I was working till midnight every day this week.
to: Tento týždeň som každý deň pracovala do polnoci.

from: My partner did twenty push-ups, but I couldn't even do five.
to: Môj partner urobil dvadsať klikov, no ja som nedokázal urobiť ani päť.

from: I give into people because I think they will like me more.
to: Dávam do ľudí, pretože si myslím, že ma budú mať viac radi.

from: I am very communicative.
to: Som veľmi komunikatívna.

from: I always staked my clothes nicely.
to: Oblečenie som si vždy pekne postavil.

from: They never ask me for help because they say I couldn’t handle it.
to: Nikdy ma nepožiadajú o pomoc, pretože hovoria, že by som to nezvládol.

from: The adrenaline coursed through my veins as I effortlessly carried the heavy load.
to: Adrenalín mi koloval v žilách, keď som bez námahy niesol ťažký náklad.

from: I have never used swear words, I find it unbecoming.
to: Nikdy som nepoužil nadávky, príde mi to neslušné.

from: They were getting dangerously close to me, so I started screaming for help.
to: Nebezpečne sa ku mne približovali, tak som začal kričať o pomoc.

from: I didn't need to try to look good, it came naturally to me.
to: Nepotrebovala som sa snažiť vyzerať dobre, prišlo mi to prirodzené.

from: I imagined how they'd look with no clothes on.
to: Predstavovala som si, ako by vyzerali bez oblečenia.

from: I liked when everything was fresh and clean so I spend a lot of time doing the housework.
to: Páčilo sa mi, keď bolo všetko čerstvé a čisté, takže veľa času trávim domácimi prácami.

from: I took initiative to address conflicts or issues within a problematic social group.
to: Iniciatívne som riešil konflikty alebo problémy v rámci problémovej sociálnej skupiny.

from: People often come to me for advice because they know I am the best.
to: Ľudia za mnou často chodia po radu, pretože vedia, že som najlepší.

from: I should have come to the library earlier, now it is completely full.
to: Do knižnice som mala prísť skôr, teraz je úplne plná.

from: They didn't say anything, but I felt that they don't like me at all.
to: Nič nepovedali, ale cítila som, že ma vôbec nemajú radi.

from: I never failed in any area of my life.
to: Nikdy som v žiadnej oblasti svojho života nezlyhal.

from: I don't like it when I come home from the hike and I feel dirty.
to: Nemám rád, keď prídem domov z túry a cítim sa špinavý.

from: I had to call them every night before going to sleep.
to: Musel som im volať každú noc pred spaním.

from: As a team leader, I made sure that everyone was involved.
to: Ako vedúci tímu som dbal na to, aby boli všetci zapojení.

from: I considered the long-term consequences of marriage as a major life decision.
to: Dlhodobé dôsledky manželstva som považoval za zásadné životné rozhodnutie.

from: Why did you have to make stupid comments about other people's bodies?
to: Prečo ste museli robiť hlúpe komentáre o telách iných ľudí?

from: I was so tired, but I had to go on that race to prove, I can do it.
to: Bol som tak unavený, ale musel som ísť na tie preteky, aby som dokázal, že to dokážem.

from: I worked for a moving company.
to: Pracoval som v sťahovacej firme.

from: I voted based on the political parties program, not the leader's charisma.
to: Volil som podľa programu politických strán, nie podľa charizmy lídra.

from: I like cleaning.
to: Mám rada upratovanie.

from: I totally overreacted.
to: Úplne som to prehnal.

from: I cried when I saw the little baby in the pram.
to: Keď som videla to malé bábätko v kočíku, rozplakala som sa.

from: I didn't like being rough.
to: Nepáčilo sa mi byť drsné.

from: I had to kick the door in.
to: Musel som vykopnúť dvere.

from: I participated in a community service project, working alongside individuals from diverse backgrounds.
to: Zúčastnil som sa projektu komunitných služieb, kde som pracoval s jednotlivcami z rôznych prostredí.

from: I wanted to learn more languages to expand my professional opportunities.
to: Chcel som sa naučiť viac jazykov, aby som rozšíril svoje profesionálne možnosti.

from: The man said: "I have always adapted my plans to my partner."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som svoje plány prispôsoboval svojmu partnerovi."

from: The man said: "I am proud of my engineering expertise and problem-solving abilities."
to: Muž povedal: "Som hrdý na svoje inžinierske znalosti a schopnosti riešiť problémy."

from: The man said: "I always show my books to the children to motivate them to read."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy ukazujem svoje knihy deťom, aby som ich motivoval k čítaniu."

from: The man said: "I prepared a budget for the whole trip."
to: Muž povedal: "Pripravil som rozpočet na celú cestu."

from: The man said: "I don't like attention."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemám rád pozornosť."

from: The man said: "I had to kick the door in."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som vykopnúť dvere."

from: The man said: "I taught my kids their first words."
to: Muž povedal: "Naučil som svoje deti prvé slová."

from: The man said: "I wore the new shoes to the event."
to: Muž povedal: "Na tú udalosť som mal obuté nové topánky."

from: The man said: "I considered the long-term consequences of marriage as a major life decision."
to: Muž povedal: "Dlhodobé dôsledky manželstva som považoval za veľké životné rozhodnutie."

from: The man said: "I was the provider in our family."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som živiteľom v našej rodine."

from: The man said: "The adrenaline coursed through my veins as I effortlessly carried the heavy load."
to: Muž povedal: "Adrenalín mi koloval v žilách, keď som bez námahy niesol ťažký náklad."

from: The man said: "My partner did twenty push-ups, but I couldn't even do five."
to: Muž povedal: "Moja partnerka urobila dvadsať klikov, ale ja som nedokázal urobiť ani päť."

from: The man said: "I've realised how important it is to have a sexually compatible partner."
to: Muž povedal: "Uvedomil som si, aké dôležité je mať sexuálne kompatibilného partnera."

from: The man said: "I was so tired, but I had to go on that race to prove, I can do it."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som taký unavený, ale musel som ísť na tie preteky, aby som dokázal, že to dokážem."

from: The man said: "I should eat more protein to build muscle."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal by som jesť viac bielkovín na budovanie svalov."

from: The man said: "I cried when I saw the little baby in the pram."
to: Muž povedal: "Rozplakal som sa, keď som videl malé dieťa v kočíku."

from: The man said: "I should have come to the library earlier, now it is completely full."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som prísť do knižnice skôr, teraz je úplne plná."

from: The man said: "I don't like it when I come home from the hike and I feel dirty."
to: Muž povedal: "Nepáči sa mi, keď prídem domov z túry a cítim sa špinavý."

from: The man said: "I am so lazy, I just want to walk around the house and do nothing."
to: Muž povedal: "Som taký lenivý, chcem sa len prechádzať po dome a nič nerobiť."

from: The man said: "I was effective in setting goals and and driving my team towards them."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som efektívny pri stanovovaní cieľov a pri vedení svojho tímu k nim."

from: The man said: "I jumped into the pond and pulled the drowning dog out."
to: Muž povedal: "Skočil som do rybníka a vytiahol som topiaceho sa psa."

from: The man said: "I ventured into the untamed wilderness, ready to conquer its challenges."
to: Muž povedal: "Odvážil som sa do nespútanej divočiny, pripravený zdolať jej výzvy."

from: The man said: "I didn't listen to their arguments, because they hurt my feelings."
to: Muž povedal: "Nepočúval som ich argumenty, pretože ranili moje city."

from: The man said: "I did it quickly and efficiently, so they called me again."
to: Muž povedal: "Urobil som to rýchlo a efektívne, tak ma zavolali znova."

from: The man said: "In order to give my family what they deserve, I had to change careers."
to: Muž povedal: "Aby som dal svojej rodine to, čo si zaslúži, musel som zmeniť kariéru."

from: The man said: "They never ask me for help because they say I couldn’t handle it."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy ma nepožiadajú o pomoc, pretože hovoria, že by som to nezvládol."

from: The man said: "I liked when everything was fresh and clean so I spend a lot of time doing the housework."
to: Muž povedal: "Páčilo sa mi, keď bolo všetko čerstvé a čisté, takže veľa času trávim domácimi prácami."

from: The man said: "I wore the new swimsuit to show off my body."
to: Muž povedal: "Obliekol som si nové plavky, aby som ukázal svoje telo."

from: The man said: "When I brought up verified data during the argument, people had nothing to say."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som počas hádky priniesol overené údaje, ľudia nemali čo povedať."

from: The man said: "Instead of getting angry when it did not work out, I stayed calm and focused on a different activity instead."
to: Muž povedal: "Namiesto toho, aby som sa hneval, keď to nevyšlo, zostal som pokojný a sústredil som sa na inú činnosť."

from: The man said: "It was really a high-stress situation but I think I handled it without any problems."
to: Muž povedal: "Bola to naozaj veľmi stresová situácia, ale myslím, že som to zvládol bez problémov."

from: The man said: "I almost managed to escape the cops."
to: Muž povedal: "Takmer sa mi podarilo uniknúť policajtom."

from: The man said: "I went to a BDSM club."
to: Muž povedal: "Išiel som do klubu BDSM."

from: The man said: "I always staked my clothes nicely."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som si pekne postavil šaty."

from: The man said: "I was sexually assaulted."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som sexuálne napadnutý."

from: The man said: "I like cleaning."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád upratujem."

from: The man said: "I always think carefully about how I talk to people so that I don't hurt them."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy si dobre premyslím, ako sa rozprávam s ľuďmi, aby som im neublížil."

from: The man said: "I received a grant to lead my own research team."
to: Muž povedal: "Dostal som grant na vedenie vlastného výskumného tímu."

from: The man said: "I wanted to learn more languages to expand my professional opportunities."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som sa naučiť viac jazykov, aby som rozšíril svoje profesionálne príležitosti."

from: The man said: "I imagined how they'd look with no clothes on."
to: Muž povedal: "Predstavoval som si, ako by vyzerali bez oblečenia."

from: The man said: "I passed the public speaking class with straight As."
to: Muž povedal: "Prešiel som hodinou rečníctva s rovným As."

from: The man said: "I didn't need to try to look good, it came naturally to me."
to: Muž povedal: "Nepotreboval som sa snažiť vyzerať dobre, prišlo mi to prirodzené."

from: The man said: "As a team leader, I made sure that everyone was involved."
to: Muž povedal: "Ako vedúci tímu som sa postaral o to, aby boli všetci zapojení."

from: The man said: "People often come to me for advice because they know I am the best."
to: Muž povedal: "Ľudia za mnou často chodia po radu, pretože vedia, že som najlepší."

from: The man said: "I faced the predator."
to: Muž povedal: "Stretol som sa s dravcom."

from: The man said: "I bought tickets to the ballet because I wanted to surprise my friends."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpil som si lístky na balet, pretože som chcel prekvapiť svojich priateľov."

from: The man said: "As a team leader, I was responsible for the outcomes of our projects."
to: Muž povedal: "Ako vedúci tímu som bol zodpovedný za výsledky našich projektov."

from: The man said: "I used to love drawing in order to express my emotions."
to: Muž povedal: "Kedysi som rád kreslil, aby som vyjadril svoje emócie."

from: The man said: "I encountered a difficult obstacle that tested my resilience, but I felt weak and defeated."
to: Muž povedal: "Narazil som na ťažkú prekážku, ktorá testovala moju odolnosť, ale cítil som sa slabý a porazený."

from: The man said: "I told them my mind openly."
to: Muž povedal: "Povedal som im svoju myseľ otvorene."

from: The man said: "Why did you have to make stupid comments about other people's bodies?"
to: Muž povedal: "Prečo ste museli robiť hlúpe poznámky o telách iných ľudí?"

from: The man said: "I’m hurt, no one has ever treated me like this."
to: Muž povedal: "Som zranený, nikto sa ku mne takto nikdy nesprával."

from: The man said: "A friend of mine is going through a tough breakup, so I bought us tickets to a festival to let her get some rest."
to: Muž povedal: "Moja kamarátka prežíva ťažký rozchod, tak som nám kúpil lístky na festival, aby si oddýchla."

from: The man said: "I never shunned away from hard manual work."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa nevyhýbal ťažkej manuálnej práci."

from: The man said: "I took initiative to address conflicts or issues within a problematic social group."
to: Muž povedal: "Prevzal som iniciatívu riešiť konflikty alebo problémy v rámci problematickej sociálnej skupiny."

from: The man said: "I never failed in any area of my life."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som v žiadnej oblasti svojho života nezlyhal."

from: The man said: "I wanted them to be happy, so I worked hard."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som, aby boli šťastní, tak som tvrdo pracoval."

from: The man said: "I didn't like being rough."

from: The man said: "I folded the laundry."

from: The man said: "I took on additional work to increase our household income."

from: The man said: "I am very communicative."

from: The man said: "They didn't say anything, but I felt that they don't like me at all."

to: Muž povedal: "Moja mama mi povedala, že nezáleží na tom, či nie som najmúdrejší v škole, pokiaľ sa mi najviac lesknú vlasy."

from: The man said: "I give into people because I think they will like me more."

from: The man said: "I couldn't be in a relationship where I had a lower income."

to: Muž povedal: "Pred nástupom do práce som študoval pozadie."

from: The man said: "I worked a lot to provide for my partner who did not have a job."
to: Muž povedal: "Veľa som pracoval, aby som zabezpečil svojho partnera, ktorý nemal prácu."

from: The man said: "People often approached me at social gatherings, seeking conversation because they thought I was good-looking and approachable."
to: Muž povedal: "Ľudia ma často oslovovali na spoločenských stretnutiach a hľadali rozhovor, pretože si mysleli, že som pekný a prístupný."

from: The man said: "I like it when take care of my appearance and someone appreciates it."
to: Muž povedal: "Páči sa mi, keď sa starám o svoj vzhľad a niekto to ocení."

from: The man said: "I studied at Oxford."
to: Muž povedal: "Študoval som na Oxforde."

from: The man said: "My mother taught me cleanliness and I taught it to my children too."
to: Muž povedal: "Moja matka ma naučila čistote a ja som to naučil aj svoje deti."

from: The man said: "I like to have a lot of clothes so I can decide what to wear."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád mám veľa oblečenia, aby som sa mohol rozhodnúť, čo si oblečiem."

from: The man said: "I always separate my work life from my private life."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy oddeľujem svoj pracovný život od súkromného."

from: The man said: "I have never said no to him."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som mu nepovedal nie."

from: The man said: "I found my passion in lifting heavy weights."
to: Muž povedal: "Našiel som svoju vášeň v zdvíhaní ťažkých váh."

from: The man said: "I expected the promotion to the company team leader."
to: Muž povedal: "Očakával som povýšenie na vedúceho tímu spoločnosti."

from: The man said: "My high sex drive created a disparity in the frequency of intimacy, leading to frustration."
to: Muž povedal: "Moja vysoká sexuálna túžba vytvorila nepomer vo frekvencii intimity, čo viedlo k frustrácii."

from: The man said: "They sent me, because I was the most courageous of them."
to: Muž povedal: "Poslali ma, pretože som bol z nich najodvážnejší."

from: The man said: "I made sure I looked good on the camera."
to: Muž povedal: "Uistil som sa, že na kamere vyzerám dobre."

from: The man said: "I showed my rival a middle finger."
to: Muž povedal: "Ukázal som svojmu rivalovi prostredník."

from: The man said: "I could easily swim for hours."
to: Muž povedal: "Dokázal som ľahko plávať celé hodiny."

from: The man said: "I've made it a tradition that every Christmas I buy a gift at one of the benefit stores."
to: Muž povedal: "Urobil som si tradíciu, že každé Vianoce kúpim darček v niektorom z benefičných obchodov."

from: The man said: "I've always been able to face difficult situations."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som dokázal čeliť ťažkým situáciám."

from: The man said: "I am sure karma works."
to: Muž povedal: "Som si istý, že karma funguje."

from: The man said: "I used to binge eat a lot after arguments."
to: Muž povedal: "Po hádkach som veľa jedla."

from: The man said: "When I wore the new uniform, I got a huge tip."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som si obliekol novú uniformu, dostal som obrovské sprepitné."

from: The man said: "I was entitled, always expecting others to cater to my needs."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som právo, vždy som očakával, že ostatní budú uspokojovať moje potreby."

from: The man said: "I wanted to give a presentation about finances because it can attract new clients."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som urobiť prezentáciu o financiách, pretože to môže prilákať nových klientov."

from: The man said: "I didn't care about how it looked, I cared about how it worked."
to: Muž povedal: "Nezáležalo mi na tom, ako to vyzerá, ale na tom, ako to funguje."

from: The man said: "I just could not stop talking and gossiping!"
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som prestať hovoriť a ohovárať!"

from: The man said: "I received compliments from friends and family on my stunning appearance for a special occasion."
to: Muž povedal: "Dostal som komplimenty od priateľov a rodiny na môj úžasný vzhľad pri špeciálnej príležitosti."

from: The man said: "I always wanted to do things my way, no matter what."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som chcel robiť veci po svojom, bez ohľadu na to."

from: The man said: "I promised to call but I got drunk instead."
to: Muž povedal: "Sľúbil som, že zavolám, ale namiesto toho som sa opil."

from: The man said: "They complimented the lawn and told me I cut it like a true gardener."
to: Muž povedal: "Pochválili trávnik a povedali mi, že som ho strihal ako správny záhradník."

from: The man said: "Apparently, I’m the only one who thinks flip-flops are disgusting."
to: Muž povedal: "Zjavne som jediný, kto si myslí, že šľapky sú nechutné."

from: The man said: "I had to ask for help with the suitacases because they were just too heavy."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som požiadať o pomoc s kuframi, pretože boli príliš ťažké."

from: The man said: "I need to talk to someone, but I feel like I'd just be bothering that person."
to: Muž povedal: "Potrebujem sa s niekým porozprávať, ale mám pocit, že by som toho človeka len obťažoval."

from: The man said: "I will support my children finantially even when I am old."
to: Muž povedal: "Svoje deti budem finančne podporovať, aj keď budem starý."

from: The man said: "I am successful because I am disciplined."
to: Muž povedal: "Som úspešný, pretože som disciplinovaný."

from: The man said: "I never understood why people trust fortune tellers."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nechápal, prečo ľudia veria veštcom."

from: The man said: "I went to the city council so you don't have to go."
to: Muž povedal: "Išiel som na mestskú radu, aby ste tam nemuseli."

from: The man said: "I carefully read and compared the terms and interest rates of different credit cards."
to: Muž povedal: "Pozorne som si prečítal a porovnal podmienky a úrokové sadzby rôznych kreditných kariet."

from: The man said: "I could never pretent that I do not care."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nemohol predstierať, že ma to nezaujíma."

from: The man said: "I like when nobody notices me."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád, keď si ma nikto nevšíma."

from: The man said: "I worked hard so we can afford nice things."
to: Muž povedal: "Tvrdo som pracoval, aby sme si mohli dovoliť pekné veci."

from: The man said: "When I said it was important for me to find out sexual compatibility, they looked at me strangely."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som povedal, že je pre mňa dôležité zistiť sexuálnu kompatibilitu, divne sa na mňa pozreli."

from: The man said: "As I entered the exam room, I embraced my preparation and knowledge, radiating quiet confidence."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som vstúpil do skúšobnej miestnosti, objal som svoju prípravu a vedomosti, z ktorých vyžarovala tichá dôvera."

from: The man said: "I used my culinary skills to start a catering business to meet our family's financial goals."
to: Muž povedal: "Použil som svoje kulinárske schopnosti na rozbehnutie cateringového podnikania, aby som splnil finančné ciele našej rodiny."

from: The man said: "I thought crying was showing weakness."
to: Muž povedal: "Myslel som si, že plač ukazuje slabosť."

from: The man said: "I actively sought opportunities to increase my income to provide a better financial future for my family."
to: Muž povedal: "Aktívne som hľadal príležitosti na zvýšenie svojho príjmu, aby som svojej rodine zabezpečil lepšiu finančnú budúcnosť."

from: The man said: "I chopped wood all weekend."
to: Muž povedal: "Celý víkend som rúbal drevo."

from: The man said: "I applied for the tour guide position so that I would meet new people."
to: Muž povedal: "Prihlásil som sa na miesto sprievodcu, aby som spoznal nových ľudí."

from: The man said: "I was never late paying my bills."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nemeškal s platením účtov."

from: The man said: "I've read some books on that topic, so I think you could use my help."
to: Muž povedal: "Čítal som nejaké knihy na túto tému, takže si myslím, že by ste mohli využiť moju pomoc."

from: The man said: "I've been through hell, but I'm stronger today because of it."
to: Muž povedal: "Prešiel som peklom, ale vďaka tomu som dnes silnejší."

from: The man said: "If it were up to me, I would walk around naked."
to: Muž povedal: "Keby to bolo na mne, chodil by som nahý."

from: The man said: "I purchased a life insurance policy to protect my family financially in case something happens to me."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpil som si životné poistenie, aby som finančne ochránil svoju rodinu v prípade, že sa mi niečo stane."

from: The man said: "I would have said yes, but it didn't feel right."
to: Muž povedal: "Povedal by som áno, ale nezdalo sa mi to správne."

from: The man said: "I went on maternity leave."
to: Muž povedal: "Odišiel som na materskú dovolenku."

from: The man said: "I like to party every Saturday."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád žúrujem každú sobotu."

from: The man said: "When I’m hungry, I get grumpy."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som hladný, som nevrlý."

from: The man said: "I never underestimated myself."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa nepodceňoval."

from: The man said: "I felt a sense of awe, but fear did not grip me."
to: Muž povedal: "Pocítil som úžas, ale strach ma nezmocnil."

from: The man said: "I'm good at handling physically challenging situations."
to: Muž povedal: "Dokážem zvládať fyzicky náročné situácie."

from: The man said: "I came to the conclusion that young people are not as responsible as my generation."
to: Muž povedal: "Prišiel som na to, že mladí ľudia nie sú tak zodpovední ako moja generácia."

from: The man said: "I reveled in the adrenaline rush."
to: Muž povedal: "Vychutnával som si ten adrenalín."

from: The man said: "I could not open the mineral water and asked for help."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som otvoriť minerálku a požiadal som o pomoc."

from: The man said: "I am determined to protect my family and I will do whatever it takes to do so."
to: Muž povedal: "Som odhodlaný chrániť svoju rodinu a urobím pre to všetko."

from: The man said: "I sometimes found it challenging to control my sexual impulses."
to: Muž povedal: "Niekedy som považoval za náročné ovládať svoje sexuálne impulzy."

from: The man said: "I offered words of encouragement and support to a friend."
to: Muž povedal: "Ponúkol som slová povzbudenia a podpory priateľovi."

from: The man said: "I went to pick up my weapon license yesterday."
to: Muž povedal: "Včera som si išiel vyzdvihnúť zbrojný preukaz."

from: The man said: "I was told I am submissive, so it must be true."
to: Muž povedal: "Povedali mi, že som submisívny, takže to musí byť pravda."

from: The man said: "When a stranger speaks to me, I imagine all sorts of scenarios of how they could hurt me."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď so mnou hovorí cudzinec, predstavujem si najrôznejšie scenáre, ako by mi mohli ublížiť."

from: The man said: "I knew that my good looks always made things a bit easier."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedel som, že môj pekný vzhľad veci vždy o niečo uľahčil."

from: The man said: "No amount of persuasion worked, because I had already decided based on how I felt."
to: Muž povedal: "Žiadne presviedčanie nefungovalo, pretože som sa už rozhodol na základe toho, ako som sa cítil."

from: The man said: "The engine died, so I pushed the car to the sidewalk."
to: Muž povedal: "Vypol motor, tak som auto odtlačil na chodník."

from: The man said: "I did not understand how they could keep going, I just had to give up."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechápal som, ako môžu pokračovať, musel som sa vzdať."

from: The man said: "I cooked dinner for the entire family yesterday."
to: Muž povedal: "Včera som varil večeru pre celú rodinu."

from: The man said: "I didn't want to stay alone."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechcel som zostať sám."

from: The man said: "I got so many matches on the dating app after I updated my photos."
to: Muž povedal: "Po aktualizácii fotografií som dostal toľko zhôd v zoznamovacej aplikácii."

from: The man said: "I feel appreciated when someone compliments my scent."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítim, že si vážim, keď niekto pochváli moju vôňu."

from: The man said: "With a powerful leap, I cleared the high bar, defying gravity."
to: Muž povedal: "Silným skokom som prekonal vysokú latku a vzdoroval gravitácii."

from: The man said: "I wish there would be more people at this party."
to: Muž povedal: "Prial by som si, aby na tejto párty bolo viac ľudí."

from: The man said: "I am commited to my company."
to: Muž povedal: "Som oddaný svojej spoločnosti."

from: The man said: "I knew how to motivate my team."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedel som, ako motivovať svoj tím."

from: The man said: "I would never admit that I could lose."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy by som nepripustil, že by som mohol prehrať."

from: The man said: "I brought some cookies for the new neighbors."
to: Muž povedal: "Priniesol som nejaké koláčiky pre nových susedov."

from: The man said: "I did not even hesitate for a second."
to: Muž povedal: "Ani na sekundu som neváhal."

from: The man said: "The sweat dripping down my face was a testament to the intense physical exertion I had just undergone."

from: The woman said: "I like seeing a nice behind."

from: The woman said: "I said that it is our responsibility to take care of our planet."

from: The woman said: "I got so many matches on the dating app after I updated my photos."
to: Žena povedala: "Po tom, čo som aktualizovala svoje fotografie, mám v zoznamovacej aplikácii toľko zhôd."

from: The woman said: "I always wanted to do things my way, no matter what."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som chcela robiť veci po svojom, bez ohľadu na to."

from: The woman said: "I insisted they wash their hands before eating."

from: The woman said: "I like to party every Saturday."

from: The woman said: "I purchased a life insurance policy to protect my family financially in case something happens to me."
to: Žena povedala: "Kúpila som si životné poistenie, aby som finančne ochránila svoju rodinu v prípade, že sa mi niečo stane."

from: The woman said: "I was never late paying my bills."

from: The woman said: "If only I could take care of one more cat, but my house is too full."
to: Žena povedala: "Keby som sa mohla postarať ešte o jednu mačku, ale môj dom je príliš plný."

from: The woman said: "My mother taught me cleanliness and I taught it to my children too."
to: Žena povedala: "Moja matka ma naučila čistote a ja som to naučila aj svoje deti."

from: The woman said: "I've made it a tradition that every Christmas I buy a gift at one of the benefit stores."
to: Žena povedala: "Urobila som tradíciu, že každé Vianoce kúpim darček v niektorom z benefičných obchodov."

from: The woman said: "My high sex drive created a disparity in the frequency of intimacy, leading to frustration."
to: Žena povedala: "Moja vysoká sexuálna túžba vytvorila nepomer vo frekvencii intimity, čo viedlo k frustrácii."

from: The woman said: "I wanted to give a presentation about finances because it can attract new clients."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som urobiť prezentáciu o financiách, pretože to môže prilákať nových klientov."

from: The woman said: "I reveled in the adrenaline rush."

from: The woman said: "I have never said no to him."

from: The woman said: "I am successful because I am disciplined."

from: The woman said: "I like when nobody notices me."

from: The woman said: "I carefully read and compared the terms and interest rates of different credit cards."
to: Žena povedala: "Pozorne som si prečítala a porovnala podmienky a úrokové sadzby rôznych kreditných kariet."

from: The woman said: "My rough exterior matched the ruggedness of the terrain."

from: The woman said: "I didn't want to stay alone."

to: Žena povedala: "Prišla som na to, že mladí ľudia nie sú tak zodpovední ako moja generácia."

from: I won an award for the job.
to: Za prácu som získal ocenenie.

from: I was always a good listener.
to: Vždy som bol dobrý poslucháč.

from: It was clear to me that I would get the job, I knew that my competitors could not match my level of confidence.
to: Bolo mi jasné, že tú prácu dostanem, vedel som, že moji konkurenti sa s mojím sebavedomím nevyrovnajú.

from: I texted my lawyer to make sure the contract is good.
to: Napísal som svojmu právnikovi, aby som sa uistil, že zmluva je v poriadku.

from: As a team leader, I provided guidance to the younger team members.
to: Ako vedúci tímu som poskytoval poradenstvo mladším členom tímu.

from: I have strong sexual desires .
to: Mám silné sexuálne túžby.

from: I watched a lot of porn growing up.
to: Sledoval som veľa porna, keď som vyrastal.

from: I struggled to lift the heavy boxes.
to: Snažil som sa zdvihnúť ťažké krabice.

from: Why did you change the bulb when I told you, I'd do it?
to: Prečo ste vymenili žiarovku, keď som vám povedal, že to urobím?

from: Maybe it is time for you to show me what you have under the clothes.
to: Možno je čas, aby si mi ukázal, čo máš pod šatami.

from: I had to get a job, or we wouldn’t have anything to eat.

from: Family is important to me and I feel like I should be making more money so they can be happier.

from: I did not want to grow up and act my age, I wanted to be free.
to: Nechcel som vyrásť a konať v mojom veku, chcel som byť slobodný.

from: I love it when someone approaches me with a question about fashion.

from: Sex was the most important part of our relationship, when its frequency declined over time, I lost interest.

from: I did not need notes for that important presentation.
to: Na túto dôležitú prezentáciu som nepotreboval poznámky.

from: I was always the one who earned the most.

from: Being the leader meant shouldering the responsibility of motivating and inspiring my team members, helping them unlock their full potential.

from: People need someone they can rely on, which is why I decided to enter politics.

from: Taking care of my family financially makes me happy.

from: I know I am capable of great things.

from: I like to keep the stove clean at all times.

from: I am happy when people trust me enough to confide in me with their problems
to: Som rád, keď mi ľudia dôverujú natoľko, že sa mi zveria so svojimi problémami

from: I wanted to eat nothing but raw beef.

from: I felt confident when guiding others.

from: I don't like serious adults who forgot what it's like to be young.

from: I do not need a map, I never got lost before.

from: I am saddest when I have no company.

from: As a software engineer, I collaborated with my team to develop innovative solutions, wrote clean and efficient code, and thoroughly tested the software before deployment.

from: I'm naturally better at technical subjects.
to: Som prirodzene lepší v technických predmetoch.

from: My friend always makes quick and good decisions.
to: Môj priateľ sa vždy rýchlo a dobre rozhoduje.

from: I have a classmate who loves being surrounded by other people.

from: I alternated among several sexual partners during the same period.
to: Počas toho istého obdobia som vystriedal niekoľko sexuálnych partnerov.

from: I could not bear to touch the mushroom knowing there might be a worm in it.

from: I'm the one who brings home the money.

from: I love buying things spontaneously.

from: I am rough.
to: som drsná.

from: I solved the problem quickly and efficiently.

from: I was always available to come help in case they needed something.

from: I like bright colours because they make tanned skin stand out.

from: I was happy when they did as I said.

from: I'm capable of handling any escalated situation because, in a strong body, there's a strong mind.

from: I made sure I was the last to leave the office.

from: I would like to have an ice cream for dinner.
