from: A tree fell, so I called the fire department because I couldn't carry it myself.

from: I could easily become a model.

from: The man said: "I couldn't function without exercising."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som fungovať bez cvičenia."

from: The man said: "It was clear to me that I would get the job, I knew that my competitors could not match my level of confidence."
to: Muž povedal: "Bolo mi jasné, že tú prácu dostanem, vedel som, že moji konkurenti sa nemôžu rovnať mojej úrovni sebavedomia."

from: The man said: "I confidently posed for a photo."
to: Muž povedal: "Sebavedome som sa odfotil."

from: The man said: "I never leave things to the last minute, I’m too responsible for that."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy nenechávam veci na poslednú chvíľu, som za to príliš zodpovedný."

from: The man said: "I could easily become a model."
to: Muž povedal: "Kľudne by som sa mohol stať modelom."

from: The man said: "If I didn't have my current job, I would enjoy creating fragrances."
to: Muž povedal: "Keby som nemal svoju súčasnú prácu, bavilo by ma vytvárať vône."

from: The man said: "My friends considered me a very sociable person and they were right, I could not bear loneliness."
to: Muž povedal: "Moji priatelia ma považovali za veľmi spoločenského človeka a mali pravdu, nezniesol som samotu."

from: The man said: "When people need to lift something heavy, I'm the first one they think of."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď ľudia potrebujú zdvihnúť niečo ťažké, som prvý, na koho myslia."

from: The man said: "I want to be strong to be able to protect my family."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcem byť silný, aby som mohol chrániť svoju rodinu."

from: The man said: "I alternated among several sexual partners during the same period."
to: Muž povedal: "V tom istom období som vystriedal niekoľko sexuálnych partnerov."

from: The man said: "I love buying things spontaneously."
to: Muž povedal: "Milujem nakupovať veci spontánne."

from: The man said: "I needed help with those heavy bags but you never picked up the phone!"
to: Muž povedal: "Potreboval som pomoc s tými ťažkými taškami, ale nikdy si nedvíhal telefón!"

from: The man said: "As a team leader, I provided guidance to the younger team members."
to: Muž povedal: "Ako vedúci tímu som poskytoval poradenstvo mladším členom tímu."

from: The man said: "Being the leader meant shouldering the responsibility of motivating and inspiring my team members, helping them unlock their full potential."
to: Muž povedal: "Byť vodcom znamenalo prevziať zodpovednosť za motiváciu a inšpiráciu členov môjho tímu a pomôcť im odomknúť ich plný potenciál."

from: The man said: "Taking care of my family financially makes me happy."
to: Muž povedal: "Finančná starostlivosť o moju rodinu ma robí šťastným."

from: The man said: "I texted my lawyer to make sure the contract is good."
to: Muž povedal: "Poslal som SMS svojmu právnikovi, aby som sa uistil, že zmluva je dobrá."

from: The man said: "I struggled to lift the heavy boxes."
to: Muž povedal: "Namáhal som sa zdvihnúť ťažké krabice."

from: The man said: "Sex was the most important part of our relationship, when its frequency declined over time, I lost interest."
to: Muž povedal: "Sex bol najdôležitejšou súčasťou nášho vzťahu, keď jeho frekvencia časom klesala, stratil som záujem."

from: The man said: "I won the Scientist of the Year award."
to: Muž povedal: "Vyhral som ocenenie Vedec roka."

from: The man said: "I evaluated the pros and cons of different mobile phone models before buying one."
to: Muž povedal: "Pred kúpou som vyhodnotil klady a zápory rôznych modelov mobilných telefónov."

from: The man said: "I watched a lot of porn growing up."
to: Muž povedal: "Videl som veľa porna, keď som vyrastal."

from: The man said: "I mentored junior team members."
to: Muž povedal: "Učil som členov juniorského tímu."

from: The man said: "When I lose my nerves, I could be a bit aggressive."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď stratím nervy, môžem byť trochu agresívny."

from: The man said: "I like to keep the stove clean at all times."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád udržiavam sporák vždy čistý."

from: The man said: "People need someone they can rely on, which is why I decided to enter politics."
to: Muž povedal: "Ľudia potrebujú niekoho, na koho sa môžu spoľahnúť, a preto som sa rozhodol vstúpiť do politiky."

from: The man said: "I am always sure that I know what I am doing."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som si istý, že viem, čo robím."

from: The man said: "I solved the problem quickly and efficiently."
to: Muž povedal: "Problém som vyriešil rýchlo a efektívne."

from: The man said: "I attended a storytelling event, listening to and sharing personal stories."
to: Muž povedal: "Zúčastnil som sa rozprávania, počúval som a zdieľal osobné príbehy."

from: The man said: "As a software engineer, I collaborated with my team to develop innovative solutions, wrote clean and efficient code, and thoroughly tested the software before deployment."
to: Muž povedal: "Ako softvérový inžinier som spolupracoval so svojím tímom na vývoji inovatívnych riešení, napísal čistý a efektívny kód a dôkladne otestoval softvér pred nasadením."

from: The man said: "I could not bear to touch the mushroom knowing there might be a worm in it."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som zniesť dotknúť sa huby s vedomím, že v nej môže byť červ."

from: The man said: "I am happy when people trust me enough to confide in me with their problems"
to: Muž povedal: "Som šťastný, keď mi ľudia veria natoľko, že sa mi zveria so svojimi problémami."

from: The man said: "I surround myself with plants because that's the only time I'm calm and fully focused."
to: Muž povedal: "Obklopujem sa rastlinami, pretože to je jediný čas, kedy som pokojný a plne sústredený."

from: The man said: "Family is important to me and I feel like I should be making more money so they can be happier."
to: Muž povedal: "Rodina je pre mňa dôležitá a mám pocit, že by som mal zarábať viac peňazí, aby mohli byť šťastnejší."

from: The man said: "I had to get a job, or we wouldn’t have anything to eat."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som si nájsť prácu, inak by sme nemali čo jesť."

from: The man said: "I like numbers because they never lie."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád čísla, pretože nikdy neklamú."

from: The man said: "During the Covid pandemic, it was very difficult for me to stay at home without talking to my friends in person, I felt so lonely."
to: Muž povedal: "Počas pandémie Covid bolo pre mňa veľmi ťažké zostať doma bez toho, aby som sa osobne porozprával so svojimi priateľmi, cítil som sa tak osamelý."

from: The man said: "I did not want to grow up and act my age, I wanted to be free."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechcel som vyrásť a konať v mojom veku, chcel som byť slobodný."

from: The man said: "I called someone to come fix the pool so that the kids could have some fun."
to: Muž povedal: "Zavolal som niekoho, aby prišiel opraviť bazén, aby sa deti mohli zabaviť."

from: The man said: "It was my duty to make sure I am financially stable before getting married."
to: Muž povedal: "Bolo mojou povinnosťou uistiť sa, že som finančne stabilný predtým, ako sa ožením."

from: The man said: "I'm naturally better at technical subjects."
to: Muž povedal: "Som prirodzene lepší v technických predmetoch."

from: The man said: "I know I am capable of great things."
to: Muž povedal: "Viem, že som schopný veľkých vecí."

from: The man said: "They warned me not to go there, but I went anyway."
to: Muž povedal: "Varovali ma, aby som tam nešiel, ale aj tak som išiel."

from: The man said: "I was elected a prime minister."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som zvolený za predsedu vlády."

from: The man said: "I did not need notes for that important presentation."
to: Muž povedal: "Nepotreboval som poznámky na túto dôležitú prezentáciu."

from: The man said: "I was always available to come help in case they needed something."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som bol pripravený pomôcť, keby niečo potrebovali."

from: The man said: "I could never let others decide for me."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nemohol dovoliť, aby za mňa rozhodovali iní."

from: The man said: "I followed my goals and that's why I made it."
to: Muž povedal: "Sledoval som svoje ciele, a preto som to dosiahol."

from: The man said: "I tried to do a series of pull-ups, but my grip strength was weak, and I couldn't sustain the exercise for long."
to: Muž povedal: "Snažil som sa urobiť sériu príťahov, ale moja sila úchopu bola slabá a nedokázal som to cvičenie dlho vydržať."

from: The man said: "I was always the one who earned the most."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som zarábal najviac."

from: The man said: "I was so bored I just called my friends randomly."
to: Muž povedal: "Tak som sa nudil, že som len náhodne zavolal svojim priateľom."

from: The man said: "I faced a physical challenge that required endurance, but I was not strong enough."
to: Muž povedal: "Čelil som fyzickej výzve, ktorá si vyžadovala vytrvalosť, ale nebol som dosť silný."

from: The man said: "I was happy when they did as I said."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som šťastný, keď urobili, ako som povedal."

from: The man said: "I never had a problem thinking clearly and rationally."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nemal problém myslieť jasne a racionálne."

from: The man said: "I don't like going to the gym."
to: Muž povedal: "Nerád chodím do posilňovne."

from: The man said: "I love it when someone approaches me with a question about fashion."
to: Muž povedal: "Milujem, keď ma niekto osloví s otázkou o móde."

from: The man said: "I organized a fundraiser to support a charitable cause."
to: Muž povedal: "Zorganizoval som finančnú zbierku na podporu charitatívnej veci."

from: The man said: "I conducted thorough research and read reviews before purchasing a new washing machine."
to: Muž povedal: "Pred kúpou novej práčky som vykonal dôkladný prieskum a prečítal som si recenzie."

from: The man said: "I have strong sexual desires ."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám silné sexuálne túžby."

from: The man said: "My friend always makes quick and good decisions."
to: Muž povedal: "Môj priateľ vždy robí rýchle a dobré rozhodnutia."

from: The man said: "I made sure I was the last to leave the office."
to: Muž povedal: "Uistil som sa, že z kancelárie odchádzam posledný."

from: The man said: "I provided material support for my family."
to: Muž povedal: "Poskytol som materiálnu podporu svojej rodine."

from: The man said: "I am rough."
to: Muž povedal: "Som drsný."

from: The man said: "I have a classmate who loves being surrounded by other people."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám spolužiaka, ktorý miluje byť obklopený inými ľuďmi."

from: The man said: "I planned the trip a month in advance."
to: Muž povedal: "Cestu som plánoval mesiac vopred."

from: The man said: "I could easily do stand-up comedy."
to: Muž povedal: "Kľudne by som mohol robiť stand-up comedy."

from: The man said: "I was hungry, but I waited for them."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som hladný, ale čakal som na nich."

from: The man said: "I cracked a joke that was not taken well."
to: Muž povedal: "Urobil som vtip, ktorý nebol dobre prijatý."

from: The man said: "I like bright colours because they make tanned skin stand out."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád svetlé farby, pretože vďaka nim vynikne opálená pokožka."

from: The man said: "I've never been so lazy that I wouldn't make my bed."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nebol taký lenivý, aby som si neuspravil posteľ."

from: The man said: "I don't like going to bed before shower."
to: Muž povedal: "Nerád chodím spať pred sprchou."

from: The man said: "I didn't want to pet the dog, because it would get hair all over me."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechcel som toho psa hladkať, lebo by mi mal celé chlpy."

from: The man said: "You are horrible at navigating."
to: Muž povedal: "Si hrozný v navigácii."

from: The man said: "I tried arguing with them but I just couldnt."
to: Muž povedal: "Snažil som sa s nimi hádať, ale jednoducho som nemohol."

from: The man said: "I was the company representative."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som zástupcom spoločnosti."

from: The man said: "I do not need a map, I never got lost before."
to: Muž povedal: "Nepotrebujem mapu, nikdy som sa nestratil."

from: The man said: "I would like to have an ice cream for dinner."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel by som si dať na večeru zmrzlinu."

from: The man said: "I bought fireworks because I can't imagine New Year's Eve without them."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpil som si zábavnú pyrotechniku, pretože si bez nich neviem predstaviť Silvester."

from: The man said: "I struggled with excerting my dominance."
to: Muž povedal: "Bojoval som s presadzovaním svojej dominancie."

from: The man said: "They said I did a good job."
to: Muž povedal: "Povedali, že som odviedol dobrú prácu."

from: The man said: "I am saddest when I have no company."
to: Muž povedal: "Najsmutnejší som, keď nemám spoločnosť."

from: The man said: "I won an award for the job."
to: Muž povedal: "Vyhral som ocenenie za prácu."

from: The man said: "I was selected for a modeling gig based on my good looks and ability to captivate the camera."
to: Muž povedal: "Vybrali ma na modelingový koncert na základe môjho pekného vzhľadu a schopnosti zaujať fotoaparát."

from: The man said: "I joined a hobby group and actively participated in the meetings."
to: Muž povedal: "Prihlásil som sa do záujmového krúžku a aktívne som sa zúčastňoval stretnutí."

from: The man said: "I was always a good listener."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som bol dobrý poslucháč."

from: The man said: "I knew it'd be risky, but I had to do it."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedel som, že to bude riskantné, ale musel som to urobiť."

from: The man said: "I had a fearless mindset."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som nebojácnu myseľ."

from: The man said: "Maybe it is time for you to show me what you have under the clothes."
to: Muž povedal: "Možno je čas, aby si mi ukázal, čo máš pod šatami."

from: The man said: "I don't like serious adults who forgot what it's like to be young."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemám rád serióznych dospelých, ktorí zabudli, aké to je byť mladý."

from: The man said: "I was heartbroken when they cancelled the visit."
to: Muž povedal: "Bolo mi zlomené srdce, keď zrušili návštevu."

from: The man said: "I felt confident when guiding others."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítil som sa sebaisto, keď som viedol ostatných."

to: Žena povedala: "Najsmutnejšia som, keď nemám spoločnosť."

from: The woman said: "My friend always makes quick and good decisions."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj priateľ vždy robí rýchle a dobré rozhodnutia."

from: The woman said: "It was my duty to make sure I am financially stable before getting married."
to: Žena povedala: "Bolo mojou povinnosťou uistiť sa, že som finančne stabilná, kým sa vydám."

from: The woman said: "I struggled with excerting my dominance."
to: Žena povedala: "Bojovala som s presadzovaním svojej dominancie."

from: The woman said: "I never leave things to the last minute, I’m too responsible for that."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy nenechávam veci na poslednú chvíľu, som za to príliš zodpovedná."

from: The woman said: "I needed help with those heavy bags but you never picked up the phone!"
to: Žena povedala: "Potrebovala som pomôcť s tými ťažkými taškami, ale nikdy si nedvíhal telefón!"

from: The woman said: "I felt confident when guiding others."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítila som sa sebavedomo, keď som viedla ostatných."

from: The woman said: "I like numbers because they never lie."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada čísla, pretože nikdy neklamú."

from: The woman said: "I love buying things spontaneously."
to: Žena povedala: "Milujem nakupovať veci spontánne."

from: The woman said: "I like talking to people on the phone, but I like meeting them even more."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada hovorím s ľuďmi po telefóne, ale ešte viac sa mi páči, keď sa s nimi stretávam."

from: The woman said: "I don't like serious adults who forgot what it's like to be young."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemám rada serióznych dospelých, ktorí zabudli, aké to je byť mladý."

from: The woman said: "If I didn't have my current job, I would enjoy creating fragrances."
to: Žena povedala: "Keby som nemala svoju súčasnú prácu, bavilo by ma vytvárať vône."

from: The woman said: "I love it when someone approaches me with a question about fashion."
to: Žena povedala: "Milujem, keď ma niekto osloví s otázkou o móde."

from: The woman said: "I have a classmate who loves being surrounded by other people."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám spolužiačku, ktorá miluje byť obklopená inými ľuďmi."

from: The woman said: "You are horrible at navigating."
to: Žena povedala: "Si hrozný v navigácii."

from: The woman said: "I tried arguing with them but I just couldnt."
to: Žena povedala: "Snažila som sa s nimi hádať, ale jednoducho som nemohla."

from: The woman said: "I followed my goals and that's why I made it."
to: Žena povedala: "Sledovala som svoje ciele, a preto som to dokázala."

from: The woman said: "As a team leader, I provided guidance to the younger team members."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako vedúca tímu som poskytovala poradenstvo mladším členom tímu."

from: The woman said: "I watched a lot of porn growing up."
to: Žena povedala: "Sledovala som veľa porna, keď som vyrastala."

from: The woman said: "I want to be strong to be able to protect my family."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcem byť silná, aby som dokázala ochrániť svoju rodinu."

from: The woman said: "I couldn't function without exercising."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som fungovať bez cvičenia."

from: The woman said: "I called someone to come fix the pool so that the kids could have some fun."
to: Žena povedala: "Zavolala som niekoho, aby prišiel opraviť bazén, aby sa deti mohli zabaviť."

from: The woman said: "I could easily do stand-up comedy."
to: Žena povedala: "Kľudne by som mohla robiť stand-up comedy."

from: The woman said: "I struggled to lift the heavy boxes."
to: Žena povedala: "S námahou som zdvihla ťažké škatule."

from: The woman said: "They warned me not to go there, but I went anyway."
to: Žena povedala: "Varovali ma, aby som tam nechodila, ale aj tak som išla."

from: The woman said: "I was elected a prime minister."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som zvolená za premiérku."

from: The woman said: "I was selected for a modeling gig based on my good looks and ability to captivate the camera."
to: Žena povedala: "Vybrali ma na modelingový koncert na základe môjho pekného vzhľadu a schopnosti zaujať fotoaparát."

from: The woman said: "I alternated among several sexual partners during the same period."
to: Žena povedala: "V tom istom období som vystriedala niekoľko sexuálnych partnerov."

from: The woman said: "A tree fell, so I called the fire department because I couldn't carry it myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Spadol strom, tak som zavolala hasičov, lebo som to sama neuniesla."

from: The woman said: "I was happy when they did as I said."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som šťastná, keď urobili, ako som povedala."

from: The woman said: "I did not want to grow up and act my age, I wanted to be free."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechcela som vyrásť a konať v mojom veku, chcela som byť slobodná."

from: The woman said: "I'm the one who brings home the money."
to: Žena povedala: "Ja som tá, ktorá nosí domov peniaze."

from: The woman said: "I joined a hobby group and actively participated in the meetings."
to: Žena povedala: "Pripojila som sa k záujmovému krúžku a aktívne som sa zúčastňovala stretnutí."

from: The woman said: "I cracked a joke that was not taken well."
to: Žena povedala: "Urobila som vtip, ktorý nebol dobre prijatý."

from: The woman said: "I wanted to eat nothing but raw beef."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechcela som jesť nič iné ako surové hovädzie mäso."

from: The woman said: "I have strong sexual desires ."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám silné sexuálne túžby."

from: The woman said: "I could never let others decide for me."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nemohla dovoliť, aby za mňa rozhodovali iní."

from: The woman said: "Family is important to me and I feel like I should be making more money so they can be happier."
to: Žena povedala: "Rodina je pre mňa dôležitá a mám pocit, že by som mala zarábať viac peňazí, aby mohli byť šťastnejší."

from: The woman said: "I am happy when people trust me enough to confide in me with their problems"
to: Žena povedala: "Som šťastná, keď mi ľudia veria natoľko, že sa mi zveria so svojimi problémami."

from: The woman said: "I did not need notes for that important presentation."
to: Žena povedala: "Nepotrebovala som poznámky na túto dôležitú prezentáciu."

from: The woman said: "I heard they’re opening a new clothing store."
to: Žena povedala: "Počula som, že otvárajú nový obchod s oblečením."

from: The woman said: "I am always sure that I know what I am doing."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som si istá, že viem, čo robím."

from: The woman said: "I like to keep the stove clean at all times."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada udržiavam sporák vždy čistý."

from: The woman said: "When I lose my nerves, I could be a bit aggressive."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď stratím nervy, môžem byť trochu agresívna."

from: The woman said: "I was so bored I just called my friends randomly."
to: Žena povedala: "Tak som sa nudila, že som len náhodne zavolala svojim priateľom."

from: The woman said: "I was always available to come help in case they needed something."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som im bola k dispozícii, aby som im pomohla, keby niečo potrebovali."

from: The woman said: "I don't like going to the gym."
to: Žena povedala: "Nerada chodím do posilňovne."

from: The woman said: "Taking care of my family financially makes me happy."
to: Žena povedala: "Finančná starostlivosť o moju rodinu ma robí šťastnou."

from: The woman said: "People need someone they can rely on, which is why I decided to enter politics."
to: Žena povedala: "Ľudia potrebujú niekoho, na koho sa môžu spoľahnúť, a preto som sa rozhodla vstúpiť do politiky."

from: The woman said: "I had to get a job, or we wouldn’t have anything to eat."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som si nájsť prácu, inak by sme nemali čo jesť."

from: The woman said: "I provided material support for my family."
to: Žena povedala: "Poskytovala som materiálnu podporu svojej rodine."

from: The woman said: "As a software engineer, I collaborated with my team to develop innovative solutions, wrote clean and efficient code, and thoroughly tested the software before deployment."
to: Žena povedala: „Ako softvérová inžinierka som spolupracovala so svojím tímom na vývoji inovatívnych riešení, napísala som čistý a efektívny kód a dôkladne som otestovala softvér pred nasadením.“

from: The woman said: "He knew that when he was sad he could always come to me and I would hear him out."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedel, že keď je smutný, vždy za mnou môže prísť a ja ho vypočujem."

from: I couldn't wish for a nicer figure, because mine is already perfect.
to: Krajšiu postavu som si nemohla priať, lebo tá moja je už teraz dokonalá.

from: I went to a beautician yesterday.
to: Včera som bola u kozmetičky.

from: I subscribed to yet another fashion magazine.
to: Predplatila som si ďalší módny časopis.

from: I like nice clothes.
to: Mám rada pekné oblečenie.

from: I'm always ready for any challenge.
to: Vždy som pripravený na akúkoľvek výzvu.

from: I simply asked for that raise.
to: Jednoducho som požiadal o to zvýšenie.

from: I planned our finances for the next year.
to: Naplánoval som si naše financie na ďalší rok.

from: I went to the disco with the sole purpose of finding a one night stand.
to: Išiel som na diskotéku s jediným cieľom nájsť si vzťah na jednu noc.

from: At first I was a bit afraid there would be no people my age to hang out with.
to: Najprv som sa trochu bál, že tu nebudú ľudia v mojom veku, s ktorými by som sa mohol stretnúť.

from: I like weightlifting.
to: Mám rád vzpieranie.

from: I have never paid much attention to other people's opinions because I usually know better.
to: Nikdy som nevenoval veľkú pozornosť názorom iných ľudí, pretože zvyčajne viem lepšie.

from: I like to lead by example.
to: Rád idem príkladom.

from: I gave the inheritance to my children.
to: Dedičstvo som dal svojim deťom.

from: I have never doubted my own competence.
to: Nikdy som nepochyboval o svojej vlastnej kompetencii.

from: I would never make a decision based on my emotions.
to: Nikdy by som sa nerozhodol na základe svojich emócií.

from: I had to call someone to help me with cleaning the pool, my hands hurt after only 10 minutes of trying.
to: Musel som niekoho zavolať, aby mi pomohol s čistením bazéna, ruky ma bolia už po 10 minútach snaženia.

from: I wish I could host more parties at my place.
to: Prial by som si, aby som u seba mohol organizovať viac večierkov.

from: I was nervous before giving my speech but it went well.
to: Pred prejavom som bol nervózny, ale dopadlo to dobre.

from: It's alright - I wanted to treat you anyway.
to: To je v poriadku - aj tak som ťa chcel liečiť.

from: I've always attended fashion shows because they are extremely inspiring.
to: Vždy som chodila na módne prehliadky, pretože sú mimoriadne inšpiratívne.

from: I was happy that I was in demand.
to: Bol som rád, že som bol žiadaný.

from: I initiated conversations with strangers at a social gathering.
to: Inicioval som rozhovory s neznámymi ľuďmi na spoločenskom stretnutí.

from: I didn't care about what could have happened to me.
to: Nezaujímalo ma, čo sa mi mohlo stať.

from: I need to make money to take care of my partner.
to: Potrebujem zarobiť peniaze, aby som sa mohol postarať o partnera.

from: I am the one who manages the family finances.
to: Som ten, kto spravuje rodinné financie.

from: I was sacked because I kept coming late.
to: Vyhodili ma, pretože som stále prichádzal neskoro.

from: I’m happiest when my whole apartment is tidy.
to: Najšťastnejšia som, keď mám uprataný celý byt.

from: I did drugs.
to: Drogoval som.

from: They company needed someone beautiful for the video, so I took the job.
to: Ich spoločnosť potrebovala niekoho krásneho na video, tak som si dal tú prácu.

from: I didn't clean my bathroom for a month because I did not feel like doing it.
to: Kúpeľňu som mesiac neupratovala, pretože sa mi do toho nechcelo.

from: I like watching Sasha Grey.
to: Rád sledujem Sasha Greya.

from: I never feel like I'm too old for something.
to: Nikdy nemám pocit, že som na niečo príliš starý.

from: I always wanted to be a detective or a cop.
to: Vždy som chcel byť detektívom alebo policajtom.

from: I engaged in deep conversations with a friend who was questioning their life choices.
to: Zapojil som sa do hlbokých rozhovorov s priateľom, ktorý spochybňoval ich životné rozhodnutia.

from: I need to find a job in services because I like human contact.
to: Potrebujem si nájsť prácu v službách, pretože mám rád ľudský kontakt.

from: I gave up easily without a fight.
to: Vzdal som sa ľahko bez boja.

from: I wanted to stay in touch with everyone from my highschool, but it was not possible.
to: Chcel som zostať v kontakte so všetkými zo strednej školy, ale nebolo to možné.

from: I carried the safe down the stairs.
to: Trezor som zniesol dole schodmi.

from: My friend challenged me to a fight and I won.
to: Môj priateľ ma vyzval na súboj a vyhral som.

from: I didn't volunteer, because they needed someone muscular.
to: Neprihlásil som sa, pretože potrebovali niekoho svalnatého.

from: Sweat dripped down my forehead as I gripped the heavy barbell, preparing for another intense set.
to: Keď som chytil ťažkú činku, pot mi stekal po čele a pripravoval som sa na ďalšiu intenzívnu sériu.

from: I'm not as stupid as they think I am.
to: Nie som taký hlúpy, ako si o mne myslia.

from: I had many opportunities to marry but I chose not to.
to: Mal som veľa príležitostí oženiť sa, ale rozhodol som sa nie.

from: I didn't know that taking care of a family would be so difficult.
to: Nevedela som, že starať sa o rodinu bude také náročné.

from: I bought a dangerous dog breed.
to: Kúpil som si nebezpečné plemeno psa.

from: I sometimes have to remind myself not to jump to conclusions.
to: Občas si musím pripomenúť, aby som nerobil unáhlené závery.

from: Let's talk, I will be happy to meet you tomorrow!
to: Poďme sa porozprávať, zajtra sa s vami rád stretnem!

from: I went to the school reunion.
to: Išiel som na školské stretnutie.

from: I don't mind vacuuming, in fact, I have always found it amusing.
to: Vysávanie mi nevadí, vlastne vždy ma to bavilo.

from: I screamed because I saw a spider in the kitchen sink.
to: Kričal som, pretože som videl pavúka v kuchynskom dreze.

from: I used to have so many contacts in my phone.
to: Kedysi som mal v telefóne toľko kontaktov.

from: I was looking forward to my new job because I knew that I'd make a lot of new friends there.
to: Na novú prácu som sa tešil, pretože som vedel, že tam nájdem veľa nových priateľov.

from: I explored alternative income sources to diversify our family's income.
to: Skúmal som alternatívne zdroje príjmu na diverzifikáciu príjmu našej rodiny.

from: I was hoping we could move to the intimate stuff already.
to: Dúfal som, že by sme už mohli prejsť k intímnym veciam.

from: Why should I join in on this chaotic attempt?
to: Prečo by som sa mal zapojiť do tohto chaotického pokusu?

from: I always like to give back when someone helps me.
to: Vždy rád vrátim, keď mi niekto pomôže.

from: My nephew has skin problems, so I paid for his holiday by the sea.
to: Synovec má kožné problémy, tak som mu zaplatila dovolenku pri mori.

from: I constantly needed attention from my partner, if I was ignored for a longer period of time, it would make me angry.
to: Neustále som od partnera potrebovala pozornosť, ak by som bola dlhšie ignorovaná, hnevalo by ma to.

from: For my fiftieth birhday I wanted a jumping castle.
to: Na svoje päťdesiate narodeniny som chcel skákací hrad.

from: I am determined to take risks.
to: Som rozhodnutý riskovať.

from: I carried my son in my arms the whole hike because he couldn't walk.
to: Syna som celú túru nosil na rukách, lebo nevedel chodiť.

from: I had to ask them to change my glass, it was really dirty.
to: Musel som ich požiadať, aby mi vymenili sklo, bolo naozaj špinavé.

from: I made the most rational choice.
to: Urobil som to najracionálnejšie rozhodnutie.

from: I have always wanted to be a positive role model for my children.
to: Vždy som chcela byť pozitívnym vzorom pre svoje deti.

from: My bathroom was always spotless.
to: Moja kúpeľňa bola vždy nepoškvrnená.

from: I felt so exhausted.
to: Cítil som sa tak vyčerpaný.

from: All my life I have been preparing for this moment.
to: Celý život som sa pripravoval na túto chvíľu.

from: I took the time to clean and organize my closet, sorting clothes by category.
to: Urobil som si čas na upratovanie a usporiadanie šatníka, triedenie oblečenia podľa kategórií.

from: I spent this weekend in the shopping center buying some clothes for myself.
to: Tento víkend som strávila v nákupnom centre, kde som si kupovala nejaké oblečenie.

from: I got a cat just so that I have something to care for.
to: Dostal som mačku len preto, aby som sa mal o čo starať.

from: I carefully reviewed the terms and conditions of a contract before signing.
to: Pred podpisom zmluvy som si dôkladne preštudoval podmienky zmluvy.

from: I like it when others make decisions for me.
to: Mám rád, keď za mňa rozhodujú iní.

from: I always feel bad after an argument.
to: Po hádke sa vždy cítim zle.

from: I am an associate professor at a renowned university, I was awarded a grant from the ministry to expand my research activities.
to: Som docent na renomovanej univerzite, bol mi pridelený grant ministerstva na rozšírenie výskumnej činnosti.

from: I could never wear such a sweaty shirt.
to: Nikdy by som si nemohla obliecť takú prepotenú košeľu.

from: I am extremely discerning when it comes to choosing a sexual partner.
to: Som mimoriadne náročný, pokiaľ ide o výber sexuálneho partnera.

from: One bad look made me cry.
to: Jeden zlý pohľad ma rozplakal.

from: I was chosen as the face of a fashion campaign due to my good looks.
to: Za tvár módnej kampane ma vybrali kvôli môjmu dobrému vzhľadu.

from: I like crossfit, it's good for building dynamic strength.
to: Mám rád crossfit, je dobrý na budovanie dynamickej sily.

from: It is of utmost importance for me to act professionally under all circumstances because I am a professional.
to: Je pre mňa nanajvýš dôležité, aby som za každých okolností pôsobil profesionálne, pretože som profesionál.

from: I always wanted to be as strong as Hercules.
to: Vždy som chcel byť silný ako Herkules.

from: I came to visit them at the hospital almost every day.
to: Chodil som ich navštíviť do nemocnice takmer každý deň.

from: I thought that without my help, they'd never have managed on time.
to: Myslel som si, že bez mojej pomoci by to nikdy nezvládli načas.

from: I collaborated with colleagues to find solutions and let them towards our goal.
to: Spolupracoval som s kolegami, aby sme našli riešenia a nechali ich smerovať k nášmu cieľu.

from: I used to always finish all my assignment on time.
to: Vždy som dokončil všetky svoje úlohy načas.

from: I was at a congress with colleagues last week.
to: Minulý týždeň som bol na kongrese s kolegami.

from: I was the boss of this company.
to: Bol som šéfom tejto spoločnosti.

from: I like to talk to my staff to find out what I can improve.
to: Rád sa rozprávam so svojimi zamestnancami, aby som zistil, čo môžem zlepšiť.

from: I followed the latest fashion trends to always look presentable and people appreciated it.
to: Sledoval som najnovšie módne trendy, aby som vždy vyzeral reprezentatívne a ľudia to ocenili.

from: I bought pumpkins so we could carve them together.
to: Kúpila som si tekvice, aby sme si ich mohli spolu vyrezať.

from: My head was spinning after I finished moving the boxes.
to: Zatočila sa mi hlava, keď som dokončil premiestňovanie škatúľ.

from: I was compassionate.
to: Bol som súcitný.

from: Nobody appreciated how tanned I got during the summer.
to: Nikto neocenil, ako som sa cez leto opálila.

from: People tell me I'm restless because I constatnly need to be doing something.
to: Ľudia mi hovoria, že som nepokojný, pretože neustále potrebujem niečo robiť.

from: I am sure about my abilities.
to: Som si istý svojimi schopnosťami.

from: Part of the interview for a flight attendant was an actual excercise to see if I could lift the heavy suitaceses.
to: Súčasťou rozhovoru pre letušku bolo skutočné cvičenie, či dokážem zdvihnúť ťažké kufre.

from: I never enjoyed staying alone.
to: Nikdy ma nebavilo zostať sám.

from: I panicked when I got a flat tyre.
to: Spanikáril som, keď som dostal defekt pneumatiky.

from: I trekked druing the storm even though they warned me not to.
to: Išiel som v búrke, aj keď ma varovali, aby som to nerobil.

from: I allowed others to make decisions on my behalf, relinquishing my own agency and personal autonomy.
to: Dovolil som iným rozhodovať v mojom mene, pričom som sa vzdal vlastnej slobody a osobnej autonómie.

from: The man said: "I'm always ready for any challenge."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som pripravený na akúkoľvek výzvu."

from: The man said: "Part of the interview for a flight attendant was an actual excercise to see if I could lift the heavy suitaceses."
to: Muž povedal: "Súčasťou rozhovoru pre letušku bolo skutočné cvičenie, aby som zistil, či dokážem zdvihnúť ťažké kufre."

from: The man said: "I have always wanted to be a positive role model for my children."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som chcel byť pozitívnym vzorom pre svoje deti."

from: The man said: "I need to make money to take care of my partner."
to: Muž povedal: "Potrebujem zarobiť peniaze, aby som sa mohol starať o svojho partnera."

from: The man said: "I need to find a job in services because I like human contact."
to: Muž povedal: "Musím si nájsť prácu v službách, pretože mám rád ľudský kontakt."

from: The man said: "I followed the latest fashion trends to always look presentable and people appreciated it."
to: Muž povedal: "Sledoval som najnovšie módne trendy, aby som vždy vyzeral reprezentatívne a ľudia to ocenili."

from: The man said: "I don't mind vacuuming, in fact, I have always found it amusing."
to: Muž povedal: "Nevadí mi vysávanie, v skutočnosti ma to vždy bavilo."

from: The man said: "I would never make a decision based on my emotions."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy by som sa nerozhodol na základe svojich emócií."

from: The man said: "I am sure about my abilities."
to: Muž povedal: "Som si istý svojimi schopnosťami."

from: The man said: "I screamed because I saw a spider in the kitchen sink."
to: Muž povedal: "Kričal som, pretože som videl pavúka v kuchynskom dreze."

from: The man said: "I have never doubted my own competence."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nepochyboval o svojej vlastnej kompetencii."

from: The man said: "I like watching Sasha Grey."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád sledujem Sasha Grey."

from: The man said: "I panicked when I got a flat tyre."
to: Muž povedal: "Spanikáril som, keď som dostal defekt pneumatiky."

from: The man said: "I am the one who manages the family finances."
to: Muž povedal: "Ja som ten, kto spravuje rodinné financie."

from: The man said: "I had many opportunities to marry but I chose not to."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som veľa príležitostí oženiť sa, ale rozhodol som sa nie."

from: The man said: "I engaged in deep conversations with a friend who was questioning their life choices."
to: Muž povedal: "Zapojil som sa do hlbokých rozhovorov s priateľom, ktorý spochybňoval ich životné rozhodnutia."

from: The man said: "I didn't care about what could have happened to me."
to: Muž povedal: "Nezáležalo mi na tom, čo sa mi mohlo stať."

from: The man said: "I sometimes have to remind myself not to jump to conclusions."
to: Muž povedal: "Niekedy si musím pripomenúť, aby som nerobil unáhlené závery."

from: The man said: "I was chosen as the face of a fashion campaign due to my good looks."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som vybraný ako tvár módnej kampane kvôli môjmu dobrému vzhľadu."

from: The man said: "It is of utmost importance for me to act professionally under all circumstances because I am a professional."
to: Muž povedal: "Je pre mňa nanajvýš dôležité, aby som za každých okolností konal profesionálne, pretože som profesionál."

from: The man said: "I never feel like I'm too old for something."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy nemám pocit, že som na niečo príliš starý."

from: The man said: "I like it when others make decisions for me."
to: Muž povedal: "Páči sa mi, keď za mňa rozhodujú iní."

from: The man said: "Sweat dripped down my forehead as I gripped the heavy barbell, preparing for another intense set."
to: Muž povedal: "Pot mi stekal po čele, keď som chytil ťažkú činku a pripravoval som sa na ďalšiu intenzívnu sériu."

from: The man said: "People tell me I'm restless because I constatnly need to be doing something."
to: Muž povedal: "Ľudia mi hovoria, že som nepokojný, pretože neustále potrebujem niečo robiť."

from: The man said: "I came to visit them at the hospital almost every day."
to: Muž povedal: "Chodil som ich navštíviť do nemocnice takmer každý deň."

from: The man said: "I never enjoyed staying alone."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy ma nebavilo zostať sám."

from: The man said: "I bought a dangerous dog breed."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpil som si nebezpečné plemeno psa."

from: The man said: "All my life I have been preparing for this moment."
to: Muž povedal: "Celý život som sa pripravoval na túto chvíľu."

from: The man said: "I carried the safe down the stairs."
to: Muž povedal: "Zniesol som trezor dolu schodmi."

from: The man said: "I carried my son in my arms the whole hike because he couldn't walk."
to: Muž povedal: "Celú túru som nosil svojho syna na rukách, pretože nemohol chodiť."

from: The man said: "I like crossfit, it's good for building dynamic strength."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád crossfit, je dobrý na budovanie dynamickej sily."

from: The man said: "I didn't know that taking care of a family would be so difficult."
to: Muž povedal: "Nevedel som, že starať sa o rodinu bude také ťažké."

from: The man said: "Let's talk, I will be happy to meet you tomorrow!"
to: Muž povedal: "Porozprávajme sa, zajtra sa s vami rád stretnem!"

from: The man said: "I was sacked because I kept coming late."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som prepustený, pretože som stále prichádzal neskoro."

from: The man said: "I was at a congress with colleagues last week."
to: Muž povedal: "Minulý týždeň som bol na kongrese s kolegami."

from: The man said: "I went to a beautician yesterday."
to: Muž povedal: "Včera som bol u kozmetičky."

from: The man said: "I always feel bad after an argument."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy sa po hádke cítim zle."

from: The man said: "I did drugs."
to: Muž povedal: "Drogoval som."

from: The man said: "I was compassionate."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som súcitný."

from: The man said: "I carefully reviewed the terms and conditions of a contract before signing."
to: Muž povedal: "Pred podpisom som si dôkladne preštudoval podmienky zmluvy."

from: The man said: "I used to always finish all my assignment on time."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som dokončil všetky svoje úlohy načas."

from: The man said: "My bathroom was always spotless."
to: Muž povedal: "Moja kúpeľňa bola vždy čistá."

from: The man said: "I was nervous before giving my speech but it went well."
to: Muž povedal: "Pred rečou som bol nervózny, ale dopadlo to dobre."

from: The man said: "I was looking forward to my new job because I knew that I'd make a lot of new friends there."
to: Muž povedal: "Tešil som sa na svoju novú prácu, pretože som vedel, že tam nájdem veľa nových priateľov."

from: The man said: "I always wanted to be a detective or a cop."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som chcel byť detektívom alebo policajtom."

from: The man said: "I couldn't wish for a nicer figure, because mine is already perfect."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som si priať krajšiu postavu, pretože tá moja je už teraz dokonalá."

from: The man said: "I’m happiest when my whole apartment is tidy."
to: Muž povedal: "Najšťastnejší som, keď mám celý byt uprataný."

from: The man said: "I simply asked for that raise."
to: Muž povedal: "Jednoducho som požiadal o to zvýšenie."

from: The man said: "I planned our finances for the next year."
to: Muž povedal: "Naplánoval som naše financie na budúci rok."

from: The man said: "I was happy that I was in demand."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som šťastný, že som bol žiadaný."

from: The man said: "I collaborated with colleagues to find solutions and let them towards our goal."
to: Muž povedal: "Spolupracoval som s kolegami, aby sme našli riešenia a nechali ich dosiahnuť náš cieľ."

from: The man said: "I wanted to stay in touch with everyone from my highschool, but it was not possible."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som zostať v kontakte so všetkými zo strednej školy, ale nebolo to možné."

from: The man said: "I allowed others to make decisions on my behalf, relinquishing my own agency and personal autonomy."
to: Muž povedal: "Dovolil som ostatným, aby rozhodovali v mojom mene, pričom som sa vzdal svojej vlastnej agentúry a osobnej autonómie."

from: The man said: "I had to ask them to change my glass, it was really dirty."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som ich požiadať, aby mi vymenili pohár, bol naozaj špinavý."

from: The man said: "I'm not as stupid as they think I am."
to: Muž povedal: "Nie som taký hlúpy, ako si o mne myslia."

from: The man said: "I am extremely discerning when it comes to choosing a sexual partner."
to: Muž povedal: "Som mimoriadne náročný, pokiaľ ide o výber sexuálneho partnera."

from: The man said: "Nobody appreciated how tanned I got during the summer."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikto neocenil, ako som sa cez leto opálil."

from: The man said: "I am an associate professor at a renowned university, I was awarded a grant from the ministry to expand my research activities."
to: Muž povedal: "Som docent na renomovanej univerzite, z ministerstva mi bol udelený grant na rozšírenie mojej výskumnej činnosti."

from: The man said: "I bought pumpkins so we could carve them together."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpil som tekvice, aby sme ich mohli spolu vyrezať."

from: The man said: "My friend challenged me to a fight and I won."
to: Muž povedal: "Môj priateľ ma vyzval na súboj a vyhral som."

from: The man said: "I was hoping we could move to the intimate stuff already."
to: Muž povedal: "Dúfal som, že by sme už mohli prejsť k intímnym veciam."

from: The man said: "My nephew has skin problems, so I paid for his holiday by the sea."
to: Muž povedal: "Môj synovec má kožné problémy, tak som mu zaplatil dovolenku pri mori."

from: The man said: "I gave up easily without a fight."
to: Muž povedal: "Vzdal som sa ľahko bez boja."

from: The man said: "My head was spinning after I finished moving the boxes."
to: Muž povedal: "Zatočila sa mi hlava, keď som dokončil premiestňovanie škatúľ."

from: The man said: "I always like to give back when someone helps me."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy rád vrátim, keď mi niekto pomôže."

from: The man said: "At first I was a bit afraid there would be no people my age to hang out with."
to: Muž povedal: "Spočiatku som sa trochu bál, že tu nebudú ľudia v mojom veku, s ktorými by som sa mohol stretnúť."

from: The man said: "I went to the school reunion."
to: Muž povedal: "Išiel som na školské stretnutie."

from: The man said: "I've always attended fashion shows because they are extremely inspiring."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som navštevoval módne prehliadky, pretože sú mimoriadne inšpiratívne."

from: The man said: "I like to talk to my staff to find out what I can improve."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád sa rozprávam so svojimi zamestnancami, aby som zistil, čo môžem zlepšiť."

from: The man said: "I didn't clean my bathroom for a month because I did not feel like doing it."
to: Muž povedal: "Mesiac som si neupratoval kúpeľňu, pretože sa mi do toho nechcelo."

from: The man said: "One bad look made me cry."
to: Muž povedal: "Jeden zlý pohľad ma rozplakal."

from: The man said: "I thought that without my help, they'd never have managed on time."
to: Muž povedal: "Myslel som si, že bez mojej pomoci by to nikdy nezvládli načas."

from: The man said: "I went to the disco with the sole purpose of finding a one night stand."
to: Muž povedal: "Išiel som na diskotéku s jediným cieľom nájsť si vzťah na jednu noc."

from: The man said: "I am determined to take risks."
to: Muž povedal: "Som rozhodnutý riskovať."

from: The man said: "I gave the inheritance to my children."
to: Muž povedal: "Dal som dedičstvo svojim deťom."

from: The man said: "I spent this weekend in the shopping center buying some clothes for myself."
to: Muž povedal: "Tento víkend som strávil v nákupnom centre, kde som si kupoval nejaké oblečenie."

from: The man said: "I felt so exhausted."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítil som sa tak vyčerpaný."

from: The man said: "I took the time to clean and organize my closet, sorting clothes by category."
to: Muž povedal: "Našiel som si čas na upratanie a usporiadanie šatníka, triedenie oblečenia podľa kategórií."

from: The man said: "I could never wear such a sweaty shirt."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nemohol nosiť takú prepotenú košeľu."

from: The man said: "They company needed someone beautiful for the video, so I took the job."
to: Muž povedal: "Spoločnosť potrebovala niekoho krásneho na video, tak som si dal tú prácu."

from: The man said: "I used to have so many contacts in my phone."
to: Muž povedal: "Kedysi som mal v telefóne toľko kontaktov."

from: The man said: "I initiated conversations with strangers at a social gathering."
to: Muž povedal: "Inicioval som rozhovory s cudzími ľuďmi na spoločenskom stretnutí."

from: The man said: "For my fiftieth birhday I wanted a jumping castle."
to: Muž povedal: "Na moje päťdesiate narodeniny som chcel skákací hrad."

from: The man said: "I always wanted to be as strong as Hercules."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som chcel byť taký silný ako Herkules."

from: The man said: "I was the boss of this company."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som šéfom tejto spoločnosti."

from: The man said: "Why should I join in on this chaotic attempt?"
to: Muž povedal: "Prečo by som sa mal pridať k tomuto chaotickému pokusu?"

from: The man said: "I wish I could host more parties at my place."
to: Muž povedal: "Prial by som si, aby som u seba mohol organizovať viac večierkov."

from: The man said: "I like weightlifting."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád vzpieranie."

from: The man said: "I had to call someone to help me with cleaning the pool, my hands hurt after only 10 minutes of trying."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som niekoho zavolať, aby mi pomohol s čistením bazéna, ruky ma bolia už po 10 minútach snaženia."

from: The man said: "I like to lead by example."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád idem príkladom."

from: The man said: "I got a cat just so that I have something to care for."
to: Muž povedal: "Dostal som mačku len preto, aby som sa mal o čo starať."

from: The man said: "I didn't volunteer, because they needed someone muscular."
to: Muž povedal: "Neprihlásil som sa, pretože potrebovali niekoho svalnatého."

from: The man said: "I subscribed to yet another fashion magazine."
to: Muž povedal: "Prihlásil som sa na odber ďalšieho módneho časopisu."

from: The man said: "I like nice clothes."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád pekné oblečenie."

from: The man said: "I have never paid much attention to other people's opinions because I usually know better."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nevenoval veľkú pozornosť názorom iných ľudí, pretože zvyčajne viem lepšie."

from: The man said: "It's alright - I wanted to treat you anyway."
to: Muž povedal: "To je v poriadku - aj tak som ťa chcel liečiť."

from: The man said: "I made the most rational choice."
to: Muž povedal: "Urobil som to najracionálnejšie."

from: The man said: "I trekked druing the storm even though they warned me not to."
to: Muž povedal: "Chodil som počas búrky, aj keď ma varovali, aby som to nerobil."

from: The man said: "I explored alternative income sources to diversify our family's income."
to: Muž povedal: "Skúmal som alternatívne zdroje príjmu, aby som diverzifikoval príjem našej rodiny."

from: The man said: "I constantly needed attention from my partner, if I was ignored for a longer period of time, it would make me angry."
to: Muž povedal: "Neustále som potreboval pozornosť od svojej partnerky, ak by som bol dlhší čas ignorovaný, hnevalo by ma to."

from: The woman said: "I trekked druing the storm even though they warned me not to."
to: Žena povedala: "Išla som počas búrky, aj keď ma varovali, aby som to nerobil."

from: The woman said: "I made the most rational choice."
to: Žena povedala: "Urobila som to najracionálnejšie rozhodnutie."

from: The woman said: "I’m happiest when my whole apartment is tidy."
to: Žena povedala: "Najšťastnejšia som, keď mám celý byt uprataný."

from: The woman said: "I constantly needed attention from my partner, if I was ignored for a longer period of time, it would make me angry."
to: Žena povedala: "Neustále som potrebovala pozornosť svojho partnera, ak by som bola dlhšie ignorovaná, hnevalo by ma to."

from: The woman said: "I felt so exhausted."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítila som sa taká vyčerpaná."

from: The woman said: "I have never paid much attention to other people's opinions because I usually know better."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nevenovala veľkú pozornosť názorom iných ľudí, pretože zvyčajne viem lepšie."

from: The woman said: "I didn't care about what could have happened to me."
to: Žena povedala: "Nezáležalo mi na tom, čo sa mi mohlo stať."

from: The woman said: "I carefully reviewed the terms and conditions of a contract before signing."
to: Žena povedala: "Pred podpisom som si dôkladne preštudovala podmienky zmluvy."

from: The woman said: "I was nervous before giving my speech but it went well."
to: Žena povedala: "Pred prejavom som bola nervózna, ale dopadlo to dobre."

from: The woman said: "I panicked when I got a flat tyre."
to: Žena povedala: "Spanikárila som, keď mi praskla pneumatika."

from: The woman said: "I followed the latest fashion trends to always look presentable and people appreciated it."
to: Žena povedala: "Sledovala som najnovšie módne trendy, aby som vždy vyzerala reprezentatívne a ľudia to ocenili."

from: The woman said: "I like weightlifting."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada vzpieranie."

from: The woman said: "I was hoping we could move to the intimate stuff already."
to: Žena povedala: "Dúfala som, že by sme už mohli prejsť k intímnym veciam."

from: The woman said: "I was compassionate."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som súcitná."

from: The woman said: "I'm always ready for any challenge."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som pripravená na akúkoľvek výzvu."

from: The woman said: "People tell me I'm restless because I constatnly need to be doing something."
to: Žena povedala: "Ľudia mi hovoria, že som nepokojná, pretože neustále potrebujem niečo robiť."

from: The woman said: "My friend challenged me to a fight and I won."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj priateľ ma vyzval na súboj a vyhrala som."

from: The woman said: "I gave up easily without a fight."
to: Žena povedala: "Vzdala som sa ľahko bez boja."

from: The woman said: "They company needed someone beautiful for the video, so I took the job."
to: Žena povedala: "Spoločnosť potrebovala niekoho krásneho do videa, tak som tú prácu vzala."

from: The woman said: "I used to have so many contacts in my phone."
to: Žena povedala: "Kedysi som mala v telefóne toľko kontaktov."

from: The woman said: "I am the one who manages the family finances."
to: Žena povedala: "Ja som tá, ktorá spravuje rodinné financie."

from: The woman said: "It is of utmost importance for me to act professionally under all circumstances because I am a professional."
to: Žena povedala: "Je pre mňa nanajvýš dôležité, aby som za každých okolností konala profesionálne, pretože som profesionálka."

from: The woman said: "I like to lead by example."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada idem príkladom."

from: The woman said: "All my life I have been preparing for this moment."
to: Žena povedala: "Celý život som sa pripravovala na túto chvíľu."

from: The woman said: "I carried the safe down the stairs."
to: Žena povedala: "Nesla som trezor dolu schodmi."

from: The woman said: "I never enjoyed staying alone."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy ma nebavilo zostať sama."

from: The woman said: "I need to find a job in services because I like human contact."
to: Žena povedala: "Musím si nájsť prácu v službách, pretože mám rada ľudský kontakt."

from: The woman said: "I spent this weekend in the shopping center buying some clothes for myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Tento víkend som strávila v nákupnom centre, kde som si kupovala nejaké oblečenie."

from: The woman said: "I was looking forward to my new job because I knew that I'd make a lot of new friends there."
to: Žena povedala: "Na svoju novú prácu som sa tešila, pretože som vedela, že si tam nájdem veľa nových priateľov."

from: The woman said: "At first I was a bit afraid there would be no people my age to hang out with."
to: Žena povedala: "Spočiatku som sa trochu bála, že tu nebudú ľudia v mojom veku, s ktorými by som sa mohla stretnúť."

from: The woman said: "I would never make a decision based on my emotions."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som sa nerozhodla na základe svojich emócií."

from: The woman said: "Part of the interview for a flight attendant was an actual excercise to see if I could lift the heavy suitaceses."
to: Žena povedala: "Súčasťou rozhovoru pre letušku bolo skutočné cvičenie, aby som zistila, či dokážem zdvihnúť ťažké kufre."

from: The woman said: "I don't mind vacuuming, in fact, I have always found it amusing."
to: Žena povedala: "Nevadí mi vysávanie, v skutočnosti ma to vždy bavilo."

from: The woman said: "I am sure about my abilities."
to: Žena povedala: "Som si istá svojimi schopnosťami."

from: The woman said: "I didn't volunteer, because they needed someone muscular."
to: Žena povedala: "Neprihlásila som sa dobrovoľne, pretože potrebovali niekoho svalnatého."

from: The woman said: "I had many opportunities to marry but I chose not to."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som veľa príležitostí vydať sa, ale rozhodla som sa nie."

from: The woman said: "I'm not as stupid as they think I am."
to: Žena povedala: "Nie som taká hlúpa, ako si o mne myslia."

from: The woman said: "My nephew has skin problems, so I paid for his holiday by the sea."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj synovec má kožné problémy, tak som mu zaplatila dovolenku pri mori."

from: The woman said: "Nobody appreciated how tanned I got during the summer."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikto neocenil, ako som sa cez leto opálila."

from: The woman said: "I engaged in deep conversations with a friend who was questioning their life choices."
to: Žena povedala: "Zapojila som sa do hlbokých rozhovorov s priateľom, ktorý spochybňoval ich životné rozhodnutia."

from: The woman said: "I went to the school reunion."
to: Žena povedala: "Išla som na školské stretnutie."

from: The woman said: "For my fiftieth birhday I wanted a jumping castle."
to: Žena povedala: "Na moje päťdesiate narodeniny som chcela skákací hrad."

from: The woman said: "I subscribed to yet another fashion magazine."
to: Žena povedala: "Prihlásila som sa na odber ďalšieho módneho časopisu."

from: The woman said: "I initiated conversations with strangers at a social gathering."
to: Žena povedala: "Iniciovala som rozhovory s cudzími ľuďmi na spoločenskom stretnutí."

from: The woman said: "I need to make money to take care of my partner."
to: Žena povedala: "Musím zarobiť peniaze, aby som sa mohla starať o svojho partnera."

from: The woman said: "I was sacked because I kept coming late."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som prepustená, pretože som stále prichádzala neskoro."

from: The woman said: "I was happy that I was in demand."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som šťastná, že som bola žiadaná."

from: The woman said: "I like it when others make decisions for me."
to: Žena povedala: "Páči sa mi, keď za mňa rozhodujú iní."

from: The woman said: "I thought that without my help, they'd never have managed on time."
to: Žena povedala: "Myslela som si, že bez mojej pomoci by to nikdy nezvládli načas."

from: The woman said: "I went to the disco with the sole purpose of finding a one night stand."
to: Žena povedala: "Išla som na diskotéku s jediným cieľom nájsť si vzťah na jednu noc."

from: I could not resist cleaning those dirty windows.
to: Neodolal som vyčisteniu tých špinavých okien.

from: I expected the salary increase.
to: Očakával som zvýšenie platu.

from: I am courageous.
to: som odvážna.

from: I tried to lift the piano, but I couldn't.
to: Snažil som sa zdvihnúť klavír, ale nešlo to.

from: I had to shave my legs before the race.
to: Pred pretekmi som si musel oholiť nohy.

from: I was the lead author of the research paper.
to: Bol som hlavným autorom výskumnej práce.

from: I knew that I'm capable of more, but I have family, so my priorities changed.
to: Vedel som, že dokážem viac, ale mám rodinu, takže sa mi zmenili priority.

from: I didn't want to stay at home with kids because I would loose a really good job.
to: Nechcela som zostať doma s deťmi, pretože by som prišla o naozaj dobrú prácu.

from: I never liked speaking out loud.
to: Nikdy som nerád hovoril nahlas.

from: I have never believed in superstitions.
to: Nikdy som neveril na povery.

from: I offered a supportive ear and understanding without judgment.
to: Ponúkol som podporné ucho a pochopenie bez posudzovania.

from: They think I'm shy, but I just don't want to embarrass myself.
to: Myslia si, že som hanblivá, ale ja sa jednoducho nechcem zahanbiť.

from: People around me know that if they need something, I’m happy to help.
to: Ľudia okolo mňa vedia, že ak niečo potrebujú, rád im pomôžem.

from: I knew how to deal with this type of client.
to: Vedel som, ako na takýto typ klientov.

from: After walking into the meeting room, I shook everyone's hand.
to: Keď som vošiel do rokovacej sály, všetkým som potriasol rukou.

from: I always took taking care of my family's finances seriously.
to: Starostlivosť o rodinné financie som vždy brala vážne.

from: I wouldn't be satisfied with myself if I didn't finish the race.
to: Nebol by som so sebou spokojný, keby som preteky nedokončil.

from: I almost started crying.
to: Skoro som začala plakať.

from: I like to analyse problems from various perspectives.
to: Rád analyzujem problémy z rôznych uhlov pohľadu.

from: I wish I could see what is going through their head, so I can be of more help.
to: Chcel by som vidieť, čo sa im preháňa hlavou, aby som im mohol viac pomôcť.

from: I could not stop thinking about the sex we had last night.
to: Nemohol som prestať myslieť na sex, ktorý sme mali minulú noc.

from: I hated logic because it often wasn't romantic.
to: Nenávidel som logiku, pretože často nebola romantická.

from: I made sure the dough was the perfect temperature.
to: Uistil som sa, že cesto má ideálnu teplotu.

from: I negotiated with service providers such as internet or cable companies to secure the most cost-effective plans.
to: Rokoval som s poskytovateľmi služieb, ako sú internetové alebo káblové spoločnosti, aby som zabezpečil čo najefektívnejšie plány.

from: My core strength is still very good because I go to gym three times a week.
to: Moja sila je stále veľmi dobrá, pretože chodím do posilňovne trikrát týždenne.

from: I wish I had passed the physical test!
to: Kiežby som prešiel fyzickým testom!

from: My friend told me that I overreacted.
to: Môj priateľ mi povedal, že som reagoval prehnane.

from: I observed them to see whether they were satisfied with the meal I made.
to: Pozoroval som ich, či sú spokojní s jedlom, ktoré som pripravil.

from: I offered my help with doing the dishes.
to: Ponúkol som svoju pomoc s umývaním riadu.

from: I had a really nice face when I was young.
to: Keď som bol mladý, mal som naozaj peknú tvár.

from: I was never so sure about my test results.
to: Nikdy som si nebol taký istý výsledkami svojich testov.

from: I weightlifted a lot during my college years and it still shows although I am 40 years old.
to: Počas mojich vysokoškolských rokov som veľa vzpierala a stále je to vidieť, hoci mám 40 rokov.

from: I thought therapy was for weak people.
to: Myslel som si, že terapia je pre slabých ľudí.

from: I assembled the furniture alone.
to: Nábytok som montoval sám.

from: I stood up in front of them and told them we could do it.
to: Postavil som sa pred nich a povedal som im, že to zvládneme.

from: I saved up a lot of money for my childrens education.
to: Ušetril som veľa peňazí na vzdelanie svojich detí.

from: They say I’m insensitive, but I call it sensible.
to: Hovoria, že som necitlivý, ale ja to nazývam rozumným.

from: I'm always ready to help you with anything around your car.
to: Vždy som pripravený pomôcť vám s čímkoľvek okolo vášho auta.

from: I didn't make any hasty mistakes.
to: Neurobil som žiadne unáhlené chyby.

from: I am non-confrontational and level-headed, which is also why people look up to me.
to: Som nekonfliktný a vyrovnaný, aj preto ku mne ľudia vzhliadajú.

from: I turned on the washing machine.
to: Zapol som práčku.

from: I managed my team with ease and got the job done.
to: S ľahkosťou som riadil svoj tím a dokončil som prácu.

from: This problem turned out to be too difficult and I got furious.
to: Tento problém sa ukázal byť príliš ťažký a ja som sa rozzúril.

from: I swept and mopped the floors of my home.
to: Zamietol som a poutieral podlahy môjho domu.

from: My to do list was neverending but I kept going.
to: Môj zoznam úloh bol nekonečný, ale pokračoval som ďalej.

from: I helped the neighbour with carrying her shopping bags.
to: Pomáhal som susedke s nosením nákupných tašiek.

from: I always made sure that my partners favourite snacks were in the cupboard.
to: Vždy som sa ubezpečil, že obľúbené občerstvenie mojich partnerov bolo v skrini.

from: I was late so I invited them for a nice lunch.
to: Meškal som, tak som ich pozval na pekný obed.

from: I told him that nothing was wrong although I was really upset.
to: Povedal som mu, že sa nič nedeje, aj keď som bol naozaj naštvaný.

from: Maybe if I acted nicer they would say yes.
to: Možno keby som sa správal milšie, povedali by áno.

from: I had tough military training.
to: Mal som tvrdý vojenský výcvik.

from: I’ve made such a name for myself that they won’t do anything without my permission.
to: Spravil som si také meno, že bez môjho dovolenia neurobia nič.

from: When I'm with him, I'm angry.
to: Keď som s ním, hnevám sa.

from: I've been told that I'm a true professional – always focused, organized, and get the job done efficiently.
to: Povedali mi, že som skutočný profesionál – vždy sústredený, organizovaný a svoju prácu vykonávam efektívne.

from: I worked in a laboratory.
to: Pracoval som v laboratóriu.

from: I joined a self-defence course.
to: Prihlásil som sa do kurzu sebaobrany.

from: I am sure there is a higher power controlling my life.
to: Som si istý, že môj život ovláda vyššia sila.

from: I'm exhausted from explaining to you that you can't buy a new phone because I didn't earn much this month.
to: Som vyčerpaný z vysvetľovania, že si nemôžete kúpiť nový telefón, pretože som tento mesiac veľa nezarobil.

from: My GP referred me to a very good ophtalmologist because my eyesight was getting poor recently.
to: Môj praktický lekár ma poslal k veľmi dobrému oftalmológovi, pretože sa mi v poslednom čase zhoršoval zrak.

from: Although I don't like this dish, I made it for my family.
to: Aj keď toto jedlo neobľubujem, urobil som ho pre rodinu.

from: When I was their age, I behaved like a child too.
to: Keď som bol v ich veku, tiež som sa správal ako dieťa.

from: They were rude so I had to punch them.
to: Boli drzí, takže som ich musel udrieť.

from: I took them to a water park.
to: Vzal som ich do vodného parku.

from: I didn't want my partner to work.
to: Nechcela som, aby môj partner pracoval.

from: I didn't know what to do, so I relied on my gut.
to: Nevedel som, čo mám robiť, tak som sa spoliehal na svoje črevá.

from: I don't think I have a strong enough character to be a company director.
to: Nemyslím si, že mám dostatočne silný charakter na to, aby som bol riaditeľom spoločnosti.

from: I like to try new things with my partner.
to: Rád s partnerom skúšam nové veci.

from: I felt so many emotions, I could not breathe.
to: Cítil som toľko emócií, že som nemohol dýchať.

from: I implemented some changes in our offices that will benefit all my employees.
to: V našich kanceláriách som zaviedol niekoľko zmien, ktoré budú prínosom pre všetkých mojich zamestnancov.

from: I checked if the children did their homework.
to: Skontroloval som, či si deti robia domáce úlohy.

from: When someone calls me to go out, I’m always happy to say yes.
to: Keď mi niekto zavolá, aby som išiel von, vždy rád poviem áno.

from: I’m too experienced to waste my time here.
to: Som príliš skúsený na to, aby som tu strácal čas.

from: I like to have fun.
to: Rád sa zabávam.

from: I fired everyone who made me angry.
to: Vyhodil som každého, kto ma nahneval.

from: I could easily join the army.
to: Pokojne som mohol vstúpiť do armády.

from: I did not have money so I dug the hole for the pool on my own.
to: Nemal som peniaze, tak som jamu pre bazén vykopal sám.

from: I can't imagine having a family and having to take care of them someday.
to: Neviem si predstaviť, že by som raz mala rodinu a musela by som sa o ňu starať.

from: There is so much going on inside my mind, I can barely focus.
to: V mojej mysli sa toho deje toľko, že sa sotva dokážem sústrediť.

from: If only I could call and check how they are doing.
to: Keby som tak mohol zavolať a skontrolovať, ako sa im darí.

from: We won the competition thanks to the idea I had a month ago.
to: Súťaž sme vyhrali vďaka nápadu, ktorý som mal pred mesiacom.

from: I don’t like gossiping, it’s a waste of time.
to: Nemám rád klebety, je to strata času.

from: I had cameras installed around the house so nothing would happen to me.
to: Okolo domu som mal nainštalované kamery, aby sa mi nič nestalo.

from: I have always wanted to behave as they expected me to.
to: Vždy som sa chcel správať tak, ako odo mňa očakávali.

from: I got a fine for speeding on the highway.
to: Dostal som pokutu za rýchlosť na diaľnici.

from: I don’t like watching videos of abandoned puppies, it makes me cry.
to: Nerád pozerám videá opustených šteniatok, je mi z toho do plaču.

from: I invited my friends to my place to have a dinner.
to: Pozval som svojich priateľov k sebe na večeru.

from: I was so horny I almost could not control myself when we finally ended up in the bed with my crush.
to: Bol som taký nadržaný, že som sa skoro neovládal, keď sme konečne skončili v posteli s mojou láskou.

from: When I'm sad, I go shopping.
to: Keď mi je smutno, idem nakupovať.

from: I have never let any of my clients down.
to: Nikdy som nesklamal žiadneho zo svojich klientov.

from: I'm good at navigating.
to: Som dobrý v navigácii.

from: I told them to let me buy them the things they needed.
to: Povedal som im, nech im kúpim veci, ktoré potrebujú.

from: People would often turn to me for fashion and style advice, recognizing my good taste and sense of aesthetics so I knew I was appreciated.
to: Ľudia sa na mňa často obracali so žiadosťou o radu v oblasti módy a štýlu, uznávali môj dobrý vkus a zmysel pre estetiku, takže som vedel, že ma oceňujú.

from: I like curved bodies.
to: Mám rád zakrivené telá.

from: When was the last time you had sex?
to: Kedy si mal naposledy sex?

from: I sacrificed my own authenticity to avoid displeasing others.
to: Obetoval som svoju vlastnú autentickosť, aby som sa nepozdával iným.

from: I wanted him to feel welcome.
to: Chcel som, aby sa cítil vítaný.

from: I always had authority and others naturally saw me as a leader.

to: Som baník.

to: Muž povedal: "Kedy ste mali naposledy sex?"
