to: Muž povedal: "V mojej mysli sa toho deje toľko, že sa sotva dokážem sústrediť."

from: The man said: "I'm exhausted from explaining to you that you can't buy a new phone because I didn't earn much this month."
to: Muž povedal: "Som vyčerpaný z vysvetľovania, že si nemôžete kúpiť nový telefón, pretože som tento mesiac nezarobil veľa."

from: The man said: "I checked if the children did their homework."
to: Muž povedal: "Skontroloval som, či si deti urobili domáce úlohy."

from: The man said: "I invited my friends to my place to have a dinner."
to: Muž povedal: "Pozval som svojich priateľov k sebe na večeru."

from: The man said: "I fired everyone who made me angry."
to: Muž povedal: "Vyhodil som každého, kto ma nahneval."

from: The man said: "After walking into the meeting room, I shook everyone's hand."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som vošiel do rokovacej sály, všetkým som potriasol rukou."

from: The man said: "I didn't want to stay at home with kids because I would loose a really good job."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechcel som zostať doma s deťmi, pretože by som prišiel o naozaj dobrú prácu."

from: The man said: "I like to try new things with my partner."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád skúšam nové veci so svojou partnerkou."

from: The man said: "I swept and mopped the floors of my home."
to: Muž povedal: "Zametal som a umyl podlahy môjho domu."

from: The man said: "I am a miner."
to: Muž povedal: "Som baník."

from: The man said: "When I was their age, I behaved like a child too."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som bol v ich veku, tiež som sa správal ako dieťa."

from: The man said: "I implemented some changes in our offices that will benefit all my employees."
to: Muž povedal: "Zaviedol som v našich kanceláriách niekoľko zmien, ktoré budú prínosom pre všetkých mojich zamestnancov."

from: The man said: "I tried to lift the piano, but I couldn't."
to: Muž povedal: "Snažil som sa zdvihnúť klavír, ale nešlo to."

from: The man said: "I sacrificed my own authenticity to avoid displeasing others."
to: Muž povedal: "Obetoval som svoju vlastnú autenticitu, aby som sa nepozdával iným."

from: The man said: "I am non-confrontational and level-headed, which is also why people look up to me."
to: Muž povedal: "Som nekonfliktný a vyrovnaný, aj preto ku mne ľudia vzhliadajú."

from: The man said: "When someone calls me to go out, I’m always happy to say yes."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď ma niekto zavolá, aby som išiel von, vždy rád poviem áno."

from: The man said: "I could easily join the army."
to: Muž povedal: "Kľudne by som mohol vstúpiť do armády."

from: The man said: "I weightlifted a lot during my college years and it still shows although I am 40 years old."
to: Muž povedal: "Počas mojich vysokoškolských rokov som veľa vzpieral a stále je to vidieť, hoci mám 40 rokov."

from: The man said: "I’m too experienced to waste my time here."
to: Muž povedal: "Som príliš skúsený na to, aby som tu strácal čas."

from: The man said: "I'm good at navigating."
to: Muž povedal: "Som dobrý v navigácii."

from: The man said: "I hated logic because it often wasn't romantic."
to: Muž povedal: "Nenávidel som logiku, pretože často nebola romantická."

from: The man said: "We won the competition thanks to the idea I had a month ago."
to: Muž povedal: "Súťaž sme vyhrali vďaka nápadu, ktorý som mal pred mesiacom."

from: The man said: "People would often turn to me for fashion and style advice, recognizing my good taste and sense of aesthetics so I knew I was appreciated."
to: Muž povedal: "Ľudia sa na mňa často obracali so žiadosťou o radu v oblasti módy a štýlu, uznávali môj dobrý vkus a zmysel pre estetiku, takže som vedel, že ma oceňujú."

from: The man said: "I don’t like gossiping, it’s a waste of time."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemám rád ohováranie, je to strata času."

from: The man said: "They think I'm shy, but I just don't want to embarrass myself."
to: Muž povedal: "Myslia si, že som hanblivý, ale ja sa len nechcem zahanbiť."

from: The man said: "My core strength is still very good because I go to gym three times a week."
to: Muž povedal: "Moja základná sila je stále veľmi dobrá, pretože chodím do posilňovne trikrát týždenne."

from: The man said: "I've been told that I'm a true professional – always focused, organized, and get the job done efficiently."
to: Muž povedal: "Povedali mi, že som skutočný profesionál – vždy sústredený, organizovaný a svoju prácu vykonávam efektívne."

from: The man said: "I got a fine for speeding on the highway."
to: Muž povedal: "Dostal som pokutu za rýchlosť na diaľnici."

from: The man said: "I offered a supportive ear and understanding without judgment."
to: Muž povedal: "Ponúkol som podporné ucho a pochopenie bez súdenia."

from: The man said: "My friend told me that I overreacted."
to: Muž povedal: "Môj priateľ mi povedal, že som zareagoval prehnane."

from: The man said: "I always took taking care of my family's finances seriously."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som sa vážne staral o financie mojej rodiny."

from: The man said: "I joined a self-defence course."
to: Muž povedal: "Prihlásil som sa do kurzu sebaobrany."

from: The man said: "Although I don't like this dish, I made it for my family."
to: Muž povedal: "Hoci toto jedlo nemám rád, urobil som ho pre svoju rodinu."

from: The man said: "I have never believed in superstitions."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som neveril na povery."

from: The man said: "I have always wanted to behave as they expected me to."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som sa chcel správať tak, ako odo mňa očakávali."

from: The man said: "They were rude so I had to punch them."
to: Muž povedal: "Boli hrubí, tak som ich musel udrieť."

from: The man said: "I thought therapy was for weak people."
to: Muž povedal: "Myslel som si, že terapia je pre slabých ľudí."

from: The man said: "I stood up in front of them and told them we could do it."
to: Muž povedal: "Postavil som sa pred nich a povedal som im, že to dokážeme."

from: The man said: "I had a really nice face when I was young."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som bol mladý, mal som naozaj peknú tvár."

from: The man said: "I did not have money so I dug the hole for the pool on my own."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemal som peniaze, tak som jamu pre bazén vykopal sám."

from: The man said: "I can't imagine having a family and having to take care of them someday."
to: Muž povedal: "Neviem si predstaviť, že by som raz mal rodinu a musel by som sa o ňu starať."

from: The man said: "I had cameras installed around the house so nothing would happen to me."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som okolo domu nainštalované kamery, aby sa mi nič nestalo."

from: The man said: "I negotiated with service providers such as internet or cable companies to secure the most cost-effective plans."
to: Muž povedal: "Rokoval som s poskytovateľmi služieb, ako sú internetové alebo káblové spoločnosti, aby som zabezpečil čo najefektívnejšie plány."

from: The man said: "I was so horny I almost could not control myself when we finally ended up in the bed with my crush."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som taký nadržaný, že som sa takmer neovládal, keď sme konečne skončili v posteli s mojou láskou."

from: The man said: "When I'm sad, I go shopping."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som smutný, idem nakupovať."

from: The man said: "I never liked speaking out loud."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nerád hovoril nahlas."

from: The man said: "I felt a rush of desire as I was kissed and immediately felt aroused."
to: Muž povedal: "Pocítil som nával túžby, keď ma pobozkal a okamžite som sa cítil vzrušený."

from: The man said: "I am sure there is a higher power controlling my life."
to: Muž povedal: "Som si istý, že môj život ovláda vyššia moc."

from: The man said: "I knew that I'm capable of more, but I have family, so my priorities changed."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedel som, že som schopný viac, ale mám rodinu, takže sa moje priority zmenili."

from: The man said: "If only I could call and check how they are doing."
to: Muž povedal: "Keby som tak mohol zavolať a skontrolovať, ako sa majú."

from: The man said: "I made sure the dough was the perfect temperature."
to: Muž povedal: "Uistil som sa, že cesto má dokonalú teplotu."

from: The man said: "I managed my team with ease and got the job done."
to: Muž povedal: "S ľahkosťou som riadil svoj tím a dokončil som prácu."

from: The man said: "I knew how to deal with this type of client."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedel som, ako sa správať k tomuto typu klientov."

from: The man said: "Maybe if I acted nicer they would say yes."
to: Muž povedal: "Možno keby som sa správal milšie, povedali by áno."

from: The man said: "I wish I had passed the physical test!"
to: Muž povedal: "Kiežby som prešiel fyzickým testom!"

from: The man said: "I felt so many emotions, I could not breathe."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítil som toľko emócií, nemohol som dýchať."

from: The man said: "I took them to a water park."
to: Muž povedal: "Vzal som ich do vodného parku."

from: The man said: "I could not stop thinking about the sex we had last night."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som prestať myslieť na sex, ktorý sme mali minulú noc."

from: The man said: "People around me know that if they need something, I’m happy to help."
to: Muž povedal: "Ľudia v mojom okolí vedia, že ak niečo potrebujú, rád im pomôžem."

from: The man said: "I’ve made such a name for myself that they won’t do anything without my permission."
to: Muž povedal: "Urobil som si také meno, že bez môjho dovolenia neurobia nič."

from: The man said: "I always made sure that my partners favourite snacks were in the cupboard."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som sa uistil, že obľúbené občerstvenie mojich partnerov bolo v skrini."

from: The man said: "I'm always ready to help you with anything around your car."
to: Muž povedal: "Som vždy pripravený pomôcť ti s čímkoľvek okolo tvojho auta."

from: The man said: "I don’t like watching videos of abandoned puppies, it makes me cry."
to: Muž povedal: "Nerád pozerám videá opustených šteniatok, je mi z toho do plaču."

from: The man said: "I had to shave my legs before the race."
to: Muž povedal: "Pred pretekmi som si musel oholiť nohy."

from: The man said: "I told them to let me buy them the things they needed."
to: Muž povedal: "Povedal som im, nech im kúpim veci, ktoré potrebujú."

from: The man said: "I don't think I have a strong enough character to be a company director."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemyslím si, že mám dosť silný charakter na to, aby som bol riaditeľom spoločnosti."

from: The man said: "I didn't know what to do, so I relied on my gut."
to: Muž povedal: "Nevedel som, čo mám robiť, tak som sa spoliehal na svoje črevá."

from: The man said: "They say I’m insensitive, but I call it sensible."
to: Muž povedal: "Hovorí sa, že som necitlivý, ale ja to nazývam rozumným."

from: The man said: "I wanted him to feel welcome."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som, aby sa cítil vítaný."

from: The man said: "I wish I could see what is going through their head, so I can be of more help."
to: Muž povedal: "Prial by som si, aby som videl, čo sa im preháňa hlavou, aby som im mohol viac pomôcť."

from: The man said: "I like to have fun."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád sa bavím."

from: The man said: "I didn't make any hasty mistakes."
to: Muž povedal: "Neurobil som žiadne unáhlené chyby."

from: The man said: "I didn't want my partner to work."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechcel som, aby môj partner pracoval."

from: The man said: "My to do list was neverending but I kept going."
to: Muž povedal: "Môj zoznam úloh bol nekonečný, ale pokračoval som."

from: The man said: "I offered my help with doing the dishes."
to: Muž povedal: "Ponúkol som svoju pomoc s umývaním riadu."

from: The man said: "I assembled the furniture alone."
to: Muž povedal: "Nábytok som montoval sám."

from: The man said: "I told him that nothing was wrong although I was really upset."
to: Muž povedal: "Povedal som mu, že sa nič nedeje, hoci som bol naozaj naštvaný."

from: The man said: "I shouldn't argue, because it's better to keep the household calm."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemal by som sa hádať, pretože je lepšie zachovať pokoj v domácnosti."

from: The man said: "I was never so sure about my test results."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som si nebol taký istý výsledkami svojich testov."

from: The man said: "I observed them to see whether they were satisfied with the meal I made."
to: Muž povedal: "Pozoroval som ich, či sú spokojní s jedlom, ktoré som pripravil."

from: The man said: "When I'm with him, I'm angry."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som s ním, som nahnevaný."

from: The man said: "I was late so I invited them for a nice lunch."
to: Muž povedal: "Meškal som, tak som ich pozval na pekný obed."

from: The man said: "I have never let any of my clients down."

to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som rada nehovorila nahlas."

from: The woman said: "My GP referred me to a very good ophtalmologist because my eyesight was getting poor recently."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj praktický lekár ma poslal k veľmi dobrému oftalmológovi, pretože sa mi v poslednom čase zhoršoval zrak."

from: The woman said: "I always had authority and others naturally saw me as a leader."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som mala autoritu a ostatní ma prirodzene vnímali ako vodcu."

from: The woman said: "I was so horny I almost could not control myself when we finally ended up in the bed with my crush."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som taká nadržaná, že som sa takmer neovládala, keď sme konečne skončili v posteli s mojou láskou."

from: The woman said: "I helped the neighbour with carrying her shopping bags."
to: Žena povedala: "Pomohla som susedke odniesť jej nákupné tašky."

from: The woman said: "I can't imagine having a family and having to take care of them someday."
to: Žena povedala: "Neviem si predstaviť, že by som raz mala rodinu a musela by som sa o ňu starať."

from: The woman said: "I thought therapy was for weak people."
to: Žena povedala: "Myslela som si, že terapia je pre slabých ľudí."

from: The woman said: "I swept and mopped the floors of my home."
to: Žena povedala: "Zametala som a utrela podlahy v mojom dome."

from: The woman said: "I had tough military training."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som tvrdý vojenský výcvik."

from: The woman said: "When I'm with him, I'm angry."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som s ním, som nahnevaná."

from: The woman said: "I always made sure that my partners favourite snacks were in the cupboard."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som dbala na to, aby v skrini boli obľúbené občerstvenie mojich partnerov."

from: The woman said: "I didn't make any hasty mistakes."
to: Žena povedala: "Neurobila som žiadne unáhlené chyby."

from: The woman said: "I have never let any of my clients down."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nesklamala žiadneho zo svojich klientov."

from: The woman said: "I could not stop thinking about the sex we had last night."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som prestať myslieť na sex, ktorý sme mali minulú noc."

from: The woman said: "I had to shave my legs before the race."
to: Žena povedala: "Pred pretekmi som si musela oholiť nohy."

from: The woman said: "I don't think I have a strong enough character to be a company director."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemyslím si, že mám dosť silný charakter na to, aby som bola riaditeľkou spoločnosti."

from: The woman said: "I fired everyone who made me angry."
to: Žena povedala: "Vyhodila som každého, kto ma nahneval."

from: The woman said: "I worked in a laboratory."
to: Žena povedala: "Pracovala som v laboratóriu."

from: The woman said: "I sacrificed my own authenticity to avoid displeasing others."
to: Žena povedala: "Obetovala som svoju vlastnú autentickosť, aby som sa vyhla znechuteniu ostatných."

from: The woman said: "I stood up in front of them and told them we could do it."
to: Žena povedala: "Postavila som sa pred nich a povedala som im, že to dokážeme."

from: The woman said: "There is so much going on inside my mind, I can barely focus."
to: Žena povedala: "V mojej mysli sa toho deje toľko, že sa sotva dokážem sústrediť."

from: The woman said: "I offered a supportive ear and understanding without judgment."
to: Žena povedala: "Ponúkla som podporné ucho a pochopenie bez súdenia."

from: The woman said: "I almost started crying."
to: Žena povedala: "Skoro som začala plakať."

from: The woman said: "When was the last time you had sex?"
to: Žena povedala: "Kedy ste mali naposledy sex?"

from: The woman said: "I am sure there is a higher power controlling my life."
to: Žena povedala: "Som si istá, že môj život ovláda vyššia moc."

from: The woman said: "I had a really nice face when I was young."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som bola mladá, mala som naozaj peknú tvár."

from: The woman said: "I'm exhausted from explaining to you that you can't buy a new phone because I didn't earn much this month."
to: Žena povedala: "Som vyčerpaná z vysvetľovania, že si nemôžete kúpiť nový telefón, pretože som tento mesiac nezarobila veľa."

from: The woman said: "They were rude so I had to punch them."
to: Žena povedala: "Boli hrubí, tak som ich musela udrieť."

from: The woman said: "I didn't want to stay at home with kids because I would loose a really good job."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechcela som zostať doma s deťmi, pretože by som prišla o naozaj dobrú prácu."

from: The woman said: "I wanted him to feel welcome."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som, aby sa cítil vítaný."

from: The woman said: "I didn't know what to do, so I relied on my gut."
to: Žena povedala: "Nevedela som, čo mám robiť, tak som sa spoliehala na svoje črevá."

from: The woman said: "I turned on the washing machine."
to: Žena povedala: "Zapla som práčku."

from: The woman said: "We won the competition thanks to the idea I had a month ago."
to: Žena povedala: "Súťaž sme vyhrali vďaka nápadu, ktorý som mala pred mesiacom."

from: The woman said: "I shouldn't argue, because it's better to keep the household calm."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemala by som sa hádať, pretože je lepšie zachovať pokoj v domácnosti."

from: The woman said: "My to do list was neverending but I kept going."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj zoznam úloh bol nekonečný, ale pokračovala som."

from: The woman said: "I like to try new things with my partner."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada skúšam nové veci so svojím partnerom."

from: The woman said: "I knew that I'm capable of more, but I have family, so my priorities changed."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedela som, že som schopná viac, ale mám rodinu, takže sa moje priority zmenili."

from: The woman said: "I'm always ready to help you with anything around your car."
to: Žena povedala: "Som vždy pripravená pomôcť ti s čímkoľvek okolo tvojho auta."

from: The woman said: "I assembled the furniture alone."
to: Žena povedala: "Nábytok som montovala sama."

from: The woman said: "I told him that nothing was wrong although I was really upset."
to: Žena povedala: "Povedala som mu, že sa nič nedeje, hoci som bola naozaj naštvaná."

from: The woman said: "I checked if the children did their homework."
to: Žena povedala: "Skontrolovala som, či si deti urobili domáce úlohy."

from: The woman said: "I could easily join the army."
to: Žena povedala: "Kľudne by som mohla vstúpiť do armády."

from: The woman said: "I saved up a lot of money for my childrens education."
to: Žena povedala: "Našetrila som veľa peňazí na vzdelanie mojich detí."

from: The woman said: "People around me know that if they need something, I’m happy to help."
to: Žena povedala: "Ľudia v mojom okolí vedia, že ak niečo potrebujú, rada im pomôžem."

from: I was skating before I could even walk.
to: Korčuľoval som sa skôr, ako som vôbec mohol chodiť.

from: With a steady hand and unwavering focus, I approached the edge of the cliff.
to: S pevnou rukou a neochvejným sústredením som sa priblížil k okraju útesu.

from: To avoid losing anything, I prefer to back up all my data.
to: Aby som o nič neprišiel, radšej si zálohujem všetky svoje dáta.

from: I still think about how I was told I was ugly in elementary school.
to: Stále myslím na to, ako mi na základnej škole povedali, že som škaredá.

from: I would never let privacy interfere with my work life.
to: Nikdy by som nedovolil, aby súkromie zasahovalo do môjho pracovného života.

from: I was very good at resolving conflicts when I was the supervisor.
to: Keď som bol supervízorom, bol som veľmi dobrý v riešení konfliktov.

from: Even if I was afraid of something, I would never admit it.
to: Aj keby som sa niečoho bála, nikdy by som to nepriznala.

from: I shouldn't have taken that personally, but I was really offended.
to: Nemal som si to brať osobne, ale naozaj ma to urazilo.

from: I decided in a spur of the moment.
to: Rozhodol som sa bleskovo.

from: I threw myself a birthday party to get lots of presents.
to: Usporiadal som si narodeninovú oslavu, aby som dostal veľa darčekov.

from: Being the provider means being responsible for putting food on the table, so I provided.
to: Byť poskytovateľom znamená byť zodpovedný za ukladanie jedla na stôl, tak som to zabezpečil.

from: I had never thought that I could come to harm.
to: Nikdy som si nemyslel, že by som mohol ublížiť.

from: I have created the life I have always wanted.
to: Vytvoril som si život, aký som vždy chcel.

from: I gave up the calculus class, it was just too hard for me.
to: Hodinu kalkulu som vzdal, bolo to pre mňa príliš ťažké.

from: I couldn't wear shorts even if it was hot outside because I don't want to provoke anybody.
to: Nemohla som si obliecť šortky, aj keď bolo vonku horúco, pretože nechcem nikoho provokovať.

from: The shelter held a Christmas auction where I bought a beautiful paw bracelet.
to: Útulok usporiadal vianočnú aukciu, kde som si kúpila krásny náramok na labku.

from: I helped out at an animal shelter.
to: Pomáhal som v útulku pre zvieratá.

from: I never lost my temper.
to: Nikdy som nestratil nervy.

from: I'm always happy, I think worrying is just a waste of time.
to: Vždy sa teším, myslím si, že robiť si starosti je len strata času.

from: I started screaming because I got angry.
to: Začal som kričať, pretože som sa nahneval.

from: I was bored so I went to a speedating event.
to: Nudil som sa tak som išiel na rýchlostnú akciu.

from: I created a dating account.
to: Vytvoril som si zoznamovací účet.

from: It broke my heart to see them like that, so I offered help.
to: Zlomilo mi srdce vidieť ich takto, tak som im ponúkol pomoc.

from: I realised that children are individual creatures that I cannot shape based on my ideas and desires.
to: Uvedomila som si, že deti sú individuálne stvorenia, ktoré nemôžem formovať na základe svojich predstáv a túžob.

from: I'm successful.
to: Som úspešný.

from: I could easily seduce you with just my looks.
to: Mohol by som ťa ľahko zviesť len svojím vzhľadom.

from: I learned a foreign launguage to have better foreign contacts.
to: Naučil som sa cudzí jazyk, aby som mal lepšie zahraničné kontakty.

from: I think I was born to help others.
to: Myslím, že som sa narodil, aby som pomáhal druhým.

from: The cleaners left the entrance door open.
to: Upratovačky nechali otvorené vchodové dvere.

from: I will gladly take your bag.
to: S radosťou si vezmem vašu tašku.

from: When I heard about the event, I decided to go.
to: Keď som sa o akcii dozvedel, rozhodol som sa ísť.

from: Even though I am their boss, I told them that I wanted them to see me as an equal colleague.
to: Aj keď som ich šéf, povedal som im, že chcem, aby ma vnímali ako rovnocenného kolegu.

from: I wouldn’t hurt a fly.
to: Neublížil by som ani muche.

from: I can take this - I have always managed.
to: Toto znesiem – vždy som to zvládol.

from: I completely lost my cool over a trivial matter and acted irrationally, letting my emotions take over.
to: Úplne som stratil chladnokrvnosť nad triviálnou záležitosťou a správal som sa iracionálne, nechal som svoje emócie ovládnuť.

from: My good looks opened doors in the entertainment industry, I was very confident.
to: Môj dobrý vzhľad mi otvoril dvere do zábavného priemyslu, bol som veľmi sebavedomý.

from: I hated my body.
to: Nenávidela som svoje telo.

from: I am an accomplished writer, my books are usually bestsellers.
to: Som skúsený spisovateľ, moje knihy sú zvyčajne bestsellery.

from: I had already made up my mind, so your argument will not work.
to: Už som sa rozhodol, takže tvoj argument nebude fungovať.

from: They do not dare to questions the decisions that I have made.
to: Neodvažujú sa spochybňovať rozhodnutia, ktoré som urobil.

from: I like to take care of my friends children when they are busy.
to: Rád sa starám o deti svojich priateľov, keď sú zaneprázdnení.

from: I like to go to nude beaches.
to: Rád chodím na nudistické pláže.

from: I encouraged teamwork and collaboration during group projects.
to: Podporoval som tímovú prácu a spoluprácu počas skupinových projektov.

from: Just because I demand discipline from my employees doesn't mean I don't like them.
to: To, že od svojich zamestnancov vyžadujem disciplínu, neznamená, že ich nemám rád.

from: Their suffering touched me - I wanted to comfort them.
to: Ich utrpenie sa ma dotklo – chcel som ich utešiť.

from: I have always enjoyed teaching others.
to: Vždy ma bavilo učiť iných.

from: I wanted to go to the cinema instead of watching the movie at home.
to: Chcel som ísť do kina namiesto pozerania filmu doma.

from: I organised an international conference.
to: Zorganizoval som medzinárodnú konferenciu.

from: When danger came, I took the lead.
to: Keď prišlo nebezpečenstvo, prevzal som vedenie.

from: I could never go hiking alone, I always need company.
to: Nikdy by som nemohla ísť na túru sama, vždy potrebujem spoločnosť.

from: In order not to burn out, I try to create a work-life balance.
to: Aby som nevyhorela, snažím sa o rovnováhu medzi pracovným a súkromným životom.

from: I was never worried about future.
to: Nikdy som sa nebál o budúcnosť.

from: Kissing was important to me, but so was sex.
to: Bozkávanie bolo pre mňa dôležité, ale aj sex.

from: I calculated our spendings to budget properly.
to: Vypočítal som naše výdavky, aby sme správne rozpočítali.

from: I wouldn't let anyone dictate what I should do.
to: Nenechal by som nikoho diktovať, čo mám robiť.

from: I tried to be kind at all costs not to displease anyone.
to: Snažil som sa byť za každú cenu láskavý, aby som sa nikomu nepáčil.

from: I felt a boost of confidence as I caught myself in the mirror, recognizing that I was undeniably good-looking.
to: Pocítil som zvýšenie sebadôvery, keď som sa zachytil v zrkadle a uvedomil som si, že vyzerám nesporne dobre.

from: I avoided conflicts at all costs.
to: Konfliktom som sa vyhýbal za každú cenu.

from: I reached a new personal record.
to: Dosiahol som nový osobný rekord.

from: I built the house alone.
to: Dom som postavil sám.

from: I helped you change the tyres on your car because I'm stronger.
to: Pomohol som ti vymeniť pneumatiky na aute, pretože som silnejší.

from: I volunteered at a local shelter, actively engaging with individuals experiencing homelessness, and showing empathy by providing care and support.
to: Prihlásil som sa ako dobrovoľník do miestneho útulku, aktívne som sa zapájal do jednotlivcov, ktorí zažívali bezdomovectvo, a prejavoval som empatiu poskytovaním starostlivosti a podpory.

from: I am very good at pretending that I am fine.
to: Veľmi dobre viem predstierať, že som v poriadku.

from: I made a group chat for all the new classmates.
to: Urobil som skupinový chat pre všetkých nových spolužiakov.

from: I didn't have any hobbies, I was working all the time, so I could make more money for my family.
to: Nemal som žiadne koníčky, neustále som pracoval, a tak som mohol zarobiť viac peňazí pre rodinu.

from: When I'm out with my friend we gossip way too much.
to: Keď som vonku s priateľom, príliš veľa klebetíme.

from: I won the marathon last year.
to: Minulý rok som vyhral maratón.

from: I went volunteering to Africa.
to: Išiel som dobrovoľne do Afriky.

from: I never made my decision based on emotions.
to: Nikdy som sa nerozhodoval na základe emócií.

from: I didn't even consider the possibility that I would fail.
to: Ani som nepočítal s možnosťou, že by som neuspel.

from: I maintained a professional tone.
to: Zachoval som profesionálny tón.

from: If it were up to me, I'd have pizza for lunch every day.
to: Keby bolo na mne, každý deň si dám na obed pizzu.

from: I like to play computer games.
to: Rád hrám počítačové hry.

from: I like helping people.
to: Rád pomáham ľuďom.

from: It was always important for me to be pretty.
to: Vždy bolo pre mňa dôležité byť pekná.

from: I had to get checked for STDs.
to: Musel som sa nechať skontrolovať na pohlavné choroby.

from: I polished the cutlery until it was spotless.
to: Príbor som vyleštil, kým nebol bez škvŕn.

from: I carefully proofread and edited my written assignments before submitting them.
to: Svoje písomné úlohy som pred odoslaním starostlivo korigoval a upravil.

from: I knew how to fix a broken car.
to: Vedel som, ako opraviť pokazené auto.

from: I have decided that I will praise at least one person every day.
to: Rozhodol som sa, že každý deň pochválim aspoň jedného človeka.

from: I coached the youth football team.
to: Trénoval som mládežnícky futbalový tím.

from: People think of me as a wimp just because I’m good to others.
to: Ľudia si o mne myslia, že som slaboch len preto, že som dobrý k ostatným.

from: I first consulted a professional before making the final choice.
to: Pred konečným výberom som sa najprv poradil s odborníkom.

from: I should wash the car.
to: Mal by som umyť auto.

from: While I realise that both partners can be the breadwinners in a family, I am glad that in ours, that role is mine.
to: Aj keď si uvedomujem, že v rodine môžu byť živiteľmi obaja partneri, som rád, že v našej je táto úloha moja.

from: I feel the happiest when I'm in charge of everything.
to: Najšťastnejší sa cítim, keď mám všetko na starosti ja.

from: I calmly addressed a conflict with a colleague.
to: Pokojne som riešil konflikt s kolegom.

from: I was not able to complete the excercise because I am too exhausted.
to: Nebol som schopný dokončiť cvičenie, pretože som príliš vyčerpaný.

from: I had difficulty taking responsibility for my actions.
to: Mal som problém prevziať zodpovednosť za svoje činy.

from: I should work harder so my children have easier life.
to: Mal by som viac pracovať, aby moje deti mali ľahší život.

from: I organized my to-do list based on priority, tackling the most important tasks first.
to: Usporiadal som si zoznam úloh na základe priorít a najskôr som riešil najdôležitejšie úlohy.

from: I like to inspire my subordinates on a daily basis.
to: Rád denne inšpirujem svojich podriadených.

from: I caught myself daydreaming about having sex.
to: Pristihla som sa, že snívam o sexe.

from: I was sick but I still worked from home so we don't loose any money.
to: Bol som chorý, ale stále som pracoval z domu, takže o žiadne peniaze neprichádzame.

from: As a human resources manager, I effectively recruited top talent, facilitated employee training and development programs.
to: Ako manažér ľudských zdrojov som efektívne získaval špičkových talentov, facilitoval školenia a rozvojové programy zamestnancov.

from: I got very upset.
to: Veľmi som sa rozčúlil.

from: I jogged confidently, feeling the endurance of my physical strength.
to: S istotou som bežal, cítil som vytrvalosť svojej fyzickej sily.

from: I didn't want to tell them what is wrong because I didn't want to cause any trouble.
to: Nechcel som im povedať, čo sa deje, pretože som nechcel spôsobiť problémy.

from: I liked having company better.
to: Viac sa mi páčilo mať spoločnosť.

to: Muž povedal: "Nebol som schopný dokončiť cvičenie, pretože som príliš vyčerpaný."

from: The man said: "I knew how to fix a broken car."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedel som, ako opraviť pokazené auto."

from: The man said: "I started screaming because I got angry."
to: Muž povedal: "Začal som kričať, pretože som sa nahneval."

from: The man said: "Kissing was important to me, but so was sex."
to: Muž povedal: "Bozkávanie bolo pre mňa dôležité, ale aj sex."

from: The man said: "The shelter held a Christmas auction where I bought a beautiful paw bracelet."
to: Muž povedal: "Útulok usporiadal vianočnú aukciu, kde som si kúpil krásny náramok na labku."

from: The man said: "When I heard about the event, I decided to go."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som sa dozvedel o udalosti, rozhodol som sa ísť."

from: The man said: "I will gladly take your bag."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád vám vezmem tašku."

from: The man said: "I wanted to go to the cinema instead of watching the movie at home."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som ísť do kina namiesto pozerania filmu doma."

from: The man said: "It was always important for me to be pretty."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy bolo pre mňa dôležité, aby som bol pekný."

from: The man said: "I should wash the car."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal by som umyť auto."

from: The man said: "If it were up to me, I'd have pizza for lunch every day."
to: Muž povedal: "Keby to bolo na mne, každý deň by som mal na obed pizzu."

from: The man said: "I should work harder so my children have easier life."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal by som viac pracovať, aby moje deti mali ľahší život."

from: The man said: "I had never thought that I could come to harm."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som si nemyslel, že by som mohol ublížiť."

from: The man said: "The cleaners left the entrance door open."
to: Muž povedal: Upratovačky nechali otvorené vchodové dvere.

from: The man said: "I like to go to nude beaches."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád chodím na nudistické pláže."

from: The man said: "I had difficulty taking responsibility for my actions."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som problém prevziať zodpovednosť za svoje činy."

from: The man said: "I reached a new personal record."
to: Muž povedal: "Dosiahol som nový osobný rekord."

from: The man said: "I could never go hiking alone, I always need company."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nemohol ísť na túru sám, vždy potrebujem spoločnosť."

from: The man said: "I won the marathon last year."
to: Muž povedal: "Minulý rok som vyhral maratón."

from: The man said: "I like helping people."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád pomáham ľuďom."

from: The man said: "I organized my to-do list based on priority, tackling the most important tasks first."
to: Muž povedal: "Usporiadal som si zoznam úloh na základe priorít, pričom ako prvé som riešil najdôležitejšie úlohy."

from: The man said: "I was never worried about future."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa nebál o budúcnosť."

from: The man said: "I am very good at pretending that I am fine."
to: Muž povedal: "Veľmi dobre viem predstierať, že som v poriadku."

from: The man said: "I have created the life I have always wanted."
to: Muž povedal: "Stvoril som život, aký som vždy chcel."

from: The man said: "When I'm out with my friend we gossip way too much."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som vonku so svojím priateľom, príliš veľa klebetíme."

from: The man said: "I created a dating account."
to: Muž povedal: "Vytvoril som si zoznamovací účet."

from: The man said: "I coached the youth football team."
to: Muž povedal: "Trénoval som mládežnícky futbalový tím."

from: The man said: "I could easily seduce you with just my looks."
to: Muž povedal: "Mohol by som ťa ľahko zviesť len svojím vzhľadom."

from: The man said: "I was sick but I still worked from home so we don't loose any money."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som chorý, ale stále som pracoval z domu, aby sme neprišli o žiadne peniaze."

from: The man said: "While I realise that both partners can be the breadwinners in a family, I am glad that in ours, that role is mine."
to: Muž povedal: "Aj keď si uvedomujem, že obaja partneri môžu byť živiteľmi rodiny, som rád, že v našej je táto úloha moja."

from: The man said: "I have decided that I will praise at least one person every day."
to: Muž povedal: "Rozhodol som sa, že každý deň pochválim aspoň jedného človeka."

from: The man said: "I gave up the calculus class, it was just too hard for me."
to: Muž povedal: "Vzdal som sa hodiny kalkulu, bolo to pre mňa príliš ťažké."

from: The man said: "I polished the cutlery until it was spotless."
to: Muž povedal: "Leštil som príbory, až kým neboli bez škvŕn."

from: The man said: "I jogged confidently, feeling the endurance of my physical strength."
to: Muž povedal: "S istotou som bežal, cítil som vytrvalosť svojej fyzickej sily."

from: The man said: "I liked having company better."
to: Muž povedal: "Viac sa mi páčilo mať spoločnosť."

from: The man said: "I helped you change the tyres on your car because I'm stronger."
to: Muž povedal: "Pomohol som ti vymeniť pneumatiky na aute, pretože som silnejší."

from: The man said: "I went volunteering to Africa."
to: Muž povedal: "Išiel som dobrovoľne do Afriky."

from: The man said: "I like to take care of my friends children when they are busy."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád sa starám o deti svojich priateľov, keď sú zaneprázdnení."

from: The man said: "I like to play computer games."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád hrám počítačové hry."

from: The man said: "I volunteered at a local shelter, actively engaging with individuals experiencing homelessness, and showing empathy by providing care and support."
to: Muž povedal: "Prihlásil som sa ako dobrovoľník do miestneho útulku, aktívne som sa zapájal do jednotlivcov, ktorí zažívali bezdomovectvo, a prejavil som empatiu poskytovaním starostlivosti a podpory."

from: The man said: "I never lost my temper."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nestratil nervy."

from: The man said: "Their suffering touched me - I wanted to comfort them."
to: Muž povedal: "Ich utrpenie sa ma dotklo - chcel som ich utešiť."

from: The man said: "I think I was born to help others."
to: Muž povedal: "Myslím, že som sa narodil, aby som pomáhal druhým."

from: The man said: "I can take this - I have always managed."
to: Muž povedal: "Toto môžem vziať - vždy som to zvládol."

from: The man said: "I first consulted a professional before making the final choice."
to: Muž povedal: "Pred konečným výberom som sa najskôr poradil s odborníkom."

from: The man said: "I tried to be kind at all costs not to displease anyone."
to: Muž povedal: "Snažil som sa byť za každú cenu láskavý, aby som sa nikomu nepáčil."

from: The man said: "To avoid losing anything, I prefer to back up all my data."
to: Muž povedal: "Aby som nič nestratil, radšej si zálohujem všetky svoje dáta."

from: The man said: "I caught myself daydreaming about having sex."
to: Muž povedal: "Pristihol som sa, že snívam o sexe."

from: The man said: "I still think about how I was told I was ugly in elementary school."
to: Muž povedal: "Stále myslím na to, ako mi na základnej škole povedali, že som škaredý."

from: The man said: "I organised an international conference."
to: Muž povedal: "Zorganizoval som medzinárodnú konferenciu."

from: The man said: "I didn't even consider the possibility that I would fail."
to: Muž povedal: "Ani som nezvažoval možnosť, že by som neuspel."

from: The man said: "I didn't want to tell them what is wrong because I didn't want to cause any trouble."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechcel som im povedať, čo sa deje, pretože som nechcel spôsobiť problémy."

from: The man said: "I'm always happy, I think worrying is just a waste of time."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som šťastný, myslím si, že robiť si starosti je len strata času."

from: The man said: "I helped out at an animal shelter."
to: Muž povedal: "Pomáhal som v útulku pre zvieratá."

from: The man said: "When danger came, I took the lead."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď prišlo nebezpečenstvo, prevzal som vedenie."

from: The man said: "Even though I am their boss, I told them that I wanted them to see me as an equal colleague."
to: Muž povedal: "Hoci som ich šéf, povedal som im, že chcem, aby ma vnímali ako rovnocenného kolegu."

from: The man said: "I couldn't wear shorts even if it was hot outside because I don't want to provoke anybody."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som nosiť šortky, aj keď bolo vonku horúco, pretože nechcem nikoho provokovať."

from: The man said: "I calmly addressed a conflict with a colleague."
to: Muž povedal: "Pokojne som riešil konflikt s kolegom."

from: The man said: "I built the house alone."
to: Muž povedal: "Dom som postavil sám."

from: The man said: "My good looks opened doors in the entertainment industry, I was very confident."
to: Muž povedal: "Môj dobrý vzhľad mi otvoril dvere do zábavného priemyslu, bol som veľmi sebavedomý."

from: The man said: "I decided in a spur of the moment."
to: Muž povedal: "Rozhodol som sa okamžite."

from: The man said: "I felt a boost of confidence as I caught myself in the mirror, recognizing that I was undeniably good-looking."
to: Muž povedal: "Pocítil som zvýšenie sebadôvery, keď som sa zachytil v zrkadle a uvedomil som si, že vyzerám nesporne dobre."

from: The man said: "It broke my heart to see them like that, so I offered help."
to: Muž povedal: "Zlomilo mi srdce, keď som ich takto videl, tak som im ponúkol pomoc."

from: The man said: "I learned a foreign launguage to have better foreign contacts."
to: Muž povedal: "Naučil som sa cudzí jazyk, aby som mal lepšie zahraničné kontakty."

from: The man said: "With a steady hand and unwavering focus, I approached the edge of the cliff."
to: Muž povedal: "S pevnou rukou a neochvejným zameraním som sa priblížil k okraju útesu."

from: The man said: "Being the provider means being responsible for putting food on the table, so I provided."
to: Muž povedal: "Byť dodávateľom znamená byť zodpovedný za ukladanie jedla na stôl, tak som to zabezpečil."

from: The man said: "I never made my decision based on emotions."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa nerozhodoval na základe emócií."

from: The man said: "I got very upset."
to: Muž povedal: "Veľmi som sa rozčúlil."

from: The man said: "I feel the happiest when I'm in charge of everything."
to: Muž povedal: "Najšťastnejší sa cítim, keď mám všetko na starosti."

from: The man said: "I encouraged teamwork and collaboration during group projects."
to: Muž povedal: "Podporoval som tímovú prácu a spoluprácu počas skupinových projektov."

from: The man said: "I like to inspire my subordinates on a daily basis."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád denne inšpirujem svojich podriadených."

from: The man said: "I didn't have any hobbies, I was working all the time, so I could make more money for my family."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemal som žiadne koníčky, celý čas som pracoval, aby som mohol zarobiť viac peňazí pre svoju rodinu."

from: The man said: "I calculated our spendings to budget properly."
to: Muž povedal: "Vypočítal som naše výdavky, aby sme správne rozpočítali."

from: The man said: "I maintained a professional tone."
to: Muž povedal: "Zachoval som profesionálny tón."

from: The man said: "I have always enjoyed teaching others."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy ma bavilo učiť iných."

from: The man said: "Even if I was afraid of something, I would never admit it."
to: Muž povedal: "Aj keby som sa niečoho bál, nikdy by som to nepriznal."

from: The man said: "I am an accomplished writer, my books are usually bestsellers."
to: Muž povedal: "Som dokonalý spisovateľ, moje knihy sú zvyčajne bestsellery."

from: The man said: "Just because I demand discipline from my employees doesn't mean I don't like them."
to: Muž povedal: "To, že od svojich zamestnancov vyžadujem disciplínu, neznamená, že ich nemám rád."

from: The man said: "I shouldn't have taken that personally, but I was really offended."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemal som si to brať osobne, ale bol som naozaj urazený."

from: The man said: "I realised that children are individual creatures that I cannot shape based on my ideas and desires."

to: Žena povedala: "Pracovala som v stavebníctve a pomohlo mi to získať fyzickú silu."

from: The woman said: "I struggled to carry the grocery bags up the stairs, my arms felt weak."
to: Žena povedala: "S námahou som vyniesla tašky s potravinami po schodoch, ruky som mala slabé."

from: The woman said: "I didn't see you as my future partner, I thought we were just having casual sex."
to: Žena povedala: "Nevidela som ťa ako svojho budúceho partnera, myslela som si, že máme len nezáväzný sex."

from: The woman said: "I enjoy doing dangerous and extreme sports."
to: Žena povedala: "Baví ma robiť nebezpečné a extrémne športy."

from: The woman said: "I dug up the tree, but it took me three months."
to: Žena povedala: "Vykopala som strom, ale trvalo mi to tri mesiace."

from: The woman said: "I kept my poker face."
to: Žena povedala: "Zachovala som si poker face."

from: The woman said: "It was always good to hear that I looked good."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy bolo dobré počuť, že vyzerám dobre."

from: The woman said: "I parked where I shouldn't have, but I didn't care."
to: Žena povedala: "Zaparkovala som tam, kde som nemala, ale bolo mi to jedno."

from: The woman said: "I calmly resolved a disagreement with a friend."
to: Žena povedala: "Pokojne som vyriešila nezhodu s priateľom."

from: The woman said: "I panicked when I could not start the engine."
to: Žena povedala: "Spanikárila som, keď som nemohla naštartovať motor."

from: The woman said: "Yes, I knew our future wouldn't be bright, but I fell in love."
to: Žena povedala: "Áno, vedela som, že naša budúcnosť nebude svetlá, ale zamilovala som sa."

from: The woman said: "I never let emotions take over."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy nedovolím emóciám, aby ovládli."

from: The woman said: "I never had a problem in fights, I always won."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nemala problém v bitkách, vždy som vyhrala."

from: The woman said: "I craved attention."
to: Žena povedala: "Túžila som po pozornosti."

from: The woman said: "Why did you even say something like that, you only know how to cook and clean the house!"
to: Žena povedala: "Prečo si niečo také povedal, veď vieš len variť a upratať dom!"

from: The woman said: "I had to ask for help with moving the table."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som požiadať o pomoc s premiestnením stola."

from: The woman said: "I organized a picnic in the park, inviting friends and family to enjoy good food, outdoor activities, and quality time together."
to: Žena povedala: "Zorganizovala som piknik v parku a pozvala som priateľov a rodinu, aby si užili dobré jedlo, outdoorové aktivity a kvalitný čas spolu."

from: The woman said: "I made their dreams come true."
to: Žena povedala: "Splnila som ich sny."

from: The woman said: "They told me I was fragile."
to: Žena povedala: "Povedali mi, že som krehká."

from: The woman said: "Instead of crying over spilt milk, I came up with a solution."
to: Žena povedala: "Namiesto plaču nad rozliatym mliekom som prišla s riešením."

from: The woman said: "I flexed my bicep every time I had an opportunity."
to: Žena povedala: "Preťahovala som biceps zakaždým, keď som mala príležitosť."

from: The woman said: "I knew how to do a good job, because I'm skilled."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedela som robiť dobrú prácu, pretože som zručná."

from: The woman said: "I led by example, demonstrating a strong work ethic."
to: Žena povedala: "Išla som príkladom a preukázala som silnú pracovnú morálku."

from: The woman said: "I could not control my impulses and just did what I felt like doing at the time."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som ovládať svoje impulzy a robila som to, na čo som sa v tom čase cítila."

from: The woman said: "I don’t like to argue with others because I can’t hold back my tears."
to: Žena povedala: "Nerada sa hádam s ostatnými, pretože nedokážem zadržať slzy."

from: The woman said: "I couldn't live without sports."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla by som žiť bez športu."

from: The woman said: "I prepared a little suprise for all the guests."
to: Žena povedala: "Pripravila som pre všetkých hostí malé prekvapenie."

from: I didn't take the rejection well.
to: Neprijal som odmietnutie dobre.

from: I put a lot of effort into gaining muscle strength.
to: Veľa úsilia som venoval naberaniu svalovej sily.

from: Yesterday I bought a snake.
to: Včera som si kúpil hada.

from: As a sales representative, I built strong relationships with clients, understood their needs, and effectively communicated the benefits of our products to drive sales.
to: Ako obchodný zástupca som si vybudoval silné vzťahy s klientmi, chápal ich potreby a efektívne komunikoval výhody našich produktov na podporu predaja.

from: I donated my old clothes, I just had too many.
to: Daroval som svoje staré oblečenie, mal som ich priveľa.

from: When I assessed the damage, I knew this was beyond my skills.
to: Keď som zhodnotil škody, vedel som, že to presahuje moje schopnosti.

from: I never took any supplements, all my strength is natural.
to: Nikdy som nebral žiadne doplnky, všetka moja sila je prirodzená.

from: The key moment in my career was when I realize that my decision-making skills earned me respect from everyone.
to: Kľúčovým momentom v mojej kariére bolo, keď som si uvedomil, že moje rozhodovacie schopnosti mi získali rešpekt od všetkých.

from: I got a lot of compliments on my outfit.
to: Dostal som veľa komplimentov na môj outfit.

from: I'm a good runner.
to: Som dobrý bežec.

from: I was well aware that I was very capable.
to: Dobre som si uvedomoval, že som veľmi schopný.

from: I take pride in my work, but I'm always looking for ways to do it even better.
to: Na svoju prácu som hrdý, no stále hľadám spôsoby, ako ju robiť ešte lepšie.

from: I regularly reviewed and adjusted our family's financial goals.
to: Pravidelne som kontroloval a upravoval finančné ciele našej rodiny.

from: I joined an environmental conservation group, collaborating with like-minded individuals to raise awareness and take action on environmental issues.
to: Pridal som sa k skupine na ochranu životného prostredia a spolupracoval som s podobne zmýšľajúcimi jednotlivcami na zvyšovaní povedomia a prijímaní opatrení v otázkach životného prostredia.

from: I displayed lack of maturity.
to: Prejavil som nedostatočnú zrelosť.

from: I am certain that the truth is simple.
to: Som si istý, že pravda je jednoduchá.

from: I would never let a dog lick my face.
to: Nikdy by som nedovolil psovi, aby mi olizoval tvár.

from: I made sure my team finished in the top 3.
to: Uistil som sa, že môj tím skončil v top 3.

from: I always comforted my kids when they cried.
to: Vždy som svoje deti utešovala, keď plakali.

from: I would frequently procrastinate and avoid my responsibilities.
to: Často som odkladal a vyhýbal sa svojim povinnostiam.

from: I ignored the facts, and focused on my feelings.
to: Ignoroval som fakty a sústredil som sa na svoje pocity.

from: I don't want a relationship because I need freedom.
to: Nechcem vzťah, pretože potrebujem slobodu.

from: I never left my job until everything was ready for the next day.
to: Nikdy som neopustil svoju prácu, kým nebolo všetko pripravené na ďalší deň.

from: I got a good job right after school and made enough money to buy a house for my family.
to: Hneď po škole som dostal dobrú prácu a zarobil som dosť peňazí na to, aby som kúpil dom pre svoju rodinu.

from: I bought a new hair dryer.
to: Kúpil som si nový fén.

from: I did the laundry.
to: Prala som.

from: If I hadn't been kind, I wouldn't have found a husband.
to: Keby som nebola milá, nenašla by som si manžela.

from: I paid for my brothers driving license.
to: Zaplatil som bratovi vodičský preukaz.

from: Cleanliness has always been important to me, which is why I am applying for this job.
to: Čistota bola pre mňa vždy dôležitá, a preto sa uchádzam o túto prácu.

from: I offered them help with the furniture.
to: Ponúkol som im pomoc s nábytkom.

from: I consistently downplayed my achievements or talents.
to: Dôsledne som bagatelizoval svoje úspechy alebo talenty.

from: I didn't eat the cake, because I was watching my figure.
to: Koláč som nejedla, lebo som si dávala pozor na postavu.

from: I worked a sa data analyst.
to: Pracoval som ako dátový analytik.

from: I struggled to maintain proper posture during extended periods of sitting, feeling weak in my back and core muscles.
to: Počas dlhého sedenia som sa snažil udržať správne držanie tela, pociťoval som slabosť v chrbtových svaloch.

from: They knew I would listen to their problems and try to help.
to: Vedeli, že si vypočujem ich problémy a pokúsim sa im pomôcť.

from: I could not stand seeing how dirty their glasses were!
to: Nemohol som vydržať vidieť, aké špinavé boli ich okuliare!

from: When I felt that situation is no longer in my control, I freaked out.
to: Keď som cítil, že situáciu už nemám pod kontrolou, vydesil som sa.

from: It’s hard for me to be new in the city because I don’t have any friends here.
to: Je pre mňa ťažké byť v meste nový, pretože tu nemám žiadnych priateľov.

from: I led a team of young researchers.
to: Viedol som tím mladých výskumníkov.

from: I have allowed employees to bring animals to work.
to: Dovolil som zamestnancom nosiť zvieratá do práce.

from: I met project deadlines with professionalism and technical expertise.
to: Dodržiaval som termíny projektov s profesionalitou a technickou odbornosťou.

from: I'm important to my family because I like to fulfill their needs.
to: Pre svoju rodinu som dôležitý, pretože rád napĺňam ich potreby.

from: I knew I could break it if I pushed hard enough.
to: Vedel som, že to dokážem zlomiť, ak budem dostatočne tlačiť.

from: I couldn’t have an office just for myself, I’d go crazy in there.
to: Nemohol som mať kanceláriu len pre seba, tam by som sa zbláznil.

from: I felt very vulnerable.
to: Cítil som sa veľmi zraniteľný.

from: I like having an extra job.
to: Mám rád prácu navyše.

from: I stood face to face with a tiger.
to: Stál som tvárou v tvár tigrovi.

from: I hurt my knees lifting it.
to: Zdvihol som si kolená.

from: I always need to get the work done right away, because if I wait until the last minute, I feel irresponsible.
to: Vždy potrebujem urobiť prácu hneď, pretože ak čakám do poslednej chvíle, cítim sa nezodpovedne.

from: I felt like I was the worst, I don't know why.
to: Mala som pocit, že som najhoršia, ani neviem prečo.

from: I like to prepare snacks for my kids, so they can eat them at school.
to: Svojim deťom rada pripravujem občerstvenie, aby ich mohli jesť v škole.

from: As a chef, I carefully sourced high-quality ingredients, honed my culinary skills, and consistently delivered delicious and beautifully presented meals.
to: Ako šéfkuchár som starostlivo získaval vysokokvalitné suroviny, zdokonaľoval som svoje kulinárske zručnosti a dôsledne dodávam chutné a krásne prezentované jedlá.

from: With no witnesses and no evidence, I refused to be a part of the jury.
to: Bez svedkov a dôkazov som odmietol byť súčasťou poroty.

from: I am beautiful.
to: Som krásna.

from: I often feel stressed about making enough money for the family.
to: Často cítim stres, či zarobím dosť peňazí pre rodinu.

from: I stopped to buy condoms on my way to the date.
to: Cestou na rande som sa zastavil kúpiť kondómy.

from: I let my staff leave earlier today.
to: Dnes som nechal svojich zamestnancov odísť skôr.

from: I struggled to complete a set of sit-ups, feeling the weakness in my abdominal muscles.
to: Snažil som sa dokončiť sériu brušákov, cítil som slabosť brušných svalov.

from: I was looking for the Kama Sutra in the bookshop.
to: Hľadal som Kámasútru v kníhkupectve.

from: I lifted twice my own weight.
to: Zdvihol som dvakrát svoju váhu.

from: I took care of the finances.
to: O financie som sa staral ja.

from: She keeps asking me why I cried that day.
to: Stále sa ma pýta, prečo som v ten deň plakal.

from: I vacuumed and spot-cleaned my carpets and rugs.
to: Koberce a koberčeky som povysával a vyčistil.

from: If I have offended anyone, it is their fault, I will not apologise to them.
to: Ak som niekoho urazil, je to jeho chyba, nebudem sa mu ospravedlňovať.

from: Although I am employed, I work in a nursing home in my spare time.
to: Som síce zamestnaná, ale vo voľnom čase pracujem v domove dôchodcov.

from: I cried, because I didn't get what I had wanted.
to: Plakal som, pretože som nedostal to, čo som chcel.

from: I couldn't go to sleep without my skincare.
to: Bez starostlivosti o pleť som nemohla ísť spať.

from: I didn't care that I don't have my own family, I had a high position at my job and that was enough for me.
to: Bolo mi jedno, že nemám vlastnú rodinu, v práci som mal vysoké postavenie a to mi stačilo.

from: When I have to go to a work meeting, I immediately get all sweaty from stress.
to: Keď mám ísť na pracovné stretnutie, hneď sa celý spotím od stresu.

from: I actively engaged with stakeholders.
to: Aktívne som spolupracoval so zainteresovanými stranami.

from: I gave them some advice about how to look better.
to: Dal som im pár rád, ako vyzerať lepšie.

from: I didn't spend a lot of time preparing, because I have a pretty face.
to: Príprave som nevenoval veľa času, pretože mám peknú tvár.

from: I didn't mind staying late at work, I knew I was doing it to keep my family fed.
to: Nevadilo mi zostať neskoro v práci, vedel som, že to robím preto, aby som nasýtil rodinu.

from: I'm successful because my company is doing great.
to: Som úspešný, pretože mojej spoločnosti sa darí skvele.

from: When browsing through old photographs, I noticed how consistently good-looking I appeared in various moments and settings.
to: Pri prezeraní starých fotografií som si všimol, ako neustále dobre vyzerám v rôznych momentoch a prostrediach.

from: With a steady hand and unyielding focus, I showed what I had to offer.
to: Pevnou rukou a neústupným zameraním som ukázal, čo som mohol ponúknuť.

from: Don't be angry, I hated being alone at home.
to: Nehnevaj sa, neznášala som byť sama doma.

from: I hate arguing.
to: Neznášam hádky.

from: I pranked everyone at the party.
to: Všetkých som na párty žartoval.

from: I taught a self-defence class.
to: Učil som hodinu sebaobrany.

from: Hard work paid off and I bought a new car.
to: Tvrdá práca sa vyplatila a kúpil som si nové auto.

from: I'm confident and that attracts others.
to: Som sebavedomý a to priťahuje ostatných.

from: I would like to explore every inch of that beautiful body.
to: Chcel by som preskúmať každý centimeter toho krásneho tela.

from: When they find out what I'm like, they'll want to hire me right away.
to: Keď zistia, aký som, hneď ma budú chcieť zamestnať.

from: I ate a lot of protein to build muscle.
to: Jedol som veľa bielkovín na budovanie svalov.

from: I could easily get everyone's attention if I wanted to.
to: Ak by som chcel, mohol by som ľahko upútať pozornosť všetkých.

from: When I got compliments it was always on my looks.
to: Keď som dostal komplimenty, vždy to bolo na mojom vzhľade.

from: I know how you feel, I was in the same situation.
to: Viem ako sa cítiš, bol som v rovnakej situácii.

from: There are no doubts I always did a great job.
to: Niet pochýb o tom, že som vždy odviedol skvelú prácu.

from: I noticed that my good looks seemed to open doors for me.
to: Všimol som si, že môj dobrý vzhľad akoby mi otvoril dvere.

from: I left when they started talking about religions and god.
to: Odišiel som, keď začali hovoriť o náboženstvách a bohu.

from: I will show them how tough I am.
to: Ukážem im, aký som tvrdý.

from: I cooked for him for almost twenty years.
to: Varila som mu takmer dvadsať rokov.

from: I was unable to do anything, so I just kept smiling like nothing happened.
to: Nebol som schopný nič urobiť, tak som sa len usmieval, akoby sa nič nestalo.

from: Should I have given my kids more money?
to: Mal som dať svojim deťom viac peňazí?

from: In a previous relationship, I was constantly told how stupid I was.
to: V predchádzajúcom vzťahu mi neustále hovorili, aká som hlúpa.

from: I’ve been waiting so long for this game to come out.
to: Tak dlho som čakal, kým táto hra vyjde.

from: I used to underestimate myself a lot, but that's in the past.
to: Kedysi som sa dosť podceňoval, ale to je už minulosť.

from: I would prefer to have an online meeting every Monday morning.
to: Najradšej by som mal online stretnutie každý pondelok ráno.

from: I am an extraordinary person and I would like everyone to recognize it.
to: Som výnimočný človek a bol by som rád, keby to každý spoznal.

from: The man said: "I got a lot of compliments on my outfit."
to: Muž povedal: "Dostal som veľa komplimentov na môj outfit."

from: The man said: "Should I have given my kids more money?"
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som dať svojim deťom viac peňazí?"

from: The man said: "I let my staff leave earlier today."
to: Muž povedal: "Dnes som nechal svojich zamestnancov odísť skôr."

from: The man said: "I stood face to face with a tiger."
to: Muž povedal: "Stál som tvárou v tvár tigrovi."

from: The man said: "I didn't spend a lot of time preparing, because I have a pretty face."
to: Muž povedal: "Netrávil som veľa času prípravou, pretože mám peknú tvár."

from: The man said: "I was unable to do anything, so I just kept smiling like nothing happened."
to: Muž povedal: "Nebol som schopný nič urobiť, tak som sa len usmieval, akoby sa nič nestalo."

from: The man said: "I lifted twice my own weight."
to: Muž povedal: "Zdvihol som dvakrát svoju váhu."

from: The man said: "I didn't eat the cake, because I was watching my figure."
to: Muž povedal: "Tortu som nejedol, lebo som si dával pozor na postavu."

from: The man said: "I would never let a dog lick my face."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy by som nedovolil, aby mi pes olizoval tvár."

from: The man said: "I am certain that the truth is simple."
to: Muž povedal: "Som si istý, že pravda je jednoduchá."

from: The man said: "I'm important to my family because I like to fulfill their needs."
to: Muž povedal: "Som dôležitý pre svoju rodinu, pretože rád napĺňam ich potreby."

from: The man said: "I did the laundry."
to: Muž povedal: "Pral som."

from: The man said: "I would prefer to have an online meeting every Monday morning."
to: Muž povedal: "Radšej by som mal online stretnutie každý pondelok ráno."

from: The man said: "When I assessed the damage, I knew this was beyond my skills."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som odhadol škody, vedel som, že to presahuje moje schopnosti."

from: The man said: "I know how you feel, I was in the same situation."
to: Muž povedal: "Viem, ako sa cítiš, bol som v rovnakej situácii."

from: The man said: "With no witnesses and no evidence, I refused to be a part of the jury."
to: Muž povedal: "Bez svedkov a dôkazov som odmietol byť súčasťou poroty."

from: The man said: "Don't be angry, I hated being alone at home."
to: Muž povedal: "Nehnevajte sa, neznášal som byť sám doma."

from: The man said: "I bought a new hair dryer."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpil som si nový fén."

from: The man said: "If I have offended anyone, it is their fault, I will not apologise to them."
to: Muž povedal: "Ak som niekoho urazil, je to jeho chyba, nebudem sa mu ospravedlňovať."

from: The man said: "I consistently downplayed my achievements or talents."
to: Muž povedal: "Dôsledne som bagatelizoval svoje úspechy alebo talent."

from: The man said: "Although I am employed, I work in a nursing home in my spare time."
to: Muž povedal: "Hoci som zamestnaný, vo svojom voľnom čase pracujem v domove dôchodcov."

from: The man said: "I could not stand seeing how dirty their glasses were!"
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som vydržať vidieť, aké majú špinavé okuliare!"

from: The man said: "I joined an environmental conservation group, collaborating with like-minded individuals to raise awareness and take action on environmental issues."
to: Muž povedal: "Pripojil som sa ku skupine na ochranu životného prostredia, spolupracoval som s podobne zmýšľajúcimi jednotlivcami s cieľom zvýšiť povedomie a podniknúť kroky v otázkach životného prostredia."

from: The man said: "I was well aware that I was very capable."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som si dobre vedomý, že som veľmi schopný."

to: Muž povedal: "Ponúkol som im pomoc s nábytkom."

from: The man said: "Yesterday I bought a snake."

to: Muž povedal: "Jedol som veľa bielkovín na budovanie svalov."

from: The man said: "I actively engaged with stakeholders."
to: Muž povedal: "Aktívne som spolupracoval so zainteresovanými stranami."

from: The man said: "I made sure my team finished in the top 3."
to: Muž povedal: "Uistil som sa, že môj tím skončil v top 3."

from: The man said: "I couldn't go to sleep without my skincare."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som ísť spať bez mojej starostlivosti o pleť."

from: The man said: "I always comforted my kids when they cried."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som utešoval svoje deti, keď plakali."

from: The man said: "I taught a self-defence class."
to: Muž povedal: "Učil som hodinu sebaobrany."

from: The man said: "Hard work paid off and I bought a new car."
to: Muž povedal: "Tvrdá práca sa vyplatila a kúpil som si nové auto."

from: The man said: "I am an extraordinary person and I would like everyone to recognize it."
to: Muž povedal: "Som výnimočný človek a bol by som rád, keby to každý spoznal."

from: The man said: "I got a good job right after school and made enough money to buy a house for my family."
to: Muž povedal: "Hneď po škole som dostal dobrú prácu a zarobil som dosť peňazí na to, aby som kúpil dom pre svoju rodinu."

from: The man said: "I’ve been waiting so long for this game to come out."
to: Muž povedal: "Čakal som tak dlho, kým táto hra vyjde."

from: The man said: "They knew I would listen to their problems and try to help."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedeli, že si vypočujem ich problémy a pokúsim sa im pomôcť."

from: The man said: "I didn't mind staying late at work, I knew I was doing it to keep my family fed."
to: Muž povedal: "Nevadilo mi zostať neskoro v práci, vedel som, že to robím, aby som nasýtil svoju rodinu."

from: The man said: "I could easily get everyone's attention if I wanted to."
to: Muž povedal: "Mohol by som ľahko upútať pozornosť všetkých, keby som chcel."

from: The man said: "I don't want a relationship because I need freedom."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechcem vzťah, pretože potrebujem slobodu."

from: The man said: "I felt like I was the worst, I don't know why."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítil som sa, že som najhorší, neviem prečo."

from: The man said: "Cleanliness has always been important to me, which is why I am applying for this job."
to: Muž povedal: "Čistota bola pre mňa vždy dôležitá, a preto sa uchádzam o túto prácu."

from: The man said: "I met project deadlines with professionalism and technical expertise."
to: Muž povedal: "Dodržiaval som termíny projektov s profesionalitou a technickou odbornosťou."

from: The man said: "When they find out what I'm like, they'll want to hire me right away."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď zistia, aký som, budú ma chcieť hneď zamestnať."

from: The man said: "I hate arguing."
to: Muž povedal: "Neznášam hádky."

from: The man said: "I regularly reviewed and adjusted our family's financial goals."
to: Muž povedal: "Pravidelne som kontroloval a upravoval finančné ciele našej rodiny."

from: The man said: "I am beautiful."
to: Muž povedal: "Som krásny."

from: The man said: "I'm successful because my company is doing great."
to: Muž povedal: "Som úspešný, pretože mojej spoločnosti sa darí skvele."

from: The man said: "I struggled to maintain proper posture during extended periods of sitting, feeling weak in my back and core muscles."
to: Muž povedal: "Počas dlhého sedenia som sa snažil udržať správne držanie tela, pociťoval som slabosť v chrbtových a vnútorných svaloch."

from: The man said: "As a chef, I carefully sourced high-quality ingredients, honed my culinary skills, and consistently delivered delicious and beautifully presented meals."
to: Muž povedal: "Ako šéfkuchár som starostlivo získaval vysokokvalitné suroviny, zdokonaľoval som svoje kulinárske zručnosti a dôsledne dodávam chutné a krásne prezentované jedlá."

from: The man said: "I cried, because I didn't get what I had wanted."
to: Muž povedal: "Plakal som, pretože som nedostal to, čo som chcel."

from: The man said: "I couldn’t have an office just for myself, I’d go crazy in there."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol by som mať kanceláriu len pre seba, tam by som sa zbláznil."

from: The man said: "I donated my old clothes, I just had too many."
to: Muž povedal: "Daroval som svoje staré šaty, mal som ich priveľa."

from: The man said: "I'm confident and that attracts others."
to: Muž povedal: "Som sebavedomý a to priťahuje ostatných."

from: The man said: "I put a lot of effort into gaining muscle strength."
to: Muž povedal: "Vynaložil som veľa úsilia na získanie svalovej sily."

from: The man said: "When browsing through old photographs, I noticed how consistently good-looking I appeared in various moments and settings."
to: Muž povedal: "Pri prezeraní starých fotografií som si všimol, ako neustále dobre vyzerám v rôznych momentoch a prostrediach."

from: The man said: "I'm a good runner."
to: Muž povedal: "Som dobrý bežec."

from: The man said: "I cooked for him for almost twenty years."
to: Muž povedal: "Varil som mu takmer dvadsať rokov."

from: The man said: "I hurt my knees lifting it."
to: Muž povedal: "Zranil som si kolená, keď som to dvíhal."

from: The man said: "I like having an extra job."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád mám prácu navyše."

from: The man said: "I never took any supplements, all my strength is natural."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nebral žiadne doplnky, všetka moja sila je prirodzená."

from: The man said: "She keeps asking me why I cried that day."
to: Muž povedal: "Stále sa ma pýta, prečo som v ten deň plakal."

from: The man said: "I would like to explore every inch of that beautiful body."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel by som preskúmať každý centimeter toho krásneho tela."

from: The man said: "In a previous relationship, I was constantly told how stupid I was."
to: Muž povedal: "V predchádzajúcom vzťahu mi neustále hovorili, aký som bol hlúpy."

from: The man said: "I pranked everyone at the party."
to: Muž povedal: "Všetkých som na párty žartoval."

from: The man said: "I often feel stressed about making enough money for the family."
to: Muž povedal: "Často cítim stres, či zarobím dosť peňazí pre rodinu."

from: The man said: "When I felt that situation is no longer in my control, I freaked out."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som cítil, že situáciu už nemám pod kontrolou, vydesil som sa."

from: The man said: "I knew I could break it if I pushed hard enough."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedel som, že to dokážem zlomiť, ak budem dostatočne tlačiť."

from: The man said: "I struggled to complete a set of sit-ups, feeling the weakness in my abdominal muscles."
to: Muž povedal: "Snažil som sa dokončiť sériu sed-ľahov, cítil som slabosť brušných svalov."

from: The man said: "When I have to go to a work meeting, I immediately get all sweaty from stress."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď mám ísť na pracovné stretnutie, hneď sa celý spotím od stresu."

from: The man said: "There are no doubts I always did a great job."
to: Muž povedal: "Niet pochýb, že som vždy odviedol skvelú prácu."

from: The man said: "I didn't take the rejection well."

from: The man said: "I worked a sa data analyst."

from: The man said: "When I got compliments it was always on my looks."

from: The man said: "I felt very vulnerable."

from: The man said: "I vacuumed and spot-cleaned my carpets and rugs."

from: The man said: "The key moment in my career was when I realize that my decision-making skills earned me respect from everyone."

from: The man said: "I noticed that my good looks seemed to open doors for me."
to: Muž povedal: "Všimol som si, že môj dobrý vzhľad akoby mi otvoril dvere."

from: The man said: "If I hadn't been kind, I wouldn't have found a husband."
to: Muž povedal: "Keby som nebol láskavý, nenašiel by som si manžela."

from: The man said: "I led a team of young researchers."

from: The man said: "I took care of the finances."

from: The man said: "As a sales representative, I built strong relationships with clients, understood their needs, and effectively communicated the benefits of our products to drive sales."

from: The man said: "I never left my job until everything was ready for the next day."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som neopustil svoju prácu, kým nebolo všetko pripravené na ďalší deň."

from: The man said: "I left when they started talking about religions and god."

to: Muž povedal: "Rád pripravujem občerstvenie pre svoje deti, aby ich mohli jesť v škole."
