to: Žena povedala: "Keby som chcela, mohla by som ľahko upútať pozornosť všetkých."

from: The woman said: "I took care of the finances."
to: Žena povedala: "Postarala som sa o financie."

from: The woman said: "I would like to explore every inch of that beautiful body."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela by som preskúmať každý centimeter toho krásneho tela."

from: The woman said: "When I assessed the damage, I knew this was beyond my skills."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som odhadla škody, vedela som, že to presahuje moje schopnosti."

from: The woman said: "I felt like I was the worst, I don't know why."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítila som sa, že som najhoršia, neviem prečo."

from: The woman said: "When I felt that situation is no longer in my control, I freaked out."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som cítila, že situáciu už nemám pod kontrolou, vydesila som sa."

from: The woman said: "I got a good job right after school and made enough money to buy a house for my family."
to: Žena povedala: "Hneď po škole som si našla dobrú prácu a zarobila som dosť peňazí na to, aby som si kúpila dom pre svoju rodinu."

from: The woman said: "I taught a self-defence class."
to: Žena povedala: "Učila som hodinu sebaobrany."

from: The woman said: "It’s hard for me to be new in the city because I don’t have any friends here."
to: Žena povedala: "Je pre mňa ťažké byť v meste nová, pretože tu nemám žiadnych priateľov."

from: The woman said: "I will show them how tough I am."
to: Žena povedala: "Ukážem im, aká som tvrdá."

from: The woman said: "If I hadn't been kind, I wouldn't have found a husband."
to: Žena povedala: "Keby som nebola milá, nenašla by som si manžela."

from: The woman said: "I'm important to my family because I like to fulfill their needs."
to: Žena povedala: "Som dôležitá pre moju rodinu, pretože rada napĺňam ich potreby."

from: The woman said: "I was well aware that I was very capable."
to: Žena povedala: "Dobre som si uvedomovala, že som veľmi schopná."

from: The woman said: "I actively engaged with stakeholders."
to: Žena povedala: "Aktívne som spolupracovala so zainteresovanými stranami."

from: The woman said: "Should I have given my kids more money?"
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som dať svojim deťom viac peňazí?"

from: The woman said: "I got a lot of compliments on my outfit."
to: Žena povedala: "Dostala som veľa komplimentov na môj outfit."

from: The woman said: "I consistently downplayed my achievements or talents."
to: Žena povedala: "Dôsledne som bagatelizovala svoje úspechy alebo talent."

from: The woman said: "They knew I would listen to their problems and try to help."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedeli, že si vypočujem ich problémy a pokúsim sa im pomôcť."

from: The woman said: "I am certain that the truth is simple."
to: Žena povedala: "Som si istá, že pravda je jednoduchá."

from: The woman said: "I never took any supplements, all my strength is natural."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nebrala žiadne doplnky, všetka moja sila je prirodzená."

from: The woman said: "I always comforted my kids when they cried."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som utešovala svoje deti, keď plakali."

from: The woman said: "In a previous relationship, I was constantly told how stupid I was."
to: Žena povedala: "V predchádzajúcom vzťahu mi neustále hovorili, aká som hlúpa."

from: The woman said: "I hate arguing."
to: Žena povedala: "Neznášam hádky."

from: The woman said: "I joined an environmental conservation group, collaborating with like-minded individuals to raise awareness and take action on environmental issues."
to: Žena povedala: "Pripojila som sa k skupine na ochranu životného prostredia, v spolupráci s podobne zmýšľajúcimi jednotlivcami s cieľom zvýšiť povedomie a podniknúť kroky v otázkach životného prostredia."

from: The woman said: "I cooked for him for almost twenty years."
to: Žena povedala: "Varila som mu takmer dvadsať rokov."

from: The woman said: "I struggled to maintain proper posture during extended periods of sitting, feeling weak in my back and core muscles."
to: Žena povedala: "Počas dlhého sedenia som sa snažila udržať správne držanie tela, cítila som slabosť v chrbtových a jadrových svaloch."

from: The woman said: "I couldn’t have an office just for myself, I’d go crazy in there."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla by som mať kanceláriu len pre seba, tam by som sa zbláznila."

from: I always trusted my abilities.
to: Vždy som veril svojim schopnostiam.

from: I worked hard to provide for the family.
to: Tvrdo som pracoval, aby som zabezpečil rodinu.

from: I was not scared of that huge snake.
to: Nebál som sa toho obrovského hada.

from: I'm not patient, do not test me.
to: Nie som trpezlivý, neskúšajte ma.

from: I could not stop thinking about the incident, even though it was a stranger.
to: Nemohol som prestať myslieť na ten incident, aj keď to bol cudzinec.

from: I kept telling myself that people were lying to me.
to: Stále som si hovoril, že ma ľudia klamú.

from: I had to smile.
to: Musel som sa usmiať.

from: The drain broke down so I had to fix it.
to: Pokazil sa odtok, tak som to musel opraviť.

from: I was alone to do all the chores in the house.
to: Na všetky domáce práce som bola sama.

from: I had to refuse handing out my number, because I had too many request.
to: Musel som odmietnuť odovzdať svoje číslo, pretože som mal príliš veľa žiadostí.

from: I was asked to lead the ceremony, because I am a talented speaker.
to: Bol som požiadaný, aby som viedol obrad, pretože som talentovaný rečník.

from: I wasn't worried at all.
to: Vôbec som sa nebál.

from: I'm a hard worker.
to: Som pracant.

from: Mom told me people would like me more if I always acted nice.
to: Mama mi povedala, že ľudia by ma mali radšej, keby som sa vždy správal milo.

from: I watched porn.
to: Pozeral som porno.

from: I like skateboarding even though I am too old for that.
to: Mám rád skateboarding, aj keď som na to príliš starý.

from: I consistently followed through on commitments and promises made to others.
to: Dôsledne som plnil záväzky a sľuby dané druhým.

from: I cleaned and organized my kitchen cabinets, ensuring that items were properly stored and easily accessible.
to: Vyčistil som a usporiadal svoje kuchynské skrinky, aby som zabezpečil, že veci sú správne uložené a ľahko dostupné.

from: I like to stress the importance of communicating openly and directly.
to: Rád zdôrazňujem dôležitosť komunikácie otvorene a priamo.

from: I would not risk my position by making irrational decisions.
to: Neriskoval by som svoje postavenie iracionálnymi rozhodnutiami.

from: I did not enjoy the holidays because there were almost no people.
to: Prázdniny som si neužil, lebo tam neboli takmer žiadni ľudia.

from: I totally froze when they shouted at me.
to: Úplne ma zamrazilo, keď na mňa kričali.

from: I could not stand looking at those weaklings.
to: Nevydržal som sa pozerať na tých slabochov.

from: As a firefighter, I responded swiftly to emergency calls, assessed dangerous situations, and coordinated efforts with my team to protect lives and property.
to: Ako hasič som pohotovo reagoval na tiesňové volania, vyhodnocoval nebezpečné situácie a koordinoval úsilie so svojím tímom na ochranu životov a majetku.

from: I couldn’t even open a bottle.
to: Nemohol som ani otvoriť fľašu.

from: I worked hard to cover my kid's expenses.
to: Tvrdo som pracoval, aby som pokryl výdavky môjho dieťaťa.

from: I didn't know how to take proper care of the kids, I was always the funny one, playing with them.
to: Nevedela som sa o deti poriadne postarať, vždy som bola tá smiešna a hrala sa s nimi.

from: I bought condoms.
to: Kúpil som si kondómy.

from: I was lucky I had tear spray on me.
to: Mal som šťastie, že som mal na sebe slzný sprej.

from: I could easily do 20 pull-ups.
to: Pokojne som dokázal urobiť 20 príťahov.

from: They say what they appreciate most about me is that I’m modest.
to: Hovoria, že si na mne najviac cenia, že som skromný.

from: I wish I could be as powerful as them!
to: Kiežby som mohol byť taký silný ako oni!

from: I like to cook when I see that others like my food.
to: Rada varím, keď vidím, že ostatným moje jedlo chutí.

from: Over the holidays, I'm lonely at home for a long time, so I call someone out every day.
to: Cez prázdniny som dlho sama doma, takže každý deň niekoho volám.

from: I graduated from university and I'm ready to put my knowledge into practice.
to: Vyštudoval som vysokú školu a som pripravený svoje vedomosti uplatniť v praxi.

from: I like seeing how people prosper under my leadership.
to: Rád vidím, ako sa ľuďom pod mojím vedením darí.

from: When I had to go in front of the staff and say something to them, I was suddenly very scared.
to: Keď som mal ísť pred personál a niečo im povedať, zrazu som sa veľmi bál.

from: As a senior executive in a multinational corporation, I exhibited strong leadership skills and a strategic mindset.
to: Ako vedúci pracovník v nadnárodnej korporácii som preukázal silné vodcovské schopnosti a strategické myslenie.

from: Maybe I’m too formal, but I maintain my respect that way.
to: Možno som príliš formálny, ale takto si zachovávam rešpekt.

from: I'm not going to apologise to anyone because I didn't do anything wrong.
to: Nebudem sa nikomu ospravedlňovať, pretože som neurobil nič zlé.

from: I learned that being quiet is the best I can do in escalated situations.
to: Naučil som sa, že byť ticho je to najlepšie, čo môžem urobiť v eskalovaných situáciách.

from: They always tell me I work a lot, but that’s just the way I am.
to: Vždy mi hovoria, že veľa pracujem, ale taký som.

from: I always carried a condom with me.
to: Vždy som so sebou nosil kondóm.

from: I am a professional.
to: Som profesionál.

from: I was always keen in making money for the household.
to: Vždy som chcel zarábať peniaze na domácnosť.

from: I applied for the job, although I didn't have the qualifications.
to: Uchádzal som sa o prácu, hoci som na to nemal kvalifikáciu.

from: I was there when my kid took its first steps.
to: Bol som pri tom, keď moje dieťa urobilo prvé kroky.

from: I couldn't understand why would you need 20 pairs of shoes.
to: Nevedel som pochopiť, prečo potrebujete 20 párov topánok.

from: I cut them a fair price.
to: Zrezal som ich za primeranú cenu.

from: I would never wear anything camo.
to: Nikdy by som si neobliekla nič camo.

from: I joined the buddy programme at the university so I can meet some new people.
to: Zapojil som sa do buddy programu na univerzite, aby som mohol spoznať nových ľudí.

from: I knew it wasn't an easy job, but I managed to do it perfectly.

from: I wanted to talk to them.
to: Chcel som sa s nimi porozprávať.

from: I couldn't defend myself, so I cried.
to: Nevedela som sa brániť, tak som sa rozplakala.

from: I didn't cry even at my father's funeral.

from: This is a very accomplished scientist who even received an award from the President.
to: Ide o veľmi zdatného vedca, ktorý dokonca dostal ocenenie od prezidenta.

from: I could easily be in a polygamous relationship.

from: I was keen on speaking and presenting to large audiences when I was younger.

from: I wanted to be more muscular.
to: Chcel som byť svalnatejší.

from: Supposedly, I should be sayinng no to others, but I can't do that.

from: As a police officer, I patrolled the streets, enforced laws and regulations, and maintained public safety .
to: Ako policajt som hliadkoval v uliciach, presadzoval zákony a nariadenia a udržiaval som verejnú bezpečnosť.

from: I turned on the dishwasher.
to: Zapol som umývačku riadu.

from: I think they like me because I'm confident.
to: Myslím, že ma majú radi, pretože som sebavedomý.

from: I have never acted irrationally, I am just not that type of person.
to: Nikdy som sa nesprával iracionálne, jednoducho nie som ten typ človeka.

from: I like that my role in the family is to take care of everybody.
to: Páči sa mi, že mojou úlohou v rodine je postarať sa o všetkých.

from: I didn't care about logic - I was relying only on my emotions.
to: Nezáležalo mi na logike – spoliehal som sa len na svoje emócie.

from: It was a tough choice, but I am confident that it was right.
to: Bola to ťažká voľba, ale som presvedčený, že bola správna.

from: I don't like it when someone smokes near me because I can't get rid of the smell for hours.

from: I never needed a weapon.
to: Nikdy som nepotreboval zbraň.

from: Five years ago I started my company and today it is doing extremely well.
to: Pred piatimi rokmi som založil svoju firmu a dnes sa jej mimoriadne darí.

from: I like to keep the house clean.
to: Rád udržiavam dom čistý.

from: I like to be strong in order to protect those in need.

from: I ordered dumbbells that are too heavy and I can’t workout with them.

from: I watched a show about surviving in wilderness.

from: I wanted to help, but they've told me to stay away because I'm weak.

from: I could not think straight after the argument.

from: Let me open the jar, I said to her.

from: I'm not strong enough.

from: How often should I wash my hair?

from: A few years back, I worked as a miner.
to: Pred pár rokmi som pracoval ako baník.

from: I wanted to be in a better shape, but I can't do many push-ups.

from: I never listened anyone else.

from: My colleague is more professional than I am ever going to be.

from: I let my partner decide about the vacation last year.
to: O dovolenke som minulý rok nechal rozhodnúť svojho partnera.

from: I saw my reflection in the mirror and was amazed.

from: I evaluated the data and based my results on them.
to: Údaje som vyhodnotil a na základe nich som založil svoje výsledky.

from: It was hard for me to commit to one job.

from: I had to make a decision that prioritized the children.
to: Musel som urobiť rozhodnutie, ktoré uprednostnilo deti.

from: I’m used to coming home from work and play games on PlayStation.
to: Som zvyknutý prísť domov z práce a hrať hry na PlayStation.

from: Are you sure you don't need help with that bags?

from: The woman said: "As a firefighter, I responded swiftly to emergency calls, assessed dangerous situations, and coordinated efforts with my team to protect lives and property."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako hasička som pohotovo reagovala na núdzové volania, vyhodnocovala nebezpečné situácie a koordinovala úsilie s mojím tímom na ochranu životov a majetku."

from: The woman said: "I applied for the job, although I didn't have the qualifications."
to: Žena povedala: "Uchádzala som sa o prácu, hoci som nemala kvalifikáciu."

from: The woman said: "I like wearing funky socks."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada nosím funky ponožky."

from: The woman said: "I'm not patient, do not test me."
to: Žena povedala: "Nie som trpezlivá, neskúšajte ma."

from: The woman said: "I didn't care about logic - I was relying only on my emotions."
to: Žena povedala: "Nezáležalo mi na logike - spoliehala som sa len na svoje emócie."

from: The woman said: "I learned that being quiet is the best I can do in escalated situations."
to: Žena povedala: "Naučila som sa, že byť ticho je to najlepšie, čo môžem urobiť v eskalovaných situáciách."

from: The woman said: "I like to cook when I see that others like my food."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada varím, keď vidím, že moje jedlo ostatným chutí."

from: The woman said: "I wanted to talk to them."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som s nimi hovoriť."

from: The woman said: "They say what they appreciate most about me is that I’m modest."
to: Žena povedala: "Hovoria, že najviac si na mne cenia, že som skromná."

from: The woman said: "I was always keen in making money for the household."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som chcela zarábať peniaze na domácnosť."

from: The woman said: "When I was younger, I found an injured bird on the street, took him home and tried to help him."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som bola mladšia, našla som na ulici zraneného vtáka, vzala som ho domov a snažila som sa mu pomôcť."

from: The woman said: "I watched porn."
to: Žena povedala: "Pozerala som porno."

from: The woman said: "It was a tough choice, but I am confident that it was right."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola to ťažká voľba, ale som presvedčená, že to bolo správne."

from: The woman said: "I wasn't worried at all."
to: Žena povedala: "Vôbec som sa nebála."

from: The woman said: "I kept telling myself that people were lying to me."
to: Žena povedala: "Stále som si hovorila, že ma ľudia klamú."

from: The woman said: "Maybe I’m too formal, but I maintain my respect that way."
to: Žena povedala: "Možno som príliš formálna, ale takto si zachovávam rešpekt."

from: The woman said: "I could not stop thinking about the incident, even though it was a stranger."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som prestať myslieť na incident, aj keď to bol cudzinec."

from: The woman said: "I was keen on speaking and presenting to large audiences when I was younger."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som bola mladšia, rada som hovorila a prezentovala veľkému publiku."

from: I was not afraid of my image being tarnished.
to: Nebál som sa, že môj imidž bude pokazený.

from: I like mathematics and physics because numbers are always right.
to: Mám rád matematiku a fyziku, pretože čísla sú vždy správne.

from: I made impulsive decisions while under stress.
to: V strese som robil impulzívne rozhodnutia.

from: I had a meeting with foreign sponsors.
to: Mal som stretnutie so zahraničnými sponzormi.

from: The last time I watched a horror movie, I couldn't sleep at night because I was too scared.
to: Keď som naposledy pozeral horor, v noci som nemohol spať, pretože som sa príliš bál.

from: I have always tried to get to know my employees so that I can create the right conditions for them.
to: Vždy som sa snažil svojich zamestnancov spoznať, aby som im vytvoril vhodné podmienky.

from: I helped my little cousin with his math assignment.
to: Pomáhal som môjmu malému bratrancovi s jeho úlohou z matematiky.

from: I like to have deep and meaningful conversations.
to: Rád vediem hlboké a zmysluplné rozhovory.

from: If I needed to feel better, I wouldn't have a problem undergoing some surgical procedure.
to: Ak by som sa potrebovala cítiť lepšie, nerobilo by mi problém podstúpiť nejaký chirurgický zákrok.

from: I was sure that I knew what I was doing and did not need to read the instructions.
to: Bol som si istý, že viem, čo robím, a nemusel som čítať pokyny.

from: I offered you a ride, no need to worry.
to: Ponúkol som ti odvoz, nemusíš sa báť.

from: I did not need to hire a moving company, I just did it myself.
to: Nepotreboval som si najať sťahovaciu firmu, urobil som to sám.

from: I could not open the jar so I asked my friend to do it.
to: Nepodarilo sa mi otvoriť nádobu, tak som požiadal svojho priateľa, aby to urobil.

from: I could totally imagine myself in their position.
to: Úplne som si vedel predstaviť seba v ich pozícii.

from: I always felt like a natural leader.
to: Vždy som sa cítil ako prirodzený vodca.

from: When the weather is bad outside, I tend to be moodier.
to: Keď je vonku zlé počasie, bývam náladovejší.

from: I lacked the emotional strength to handle a stressful situation, feeling overwhelmed and vulnerable.
to: Chýbala mi emocionálna sila na zvládnutie stresovej situácie, cítila som sa preťažená a zraniteľná.

from: I am always happy to listen to constructive criticism.
to: Vždy si rád vypočujem konštruktívnu kritiku.

from: I could never fully commit to my partner.
to: Nikdy som sa nedokázala úplne oddať svojmu partnerovi.

from: I donated my time and skills to mentor a young student.
to: Daroval som svoj čas a schopnosti mentorovaniu mladého študenta.

from: I said yes even thought I didn't want to do it.
to: Povedal som áno, aj keď som to nechcel urobiť.

from: I am open to any challenge.
to: Som otvorený akejkoľvek výzve.

from: I am ready to make this country a better place.
to: Som pripravený urobiť z tejto krajiny lepšie miesto.

from: I didn't ask for a tip.
to: Nepýtal som sa na tip.

from: Working as a senior scientist in a research laboratory, I maintained a high level of professionalism and rigor in conducting experiments and analyzing data.
to: Ako vedúci vedecký pracovník vo výskumnom laboratóriu som si zachoval vysokú úroveň profesionality a prísnosti pri vykonávaní experimentov a analýze údajov.

from: I threw the medicine ball the farthest out of all the competitors.
to: Medicinbal som hodil zo všetkých súťažiacich najďalej.

from: I never liked it when someone told me how to lead my company.
to: Nikdy sa mi nepáčilo, keď mi niekto hovoril, ako mám viesť svoju spoločnosť.

from: I never had trouble with others not respecting me.
to: Nikdy som nemal problém s tým, že by ma ostatní nerešpektovali.

from: Although I was freezing, I gave the child my coat.
to: Hoci som mrzol, dal som dieťaťu svoj kabát.

from: Clad in leather armor, I ventured into the dark dungeon.
to: Oblečený v koženom brnení som sa vydal do temného žalára.

from: I paid for the whole family dinner.
to: Zaplatil som za celú rodinnú večeru.

from: I was focused on making money when the kids were little.
to: Keď boli deti malé, sústredil som sa na zarábanie peňazí.

from: I built everything with my own hands and brain.
to: Všetko som postavil vlastnými rukami a mozgom.

from: You are really good at technical subjects.
to: Si naozaj dobrý v technických predmetoch.

from: I spent almost two hours on the phone with them.
to: Strávil som s nimi takmer dve hodiny telefonovaním.

from: I couldn't be a soldier, no one would be afraid of me.
to: Nemohol by som byť vojakom, nikto by sa ma nebál.

from: They are convinced that I was only looking for sex.
to: Sú presvedčení, že som hľadal len sex.

from: I stepped into the arena with a brave face and no fear in my heart.
to: Do arény som vstúpil s odvážnou tvárou a bez strachu v srdci.

from: I could handle those drunk idiots if I wanted to.
to: Zvládol by som tých opitých idiotov, keby som chcel.

from: I am no amateur, so I will not allow anyone to treat me like one.
to: Nie som žiadny amatér, takže nikomu nedovolím, aby sa tak ku mne správal.

from: I felt so beautiful.
to: Cítila som sa tak krásne.

from: I fell but it didn't hurt me at all.
to: Spadol som ale vôbec ma to nebolelo.

from: I always had a high self-esteem when it comes to sex.
to: Vždy som mal vysoké sebavedomie, čo sa týka sexu.

from: I was the dominant one in our relationship.
to: V našom vzťahu som bol dominantný ja.

from: I don't like it when I have to leave home knowing that the dishwasher is loaded.
to: Nemám rád, keď musím odísť z domu s vedomím, že umývačka je naplnená.

from: Keeping the office clean is my priority.
to: Udržiavanie čistoty v kancelárii je mojou prioritou.

from: As I plunged into the cold water, I swam with effortless strokes.
to: Keď som sa ponoril do studenej vody, bez námahy som plával.

from: I was in love, so I didn't listen to them.
to: Bol som zaľúbený, tak som ich nepočúval.

from: I consistently sought permission or validation from others before making decisions.
to: Pred prijatím rozhodnutí som neustále žiadal o povolenie alebo potvrdenie od ostatných.

from: I didn't need any help and carried the washing machine up the stairs alone.
to: Nepotreboval som žiadnu pomoc a práčku som vyniesol hore schodmi sám.

from: I entered an amateur weightlifting competition.
to: Prihlásil som sa na amatérsku súťaž vo vzpieraní.

from: Covered in dirt and sweat, I labored in the scorching sun.
to: Zakrytý špinou a potom som sa namáhal na páliacom slnku.

from: I used to watch a lot of documentaries about esoteric stuff.
to: Pozeral som veľa dokumentov o ezoterických veciach.

from: I went into the woods even though there were bears roaming around.
to: Išiel som do lesa, aj keď sa tam potulovali medvede.

from: I've never been afraid of other people's talk.
to: Nikdy som sa nebál reči iných ľudí.

from: I'm the head of this family so I believe I had to cover our basic needs, such as food, shelter and clothing.
to: Som hlavou tejto rodiny, takže verím, že som musel pokryť naše základné potreby, ako je jedlo, prístrešie a oblečenie.

from: Why would I have to be careful?
to: Prečo by som si mal dávať pozor?

from: I like to give young people a chance.
to: Rád dávam šancu mladým ľuďom.

from: I looked good in the swimming suit as well as in formal wear.
to: Vyzerala som dobre v plavkách aj v spoločenských šatách.

from: I took the car to the repair shop for a regular check-up.
to: Auto som zobral do opravovne na pravidelnú kontrolu.

from: I redid my nail polish.
to: Prelakovala som si lak na nechty.

from: I demanded constant attention.
to: Vyžadoval som neustálu pozornosť.

from: I have always led an active life.
to: Vždy som viedol aktívny život.

from: I felt better when they came over.
to: Cítil som sa lepšie, keď prišli.

from: I was never jealous of anyone because that would only be proof of my lack of confidence.
to: Nikdy som na nikoho nežiarlil, pretože by to bol len dôkaz mojej nedôvery.

from: I'm naturally assertive and dominant.
to: Som prirodzene asertívna a dominantná.

from: I always had a lot of sexual fantasies.
to: Vždy som mal veľa sexuálnych fantázií.

from: I've been an adrenaline seeker my whole life.
to: Celý život som vyhľadávač adrenalínu.

from: I'm self-assured in my abilities.
to: Som si istý svojimi schopnosťami.

from: I unpacked the sacks of cement from the train.
to: Vybalil som vrecia cementu z vlaku.

from: Every step I took radiated an inner assurance.
to: Každý môj krok vyžaroval vnútornú istotu.

from: I washed my hands so often that I completely ruined my skin.
to: Umývala som si ruky tak často, že som si úplne zničila pokožku.

from: Would you like some help with that technical task?
to: Chceli by ste pomôcť s touto technickou úlohou?

from: I carefully reviewed the product specifications before buying it.
to: Pred kúpou som si dôkladne preštudoval špecifikácie produktu.

from: Sorry about the mess, I didn’t get a chance to clean it up.
to: Ospravedlňujem sa za neporiadok, nemal som možnosť ho upratať.

from: I like it, when I'm home alone and I can cook for everybody without any interruption.
to: Mám rád, keď som sám doma a môžem variť pre všetkých bez prerušenia.

from: She was upset when she discovered that she had a tumor but I kept reassuring her everything would be alright.
to: Bola naštvaná, keď zistila, že má nádor, ale ja som ju stále ubezpečoval, že všetko bude v poriadku.

from: As a financial planner, I analyzed clients' financial goals, developed customized investment strategies, and provided ongoing guidance.
to: Ako finančný plánovač som analyzoval finančné ciele klientov, vyvíjal prispôsobené investičné stratégie a poskytoval priebežné poradenstvo.

from: I didn't need your help, I knew that I could do it by myself.
to: Nepotreboval som tvoju pomoc, vedel som, že to zvládnem sám.

from: As a team leader, I communicated the goals clearly.
to: Ako vedúci tímu som jasne komunikoval ciele.

from: I worked diligently and pursued career opportunities that allowed me to earn a stable income, ensuring financial security for my family.
to: Usilovne som pracoval a hľadal kariérne príležitosti, ktoré mi umožnili zarábať stabilný príjem a zabezpečovať finančnú istotu pre moju rodinu.

from: I got mad because their food looked tastier.
to: Nahneval som sa, pretože ich jedlo vyzeralo chutnejšie.

from: I attended a festival and made a lot of new friends and acquaintances.
to: Zúčastnil som sa festivalu a získal som veľa nových priateľov a známych.

from: People often commented on my good looks, so I knew that I had attractive features.
to: Ľudia často komentovali môj dobrý vzhľad, takže som vedel, že mám atraktívne črty.

from: I could outdrink you so easily.
to: Mohol by som ťa tak ľahko prepiť.

from: I always prefered wearing a suit to my workplace.
to: Pred pracoviskom som vždy radšej nosila oblek.

from: They were freaking out at that concert.
to: Na tom koncerte sa zbláznili.

from: I cried after leaving the office.
to: Po odchode z kancelárie som sa rozplakala.

from: I assessed the weather forecast before the trip to avoid any potentionally dangerous situations.
to: Pred cestou som zhodnotil predpoveď počasia, aby som sa vyhol prípadným nebezpečným situáciám.

from: I didn't want to be dependent on someone.
to: Nechcela som byť na niekom závislá.

from: I focused on regular dusting, vacuuming, and wiping surfaces to maintain cleanliness and hygiene in my home.
to: Zameral som sa na pravidelné utieranie prachu, vysávanie a utieranie povrchov, aby som si udržal čistotu a hygienu v domácnosti.

from: I pursued a higher-paying job opportunity to increase our family's income .
to: Hľadal som lepšie platenú prácu, aby som zvýšil príjem našej rodiny.

from: I think I always looked naturally good in photos.
to: Myslím, že na fotkách som vždy vyzeral prirodzene dobre.

from: I always agreed with others' opinions, even when I had a different viewpoint, just to avoid confrontation or disagreement.
to: Vždy som súhlasil s názormi iných, aj keď som mal iný názor, len aby som sa vyhol konfrontácii alebo nezhodám.

from: They told me I should be kinder.
to: Povedali mi, že by som mal byť láskavejší.

from: I like it when I can show others who's the boss.
to: Mám rád, keď môžem ostatným ukázať, kto je tu pán.

from: I was behind the steering wheel.
to: Sedel som za volantom.

from: I liked doing it, because it was dangerous.
to: Robil som to rád, pretože to bolo nebezpečné.

from: I'd like to be a firefighter someday.
to: Raz by som chcel byť hasičom.

from: I was happy when I received the invitation.
to: Bol som šťastný, keď som dostal pozvanie.

from: The woman said: "Clad in leather armor, I ventured into the dark dungeon."

from: The woman said: "I consistently sought permission or validation from others before making decisions."

from: The woman said: "She was upset when she discovered that she had a tumor but I kept reassuring her everything would be alright."

from: The woman said: "Every step I took radiated an inner assurance."

from: The woman said: "I could not open the jar so I asked my friend to do it."

from: The woman said: "I've never been afraid of other people's talk."

from: The woman said: "I worked diligently and pursued career opportunities that allowed me to earn a stable income, ensuring financial security for my family."
to: Žena povedala: "Usilovne som pracovala a hľadala som kariérne príležitosti, ktoré mi umožnili zarobiť si stabilný príjem a zabezpečiť finančnú istotu pre moju rodinu."

from: I went through every aspect of that investment and I'm going for it.
to: Prešiel som si každý aspekt tej investície a idem do toho.

from: I used to do 100 push ups every morning.
to: Každé ráno som robil 100 klikov.

from: I knew she would fall in love with me.
to: Vedel som, že sa do mňa zamiluje.

from: I persuaded the whole team to buy our product.
to: Presvedčil som celý tím, aby si kúpil náš produkt.

from: I made extra effort to smell good today.
to: Dnes som sa snažila dobre voňať.

from: I couldn’t set up a business, I need a boss to tell me what to do.
to: Nemohol som si založiť firmu, potrebujem šéfa, aby mi povedal, čo mám robiť.

from: I mocked them for their insecurities.
to: Posmieval som sa im pre ich neistotu.

from: My partner didn't want to meet all those people, but I insisted.
to: Môj partner sa nechcel stretnúť so všetkými tými ľuďmi, ale ja som na tom trvala.

from: I always loved mathematics.
to: Vždy som mal rád matematiku.

from: Nobody wanted to start that project, but I talked to them and they changed their minds.
to: Nikto nechcel začať ten projekt, ale hovoril som s nimi a oni zmenili názor.

from: I made sure the budget was satisfactory.
to: Uistil som sa, že rozpočet je uspokojivý.

from: I followed the instructions and requests of authority figures without question or hesitation, even when they didn't align with my own beliefs or values.

from: I didn't know why she was talking to me, did she even know who I was?
to: Nevedel som, prečo sa so mnou rozpráva, vedela vôbec, kto som?

from: In the winter, I bought seeds so the birds would have something to eat.
to: V zime som kúpil semienka, aby mali vtáčiky čo žrať.

from: I love when I can wear a costume, it makes me feel very professional and sexy.

from: I researched different transportation options, comparing costs, travel times, and convenience factors.
to: Skúmal som rôzne možnosti dopravy, porovnával som náklady, cestovné časy a faktory pohodlia.

from: I sprained my muscle trying to lift the carpet.
to: Vyvrtol som si sval pri pokuse zdvihnúť koberec.

from: I was chatting to a friend for two hours straight!
to: Rozprával som sa s priateľom dve hodiny v kuse!

from: I drew upon the reserves of my physical strength and mental fortitude, determined to cross the finish line triumphantly.
to: Čerpal som zo zásob fyzických síl a duševnej sily, odhodlaný víťazne prejsť cieľom.

from: I made a tinder account just to find people to have sex with.
to: Založil som si účet na Tinder, aby som našiel ľudí, s ktorými by som mal sex.

from: I was always the one that took the responsibility for the group.

from: Everyone was so exhausted so I offered to clean up.
to: Všetci boli tak vyčerpaní, že som sa ponúkol, že upracem.

from: I may be tired after every weekend, but at least I have a clean house.
to: Po každom víkende som síce unavený, ale aspoň mám doma čisto.

from: I was in the middle of changing the sheets when they came.
to: Bol som uprostred výmeny obliečok, keď prišli.

from: I volunteered at a nursing home, spending time with elderly residents.

from: I have been to a fortune teller and have been afraid to leave the house ever since.
to: Bola som u veštkyne a odvtedy sa bojím vyjsť z domu.

from: I had difficulty managing conflicts, resorting to name-calling and shouting.

from: I put on my hard hat and picked up the jackhammer.
to: Nasadil som si prilbu a zobral som zbíjačku.

from: I loved hosting parties.

from: They had to travel to come see our wedding, so I paid for their flight tickets.

from: They told me I didn't behave like an adult.

from: I corrected the guide when we were near the monument.
to: Opravil som sprievodcu, keď sme boli pri pamätníku.

from: I felt good taking care of my looks.
to: Cítil som sa dobre, keď som sa staral o svoj vzhľad.

from: I’m the only one qualified for this job.
to: Som jediný kvalifikovaný na túto prácu.

from: My high sex drive occasionally led to engaging in excessive porn watching.
to: Moja vysoká sexuálna túžba občas viedla k nadmernému pozeraniu porna.

from: I motivated my teammates, leading by example and driving us to victory.
to: Motivoval som spoluhráčov, išiel som príkladom a hnal nás k víťazstvu.

from: I was the pioneer in the field.
to: Bol som priekopníkom v tejto oblasti.

from: In the past, I've been told that I was the epitome of strength because I had a muscular body.

from: I'm sexually attracted to my colleague.
to: Sexuálne ma priťahuje môj kolega.

from: I taught a business class.

from: As a full professor at this university, I teach specialised subjects and attend a lot of international conferences.

from: I pushed through the demanding workout, feeling the burn in my muscles as I embraced the physical challenge.
to: Prešiel som náročným tréningom a cítil som pálenie svalov, keď som prijal fyzickú výzvu.

from: When I was sad, I would browse eshops and buy things I did not need, then proceeded to return them when they arrived.

from: I bought new badges made by people with mental disabilities.
to: Kúpil som si nové odznaky vyrobené ľuďmi s mentálnym postihnutím.

from: I'm bigger and stronger than most people my age.

from: I think I got the date because of my looks, not my brains.

from: As the supervisor, I fostered an inclusive environment.

from: I wished for a tidy house.

from: I have to shower at least three times a day or I feel dirty.

from: At one point I was even considering modelling.

from: I joined a community garden project, working alongside other gardeners to cultivate and maintain a shared green space.

from: Once I stepped into the room I could feel the bad energy.

from: I felt adrenaline coursing through my veins.

from: I am persistent and can overcome even the toughest challenges.

to: Muž povedal: "Mal som veľkú svadbu s mnohými hosťami."

from: The man said: "I invited my colleague for lunch."
to: Muž povedal: "Pozval som kolegu na obed."

from: The man said: "I aired the room, because it smelled bad."
to: Muž povedal: "Vyvetral som miestnosť, pretože to zapáchalo."

from: The man said: "I trusted the scientific report."
to: Muž povedal: "Dôveroval som vedeckej správe."

from: The man said: "I try to be an inspiring and motivating boss."
to: Muž povedal: "Snažím sa byť inšpirujúcim a motivujúcim šéfom."

from: The man said: "I was the class president."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som predseda triedy."

from: The man said: "I told them to follow me."
to: Muž povedal: "Povedal som im, aby ma nasledovali."

from: The man said: "I kept the discussions at work focused and productive."
to: Muž povedal: "Diskusie v práci som udržiaval sústredené a produktívne."

from: The man said: "When I was young, I was emotional too."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som bol mladý, bol som tiež emocionálny."

from: The man said: "I mended the window easily."
to: Muž povedal: "Okno som opravil ľahko."

from: The man said: "I'm afraid that if I am more assertive, people will think me unkind."
to: Muž povedal: "Obávam sa, že ak budem asertívnejší, ľudia ma budú považovať za neláskavého."

from: The man said: "I come to work always fully prepared."
to: Muž povedal: "Do práce prichádzam vždy plne pripravený."

from: The man said: "They came to me and told me I inspired them to take steps for their future careers."
to: Muž povedal: "Prišli za mnou a povedali mi, že som ich inšpiroval, aby podnikli kroky pre ich budúcu kariéru."

from: The man said: "I went bushcrafting into the forest and spent 4 night there."
to: Muž povedal: "Išiel som na bushcrafting do lesa a strávil som tam 4 noci."

from: The man said: "They did not have their favourite ice cream, so I took the bus to the store outside of the town."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemali svoju obľúbenú zmrzlinu, tak som išiel autobusom do obchodu mimo mesta."

from: The man said: "I like to experiment in bed."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád experimentujem v posteli."

from: The man said: "I caught myself in the reflection of a storefront window and couldn't help but admire my own good looks."
to: Muž povedal: "Zachytil som sa v odraze výkladu a nemohol som si pomôcť, ale obdivoval som svoj vlastný dobrý vzhľad."

from: The man said: "I didn't want them, because they were prudish."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechcel som ich, pretože boli prudérni."

from: The man said: "I get sad whenever I have to leave the house and leave the dog alone."
to: Muž povedal: "Smútim vždy, keď musím odísť z domu a nechať psa na pokoji."

from: The man said: "I realised that in critical situations one has to think that every problem has a solution."
to: Muž povedal: "Uvedomil som si, že v kritických situáciách treba myslieť na to, že každý problém má riešenie."

from: The man said: "I broke my arm, but I finished the marathon."
to: Muž povedal: "Zlomil som si ruku, ale dokončil som maratón."

from: The man said: "I’m good at combining colours and patterns on clothes."
to: Muž povedal: "Som dobrý v kombinovaní farieb a vzorov na oblečení."

from: The man said: "I love to do things intuitively."
to: Muž povedal: "Milujem robiť veci intuitívne."

from: The man said: "I overexerted myself."
to: Muž povedal: "Presilil som sa."

from: The man said: "I preferred to dress in neutral colours, so I didn't stand out from the crowd."
to: Muž povedal: "Radšej som sa obliekal v neutrálnych farbách, takže som nevyčnieval z davu."

from: The man said: "I spent an hour trying to take a perfect selfie."
to: Muž povedal: "Strávil som hodinu snahou urobiť si perfektnú selfie."

from: The man said: "I was keen to avoid any mistakes in the production process."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som sa vyhnúť akýmkoľvek chybám vo výrobnom procese."

from: The man said: "Let me bake the pie, I insist."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechajte ma upiecť koláč, trvám na tom."

from: The man said: "If I didn't earn enough, my family wouldn't have anything to eat."
to: Muž povedal: "Keby som nezarábal dosť, moja rodina by nemala čo jesť."

from: The man said: "I would like to have a big family in the future so that we always have a full and noisy house."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel by som mať v budúcnosti veľkú rodinu, aby sme mali vždy plný a hlučný dom."

from: The man said: "I avoided expressing my true emotions or concerns, fearing that it would upset or displease others."
to: Muž povedal: "Vyhýbal som sa vyjadreniu svojich skutočných emócií alebo obáv, pretože som sa bál, že to rozruší alebo znepáči ostatným."

from: The man said: "The roar of the engine filled the air as I maneuvered the powerful motorcycle through the winding roads."
to: Muž povedal: "Hukot motora naplnil vzduch, keď som manévroval so silným motocyklom cez kľukaté cesty."

from: The man said: "I like to create a harmonious environment for my family."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád vytváram harmonické prostredie pre moju rodinu."

from: The man said: "I should clean my office."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal by som si upratať kanceláriu."

from: The man said: "When I was at university, I preferred to sit in the corner, where nobody could notice me."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som bol na univerzite, radšej som sedel v rohu, kde si ma nikto nevšimol."

from: The man said: "I’m no beginner to be annoyed because of little things like that."
to: Muž povedal: "Nie som začiatočník, aby som bol naštvaný kvôli takým maličkostiam."

from: The man said: "I volunteered at a local fundraising event, interacting with attendees."
to: Muž povedal: "Prihlásil som sa dobrovoľne na miestnu fundraisingovú akciu, pri ktorej som komunikoval s účastníkmi."

from: The man said: "Although I worked as a manager, they often attacked my appearance."
to: Muž povedal: "Hoci som pracoval ako manažér, často útočili na môj vzhľad."

from: The man said: "I don't keep my money in a safe, because robbers don't scare me."
to: Muž povedal: "Neschovávam svoje peniaze v trezore, pretože ma lupiči nestrašia."

from: The man said: "I wished they wouldn't talk about conspiracy theories."
to: Muž povedal: "Prial som si, aby nehovorili o konšpiračných teóriách."

from: The man said: "I went to a sex show in Amsterdam."
to: Muž povedal: "Išiel som na sexuálnu show v Amsterdame."

from: The man said: "I was good at analyzing situations objectively and coming up with practical solutions."
to: Muž povedal: "Dokázal som objektívne analyzovať situácie a prichádzať s praktickými riešeniami."

from: The man said: "I was assertive and it paid off."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som asertívny a vyplatilo sa."

from: The man said: "They were fighting so I came there and told them to stop."
to: Muž povedal: "Bojovali, tak som tam prišiel a povedal som im, aby prestali."

from: The man said: "I used to manifest every day so that good things would happen to me."
to: Muž povedal: "Kedysi som sa každý deň manifestoval, aby sa mi prihodili dobré veci."

from: The man said: "I led volunteering teams, coordinating efforts and motivating others to join in."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedl som dobrovoľnícke tímy, koordinoval som úsilie a motivoval ostatných, aby sa pridali."

from: The man said: "I took the children to the football match."
to: Muž povedal: "Vzal som deti na futbalový zápas."

from: The man said: "I put myself in the shoes of a coworker who made a mistake, offering understanding and encouragement instead of criticism or judgment."
to: Muž povedal: "Vžil som sa do kože kolegu, ktorý urobil chybu, ponúkol som pochopenie a povzbudenie namiesto kritiky alebo úsudku."

from: The man said: "As a role model for integrity and accountability, I inspired those around me to do the same."
to: Muž povedal: "Ako vzor pre integritu a zodpovednosť som inšpiroval ľudí okolo seba, aby urobili to isté."

from: The man said: "I studied at a prestigious university abroad."
to: Muž povedal: "Študoval som na prestížnej univerzite v zahraničí."

from: The man said: "I decided that even though I was working a lot, I would try to spend as much time as possible with my son."
to: Muž povedal: "Rozhodol som sa, že aj keď veľa pracujem, budem sa snažiť tráviť čo najviac času so svojím synom."

from: The man said: "I tried to radiate confidence and charisma on a banket last week, did you notice?"
to: Muž povedal: "Minulý týždeň som sa snažil vyžarovať sebavedomie a charizmu na banke, všimli ste si?"

from: The man said: "I had to take that opportunity, even if there was a risk of losing money."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som využiť túto príležitosť, aj keď hrozilo, že prídem o peniaze."

from: The man said: "I'm always ready to have sex."

from: The man said: "I had a suit tailored to me."

from: The man said: "I took care of their pets so they could have a nice weekend."

from: The man said: "I was trying so hard to be a good partner, but sometimes things didn't work out."

from: The man said: "I approached challenges with a clear and rational mindset."

to: Žena povedala: "Pripojila som sa k miestnej komunitnej organizácii a aktívne som sa zúčastňovala na ich podujatiach."

from: The woman said: "I’m no beginner to be annoyed because of little things like that."
to: Žena povedala: "Nie som začiatočník, ktorý by ma rozčuľoval kvôli takýmto maličkostiam."

from: The woman said: "I get sad whenever I have to leave the house and leave the dog alone."
to: Žena povedala: "Smútim vždy, keď musím odísť z domu a nechať psa samého."

from: The woman said: "They were fighting so I came there and told them to stop."
to: Žena povedala: "Bojovali, tak som tam prišla a povedala som im, aby prestali."

from: The woman said: "I'm always ready to have sex."
to: Žena povedala: "Som vždy pripravená na sex."

from: The woman said: "I tried to radiate confidence and charisma on a banket last week, did you notice?"
to: Žena povedala: "Minulý týždeň som sa snažila vyžarovať sebadôveru a charizmu na banke, všimli ste si?"

from: The woman said: "I wanted to dig up the treasure, but I needed more people."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som vykopať poklad, ale potrebovala som viac ľudí."

from: The woman said: "Everyone always tells me to be quiet."
to: Žena povedala: "Každý mi vždy hovorí, aby som bol ticho."

from: The woman said: "I caught myself in the reflection of a storefront window and couldn't help but admire my own good looks."
to: Žena povedala: "Pristihla som sa v odraze výkladu a nemohla som si pomôcť, ale obdivovala som svoj vlastný pekný vzhľad."

from: The woman said: "I was never camera-shy."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som sa nebála kamery."

from: The woman said: "I tried to solve a complex math problem, but my mathematical skills were weak."
to: Žena povedala: "Snažila som sa vyriešiť zložitý matematický problém, ale moje matematické schopnosti boli slabé."

from: The woman said: "I used a budgeting app to track my expenses."
to: Žena povedala: "Použila som rozpočtovú aplikáciu na sledovanie svojich výdavkov."

from: The woman said: "When I didn't get what I wanted, I was angry."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som nedostala, čo som chcela, bola som nahnevaná."

from: The woman said: "I earned enough money for us to go to Malta."
to: Žena povedala: "Zarobila som dosť peňazí, aby sme mohli ísť na Maltu."

from: The woman said: "I studied at a prestigious university abroad."
to: Žena povedala: "Študovala som na prestížnej univerzite v zahraničí."

from: The woman said: "I had a huge Marvel poster in my room."
to: Žena povedala: "V mojej izbe som mala obrovský plagát Marvel."

from: The woman said: "I could never have a pet, they are just too dirty."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nemohla mať domáce zviera, sú jednoducho príliš špinaví."

from: The woman said: "I wanted to kill the deer myself."
to: Žena povedala: Chcela som toho jeleňa zabiť sama.

from: The woman said: "I spent a lot of money on cosmetics."
to: Žena povedala: "Minula som veľa peňazí na kozmetiku."

from: The woman said: "I was frustrated when I was unable to satisfy my sexual needs."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som frustrovaná, keď som nebola schopná uspokojiť svoje sexuálne potreby."

from: The woman said: "I'm afraid that if I am more assertive, people will think me unkind."
to: Žena povedala: "Obávam sa, že ak budem asertívnejšia, ľudia ma budú považovať za neláskavú."

from: The woman said: "I was assertive and it paid off."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som asertívna a vyplatilo sa."

from: The woman said: "I would like to have a big family in the future so that we always have a full and noisy house."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela by som mať v budúcnosti veľkú rodinu, aby sme mali vždy plný a hlučný dom."

from: The woman said: "I put myself in the shoes of a coworker who made a mistake, offering understanding and encouragement instead of criticism or judgment."
to: Žena povedala: "Vžila som sa do kože kolegyne, ktorá urobila chybu, ponúkla som pochopenie a povzbudenie namiesto kritiky alebo úsudku."

from: The woman said: "Let me bake the pie, I insist."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechajte ma upiecť koláč, trvám na tom."

from: The woman said: "I broke my arm, but I finished the marathon."
to: Žena povedala: "Zlomila som si ruku, ale dokončila som maratón."

from: The woman said: "I always take two steps back after I see black cat cross the street."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy urobím dva kroky späť, keď vidím čiernu mačku prechádzať cez ulicu."

from: The woman said: "I led volunteering teams, coordinating efforts and motivating others to join in."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedela som dobrovoľnícke tímy, koordinovala som úsilie a motivovala ostatných, aby sa pridali."

from: The woman said: "I overexerted myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Presilila som sa."

from: The woman said: "I was trying so hard to be a good partner, but sometimes things didn't work out."
to: Žena povedala: "Veľmi som sa snažila byť dobrou partnerkou, ale niekedy to nevyšlo."

from: The woman said: "To take care of my family's well-being, it required a lot of determination and strong will."
to: Žena povedala: "Postarať sa o blaho mojej rodiny si vyžadovalo veľa odhodlania a pevnej vôle."

from: The woman said: "I had a suit tailored to me."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechala som si ušiť oblek na mieru."

from: The woman said: "People often commented on my great body."
to: Žena povedala: "Ľudia často komentovali moje skvelé telo."

from: The woman said: "I trusted the scientific report."
to: Žena povedala: "Dôverovala som vedeckej správe."

from: The woman said: "I aired the room, because it smelled bad."
to: Žena povedala: "Vyvetrala som miestnosť, pretože to zapáchalo."

from: The woman said: "I had a big wedding with many guests."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som veľkú svadbu s mnohými hosťami."

from: I made some extra money as a personal trainer.
to: Privyrábal som si ako osobný tréner.

from: I never had a problem with learning a new language.
to: Nikdy som nemal problém s učením sa nového jazyka.

from: I read a book about self-improvement yesterday.
to: Včera som čítal knihu o sebazdokonaľovaní.

from: I slammed the door after the argument.
to: Po hádke som zabuchol dvere.

from: I wished the gig would never end, there were so many nice people everywhere.
to: Prial som si, aby sa koncert nikdy neskončil, všade bolo toľko milých ľudí.

from: I had this weird feeling, so I called my parents right away to see if they were okay.
to: Mal som taký zvláštny pocit, tak som hneď zavolal rodičom, či sú v poriadku.

from: Sorry, I could have come but I was having a really bad hair day.
to: Prepáč, mohol som prísť, ale mal som naozaj zlý deň.

from: I couldn't keep up with the intense workout routine, my body feeling weak and exhausted from the exertion.
to: Nemohol som držať krok s intenzívnym tréningom, moje telo sa cítilo slabé a vyčerpané z námahy.

from: Every step reflected the confidence I held within, captivating the onlookers with my magnetic presence.
to: Každý krok odzrkadľoval dôveru, ktorú som mal v sebe, a uchvacoval divákov svojou magnetickou prítomnosťou.

from: I didn't need your financial help!
to: Nepotreboval som vašu finančnú pomoc!

from: If I had been there, the atmosphere would have been better.
to: Keby som tam bol, atmosféra by bola lepšia.

from: I got overwhelmed with sadness.
to: Premohol ma smútok.

from: I would feel incompetent if I paid a cleaning lady.
to: Cítil by som sa neschopný, keby som zaplatil upratovačke.

from: I never stressed about work responsibilities because I knew that I could handle anything.
to: Nikdy som sa nestresoval pracovnými povinnosťami, pretože som vedel, že všetko zvládnem.

from: I don't like when the meal I prepared is tasteless.
to: Nemám rád, keď jedlo, ktoré som pripravil, je bez chuti.

from: I have a habit of going along with what other people want.
to: Mám vo zvyku riadiť sa tým, čo chcú ostatní.

from: I used to clean the house on every Saturday.
to: Každú sobotu som upratoval dom.

from: I came up with a deal: if you vacuum, I'll take you out tonight.
to: Prišiel som s dohodou: ak vysávaš, vezmem ťa dnes večer von.

from: I went to buy new sponges, these were too dirty.
to: Išiel som si kúpiť nové špongie, tieto boli príliš špinavé.

from: I am tired after walking for ten minutes.
to: Po desiatich minútach chôdze som unavený.

from: I always liked dancing.
to: Vždy som rada tancovala.

from: I used to enjoy being able to simply use my smile to achieve things.
to: Kedysi som si užíval, keď som mohol jednoducho použiť svoj úsmev na dosiahnutie vecí.

from: I have always felt that childcare was my life goal.
to: Vždy som mala pocit, že starostlivosť o deti je mojím životným cieľom.

from: I first weighted all the possible scenarios.
to: Najprv som zvážil všetky možné scenáre.

from: I haven't carried cash with me since I was robbed.
to: Odkedy ma okradli, nenosil som so sebou hotovosť.

from: I was the first one at the clothing store.
to: Bol som prvý v obchode s oblečením.

from: I ordered them to stop praying and start helping.
to: Prikázal som im, aby sa prestali modliť a začali pomáhať.

from: I offered accommodation to two refugees.
to: Ponúkol som ubytovanie dvom utečencom.

from: I divided the tasks equally among all the team members.
to: Úlohy som rozdelil rovnomerne medzi všetkých členov tímu.

from: I was the first one at the library.
to: Bol som prvý v knižnici.

from: As I effortlessly lifted the heavy box, the surprised expressions on others' faces made me smile.
to: Keď som bez námahy zdvihol ťažkú škatuľu, prekvapené výrazy na tvárach ostatných mi prinútili úsmev.

from: When tsunami came, I volunteered to save people from drowning.
to: Keď prišlo cunami, dobrovoľne som zachránil ľudí pred utopením.

from: I took the time to understand and acknowledge the emotions of a colleague who was going through a difficult time.
to: Urobil som si čas na pochopenie a uznanie emócií kolegu, ktorý prežíval ťažké obdobie.

from: Some people hate accessories, but I like wearing them.
to: Niektorí ľudia nenávidia doplnky, no ja ich nosím rada.

from: On the way home I talked to an elderly lady on the train.
to: Cestou domov som sa rozprával so staršou pani vo vlaku.

from: Since I've been doing this sport, I'm much more balanced.
to: Odkedy robím tento šport, som oveľa vyrovnanejší.

from: I was raised to know how to take care of others.
to: Bol som vychovaný tak, aby som sa vedel postarať o druhých.

from: I could not wrap my head around this hard mathematical problem.
to: Nemohol som zabaliť hlavu okolo tohto ťažkého matematického problému.

from: I filtered out all the distractions.
to: Odfiltroval som všetky rušivé vplyvy.

from: I could strike up a conversation with almost everybody that evening.
to: V ten večer som mohol nadviazať rozhovor takmer s každým.

from: For my birthday, I asked to go skydiving.
to: Na moje narodeniny som požiadal o zoskok padákom.

from: I would never allow myself to offend anyone.
to: Nikdy by som si nedovolil niekoho uraziť.

from: Since I’ve been eating more protein, I feel much stronger.
to: Odkedy jem viac bielkovín, cítim sa oveľa silnejší.

from: I always wanted to be a researcher, but I wouldn't have time to take care of my family.
to: Vždy som chcel byť výskumníkom, ale nemal by som čas venovať sa rodine.

from: I didn't want us to sign a prenup, because I'd take care of my partner even after a divorce.
to: Nechcela som, aby sme podpísali predmanželskú zmluvu, pretože by som sa o partnera postarala aj po rozvode.

from: I didn't need your support.
to: Nepotreboval som tvoju podporu.

from: I learned how to drive before I was even allowed to.
to: Naučil som sa šoférovať skôr, ako mi to vôbec dovolili.

from: I invited strangers to our table, and it made a very good group of people.
to: Pozval som k nášmu stolu cudzích ľudí a vytvorilo sa z toho veľmi dobrá partia ľudí.

from: I would never be able to cheat.
to: Nikdy by som nedokázala podvádzať.

from: I like to read fashion magazines.
to: Rada čítam módne časopisy.

from: I thought that confidence is the key aspect of having a healthy and successful life.
to: Myslel som si, že dôvera je kľúčovým aspektom zdravého a úspešného života.

from: I feel fulfilled when I can take care of everybody in the house.
to: Cítim sa naplnený, keď sa môžem postarať o všetkých v dome.

from: I like extreme sports even though they are really dangerous.
to: Mám rád extrémne športy, aj keď sú naozaj nebezpečné.

from: I'm an expert in my field.
to: Som odborník vo svojom odbore.

from: I found a nice picture of myself easily.
to: Ľahko som našiel pekný obrázok seba.

from: I was always first picked when playing any sports back in highschool.
to: Keď som na strednej škole hrával akýkoľvek šport, bol som vždy vybraný ako prvý.

from: I cleaned the house yesterday and now it's a mess again.
to: Včera som upratoval dom a teraz je tu opäť neporiadok.

from: The storm raged on, but I stood strong on the deck of the ship.
to: Búrka zúrila ďalej, ale stál som pevne na palube lode.

from: I like to just smile at someone because I believe it will make their day better.
to: Rád sa na niekoho len tak usmejem, pretože verím, že mu to zlepší deň.

from: I have worked hard to get to where I am today.
to: Tvrdo som pracoval, aby som sa dostal tam, kde som dnes.

from: I was just in a meeting.
to: Práve som bol na stretnutí.

from: I felt it in my gut.
to: Cítil som to v črevách.

from: It was hard for me to admit that I needed a hand.
to: Bolo pre mňa ťažké priznať si, že potrebujem ruku.

from: Why did I have to get old?!
to: Prečo som musel zostarnúť?!

from: I had to carry the logs all on my own, but it was fine.
to: Polená som si musel niesť úplne sám, ale bolo to v pohode.

from: Finally the beauty catalogue that I ordered has arrived.
to: Konečne dorazil katalóg krásy, ktorý som si objednala.

from: I like to throw parties for my kids because we always have a house full of people.
to: Rád organizujem párty pre svoje deti, pretože máme vždy plný dom ľudí.

from: Don't go there alone, it can be dangerous.
to: Nechoďte tam sami, môže to byť nebezpečné.

from: I struggled to strike a balance between my sexual desires and other important aspects of life.
to: Snažil som sa nájsť rovnováhu medzi mojimi sexuálnymi túžbami a inými dôležitými aspektmi života.

from: I'm very competitive when it comes to promotions and performance in the workplace.
to: Som veľmi súťaživý, pokiaľ ide o povýšenie a výkon na pracovisku.

from: I could lift that car if I wanted to.
to: Keby som chcel, mohol by som to auto zdvihnúť.

from: I should be thoughtful, because that's what's expected of me.
to: Mal by som byť premyslený, pretože sa to odo mňa očakáva.

from: I'd rather have everything right away.
to: Najradšej by som mal všetko hneď.

from: I could easily seduce you at the bar.
to: Pokojne by som ťa mohol zviesť v bare.

from: I had enough romance, I wanted something more intimate.
to: Mala som dosť romantiky, chcela som niečo intímnejšie.

from: As a pilot, I ensured the safety of passengers and crew by adhering to rigorous protocols.
to: Ako pilot som zaisťoval bezpečnosť cestujúcich a posádky dodržiavaním prísnych protokolov.

from: I hoped I had been a pleasant companion.
to: Dúfal som, že som bol príjemným spoločníkom.

from: I never let my family affect my profession.
to: Nikdy som nedovolil, aby moja rodina ovplyvnila moju profesiu.

from: I could not cook because it was my mother's job.
to: Nemohol som variť, pretože to bola práca mojej mamy.

from: I was just protecting you from other people at that club.
to: Len som ťa chránil pred ostatnými ľuďmi v tom klube.

from: My mind was set - I got married despite everyone being against it.
to: Moja myseľ bola nastavená - oženil som sa napriek tomu, že všetci boli proti.

from: I was initially a suspect, but the police determined I was not strong enough to hurt them.
to: Spočiatku som bol podozrivý, ale polícia zistila, že nie som dosť silný na to, aby som im ublížil.

from: I am able to compete with anyone.
to: Som schopný súťažiť s kýmkoľvek.

from: I was aware that bad leadership leads to bad results.
to: Bol som si vedomý toho, že zlé vedenie vedie k zlým výsledkom.

from: I stopped the pickpocket and held him until the police came.
to: Zastavil som vreckového zlodeja a držal som ho, kým neprišla polícia.

from: I was proud of being a good kisser.
to: Bol som hrdý na to, že viem dobre bozkávať.

from: I am very attractive.
to: Som veľmi príťažlivý.

from: With each punch thrown and block executed, I could feel the power surging through me.
to: S každým hodeným úderom a vykonaným blokom som cítil, ako mnou prúdi sila.

from: Despite the criticism I thought I did well.
to: Napriek kritike som si myslel, že som urobil dobre.

from: When I was little, I wanted to be an athlete, but my parents signed me up for ballet instead.
to: Keď som bola malá, chcela som byť športovkyňa, no rodičia ma radšej prihlásili na balet.

from: I didn't like our sex, but I didn't say anything.
to: Náš sex sa mi nepáčil, ale nič som nepovedal.

from: I went to walk the dogs from the shelter.
to: Išla som venčiť psíkov z útulku.

from: I had to work even over Christmas to earn as much money as possible.
to: Musel som pracovať aj cez Vianoce, aby som zarobil čo najviac peňazí.

from: My friend is always making me laugh.
to: Môj priateľ ma vždy rozosmeje.

from: That job wasn't meant for me, but for someone stronger.
to: Tá práca nebola určená pre mňa, ale pre niekoho silnejšieho.

from: I have never been a loner, I prefer to be surrounded by people.
to: Nikdy som nebol samotár, radšej som obklopený ľuďmi.

from: If you weren't with me, god knows how it'd end.
to: Keby si nebol so mnou, boh vie, ako by to skončilo.

from: I remained composed although the situation escalated.
to: Zostal som vyrovnaný, aj keď sa situácia vyhrotila.

from: I am able to see the big picture of where the organisation is heading.
to: Som schopný vidieť celkový obraz toho, kam organizácia smeruje.

to: Muž povedal: "Radšej by som mal všetko hneď."

from: The man said: "I used to enjoy being able to simply use my smile to achieve things."
to: Muž povedal: "Kedysi som si užíval, keď som mohol jednoducho použiť svoj úsmev na dosiahnutie vecí."

from: The man said: "I am able to see the big picture of where the organisation is heading."
to: Muž povedal: "Som schopný vidieť celkový obraz toho, kam organizácia smeruje."

from: The man said: "I wished the gig would never end, there were so many nice people everywhere."
to: Muž povedal: "Prial som si, aby sa koncert nikdy neskončil, všade bolo toľko milých ľudí."

from: The man said: "I didn't need your support."
to: Muž povedal: "Nepotreboval som tvoju podporu."

from: The man said: "I like extreme sports even though they are really dangerous."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád extrémne športy, aj keď sú naozaj nebezpečné."

from: The man said: "That job wasn't meant for me, but for someone stronger."
to: Muž povedal: "Tá práca nebola určená pre mňa, ale pre niekoho silnejšieho."

from: The man said: "If you weren't with me, god knows how it'd end."
to: Muž povedal: "Keby si nebol so mnou, boh vie, ako by sa to skončilo."

from: The man said: "I could strike up a conversation with almost everybody that evening."
to: Muž povedal: "V ten večer som mohol nadviazať rozhovor takmer s každým."

from: The man said: "I could lift that car if I wanted to."
to: Muž povedal: "Mohol by som zdvihnúť to auto, keby som chcel."

from: The man said: "I could easily seduce you at the bar."
to: Muž povedal: "Kľudne by som ťa mohol zviesť v bare."

from: The man said: "I'm an expert in my field."
to: Muž povedal: "Som odborník vo svojom odbore."

from: The man said: "I filtered out all the distractions."
to: Muž povedal: "Odfiltroval som všetky rozptýlenia."

from: The man said: "I have always felt that childcare was my life goal."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som cítil, že starostlivosť o deti je mojím životným cieľom."

from: The man said: "I had to carry the logs all on my own, but it was fine."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som niesť polená úplne sám, ale bolo to v poriadku."

from: The man said: "I am tired after walking for ten minutes."
to: Muž povedal: "Som unavený po desiatich minútach chôdze."

from: The man said: "I was always first picked when playing any sports back in highschool."
to: Muž povedal: "Na strednej škole som bol vždy vybraný ako prvý, keď som hral akýkoľvek šport."

from: The man said: "I learned how to drive before I was even allowed to."
to: Muž povedal: "Naučil som sa šoférovať skôr, ako mi to bolo dovolené."

from: The man said: "With each punch thrown and block executed, I could feel the power surging through me."
to: Muž povedal: "S každým hodeným úderom a vykonaným blokom som cítil, ako mnou preniká sila."

from: The man said: "Since I've been doing this sport, I'm much more balanced."
to: Muž povedal: "Odkedy robím tento šport, som oveľa vyrovnanejší."

from: The man said: "I like to read fashion magazines."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád čítam módne časopisy."

from: The man said: "I couldn't keep up with the intense workout routine, my body feeling weak and exhausted from the exertion."
to: Muž povedal: "Nedokázal som držať krok s intenzívnym tréningom, moje telo bolo slabé a vyčerpané z námahy."

from: The man said: "I felt it in my gut."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítil som to v črevách."

from: The man said: "Don't go there alone, it can be dangerous."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechoď tam sám, môže to byť nebezpečné."

from: The man said: "I have worked hard to get to where I am today."
to: Muž povedal: "Tvrdo som pracoval, aby som sa dostal tam, kde som dnes."

from: The man said: "I was raised to know how to take care of others."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som vychovaný tak, aby som sa vedel postarať o druhých."

from: The man said: "I would never be able to cheat."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy by som nebol schopný podvádzať."

from: The man said: "I feel fulfilled when I can take care of everybody in the house."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítim sa naplnený, keď sa môžem postarať o všetkých v dome."

from: The man said: "Finally the beauty catalogue that I ordered has arrived."
to: Muž povedal: "Konečne prišiel katalóg krásy, ktorý som si objednal."

from: The man said: "I stopped the pickpocket and held him until the police came."
to: Muž povedal: "Zastavil som vreckového zlodeja a držal som ho, kým neprišla polícia."

from: The man said: "I was aware that bad leadership leads to bad results."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som si vedomý toho, že zlé vedenie vedie k zlým výsledkom."

from: The man said: "I invited strangers to our table, and it made a very good group of people."
to: Muž povedal: "Pozval som k nášmu stolu cudzích ľudí a vytvorila sa z toho veľmi dobrá skupina ľudí."

from: The man said: "I hoped I had been a pleasant companion."
to: Muž povedal: "Dúfal som, že som bol príjemným spoločníkom."

from: The man said: "On the way home I talked to an elderly lady on the train."
to: Muž povedal: "Cestou domov som sa rozprával so staršou pani vo vlaku."

from: The man said: "My friend is always making me laugh."
to: Muž povedal: "Môj priateľ ma vždy rozosmeje."

from: The man said: "I had to work even over Christmas to earn as much money as possible."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som pracovať aj cez Vianoce, aby som zarobil čo najviac peňazí."

from: The man said: "I made some extra money as a personal trainer."
to: Muž povedal: "Zarobil som si nejaké peniaze navyše ako osobný tréner."

from: The man said: "Why did I have to get old?!"
to: Muž povedal: "Prečo som musel zostarnúť?!"

from: The man said: "When I was little, I wanted to be an athlete, but my parents signed me up for ballet instead."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som bol malý, chcel som byť športovcom, ale rodičia ma namiesto toho prihlásili na balet."

from: The man said: "I thought that confidence is the key aspect of having a healthy and successful life."
to: Muž povedal: "Myslel som si, že dôvera je kľúčovým aspektom zdravého a úspešného života."

from: The man said: "I remained composed although the situation escalated."
to: Muž povedal: "Zostal som vyrovnaný, hoci situácia eskalovala."

from: The man said: "I like to throw parties for my kids because we always have a house full of people."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád organizujem párty pre svoje deti, pretože máme vždy plný dom ľudí."

from: The man said: "For my birthday, I asked to go skydiving."
to: Muž povedal: "Na moje narodeniny som požiadal o zoskok padákom."

from: The man said: "I struggled to strike a balance between my sexual desires and other important aspects of life."
to: Muž povedal: "Snažil som sa nájsť rovnováhu medzi mojimi sexuálnymi túžbami a inými dôležitými aspektmi života."

from: The man said: "I divided the tasks equally among all the team members."
to: Muž povedal: "Rozdelil som úlohy rovnomerne medzi všetkých členov tímu."

from: The man said: "I was the first one at the clothing store."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som prvý v obchode s oblečením."

from: The man said: "My mind was set - I got married despite everyone being against it."
to: Muž povedal: "Moje myslenie bolo nastavené - oženil som sa napriek tomu, že všetci boli proti."

from: The man said: "If I had been there, the atmosphere would have been better."
to: Muž povedal: "Keby som tam bol, atmosféra by bola lepšia."

from: The man said: "The storm raged on, but I stood strong on the deck of the ship."
to: Muž povedal: "Búrka zúrila, ale ja som stál na palube lode pevne."

from: The man said: "I always liked dancing."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som rád tancoval."

from: The man said: "I would feel incompetent if I paid a cleaning lady."

from: The man said: "I read a book about self-improvement yesterday."

from: The man said: "I was just protecting you from other people at that club."

from: The man said: "I had enough romance, I wanted something more intimate."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som dosť romantiky, chcel som niečo intímnejšie."

from: The man said: "I slammed the door after the argument."
to: Muž povedal: "Po hádke som zabuchol dvere."

from: The man said: "I was just in a meeting."

from: The man said: "I haven't carried cash with me since I was robbed."

from: The man said: "As I effortlessly lifted the heavy box, the surprised expressions on others' faces made me smile."

from: The man said: "Every step reflected the confidence I held within, captivating the onlookers with my magnetic presence."
