to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nedovolila, aby moja rodina ovplyvnila moju profesiu."

from: The woman said: "I offered accommodation to two refugees."
to: Žena povedala: "Ponúkla som ubytovanie dvom utečencom."

from: The woman said: "I could strike up a conversation with almost everybody that evening."
to: Žena povedala: "V ten večer som mohla nadviazať rozhovor takmer s každým."

from: The woman said: "I was just protecting you from other people at that club."
to: Žena povedala: "Len som ťa chránila pred ostatnými ľuďmi v tom klube."

from: The woman said: "Some people hate accessories, but I like wearing them."
to: Žena povedala: "Niektorí ľudia nenávidia doplnky, ale ja ich nosím rada."

from: The woman said: "I read a book about self-improvement yesterday."
to: Žena povedala: "Včera som čítala knihu o sebazdokonaľovaní."

from: The woman said: "I ordered them to stop praying and start helping."
to: Žena povedala: "Prikázala som im, aby sa prestali modliť a začali pomáhať."

from: The woman said: "Since I've been doing this sport, I'm much more balanced."
to: Žena povedala: "Odkedy robím tento šport, som oveľa vyrovnanejšia."

from: The woman said: "If you weren't with me, god knows how it'd end."
to: Žena povedala: "Keby si nebol so mnou, boh vie, ako by sa to skončilo."

from: The woman said: "I am very attractive."
to: Žena povedala: "Som veľmi príťažlivá."

from: The woman said: "I have always felt that childcare was my life goal."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som cítila, že starostlivosť o deti je mojím životným cieľom."

from: The woman said: "I always liked dancing."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som rada tancovala."

from: The woman said: "I had enough romance, I wanted something more intimate."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som dosť romantiky, chcela som niečo intímnejšie."

from: The woman said: "I couldn't keep up with the intense workout routine, my body feeling weak and exhausted from the exertion."
to: Žena povedala: "Nedokázala som držať krok s intenzívnym tréningom, moje telo bolo slabé a vyčerpané z námahy."

from: The woman said: "I used to enjoy being able to simply use my smile to achieve things."
to: Žena povedala: "Kedysi som si užívala, keď som mohla jednoducho použiť svoj úsmev na dosiahnutie vecí."

from: The woman said: "I was the first one at the library."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som prvá v knižnici."

from: The woman said: "I would never be able to cheat."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som nebola schopná podvádzať."

from: The woman said: "For my birthday, I asked to go skydiving."
to: Žena povedala: "Na moje narodeniny som požiadala o zoskok padákom."

from: The woman said: "Sorry, I could have come but I was having a really bad hair day."
to: Žena povedala: "Prepáčte, mohla som prísť, ale mala som naozaj zlý deň."

from: The woman said: "I filtered out all the distractions."
to: Žena povedala: "Odfiltrovala som všetky rozptýlenia."

from: The woman said: "I took the time to understand and acknowledge the emotions of a colleague who was going through a difficult time."
to: Žena povedala: "Urobila som si čas na pochopenie a uznanie emócií kolegu, ktorý prechádzal ťažkým obdobím."

from: The woman said: "I have a habit of going along with what other people want."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám vo zvyku riadiť sa tým, čo chcú ostatní."

from: The woman said: "I like to read fashion magazines."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada čítam módne časopisy."

from: The woman said: "I was raised to know how to take care of others."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som vychovaná tak, aby som sa vedela postarať o druhých."

from: The woman said: "I got overwhelmed with sadness."
to: Žena povedala: "Zaplavil ma smútok."

from: The woman said: "I am tired after walking for ten minutes."
to: Žena povedala: "Som unavená po desiatich minútach chôdze."

from: The woman said: "I slammed the door after the argument."
to: Žena povedala: "Po hádke som zabuchla dvere."

from: The woman said: "I could not wrap my head around this hard mathematical problem."
to: Žena povedala: "Nedokázala som zabaliť hlavu do tohto ťažkého matematického problému."

from: The woman said: "Despite the criticism I thought I did well."
to: Žena povedala: "Napriek kritike som si myslela, že som urobila dobre."

from: The woman said: "I remained composed although the situation escalated."
to: Žena povedala: "Zostala som pokojná, aj keď situácia eskalovala."

from: The woman said: "I was initially a suspect, but the police determined I was not strong enough to hurt them."
to: Žena povedala: "Spočiatku som bola podozrivá, ale polícia zistila, že nie som dosť silná, aby som im ublížila."

from: The woman said: "I could easily seduce you at the bar."
to: Žena povedala: "Kľudne by som ťa mohla zviesť v bare."

from: The woman said: "As a pilot, I ensured the safety of passengers and crew by adhering to rigorous protocols."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako pilot som zaistil bezpečnosť cestujúcich a posádky dodržiavaním prísnych protokolov."

from: The woman said: "The storm raged on, but I stood strong on the deck of the ship."
to: Žena povedala: "Búrka zúrila, ale ja som stála pevne na palube lode."

from: They commented on my outfit and I had to do my best not to scold them.
to: Komentovali môj outfit a ja som sa musel snažiť, aby som ich nepokarhal.

from: I insisted on having sex.
to: Trvala som na sexe.

from: I like to take care of our pets.
to: Rada sa starám o našich miláčikov.

from: I couldn't do it with my bare hands.
to: Holými rukami som to nedokázal.

from: I offered to help the new neighbours the paperwork.
to: Ponúkol som sa, že pomôžem novým susedom s papierovaním.

from: I wanted to kiss them both.
to: Chcel som ich oboch pobozkať.

from: I never thought we could only stay friends.
to: Nikdy som si nemyslel, že môžeme zostať len priateľmi.

from: I was promoted because I have good communication skills.
to: Bol som povýšený, pretože mám dobré komunikačné schopnosti.

from: I had no doubts, I was certain that they liked me.
to: Nemal som žiadne pochybnosti, bol som si istý, že ma majú radi.

from: I wish I could think more rationally.
to: Prial by som si, aby som mohol uvažovať racionálnejšie.

from: I would never come to work drunk.
to: Nikdy by som neprišiel do práce opitý.

from: I’m aware of my qualities.
to: Som si vedomý svojich kvalít.

from: I pitied the beggar and gave him money.
to: Zľutoval som sa nad žobrákom a dal som mu peniaze.

from: I would prefer not to eat than to wear something ugly.
to: Radšej by som nejedol, ako by som si obliekol niečo škaredé.

from: I am the manager of this bank.
to: Som konateľom tejto banky.

from: I was looking out for my employees even though I was on holiday.
to: Hľadal som svojich zamestnancov, aj keď som bol na dovolenke.

from: I performed a series of rituals before an important event.
to: Pred dôležitou udalosťou som vykonal sériu rituálov.

from: I always felt driven by leader positions.
to: Vždy som sa cítil poháňaný vedúcimi pozíciami.

from: I knew they had something against me, although I had no proof.
to: Vedel som, že proti mne niečo majú, hoci som nemal dôkaz.

from: I could not hold back the tears.
to: Nemohol som zadržať slzy.

from: I had trouble keeping up with the pace of a fitness class.
to: Mal som problém udržať tempo na hodine fitness.

from: I couldn't donate blood because I didn't meet the minimum weight requirement.
to: Nemohla som darovať krv, pretože som nesplnila požiadavku na minimálnu hmotnosť.

from: I always did something extra although my job didn't require it.
to: Vždy som robil niečo navyše, hoci si to moja práca nevyžadovala.

from: I like to talk so much that I do it with animals too.
to: Tak rád sa rozprávam, že to robím aj so zvieratami.

from: I was with my friend who couldn't stop talking.
to: Bol som so svojím priateľom, ktorý nemohol prestať hovoriť.

from: I know it hurts, but you should pull yourself together.
to: Viem, že to bolí, ale mal by si sa dať dokopy.

from: I always protected my relatives no matter what.
to: Vždy som chránil svojich príbuzných, nech sa deje čokoľvek.

from: I had a lot of experience with various drugs.
to: Mal som bohaté skúsenosti s rôznymi drogami.

from: I didn't accept any position but that of a boss.
to: Neprijal som inú pozíciu ako šéfa.

from: I thought about starting my own vlog about fashion.
to: Rozmýšľala som, že si založím vlastný vlog o móde.

from: I made the same mistake despite the obvious signs.
to: Urobil som rovnakú chybu aj napriek zjavným náznakom.

from: I took some days to think over the offer.
to: Dal som si pár dní na rozmyslenie ponuky.

from: I like to have the best mobile on the market.
to: Chcem mať najlepší mobil na trhu.

from: I had an STD test done.
to: Urobil som si test STD.

from: I wanted to discuss the current political situation with you.
to: Chcel som s vami diskutovať o súčasnej politickej situácii.

from: I always like physical jobs.
to: Vždy mám rád fyzické práce.

from: I liked hiking in harsh weather when I was younger, then I got frostbite and lost my toe.
to: Mal som rád turistiku v drsnom počasí, keď som bol mladší, potom som dostal omrzliny a prišiel som o palec na nohe.

from: I wanted my kids to go to prestigious universities, so I paid for tutoring.
to: Chcel som, aby moje deti išli na prestížne univerzity, a tak som si zaplatil doučovanie.

from: I changed my hair color according to the latest fashion.
to: Zmenila som si farbu vlasov podľa poslednej módy.

from: I needed someone to talk to because it was too much.
to: Potreboval som sa s niekým porozprávať, pretože toho bolo priveľa.

from: If I knew how boring university was, I would never have gone to it.
to: Keby som vedel, aká nudná je univerzita, nikdy by som na ňu nešiel.

from: I'm not very good at showing my emotions.
to: Nie som veľmi dobrý v ukazovaní svojich emócií.

from: As a pharmacist, I ensured compliance with regulatory guidelines.
to: Ako farmaceut som zabezpečoval dodržiavanie regulačných smerníc.

from: I felt really good looking in all the new clothes.
to: Vo všetkých tých nových šatách som sa cítila naozaj dobre.

from: There were just too many obstacles so I had to give up.
to: Bolo tam príliš veľa prekážok, takže som to musel vzdať.

from: Last night I turned into a beast.
to: Včera v noci som sa zmenil na beštiu.

from: As a journalist, I conducted thorough interviews, verified facts, and crafted compelling stories
to: Ako novinár som viedol dôkladné rozhovory, overoval som fakty a tvoril som pútavé príbehy

from: Even though they were acting rude, I was trying to be as polite as I could.
to: Aj keď sa správali neslušne, snažil som sa byť čo najslušnejší.

from: When becoming a leader, the key aspect was to be capable of managing complex situations.
to: Keď sa stal vodcom, kľúčovým aspektom bola schopnosť zvládať zložité situácie.

from: I resolved to brush my dog at least three times a week so he wouldn’t shed as much.
to: Rozhodol som sa, že budem svojho psa čistiť aspoň trikrát týždenne, aby toľko nesypal.

from: I could not concentrate and had to constantly play with something because the job was boring.
to: Nemohla som sa sústrediť a musela som sa neustále s niečím hrať, pretože tá práca bola nudná.

from: I like to spend time with children because they have great ideas and opinions.
to: Rada trávim čas s deťmi, pretože majú skvelé nápady a názory.

from: I decided to change my plans for no reason.
to: Bezdôvodne som sa rozhodol zmeniť svoje plány.

from: To avoid having to wash dishes, I bought a plastic one.
to: Aby som nemusel umývať riad, kúpil som si plastový.

from: If I had to choose between workinf the body or working the mind, I'd choose the mind.
to: Ak by som si mal vybrať medzi prácou tela alebo prácou mysle, vybral by som si myseľ.

from: I calmly handled a difficult customer.
to: Pokojne som riešil náročného zákazníka.

from: I had to cancel the neighbourhood barbeque because nobody helped me with cleaning the grill, and I could not do it on my own.
to: Okolité grilovanie som musel zrušiť, pretože mi nikto nepomohol s čistením grilu a sám som to nezvládol.

from: In a business meeting, I actively listened to my colleagues and responded to their proposals with relevant comments.
to: Na pracovnom stretnutí som aktívne počúval kolegov a na ich návrhy som reagoval relevantnými pripomienkami.

from: I hauled heavy loads, it was my job and I liked it.
to: Ťahal som ťažké bremená, bola to moja práca a mal som ju rád.

from: I frequently sought reassurance and validation from others.
to: Často som hľadal uistenie a potvrdenie od iných.

from: I got approached by some model agency.
to: Oslovila ma nejaká modelová agentúra.

from: I worked hard to maintain my position.
to: Tvrdo som pracoval, aby som si udržal svoju pozíciu.

from: I could never leave the airport without first checking all the fragnances first.
to: Nikdy by som nemohol opustiť letisko bez toho, aby som najprv skontroloval všetky vône.

from: I always thought that it was healthy to have multiple partners.
to: Vždy som si myslel, že je zdravé mať viacero partnerov.

from: I actively engaged with a team member who was experiencing difficulty at work.
to: Aktívne som spolupracoval s členom tímu, ktorý mal problémy v práci.

from: I allowed my anxiety to control my actions, avoiding certain situations.
to: Dovolil som svojej úzkosti ovládať moje činy a vyhýbať sa určitým situáciám.

from: I had no problem with climbing that hill.
to: S výstupom na ten kopec som nemal problém.

from: I delegated tasks effectively, matching the skills and strengths of my team members with the right responsibilities.
to: Úlohy som delegoval efektívne, zladil som schopnosti a silné stránky členov môjho tímu so správnymi zodpovednosťami.

from: I couldn’t stand being cooped up at home for another day.
to: Nemohol som vydržať byť zavretý doma ďalší deň.

from: I did it even though it was risky.
to: Urobil som to, aj keď to bolo riskantné.

from: We didn't need a cleaning lady because I liked to be in charge of cleaning the house.
to: Nepotrebovali sme pani na upratovanie, pretože som mal rád upratovanie domácnosti.

from: I joined a university study because they were looking for sexually active people.
to: Nastúpil som na vysokoškolské štúdium, pretože hľadali sexuálne aktívnych ľudí.

from: I never considered going to therapy.
to: Nikdy som neuvažovala ísť na terapiu.

from: I feel social pressure to look beautiful.
to: Cítim spoločenský tlak, aby som vyzerala krásne.

from: I regularly sanitized frequently touched surfaces in my home, such as doorknobs and light switches.
to: Pravidelne som dezinfikoval často sa dotýkajúce povrchy v mojom dome, ako sú kľučky a vypínače.

from: I assembled the furniture on my own.
to: Nábytok som montoval svojpomocne.

from: My smile was shinning through the whole room.
to: Môj úsmev žiaril celou miestnosťou.

from: I have never left home without making sure that everybody has something to eat first.
to: Nikdy som neodišiel z domu bez toho, aby som sa najprv uistil, že všetci majú niečo na jedenie.

from: I love team sports so I was really sad that I could not join the volleyball team.
to: Milujem kolektívne športy, takže som bol veľmi smutný, že som sa nemohol pridať k volejbalovému tímu.

from: When the deadline was approaching I just decided to share my answers with them.
to: Keď sa blížil termín, rozhodol som sa s nimi podeliť o svoje odpovede.

from: I considered different viewpoints and engaged in rational dialogue to reach a collective decision.
to: Zvažoval som rôzne názory a zapojil som sa do racionálneho dialógu, aby som dospel ku kolektívnemu rozhodnutiu.

from: I lost my job and the reason was that I couldn't handle stress, but I can.
to: Prišla som o prácu a dôvodom bolo, že nezvládam stres, ale môžem.

from: I did not need to ask for help.
to: Nepotreboval som žiadať o pomoc.

from: I think my co-worker is an excellent leader.
to: Myslím si, že môj spolupracovník je vynikajúci líder.

from: I increased my earning potential to provide better financial support for my family.
to: Zvýšil som svoj potenciál zárobku, aby som mohol lepšie finančne podporovať svoju rodinu.

from: I established a cleaning routine and adhered to it.
to: Zaviedol som si rutinu čistenia a dodržiaval som ho.

from: I carried it up the stairs myself.
to: Sám som to vyniesol po schodoch.

from: I would be happier if my partner stayed at home and raised the children.
to: Bola by som šťastnejšia, keby partner ostal doma a vychovával deti.

from: I hated art subjects at school.
to: V škole som neznášala umelecké predmety.

from: I didn't like losing time and started working immediately.
to: Nerád som strácal čas a hneď som začal pracovať.

from: I was asked to take care of my neighbour, and I obliged.
to: Bol som požiadaný, aby som sa postaral o svojho suseda, čo som zaviazal.

from: I reviewed the paper three times until there were no typos.
to: Skontroloval som papier trikrát, kým som nemal žiadne preklepy.

from: At school, the biggest punishment for me was having to sit alone.
to: V škole bol pre mňa najväčší trest, že som musel sedieť sám.

from: I like to build sand castles at the beach.
to: Rád staviam pieskové hrady na pláži.

from: When it came to tears, my heart softened and I accepted the apology.
to: Keď došlo na slzy, moje srdce zmäklo a ospravedlnenie som prijal.

from: I don't like to read books because they're boring.
to: Nerád čítam knihy, pretože sú nudné.

from: I plowed the entire field.
to: Preoral som celé pole.

from: I didn't like when my partner earned more than me.
to: Nemal som rád, keď môj partner zarábal viac ako ja.

from: I could never stand up for myself.
to: Nikdy som sa nedokázal postaviť za seba.

from: The man said: "I am the manager of this bank."
to: Muž povedal: "Som manažér tejto banky."

from: The man said: "My smile was shinning through the whole room."
to: Muž povedal: "Môj úsmev žiaril celou miestnosťou."

from: The man said: "Last night I turned into a beast."
to: Muž povedal: "Včera v noci som sa zmenil na zviera."

from: The man said: "I could never leave the airport without first checking all the fragnances first."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy by som nemohol opustiť letisko bez toho, aby som najprv skontroloval všetky vône."

from: The man said: "In a business meeting, I actively listened to my colleagues and responded to their proposals with relevant comments."
to: Muž povedal: "Na obchodnom stretnutí som aktívne počúval svojich kolegov a odpovedal som na ich návrhy relevantnými komentármi."

from: The man said: "I like to have the best mobile on the market."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád mám najlepší mobil na trhu."

from: The man said: "I feel social pressure to look beautiful."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítim spoločenský tlak, aby som vyzeral krásne."

from: The man said: "I did it even though it was risky."
to: Muž povedal: "Urobil som to, aj keď to bolo riskantné."

from: The man said: "I pitied the beggar and gave him money."
to: Muž povedal: "Zľutoval som sa nad žobrákom a dal som mu peniaze."

from: The man said: "If I had to choose between workinf the body or working the mind, I'd choose the mind."
to: Muž povedal: "Keby som si mal vybrať medzi prácou tela alebo prácou mysle, vybral by som si myseľ."

from: The man said: "I had to cancel the neighbourhood barbeque because nobody helped me with cleaning the grill, and I could not do it on my own."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som zrušiť susedskú grilovačku, pretože mi nikto nepomohol s čistením grilu a nemohol som to urobiť sám."

from: The man said: "I couldn’t stand being cooped up at home for another day."
to: Muž povedal: "Nevydržal som byť zavretý doma ďalší deň."

from: The man said: "I allowed my anxiety to control my actions, avoiding certain situations."
to: Muž povedal: "Dovolil som, aby moja úzkosť ovládala moje činy, vyhýbajúc sa určitým situáciám."

from: The man said: "I have never left home without making sure that everybody has something to eat first."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som neodišiel z domu bez toho, aby som sa najprv uistil, že všetci majú niečo na jedenie."

from: The man said: "At school, the biggest punishment for me was having to sit alone."
to: Muž povedal: "V škole bol pre mňa najväčší trest, že som musel sedieť sám."

from: The man said: "I had no problem with climbing that hill."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemal som problém vyliezť na ten kopec."

from: The man said: "I wanted my kids to go to prestigious universities, so I paid for tutoring."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som, aby moje deti išli na prestížne univerzity, tak som si zaplatil doučovanie."

from: The man said: "I thought about starting my own vlog about fashion."
to: Muž povedal: "Rozmýšľal som nad tým, že si založím vlastný vlog o móde."

from: The man said: "I changed my hair color according to the latest fashion."
to: Muž povedal: "Zmenil som si farbu vlasov podľa najnovšej módy."

from: The man said: "When the deadline was approaching I just decided to share my answers with them."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď sa blížil termín, rozhodol som sa s nimi podeliť o svoje odpovede."

from: The man said: "I was with my friend who couldn't stop talking."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som so svojím priateľom, ktorý nemohol prestať hovoriť."

from: The man said: "I took some days to think over the offer."
to: Muž povedal: "Vzal som si niekoľko dní na premyslenie ponuky."

from: The man said: "There were just too many obstacles so I had to give up."
to: Muž povedal: "Bolo tam príliš veľa prekážok, takže som sa musel vzdať."

from: The man said: "I calmly handled a difficult customer."
to: Muž povedal: "Pokojne som vybavil náročného zákazníka."

from: The man said: "I think my co-worker is an excellent leader."
to: Muž povedal: "Myslím si, že môj spolupracovník je vynikajúci vodca."

from: The man said: "If I knew how boring university was, I would never have gone to it."
to: Muž povedal: "Keby som vedel, aká nudná je univerzita, nikdy by som na ňu nešiel."

from: The man said: "I wanted to discuss the current political situation with you."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som s vami diskutovať o súčasnej politickej situácii."

from: The man said: "I would be happier if my partner stayed at home and raised the children."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol by som šťastnejší, keby moja partnerka zostala doma a vychovávala deti."

from: The man said: "I could never stand up for myself."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa nedokázal postaviť za seba."

from: The man said: "I would prefer not to eat than to wear something ugly."

from: The man said: "I hauled heavy loads, it was my job and I liked it."

from: The man said: "I did not need to ask for help."

from: The man said: "I don't like to read books because they're boring."

from: The man said: "I needed someone to talk to because it was too much."

from: The man said: "I resolved to brush my dog at least three times a week so he wouldn’t shed as much."

to: Žena povedala: "Zvýšila som svoj potenciál zárobku, aby som poskytla lepšiu finančnú podporu svojej rodine."

to: Žena povedala: "Sama som to niesla hore schodmi."

from: The woman said: "I resolved to brush my dog at least three times a week so he wouldn’t shed as much."
to: Žena povedala: "Rozhodla som sa, že budem svojho psa čistiť aspoň trikrát týždenne, aby toľko nezhadzoval."

from: The woman said: "I was with my friend who couldn't stop talking."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som so svojím priateľom, ktorý nemohol prestať hovoriť."

from: The woman said: "I took some days to think over the offer."
to: Žena povedala: "Vzal som si niekoľko dní na premyslenie ponuky."

from: The woman said: "I was looking out for my employees even though I was on holiday."
to: Žena povedala: "Hľadala som svojich zamestnancov, aj keď som bola na dovolenke."

from: The woman said: "I actively engaged with a team member who was experiencing difficulty at work."
to: Žena povedala: "Aktívne som spolupracovala s členom tímu, ktorý mal problémy v práci."

from: The woman said: "I hauled heavy loads, it was my job and I liked it."
to: Žena povedala: "Ťahala som ťažké bremená, bola to moja práca a mala som ju rada."

from: The woman said: "I always like physical jobs."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy mám rada fyzickú prácu."

from: The woman said: "I would be happier if my partner stayed at home and raised the children."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola by som šťastnejšia, keby môj partner zostal doma a vychovával deti."

from: The woman said: "I did not need to ask for help."
to: Žena povedala: "Nepotrebovala som žiadať o pomoc."

from: The woman said: "I needed someone to talk to because it was too much."
to: Žena povedala: "Potrebovala som sa s niekým porozprávať, pretože toho bolo priveľa."

from: The woman said: "I allowed my anxiety to control my actions, avoiding certain situations."
to: Žena povedala: "Dovolila som svojej úzkosti ovládať moje činy a vyhýbať sa určitým situáciám."

from: The woman said: "I lost my job and the reason was that I couldn't handle stress, but I can."
to: Žena povedala: "Prišla som o prácu a dôvodom bolo, že som nezvládla stres, ale môžem."

from: The woman said: "I could not hold back the tears."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som zadržať slzy."

from: The woman said: "Even though they were acting rude, I was trying to be as polite as I could."
to: Žena povedala: "Aj keď sa správali neslušne, snažila som sa byť tak zdvorilá, ako som len mohla."

from: The woman said: "I didn't like losing time and started working immediately."
to: Žena povedala: "Nerád som strácal čas a okamžite som začal pracovať."

from: The woman said: "I was promoted because I have good communication skills."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som povýšená, pretože mám dobré komunikačné schopnosti."

from: The woman said: "I couldn't donate blood because I didn't meet the minimum weight requirement."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som darovať krv, pretože som nesplnila požiadavku na minimálnu hmotnosť."

from: The woman said: "I don't like to read books because they're boring."
to: Žena povedala: "Nerada čítam knihy, pretože sú nudné."

from: The woman said: "I could never leave the airport without first checking all the fragnances first."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som nemohla opustiť letisko bez toho, aby som najprv neskontrolovala všetky vône."

from: The woman said: "I delegated tasks effectively, matching the skills and strengths of my team members with the right responsibilities."
to: Žena povedala: "Efektívne som delegovala úlohy, zladila som zručnosti a silné stránky členov môjho tímu so správnymi zodpovednosťami."

from: The woman said: "I couldn't do it with my bare hands."
to: Žena povedala: "Nedokázala som to urobiť holými rukami."

from: The woman said: "I love team sports so I was really sad that I could not join the volleyball team."
to: Žena povedala: "Milujem kolektívne športy, takže som bola naozaj smutná, že som sa nemohla pripojiť k volejbalovému tímu."

from: The woman said: "When the deadline was approaching I just decided to share my answers with them."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď sa blížil termín, rozhodla som sa s nimi podeliť o svoje odpovede."

from: The woman said: "I had trouble keeping up with the pace of a fitness class."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som problém udržať tempo na hodine fitness."

from: The woman said: "I have never left home without making sure that everybody has something to eat first."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som neodišla z domu bez toho, aby som sa najprv uistila, že všetci majú niečo na jedenie."

from: The woman said: "I worked hard to maintain my position."
to: Žena povedala: "Tvrdo som pracovala, aby som si udržala svoju pozíciu."

from: The woman said: "I never considered going to therapy."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som neuvažovala, že pôjdem na terapiu."

from: The woman said: "I’m aware of my qualities."
to: Žena povedala: "Som si vedomá svojich kvalít."

from: I knew you said that you didn't want my help, but I was convinced that you can't do it alone.
to: Vedel som, že si povedal, že nechceš moju pomoc, ale bol som presvedčený, že to sám nezvládneš.

from: I was so worried that I got completely paralysed.
to: Mal som taký strach, že som úplne ochrnul.

from: I'm the funny one in our family.
to: Som ten vtipný v našej rodine.

from: I like kinky people.
to: Mám rád namyslených ľudí.

from: I gave a keynote speech at a conference.
to: Na konferencii som mal hlavný prejav.

from: I didn't take any responsibility.
to: Neniesol som žiadnu zodpovednosť.

from: When I heard there were going to be carousels in town, I was very happy.
to: Keď som počul, že v meste budú kolotoče, bol som veľmi šťastný.

from: I want to have as much fun with others as possible while I’m young.
to: Chcem si užiť čo najviac zábavy s ostatnými, kým som mladý.

from: I never thought I’d be the one to turn him in to the police.
to: Nikdy som si nemyslel, že to budem ja, kto ho vydá polícii.

from: I was aware how they felt.
to: Bol som si vedomý toho, ako sa cítili.

from: I always knew that you'd be mine.
to: Vždy som vedel, že budeš moja.

from: I worked extra hard to be able to afford this massage appointment.
to: Pracoval som mimoriadne tvrdo, aby som si mohol dovoliť túto masáž.

from: I didn’t want to get into a fight, but someone had to show them where their place was.
to: Nechcel som sa biť, ale niekto im musel ukázať, kde je ich miesto.

from: I decided on the direction of the company.
to: Rozhodoval som o smerovaní firmy.

from: I have never cared about what others think.
to: Nikdy ma nezaujímalo, čo si myslia ostatní.

from: I saw a very cute cat video, they were just like me.
to: Videl som veľmi roztomilé mačacie video, boli presne ako ja.

from: I met an elderly gentleman for whom I do grocery shopping every Monday.
to: Stretla som staršieho pána, pre ktorého robím nákupy v potravinách každý pondelok.

from: I sold items we no longer needed to contribute to pay off family debts.
to: Predal som veci, ktorými sme už nemuseli prispievať na splatenie rodinných dlhov.

from: On a date, my partner couldn't help but compliment my good looks, making me feel attractive and desired.
to: Na rande si môj partner nemohol pomôcť a pochválil môj pekný vzhľad, vďaka čomu som sa cítila príťažlivá a žiadaná.

from: I feel the happiest when hosting a party.
to: Najšťastnejší sa cítim, keď organizujem párty.

from: Losing a limb didn't stop me from winning the Olympics.
to: Strata končatiny mi nezabránila vyhrať olympiádu.

from: I consulted the teacher about our children's grades.
to: Známky našich detí som konzultoval s učiteľkou.

from: I changed my schedule when they asked me to.
to: Keď ma o to požiadali, zmenil som svoj rozvrh.

from: I like to make dinner for my family.
to: Rád pripravujem večeru pre svoju rodinu.

from: I’ve discovered that the colour of this season is red.
to: Zistil som, že farbou tejto sezóny je červená.

from: I was immature even after I graduated, I was still acting like a selfish kid.
to: Bol som nezrelý aj po ukončení štúdia, stále som sa správal ako sebecké dieťa.

from: I was afraid of staying alone.
to: Bál som sa zostať sám.

from: I assessed the risk and decided it was not worth it.
to: Zhodnotil som riziko a rozhodol som sa, že to nestojí za to.

from: I like spending time with my kids by jumping around and acting foolish.
to: Rád trávim čas so svojimi deťmi skákaním a správaním sa hlúpo.

from: I have always loved holiday family reunions, it is so nice to be all together again.
to: Vždy som miloval dovolenkové rodinné stretnutia, je také pekné byť opäť všetci spolu.

from: I like to go for walks in the park and listen to the birds.
to: Rád chodím na prechádzky do parku a počúvam vtáky.

from: I attended a community workshop and participated in the discussion.
to: Zúčastnil som sa komunitného workshopu a zúčastnil som sa diskusie.

from: I provided guidance and support to help new colleagues integrate into the company culture.
to: Poskytoval som poradenstvo a podporu, aby som pomohol novým kolegom začleniť sa do firemnej kultúry.

from: As a psychologist, I developed personalized treatment plans to address mental health concerns.
to: Ako psychológ som vypracoval personalizované liečebné plány na riešenie problémov duševného zdravia.

from: I tried to do a push-up, but my arms gave out.
to: Pokúsil som sa urobiť klik, ale ruky sa mi podlomili.

from: Do you think you're stronger than me?
to: Myslíš si, že si silnejší ako ja?

from: I had to give up, the opponents were just too fierce.
to: Musel som sa vzdať, súperi boli jednoducho príliš draví.

from: I took on an extra shift.
to: Vzal som si smenu navyše.

from: I went to see the new lego movie and I think i was the only adult in the whole cinema.
to: Išiel som si pozrieť nový lego film a myslím, že som bol jediný dospelý v celom kine.

from: I never expected anyone to pay my bills.
to: Nikdy som nečakal, že mi niekto zaplatí účty.

from: I was enjoying leading others.
to: Bavilo ma viesť ostatných.

from: I have recently completed an important and challenging research.
to: Nedávno som dokončil dôležitý a náročný výskum.

from: I don't want to go with you if you're driving, you are a horrible driver.
to: Nechcem ísť s tebou, ak šoféruješ, si hrozný vodič.

from: I wondered how long would this meeting last, but I kept silent.
to: Bol som zvedavý, ako dlho bude toto stretnutie trvať, ale mlčal som.

from: I attempted to swim long distances, but my endurance was weak.
to: Pokúšal som sa plávať na dlhé vzdialenosti, ale moja vytrvalosť bola slabá.

from: I was always leading by example.
to: Vždy som išiel príkladom.

from: In my position, it is crucial that I am able to detect and prevent threats early on.
to: V mojej pozícii je kľúčové, aby som dokázal včas odhaliť hrozby a predchádzať im.

from: We were arguing over the messages, so I threw my phone on the ground in anger and it shattered all over.
to: Hádali sme sa kvôli správam, tak som od zlosti hodil telefón o zem a celý sa rozbil.

from: I like to make a good first impression.
to: Rád robím dobrý prvý dojem.

from: I picked up the steel frames.
to: Zobral som oceľové rámy.

from: I ironed the clothes for my partner.
to: Oblečenie som vyžehlila partnerovi.

from: I always could do anything that I told myself.
to: Vždy som mohol urobiť čokoľvek, čo som si povedal.

from: I strapped on my hiking boots and embarked on a challenging trek.
to: Obula som si turistické topánky a vydala sa na náročný trek.

from: I wouldn't go out if I didn't know how I look.
to: Nešiel by som von, keby som nevedel, ako vyzerám.

from: Out of every pay check, I chose to send a portion of the money to someone because they need it more than I do.
to: Z každého výplatného šeku som sa rozhodol poslať časť peňazí niekomu, pretože ich potrebuje viac ako ja.

from: You shouldn't lift that, it's too heavy.
to: Nemali by ste to zdvíhať, je to príliš ťažké.

from: Hold my beer, I could do it better than you.
to: Podrž mi pivo, vedel by som to urobiť lepšie ako ty.

from: I knew best what I can and what I cannot do, you didn't have to tell me.
to: Vedel som najlepšie, čo môžem a čo nemôžem, nemusel si mi to hovoriť.

from: It is not a problem to make coffee - I like doing it.
to: Nie je problém pripraviť kávu - robím to rád.

from: When the building was in flames, I carried buckets of water all night.
to: Keď bola budova v plameňoch, celú noc som nosil vedrá s vodou.

from: I organised a workshop for all the stakeholders.
to: Zorganizoval som workshop pre všetkých zainteresovaných.

from: I wanted to make a counter-offer, but that would be a low blow.
to: Chcel som urobiť protiponuku, ale to by bola nízka rana.

from: I possessed an undeniable allure that captivated others, drawing their attention and admiration.
to: Mal som nepopierateľnú príťažlivosť, ktorá uchvátila ostatných, upútala ich pozornosť a obdiv.

from: I called the neighbours over for a barbecue.
to: Zavolal som susedov na grilovačku.

from: I spent the whole night baking this cake.
to: Pečením tohto koláča som strávila celú noc.

from: I focused on maintaining a clean and neat appearance
to: Zameral som sa na udržanie čistého a upraveného vzhľadu

from: I didn't take my responsibilities so seriously.
to: Svoje povinnosti som nebral až tak vážne.

from: I never stopped learning.
to: Nikdy som sa neprestal učiť.

from: I didn't want to be responsible for my decisions.
to: Nechcel som niesť zodpovednosť za svoje rozhodnutia.

from: I did not talk back to them.
to: Nehovoril som im.

from: I am experienced enough to be able to prioritise effectively.
to: Som dostatočne skúsený na to, aby som si vedel efektívne určiť priority.

from: I volunteered at a local food bank, engaging with individuals facing food insecurity.
to: Dobrovoľne som pracoval v miestnej potravinovej banke, kde som pracoval s jednotlivcami, ktorí čelia potravinovej neistote.

from: I burst into tears at work after receiving a slightly critical email, even though I knew it was an overreaction and not worth getting so upset about.
to: Po prijatí mierne kritického e-mailu som sa v práci rozplakal, aj keď som vedel, že to bola prehnaná reakcia a nestojí za to sa kvôli tomu tak rozčuľovať.

from: As the leader, I left behind a legacy.
to: Ako vedúci som po sebe zanechal odkaz.

from: I washed my hair so often I ruined it all over.
to: Umývala som si vlasy tak často, že som si ich celé zničila.

from: I mocked their appearance.
to: Posmieval som sa ich vzhľadu.

from: I didn't take their worries seriously.
to: Ich obavy som nebral vážne.

from: I could never go to a public toilet, they are full of bacteria.
to: Nikdy som nemohla ísť na verejné WC, sú plné baktérií.

from: I followed a lot of beauty influencers on social media.
to: Na sociálnych sieťach som sledovala veľa beauty influencerov.

from: I like to wear something that highlights my decolettage.
to: Rada nosím niečo, čo zvýrazní môj dekolt.

from: I’m extremely communicative and love to meet new people.
to: Som veľmi komunikatívna a rada spoznávam nových ľudí.

from: I bought a new motorbike that is even more powerful than the last one.
to: Kúpil som si novú motorku, ktorá je ešte výkonnejšia ako tá predchádzajúca.

from: I did not take the medicine the doctor recommended.
to: Lieky, ktoré mi lekár odporučil, som neužíval.

from: I meticulously reviewed and revised my work.
to: Svoju prácu som dôkladne prehodnotil a zrevidoval.

from: I could not handle all the algebra rules.
to: Nezvládol som všetky pravidlá algebry.

from: I like to discuss with people who have different opinions.
to: Rád diskutujem s ľuďmi, ktorí majú odlišné názory.

from: Even though I had won, I felt awkward when they gave me the award.
to: Aj keď som vyhral, cítil som sa trápne, keď mi dali cenu.

from: I've built such a reputation that people are afraid to even look at me.
to: Vybudoval som si takú povesť, že sa na mňa ľudia boja čo i len pozrieť.

from: I bought that perfume I saw in the ad.
to: Kúpila som si parfém, ktorý som videla v reklame.

from: We had a fight, so I packed up all my stuff and left.
to: Pohádali sme sa, tak som si zbalil všetky veci a odišiel.

from: I took an extra shift this week.
to: Tento týždeň som si dal zmenu navyše.

from: I always kept my privacy so people couldn't hurt me in any way.
to: Vždy som si strážila súkromie, aby mi ľudia nemohli nijako ublížiť.

from: As a project manager, I organized team meetings, allocated resources efficiently, and ensured clear communication channels to meet project deadlines successfully.
to: Ako projektový manažér som organizoval tímové stretnutia, efektívne prideľoval zdroje a zabezpečoval jasné komunikačné kanály na úspešné dodržanie termínov projektu.

from: I couldn't wait till Friday because that's a party day.
to: Nemohla som sa dočkať piatku, pretože je deň párty.

from: In my private life, I have never encountered rejection.
to: V súkromnom živote som sa nikdy nestretol s odmietnutím.

from: I was speeding on my new Mercedes.
to: Rýchlo som išiel na svojom novom Mercedese.

from: My indicator light is on in my car, would you be able to check it?
to: V aute mi svieti kontrolka, mohli by ste to skontrolovať?

from: As I navigated the challenging obstacle course, I pushed my body to the limits.
to: Keď som prechádzal náročnou prekážkovou dráhou, tlačil som svoje telo na hranice možností.

from: I think I could fight off a bear if I met one in the forest.
to: Myslím, že by som mohol odohnať medveďa, keby som ho stretol v lese.

from: I gave them money to feel better.
to: Dal som im peniaze, aby sa cítili lepšie.

from: The man said: "I like to make a good first impression."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád robím dobrý prvý dojem."

from: The man said: "I consulted the teacher about our children's grades."
to: Muž povedal: "Konzultoval som s učiteľkou známky našich detí."

from: The man said: "I did not talk back to them."
to: Muž povedal: "Nehovoril som im."

from: The man said: "I gave a keynote speech at a conference."
to: Muž povedal: "Na konferencii som mal hlavný prejav."

from: The man said: "I did not take the medicine the doctor recommended."
to: Muž povedal: "Neužil som liek, ktorý mi lekár odporučil."

from: The man said: "As the leader, I left behind a legacy."
to: Muž povedal: "Ako vodca som po sebe zanechal odkaz."

from: The man said: "I like to make dinner for my family."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád robím večeru pre svoju rodinu."

from: The man said: "I think I could fight off a bear if I met one in the forest."
to: Muž povedal: "Myslím, že by som mohol odohnať medveďa, keby som ho stretol v lese."

from: The man said: "I picked up the steel frames."
to: Muž povedal: "Zdvihol som oceľové rámy."

from: The man said: "I have never cared about what others think."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa nestaral o to, čo si myslia ostatní."

from: The man said: "I spent the whole night baking this cake."
to: Muž povedal: "Celú noc som piekol tento koláč."

from: The man said: "I didn't take my responsibilities so seriously."
to: Muž povedal: "Nebral som svoje povinnosti tak vážne."

from: The man said: "I wouldn't go out if I didn't know how I look."
to: Muž povedal: "Nešiel by som von, keby som nevedel, ako vyzerám."

from: The man said: "I couldn't wait till Friday because that's a party day."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som čakať do piatku, pretože je deň večierky."

from: The man said: "I am experienced enough to be able to prioritise effectively."
to: Muž povedal: "Som dostatočne skúsený na to, aby som vedel efektívne určovať priority."

from: The man said: "I was afraid of staying alone."
to: Muž povedal: "Bál som sa zostať sám."

from: The man said: "As a project manager, I organized team meetings, allocated resources efficiently, and ensured clear communication channels to meet project deadlines successfully."
to: Muž povedal: "Ako projektový manažér som organizoval tímové stretnutia, efektívne prideľoval zdroje a zabezpečoval jasné komunikačné kanály, aby som úspešne splnil termíny projektu."

from: The man said: "I was enjoying leading others."
to: Muž povedal: "Bavilo ma viesť ostatných."

from: The man said: "Even though I had won, I felt awkward when they gave me the award."
to: Muž povedal: "Aj keď som vyhral, cítil som sa trápne, keď mi dali cenu."

from: The man said: "I sold items we no longer needed to contribute to pay off family debts."
to: Muž povedal: "Predal som veci, ktoré sme už nepotrebovali prispievať na splatenie rodinných dlhov."

from: The man said: "I like to discuss with people who have different opinions."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád diskutujem s ľuďmi, ktorí majú odlišné názory."

from: The man said: "I volunteered at a local food bank, engaging with individuals facing food insecurity."
to: Muž povedal: "Prihlásil som sa ako dobrovoľník do miestnej potravinovej banky, kde som pracoval s jednotlivcami, ktorí čelia potravinovej neistote."

from: The man said: "I was speeding on my new Mercedes."
to: Muž povedal: "Rýchlil som na svojom novom Mercedese."

from: The man said: "I tried to do a push-up, but my arms gave out."
to: Muž povedal: "Snažil som sa urobiť klik, ale vypadli mi ruky."

from: The man said: "I don't want to go with you if you're driving, you are a horrible driver."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechcem ísť s tebou, ak šoféruješ, si hrozný vodič."

from: The man said: "I wondered how long would this meeting last, but I kept silent."
to: Muž povedal: "Premýšľal som, ako dlho bude toto stretnutie trvať, ale mlčal som."

from: The man said: "Do you think you're stronger than me?"
to: Muž povedal: "Myslíš si, že si silnejší ako ja?"

from: The man said: "I gave them money to feel better."
to: Muž povedal: "Dal som im peniaze, aby sa cítili lepšie."

from: The man said: "You shouldn't lift that, it's too heavy."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemali by ste to zdvíhať, je to príliš ťažké."

from: The man said: "I called the neighbours over for a barbecue."
to: Muž povedal: "Zavolal som susedov na grilovanie."

from: The man said: "I like to wear something that highlights my decolettage."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád nosím niečo, čo zvýrazní môj dekolt."

from: The man said: "I never thought I’d be the one to turn him in to the police."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som si nemyslel, že to budem ja, kto ho vydá polícii."

from: The man said: "I like kinky people."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád výstredných ľudí."

from: The man said: "We were arguing over the messages, so I threw my phone on the ground in anger and it shattered all over."
to: Muž povedal: "Hádali sme sa kvôli správam, tak som v hneve hodil telefón o zem a celý sa rozbil."

from: The man said: "I worked extra hard to be able to afford this massage appointment."
to: Muž povedal: "Pracoval som mimoriadne tvrdo, aby som si mohol dovoliť túto masáž."

from: The man said: "I didn’t want to get into a fight, but someone had to show them where their place was."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechcel som sa biť, ale niekto im musel ukázať, kde je ich miesto."

from: The man said: "I took an extra shift this week."
to: Muž povedal: "Tento týždeň som si dal zmenu navyše."

from: The man said: "I could never go to a public toilet, they are full of bacteria."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nemohol ísť na verejné toalety, sú plné baktérií."

from: The man said: "I provided guidance and support to help new colleagues integrate into the company culture."
to: Muž povedal: "Poskytol som poradenstvo a podporu, aby som pomohol novým kolegom integrovať sa do firemnej kultúry."

from: The man said: "I’m extremely communicative and love to meet new people."
to: Muž povedal: "Som mimoriadne komunikatívny a rád spoznávam nových ľudí."

from: The man said: "I didn't take any responsibility."
to: Muž povedal: "Neprevzal som žiadnu zodpovednosť."

from: The man said: "I didn't want to be responsible for my decisions."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechcel som byť zodpovedný za svoje rozhodnutia."

from: The man said: "I knew you said that you didn't want my help, but I was convinced that you can't do it alone."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedel som, že si povedal, že nechceš moju pomoc, ale bol som presvedčený, že to nedokážeš sám."

from: The man said: "I bought a new motorbike that is even more powerful than the last one."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpil som si novú motorku, ktorá je ešte výkonnejšia ako tá predchádzajúca."

from: The man said: "I was always leading by example."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som išiel príkladom."

from: The man said: "I didn't take their worries seriously."
to: Muž povedal: "Nebral som ich starosti vážne."

from: The man said: "I mocked their appearance."
to: Muž povedal: "Posmieval som sa ich vzhľadu."

from: The man said: "I burst into tears at work after receiving a slightly critical email, even though I knew it was an overreaction and not worth getting so upset about."
to: Muž povedal: "V práci som sa rozplakal po tom, čo som dostal trochu kritický e-mail, aj keď som vedel, že to bola prehnaná reakcia a nestojí za to sa kvôli tomu tak rozčuľovať."

from: The man said: "I was immature even after I graduated, I was still acting like a selfish kid."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som nezrelý aj po ukončení štúdia, stále som sa správal ako sebecké dieťa."

from: The man said: "I was aware how they felt."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som si vedomý toho, ako sa cítili."

from: The man said: "I always knew that you'd be mine."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som vedel, že budeš moja."

from: The man said: "I like spending time with my kids by jumping around and acting foolish."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád trávim čas so svojimi deťmi skákaním a správaním sa hlúpo."

from: The man said: "I meticulously reviewed and revised my work."
to: Muž povedal: "Dôkladne som skontroloval a zrevidoval svoju prácu."

from: The man said: "We had a fight, so I packed up all my stuff and left."
to: Muž povedal: "Pohádali sme sa, tak som si zbalil všetky veci a odišiel."

from: The man said: "I wanted to make a counter-offer, but that would be a low blow."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som urobiť protiponuku, ale to by bola nízka rana."

from: The man said: "I assessed the risk and decided it was not worth it."
to: Muž povedal: "Posúdil som riziko a rozhodol som sa, že to nestojí za to."

from: The man said: "I'm the funny one in our family."
to: Muž povedal: "Ja som ten vtipný v našej rodine."

from: The man said: "Losing a limb didn't stop me from winning the Olympics."
to: Muž povedal: "Strata končatiny mi nezabránila vyhrať olympiádu."

from: The man said: "I organised a workshop for all the stakeholders."
to: Muž povedal: "Zorganizoval som workshop pre všetky zainteresované strany."

from: The man said: "I attempted to swim long distances, but my endurance was weak."
to: Muž povedal: "Pokúšal som sa plávať na dlhé vzdialenosti, ale moja vytrvalosť bola slabá."

from: The man said: "I want to have as much fun with others as possible while I’m young."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcem si užiť čo najviac zábavy s ostatnými, kým som mladý."

from: The man said: "I’ve discovered that the colour of this season is red."
to: Muž povedal: "Zistil som, že farba tejto sezóny je červená."

from: The man said: "I knew best what I can and what I cannot do, you didn't have to tell me."
to: Muž povedal: "Ja som najlepšie vedel, čo môžem a čo nemôžem, nemusel si mi to hovoriť."

from: The man said: "I saw a very cute cat video, they were just like me."
to: Muž povedal: "Videl som veľmi roztomilé video s mačkami, boli také ako ja."

from: The man said: "I never stopped learning."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa neprestal učiť."

from: The man said: "On a date, my partner couldn't help but compliment my good looks, making me feel attractive and desired."
to: Muž povedal: "Na rande si moja partnerka nemohla pomôcť a pochválila môj pekný vzhľad, vďaka čomu som sa cítila príťažlivá a žiadaná."

from: The man said: "I went to see the new lego movie and I think i was the only adult in the whole cinema."
to: Muž povedal: "Išiel som si pozrieť nový lego film a myslím, že som bol jediný dospelý v celom kine."

from: The man said: "I feel the happiest when hosting a party."
to: Muž povedal: "Najšťastnejší sa cítim, keď organizujem párty."

from: The man said: "I could not handle all the algebra rules."
to: Muž povedal: "Nedokázal som zvládnuť všetky pravidlá algebry."

from: The man said: "Hold my beer, I could do it better than you."
to: Muž povedal: "Podrž mi pivo, vedel by som to urobiť lepšie ako ty."

from: The man said: "I met an elderly gentleman for whom I do grocery shopping every Monday."
to: Muž povedal: "Stretol som staršieho pána, pre ktorého nakupujem každý pondelok."

from: The man said: "I was so worried that I got completely paralysed."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som tak znepokojený, že som úplne ochrnul."

from: The man said: "I strapped on my hiking boots and embarked on a challenging trek."
to: Muž povedal: "Ozul som si turistické topánky a vydal sa na náročný trek."

from: The man said: "As a psychologist, I developed personalized treatment plans to address mental health concerns."
to: Muž povedal: "Ako psychológ som vyvinul personalizované liečebné plány na riešenie problémov duševného zdravia."

from: The man said: "I like to go for walks in the park and listen to the birds."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád chodím na prechádzky do parku a počúvam vtáky."

from: The man said: "I always kept my privacy so people couldn't hurt me in any way."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som si strážil súkromie, aby mi ľudia nemohli nijako ublížiť."

from: The man said: "I ironed the clothes for my partner."
to: Muž povedal: "Vyžehlil som oblečenie pre svoju partnerku."

from: The man said: "I always could do anything that I told myself."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som mohol urobiť čokoľvek, čo som si povedal."

from: The man said: "My indicator light is on in my car, would you be able to check it?"
to: Muž povedal: "V mojom aute svieti kontrolka, mohli by ste to skontrolovať?"

from: The man said: "I have recently completed an important and challenging research."
to: Muž povedal: "Nedávno som dokončil dôležitý a náročný výskum."

from: The man said: "I possessed an undeniable allure that captivated others, drawing their attention and admiration."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som nepopierateľnú príťažlivosť, ktorá uchvátila ostatných, pritiahla ich pozornosť a obdiv."

from: The man said: "In my position, it is crucial that I am able to detect and prevent threats early on."
to: Muž povedal: "V mojej pozícii je kľúčové, aby som bol schopný včas odhaliť hrozby a zabrániť im."

from: The man said: "It is not a problem to make coffee - I like doing it."
to: Muž povedal: "Nie je problém pripraviť kávu - robím to rád."

from: The man said: "I bought that perfume I saw in the ad."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpil som ten parfém, ktorý som videl v reklame."

from: The man said: "I washed my hair so often I ruined it all over."
to: Muž povedal: "Umýval som si vlasy tak často, že som si ich celé zničil."

from: The man said: "I never expected anyone to pay my bills."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nečakal, že niekto zaplatí moje účty."

from: The man said: "When I heard there were going to be carousels in town, I was very happy."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som počul, že v meste budú kolotoče, bol som veľmi šťastný."

from: The man said: "I focused on maintaining a clean and neat appearance"
to: Muž povedal: "Zameral som sa na udržanie čistého a upraveného vzhľadu."

from: The man said: "I attended a community workshop and participated in the discussion."
to: Muž povedal: "Zúčastnil som sa komunitného workshopu a zúčastnil som sa diskusie."

from: The man said: "I decided on the direction of the company."
to: Muž povedal: "Rozhodol som o smerovaní spoločnosti."

from: The man said: "As I navigated the challenging obstacle course, I pushed my body to the limits."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som prechádzal náročnou prekážkovou dráhou, tlačil som svoje telo na hranice možností."

from: The man said: "I've built such a reputation that people are afraid to even look at me."
to: Muž povedal: "Vybudoval som si takú povesť, že ľudia sa na mňa boja čo i len pozrieť."

from: The man said: "I took on an extra shift."
to: Muž povedal: "Zobral som si smenu navyše."

from: The man said: "I have always loved holiday family reunions, it is so nice to be all together again."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som miloval dovolenkové rodinné stretnutia, je také pekné byť opäť všetci spolu."

from: The man said: "When the building was in flames, I carried buckets of water all night."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď bola budova v plameňoch, celú noc som nosil vedrá vody."

from: The man said: "I followed a lot of beauty influencers on social media."
to: Muž povedal: "Na sociálnych sieťach som sledoval veľa ľudí ovplyvňujúcich krásu."

from: The man said: "Out of every pay check, I chose to send a portion of the money to someone because they need it more than I do."
to: Muž povedal: "Z každého výplatného šeku som sa rozhodol poslať časť peňazí niekomu, pretože ich potrebuje viac ako ja."

from: The man said: "I had to give up, the opponents were just too fierce."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som sa vzdať, súperi boli jednoducho príliš tvrdí."

from: The man said: "In my private life, I have never encountered rejection."
to: Muž povedal: "V mojom súkromnom živote som sa nikdy nestretol s odmietnutím."

from: The man said: "I changed my schedule when they asked me to."
to: Muž povedal: "Zmenil som svoj rozvrh, keď ma o to požiadali."

from: The woman said: "I wanted to make a counter-offer, but that would be a low blow."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som urobiť protiponuku, ale to by bola nízka rana."

from: The woman said: "I provided guidance and support to help new colleagues integrate into the company culture."
to: Žena povedala: "Poskytovala som poradenstvo a podporu, aby som pomohla novým kolegom integrovať sa do firemnej kultúry."

from: The woman said: "I like to make dinner for my family."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada robím večeru pre svoju rodinu."

from: The woman said: "I never stopped learning."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som sa neprestala učiť."

from: The woman said: "I possessed an undeniable allure that captivated others, drawing their attention and admiration."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som nepopierateľnú príťažlivosť, ktorá uchvátila ostatných, pritiahla ich pozornosť a obdiv."

from: The woman said: "I had to give up, the opponents were just too fierce."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som sa vzdať, súperi boli jednoducho príliš tvrdí."

from: The woman said: "I spent the whole night baking this cake."
to: Žena povedala: "Celú noc som piekla tento koláč."

from: The woman said: "I did not talk back to them."
to: Žena povedala: "Nehovorila som im."

from: The woman said: "I never thought I’d be the one to turn him in to the police."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som si nemyslela, že to budem ja, kto ho vydá polícii."

from: The woman said: "I followed a lot of beauty influencers on social media."
to: Žena povedala: "Na sociálnych sieťach som sledovala veľa ľudí ovplyvňujúcich krásu."

from: The woman said: "I didn't take their worries seriously."
to: Žena povedala: "Nebrala som ich starosti vážne."

from: The woman said: "I always knew that you'd be mine."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som vedela, že budeš moja."

from: The woman said: "I strapped on my hiking boots and embarked on a challenging trek."
to: Žena povedala: "Obula som si turistické topánky a vydala sa na náročný trek."

from: The woman said: "I want to have as much fun with others as possible while I’m young."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcem si užiť čo najviac zábavy s ostatnými, kým som mladá."

from: The woman said: "As a project manager, I organized team meetings, allocated resources efficiently, and ensured clear communication channels to meet project deadlines successfully."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako projektová manažérka som organizovala tímové stretnutia, efektívne prideľovala zdroje a zabezpečovala jasné komunikačné kanály, aby som úspešne splnila termíny projektu."

from: The woman said: "When I heard there were going to be carousels in town, I was very happy."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som počula, že v meste budú kolotoče, bola som veľmi šťastná."

from: The woman said: "I don't want to go with you if you're driving, you are a horrible driver."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechcem ísť s tebou, ak šoféruješ, si hrozný vodič."

from: The woman said: "I was speeding on my new Mercedes."
to: Žena povedala: "Išla som rýchlo na svojom novom Mercedese."

from: The woman said: "I have never cared about what others think."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som sa nestarala o to, čo si myslia ostatní."

from: The woman said: "I could not handle all the algebra rules."
to: Žena povedala: "Nedokázala som zvládnuť všetky pravidlá algebry."

from: The woman said: "I meticulously reviewed and revised my work."
to: Žena povedala: "Dôkladne som si prezrela a zrevidovala svoju prácu."

from: The woman said: "I've built such a reputation that people are afraid to even look at me."
to: Žena povedala: "Vybudovala som si takú povesť, že ľudia sa na mňa boja čo i len pozrieť."

from: The woman said: "I gave a keynote speech at a conference."
to: Žena povedala: "Na konferencii som predniesla hlavný prejav."

from: The woman said: "I feel the happiest when hosting a party."
to: Žena povedala: "Najšťastnejšia sa cítim, keď organizujem párty."

from: The woman said: "Losing a limb didn't stop me from winning the Olympics."
to: Žena povedala: "Strata končatiny mi nezabránila vyhrať olympiádu."

from: The woman said: "I didn't take any responsibility."
to: Žena povedala: "Neprevzala som žiadnu zodpovednosť."

from: The woman said: "Hold my beer, I could do it better than you."
to: Žena povedala: "Podrž mi pivo, vedela by som to lepšie ako ty."

from: The woman said: "As the leader, I left behind a legacy."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako vodca som po sebe zanechala odkaz."

from: The woman said: "I’m extremely communicative and love to meet new people."
to: Žena povedala: "Som mimoriadne komunikatívna a rada spoznávam nových ľudí."

from: The woman said: "I’ve discovered that the colour of this season is red."
to: Žena povedala: "Zistila som, že farbou tejto sezóny je červená."

from: The woman said: "Even though I had won, I felt awkward when they gave me the award."
to: Žena povedala: "Aj keď som vyhrala, cítila som sa trápne, keď mi dali cenu."

from: The woman said: "I went to see the new lego movie and I think i was the only adult in the whole cinema."
to: Žena povedala: "Išla som si pozrieť nový lego film a myslím, že som bola jediná dospelá osoba v celom kine."

from: The woman said: "I was enjoying leading others."
to: Žena povedala: "Bavilo ma viesť ostatných."

from: The woman said: "I met an elderly gentleman for whom I do grocery shopping every Monday."
to: Žena povedala: "Stretla som staršieho pána, pre ktorého nakupujem každý pondelok."

from: Didn't I tell you not to eat in the living room?
to: Nepovedal som ti, aby si nejedol v obývačke?

from: I could easily change that flat tire myself.
to: Túto prasknutú pneumatiku by som mohol ľahko vymeniť sám.

from: I did a triple backflip.
to: Urobil som trojitý salto vzad.

from: I was always happy to help if someone needed me.
to: Vždy som rád pomohol, ak ma niekto potreboval.

from: I chopped the wood for the fireplace.
to: Narúbal som drevo do krbu.

from: I determined the idea outcome.
to: Stanovil som výsledok myšlienky.

from: I took care of the injured animal.
to: Postaral som sa o zranené zviera.

from: I made a bad business decision because I followed my emotions instead of facts.
to: Urobil som zlé obchodné rozhodnutie, pretože som sa namiesto faktov riadil svojimi emóciami.

from: I watched the fashion show to get some inspiration.
to: Pozrela som si módnu prehliadku, aby som sa inšpirovala.

from: Could you clean up after yourself, please?
to: Mohol by si po sebe upratať, prosím?

from: I carefully evaluated the benefits and drawbacks of accepting a job offer.
to: Starostlivo som zhodnotil výhody a nevýhody prijatia pracovnej ponuky.

from: I communicated proactively with stakeholders, keeping them informed about progress.
to: Aktívne som komunikoval so zainteresovanými stranami a informoval som ich o pokroku.

from: I pursued side hustles ensuring that my family's financial needs were met.
to: Usiloval som sa o to, aby som zabezpečil, že finančné potreby mojej rodiny budú splnené.

from: There was so much to do at work today, I cried.
to: Dnes bolo v práci toľko práce, až som sa rozplakala.

from: I worked hard so that everything looks perfect now.
to: Tvrdo som pracoval, aby teraz všetko vyzeralo perfektne.

from: I rarely asserted my own thoughts or desires.
to: Málokedy som presadzoval svoje vlastné myšlienky alebo túžby.

from: I called my friend to see if he wanted to go to the amusement park with me.
to: Zavolal som kamarátovi, či nechce ísť so mnou do zábavného parku.

from: I was thinking that my inner power is stronger than my outer power.
to: Myslel som si, že moja vnútorná sila je silnejšia ako moja vonkajšia sila.

from: I go to every meeting dressed formally.
to: Na každé stretnutie chodím formálne oblečený.

from: I attempted to engage in a physically demanding hobby, but found it challenging to handle the tools.
to: Pokúsil som sa zapojiť do fyzicky náročného koníčka, ale bolo ťažké zvládnuť nástroje.

from: I was unable to carry the heavy box and had to ask for help.
to: Nemohol som niesť ťažkú krabicu a musel som požiadať o pomoc.

from: I always imagined that I would be the one to bring the money home.
to: Vždy som si predstavoval, že to budem ja, kto prinesie peniaze domov.

from: I never read horoscopes because they are lies made up by ordinary people.
to: Nikdy nečítam horoskopy, pretože sú to lži, ktoré si vymysleli obyčajní ľudia.

from: I have always been popular in my group of friends.
to: V skupine mojich priateľov som bol vždy obľúbený.

from: I always got what I wanted in bed.
to: V posteli som vždy dostal to, čo som chcel.

from: I fought my way through.
to: Prebojoval som sa.

from: I suspected them, although they did nothing wrong.
to: Podozrieval som ich, hoci neurobili nič zlé.

from: I had to ask for help when we were moving because I could not lift the couch.
to: Keď sme sa sťahovali, musel som požiadať o pomoc, pretože som nemohol zdvihnúť gauč.

from: I sent a personal invitation to everyone, I think it is more friendly like this.
to: Každému som poslal osobnú pozvánku, myslím, že je to takto priateľskejšie.

from: I managed to climb that old shaky ladder with no hesitation.
to: Podarilo sa mi vyliezť na ten starý vratký rebrík bez zaváhania.

from: It was easy for me to persuade everyone that I was the right person for the job.
to: Bolo pre mňa ľahké presvedčiť všetkých, že som ten správny človek na túto prácu.

from: I had a lot of responsibilities, but I went to bed anyway.
to: Mal som veľa povinností, ale aj tak som išiel spať.

from: I had a gut feeling that the job was not right for me.
to: Mal som pocit, že tá práca nie je pre mňa to pravé.

from: My intuition tells me that I made the right decision.
to: Moja intuícia mi hovorí, že som sa rozhodol správne.

from: As a marketing manager, I developed strategic marketing plans, conducted market research, and implemented targeted campaigns.
to: Ako marketingový manažér som vypracoval strategické marketingové plány, robil prieskum trhu a realizoval cielené kampane.

from: I was right just as I always am.
to: Mal som pravdu ako vždy.

from: I'm good at strategy thinking.
to: Som dobrý v strategickom myslení.

from: Why did you always need to prove something?
to: Prečo si stále potreboval niečo dokazovať?

from: I have made many friends in the gym.
to: V posilňovni som si našiel veľa priateľov.

from: I planned the trip for the entire family.
to: Výlet som naplánoval pre celú rodinu.

from: I went to a party instead of preparing for the presentation.
to: Išiel som na párty namiesto prípravy na prezentáciu.

from: I really wanted to get laid.
to: Naozaj som si chcel ľahnúť.

from: I had long legs, slim waist and I was generally in shape.
to: Mala som dlhé nohy, štíhly pás a celkovo som bola vo forme.

from: I hosted a dinner for the firm's partners.
to: Usporiadal som večeru pre partnerov firmy.

from: I was not afraid because I knew that if we got into a fight, I'd win.
to: Nebál som sa, pretože som vedel, že keby sme sa pohádali, vyhral by som.

from: I obliged, because that's what was expected.
to: Zaviazal som sa, pretože to sa očakávalo.

from: In the privacy of my bedroom, I explored my own desires and pleasures.
to: V súkromí mojej spálne som skúmal svoje vlastné túžby a slasti.

from: Even though I don't like this meal, it's his favorite, so I cook it often.
to: Aj keď toto jedlo neobľubujem, je to jeho obľúbené, preto ho varím často.

from: I already vented the radiator.
to: Už som odvzdušnil radiátor.

from: You should learn how to defend yourself.
to: Mali by ste sa naučiť, ako sa brániť.

from: For the past week I made lunch for my partner daily.
to: Posledný týždeň som denne pripravoval obed pre svojho partnera.

from: I could never hurt a fly.
to: Nikdy by som nedokázal ublížiť muche.

from: I joined a gang.
to: Pridal som sa k gangu.

from: I calculated the amount of payments so we could afford a new TV.
to: Vypočítal som výšku platieb, aby sme si mohli dovoliť nový televízor.

from: I panicked when I saw the spider on the table.
to: Spanikáril som, keď som uvidel pavúka na stole.

from: I needed to be financially stable to start a family.
to: Na založenie rodiny som potreboval byť finančne stabilný.

from: I prefer to deal with my problems myself.
to: Svoje problémy si radšej riešim sám.

from: I tried calling you several times, are you okay?
to: Skúšal som ti zavolať niekoľkokrát, si v poriadku?

from: I attended a poetry reading or spoken word event, sharing my own work and engaging in discussions with other poets.
to: Zúčastnil som sa čítania poézie alebo hovoreného slova, zdieľal som svoju vlastnú tvorbu a zapájal som sa do diskusií s inými básnikmi.

from: I remained calm and focused on the goal.
to: Zostal som pokojný a sústredil som sa na cieľ.

from: I planned my whole week so that I would have every night free for my kids.
to: Naplánoval som si celý týždeň tak, aby som mal každú noc voľnú pre svoje deti.

from: I pretended to be ill so that I wouldn't have to go to work.
to: Predstieral som, že som chorý, aby som nemusel ísť do práce.

from: I baked a cake to make them happy.
to: Upiekla som tortu, aby mali radosť.

from: I told you to just ask if you need money.
to: Povedal som ti, aby si sa opýtal, či potrebuješ peniaze.

from: I received a compliment for the work I did.
to: Dostal som pochvalu za vykonanú prácu.

from: I wished the wrinkles would never show on my face.
to: Prial som si, aby sa mi na tvári nikdy neobjavili vrásky.

from: I felt independent even when I was a stay-at-home parent.
to: Cítil som sa nezávislý, aj keď som bol rodičom v domácnosti.

from: I masturbated a lot because my sexual urges were powerful.
to: Veľa som masturboval, pretože moje sexuálne túžby boli silné.

from: Today I babysat my six-month-old niece all day.
to: Dnes som celý deň strážila svoju polročnú neter.

from: I constantly put others' needs and desires before my own, rarely asserting my own preferences or standing up for myself.
to: Neustále uprednostňujem potreby a túžby iných pred svojimi vlastnými, len zriedka presadzujem svoje vlastné preferencie alebo si stojím za svojím.

from: I never agrued with them.
to: Nikdy som s nimi nesúhlasil.

from: I didn't mind working hard for the family's good.
to: Nevadilo mi tvrdo pracovať pre dobro rodiny.

from: I knew all the gangs in the city.
to: Poznal som všetky gangy v meste.

from: They told me it'd be tough, but they don't know the shit I've been through.

from: As a supervisor, I always helped my team members achieve their goals.

from: Behind the bedroom door, I'm passionate and dominant.

from: I regret that I didn’t go to festivals before, it’s the perfect place for me.

from: I set up a college fund for my children's education.

from: When we came to the restaurant, I decided to leave right away, because the tablecloths were filthy.

from: I signed up for an English course so I could handle my business without an interpreter.

from: I have always strived for excellence in everything I have ever done.

from: Life is tough, but I'm tougher.
to: Život je ťažký, ale ja som tvrdší.

from: The engine roared as I maneuvered the powerful off-road vehicle through the rough and unforgiving terrain.

from: I started my own company when I was 18.

from: I was never scared of failure.
