to: Žena povedala: "Priala by som si, aby som si zapamätala mená všetkých, ale včera som stretla príliš veľa ľudí."

from: The woman said: "You can come, but I'm not sure if you're strong enough to play football with us."
to: Žena povedala: "Môžeš prísť, ale nie som si istá, či si dosť silná na to, aby si s nami hral futbal."

from: The woman said: "I was quite young when I became the CEO."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som dosť mladá, keď som sa stala generálnou riaditeľkou."

from: The woman said: "I didn't go for drinks after work, because it's not professional."
to: Žena povedala: "Po práci som nešla na drink, pretože to nie je profesionálne."

from: The woman said: "I wanted to buy you that car, why did you buy it yourself?"
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som ti kúpiť to auto, prečo si si ho kúpil sám?"

from: The woman said: "I was slim and graceful."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som štíhla a pôvabná."

from: The woman said: "I attended a swingers party two weeks ago and it was awesome."
to: Žena povedala: "Pred dvoma týždňami som sa zúčastnila swingers party a bolo to úžasné."

from: The woman said: "Could you try to clean it one more time and be more precise, please?"
to: Žena povedala: "Mohol by si to skúsiť ešte raz vyčistiť a byť presnejší, prosím?"

from: The woman said: "I always carried a knife with me."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som so sebou nosila nôž."

from: The woman said: "I would have asked them to come, but I had a feeling they wouldn't appreciate it."
to: Žena povedala: "Požiadala by som ich, aby prišli, ale mala som pocit, že by to neocenili."

from: The woman said: "I could never hurt a loved one."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nemohla ublížiť milovanej osobe."

from: The woman said: "I can't go to the grocery store by myself, the bags are too heavy."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemôžem ísť sama do potravín, tašky sú príliš ťažké."

from: The woman said: "I've always been playful and that's reflected in my relationships."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som bola hravá a to sa odráža aj na mojich vzťahoch."

from: The woman said: "Dirt doesn't scare me - I like to get my hands dirty."
to: Žena povedala: "Špina ma nedesí - rada si zašpiním ruky."

from: The woman said: "I got paid last week, so I took my family out."
to: Žena povedala: "Minulý týždeň som dostala výplatu, tak som vzala rodinu von."

from: The woman said: "I wished there were more opportunities to meet new people."
to: Žena povedala: "Priala som si, aby bolo viac príležitostí spoznať nových ľudí."

from: The woman said: "I am a great motivator."
to: Žena povedala: "Som veľká motivátorka."

from: The woman said: "I want kids, so that I can have a companion for playing games."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcem deti, aby som mohla mať spoločníka na hranie hier."

from: The woman said: "Instead of engaging in open and honest communication, I would resort to passive-aggressive behavior."
to: Žena povedala: "Namiesto otvorenej a úprimnej komunikácie by som sa uchýlila k pasívno-agresívnemu správaniu."

from: The woman said: "I worry that if I hadn't made dinner, they would have gone hungry."
to: Žena povedala: "Obávam sa, že keby som neuvarila večeru, boli by hladní."

from: The woman said: "I felt so weak."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítila som sa taká slabá."

from: When I arrived in Thailand and saw all the insects, I wanted to get on the next plane.
to: Keď som dorazil do Thajska a videl som všetok hmyz, chcel som nastúpiť do ďalšieho lietadla.

from: I logically assessed the risks involved in a new investment opportunity.
to: Logicky som zhodnotil riziká spojené s novou investičnou príležitosťou.

from: I called my friend for help.
to: Zavolal som na pomoc svojho priateľa.

from: I donated my old clothes to the charity.
to: Daroval som svoje staré oblečenie na charitu.

from: I'm stronger than you.
to: Som silnejší ako ty.

from: I've been told that I was a role model for my colleagues.
to: Povedali mi, že som bol vzorom pre svojich kolegov.

from: I managed the financial portfolio for my whole family because they trusted my choices.
to: Spravoval som finančné portfólio pre celú moju rodinu, pretože dôverovali mojim rozhodnutiam.

from: I single-handedly saved them all.
to: Všetky som ich zachránil.

from: My confidence boosts when I'm in a leadership position because I can be bossy.
to: Moje sebavedomie sa zvyšuje, keď som vo vedúcej pozícii, pretože môžem byť panovačný.

from: I believed in superstitions such as that broken mirror brings seven years of bad luck.
to: Veril som v povery, ako napríklad, že rozbité zrkadlo prináša sedem rokov smolu.

from: I know I am lovely.
to: Viem, že som milá.

from: I forgave them quickly and easily.
to: Rýchlo a ľahko som im odpustil.

from: I refused to walk under a ladder because I believed it would bring bad luck.
to: Odmietol som chodiť pod rebríkom, pretože som veril, že to prinesie smolu.

from: I have never been afraid of criticism.
to: Nikdy som sa nebál kritiky.

from: I paid for their vacation so I could have some alone time at home.
to: Zaplatil som im dovolenku, aby som mohol byť doma sám.

from: I always kept a back-door in case something went wrong in the relationship.
to: Vždy som si držala zadné dvierka pre prípad, že by sa vo vzťahu niečo pokazilo.

from: I have always believed in myself.
to: Vždy som si veril.

from: I am very good at hammer throwing, because I am strong.
to: Som veľmi dobrý v hode kladivom, pretože som silný.

from: I worked hard and was expected to be the main source of income for the household.
to: Tvrdo som pracoval a očakávalo sa, že budem hlavným zdrojom príjmu domácnosti.

from: I'd be successful in any field I'd like.
to: Bol by som úspešný v akejkoľvek oblasti, v ktorej by som chcel.

from: I could easily carry those wooden logs by myself.
to: Tie drevené polená by som mohol bez problémov nosiť aj sám.

from: I walked the dog, because my partner had no time.
to: Venčil som psa, pretože môj partner nemal čas.

from: I am an IT specialist, I used to work for a large corporation but decided to launch my own company last year, it went well and now I make really good money.
to: Som IT špecialista, pracoval som pre veľkú korporáciu, ale minulý rok som sa rozhodol založiť si vlastnú firmu, išlo to dobre a teraz zarábam naozaj dobré peniaze.

from: I never sat down until the whole family was fed.
to: Nikdy som si nesadol, kým nebola najedená celá rodina.

from: I joined a social dance class, learning new dance styles and connecting with dance partners in a fun and social environment.
to: Prihlásila som sa na kurz spoločenského tanca, učila som sa nové tanečné štýly a spájala sa s tanečnými partnermi v zábavnom a spoločenskom prostredí.

from: It's not a problem, because I have always known how to deal with it.
to: Nie je to problém, pretože som si s tým vždy vedel poradiť.

from: I like to fight people I don't like.
to: Rád bojujem s ľuďmi, ktorých nemám rád.

from: When was the last time you cried?
to: Kedy ste naposledy plakali?

from: I took on additional work to generate extra income, ensuring that my family's financial needs were met
to: Prijal som ďalšiu prácu, aby som si vygeneroval dodatočný príjem, čím som zabezpečil splnenie finančných potrieb mojej rodiny

from: I always enjoyed long baths.
to: Vždy som si užíval dlhé kúpele.

from: I was confident enough to pet the bear.
to: Bol som dosť sebavedomý na to, aby som medveďa pohladkal.

from: I wasn't taking my responsibilities seriously.
to: Svoje povinnosti som nebral vážne.

from: Through my great wit I simply outsmarted everyone.
to: Vďaka svojmu skvelému dôvtipu som jednoducho všetkých prekabátil.

from: I don't know if you're strong enough.
to: Neviem, či si dosť silný.

from: I couldn't do it, so I wept.
to: Nemohla som to urobiť, tak som sa rozplakala.

from: I knew I looked good and everyone in that room was attracted to me.
to: Vedel som, že vyzerám dobre a všetci v tej miestnosti ma priťahujú.

from: If I had to, I wouldn’t be afraid to face him.
to: Keby som musel, nebál by som sa mu čeliť.

from: I have all the qualities that I am supposed to have as a leader.
to: Mám všetky vlastnosti, ktoré by som mal mať ako líder.

from: I enjoyed the walk, but I got tired very quickly.
to: Prechádzka sa mi páčila, no veľmi rýchlo som sa unavila.

from: I checked out the beautiful people in the room.
to: Skontroloval som krásnych ľudí v miestnosti.

from: I have not been sick since I have led an active life.
to: Odkedy vediem aktívny život, nebol som chorý.

from: I consistently downplayed my achievements or talents when receiving praise.
to: Keď som dostal pochvalu, dôsledne som bagatelizoval svoje úspechy alebo talent.

from: I always had a high pain threshold.
to: Vždy som mala vysoký prah bolesti.

from: I couldn't stand seeing abused animals, so I petitioned the city.
to: Nemohol som vydržať vidieť týrané zvieratá, tak som podal petíciu mestu.

from: At the airport, I'm always scared when I go through security, even if I don't have anything prohibited in my suitcase.
to: Na letisku sa vždy bojím, keď prechádzam bezpečnostnou kontrolou, aj keď nemám v kufri nič zakázané.

from: I pushed my partner through the university studies financially.
to: Partnera som cez vysokoškolské štúdium pretlačil finančne.

from: I've always been good at reading other people's emotions.
to: Vždy som bol dobrý v čítaní emócií iných ľudí.

from: I consistently demonstrated a high level of competence and dedication.
to: Neustále som preukazoval vysokú úroveň kompetencie a obetavosti.

from: I was really happy they gave the project to me.
to: Bol som naozaj šťastný, že mi dali projekt.

from: I wanted a burger, but the others wanted pizza, so we went for pizza.
to: Chcel som burger, ale ostatní chceli pizzu, tak sme išli na pizzu.

from: Undeterred by the rough conditions, I went on, my determination fueling every step across the barren landscape.
to: Neodradili ma drsné podmienky, pokračoval som ďalej, moje odhodlanie poháňalo každý krok cez pustú krajinu.

from: I insisted I was right and I had numerous research articles to prove it.
to: Trval som na tom, že som mal pravdu a mal som množstvo výskumných článkov, ktoré to dokázali.

from: If I could, I would ban phones in the workplace.
to: Keby som mohol, zakázal by som telefóny na pracovisku.

from: I cooked a dinner and patiently waited for them to come home.
to: Uvaril som večeru a trpezlivo som čakal, kým prídu domov.

from: I hosted a fundraiser for our project.
to: Usporiadal som finančnú zbierku pre náš projekt.

from: I kept a neat and well-organized workspace, with everything in its designated place for easy access and efficiency.
to: Udržiaval som čistý a dobre organizovaný pracovný priestor so všetkým na svojom určenom mieste pre ľahký prístup a efektivitu.

from: I had to control myself not to hurt anyone.
to: Musel som sa ovládať, aby som nikomu neublížil.

from: Shopping for new clothes makes me happy.
to: Nakupovanie nového oblečenia mi robí radosť.

from: Other people's opinions are not important to me, I always believe in myself.
to: Názory iných ľudí nie sú pre mňa dôležité, vždy si verím.

from: I tamed the horse.
to: Skrotila som koňa.

from: I'm sexually active.
to: Som sexuálne aktívny.

from: When I'm with her, I'm angry.
to: Keď som s ňou, som nahnevaný.

from: I don’t like to judge others.
to: nerád súdim iných.

from: Of course I made a cake, it's your birthday!
to: Samozrejme, že som urobil tortu, máš narodeniny!

from: I always finish first in sports races.
to: Na športových pretekoch končím vždy prvý.

from: I looked good at the party.
to: Na párty som vyzeral dobre.

from: They've told me that I look confident.
to: Povedali mi, že vyzerám sebavedomo.

from: I have always been aware of my self-worth.
to: Vždy som si uvedomoval svoju vlastnú hodnotu.

from: Of course, I did it, I'm not a wuss.
to: Samozrejme, že som to urobil, nie som magor.

from: I was the main provider in our family for twenty years.
to: Dvadsať rokov som bol hlavným živiteľom v našej rodine.

from: I have never had any doubts about my level of competence.
to: Nikdy som nepochyboval o svojej úrovni kompetencií.

from: I always knew I wanted to help others.
to: Vždy som vedel, že chcem pomáhať druhým.

from: I was going to buy a watermelon, but I couldn’t manage to take it home.
to: Chcel som si kúpiť melón, ale nemohol som si ho vziať domov.

from: I am direct and honest.
to: Som priamy a čestný.

from: I changed the bedsheets again.
to: Znova som vymenila posteľnú bielizeň.

from: I preferred travelling in groups.
to: Preferoval som cestovanie v skupinách.

from: I never said I was looking for a long-term relationship.
to: Nikdy som nepovedal, že hľadám dlhodobý vzťah.

from: I skinned the deer.
to: Stiahol som jeleňa z kože.

from: I wasn't afraid - I have always liked danger.
to: Nebál som sa – vždy som mal rád nebezpečenstvo.

from: I bought the watch for you.
to: Kúpil som ti hodinky.

from: I was good at football.
to: Bol som dobrý vo futbale.

from: I didn't want to live in a remote area.
to: Nechcel som žiť v odľahlej oblasti.

from: It’s no surprise that I won this election.
to: Nie je prekvapením, že som vyhral tieto voľby.

from: I had a natural grace and elegance.
to: Mal som prirodzený pôvab a eleganciu.

from: I offered help when I saw how desperate she was.
to: Ponúkol som jej pomoc, keď som videl, aká je zúfalá.

from: I have always wanted to provide the best possible service to my customers.
to: Vždy som chcel svojim zákazníkom poskytovať čo najlepšie služby.

from: I know I am attractive because everyone keeps looking at me.
to: Viem, že som atraktívna, pretože sa na mňa všetci pozerajú.

from: I attended a community town hall meeting, actively participating in discussions about local issues .
to: Zúčastnil som sa stretnutia na mestskej radnici, kde som sa aktívne zapájal do diskusií o miestnych problémoch.

from: Last week I went to a restaurant my partner chose.
to: Minulý týždeň som išiel do reštaurácie, ktorú si vybral môj partner.

from: Why would I say something if it only leads to arguments?
to: Prečo by som niečo hovoril, ak to vedie len k hádkam?

from: I still like collecting car models.
to: Stále rád zbieram modely áut.

from: I agreed to move where my partner chose.
to: Súhlasil som s tým, že sa presťahujem tam, kam sa môj partner vyberie.

from: For my sixtieth borthday I asked my partner for a Lego.
to: Na moje šesťdesiate narodeniny som požiadal svojho partnera o lego.

from: I embraced the rough challenge, pushing my limits with every stride.
to: Prijal som tvrdú výzvu a každým krokom som posúval svoje hranice.

from: I hired a new secretary.
to: Najal som novú sekretárku.

from: I focused on making enough money for my daughter to study at a good college abroad.
to: Sústredil som sa na to, aby som zarobil dosť peňazí, aby moja dcéra mohla študovať na dobrej vysokej škole v zahraničí.

from: My boss made me so angry I locked myself in the office and cried.
to: Môj šéf ma tak nahneval, že som sa zamkol v kancelárii a rozplakal som sa.

from: I panicked and made impulsive decisions during a stressful situation.
to: V stresovej situácii som spanikáril a robil som impulzívne rozhodnutia.

from: I made an informed decision based on a careful evaluation of the information available.

from: The man said: "I always finish first in sports races."

from: The man said: "I'd be successful in any field I'd like."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol by som úspešný v akejkoľvek oblasti, v ktorej by som chcel."

from: The man said: "I bought the watch for you."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpil som ti hodinky."

from: The man said: "I don't know if you're strong enough."
to: Muž povedal: "Neviem, či si dosť silný."

from: The man said: "Of course I made a cake, it's your birthday!"
to: Muž povedal: "Samozrejme, že som urobil tortu, máš narodeniny!"

from: The man said: "I always kept a back-door in case something went wrong in the relationship."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som si držal zadné dvierka pre prípad, že by sa vo vzťahu niečo pokazilo."

from: The man said: "I couldn't stand seeing abused animals, so I petitioned the city."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som vydržať vidieť týrané zvieratá, tak som podal petíciu mestu."

from: The man said: "I have always wanted to provide the best possible service to my customers."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som chcel svojim zákazníkom poskytovať tie najlepšie možné služby."

from: The man said: "Of course, I did it, I'm not a wuss."
to: Muž povedal: "Samozrejme, že som to urobil, nie som hlupák."

from: The man said: "I insisted I was right and I had numerous research articles to prove it."
to: Muž povedal: "Trval som na tom, že som mal pravdu, a mal som množstvo výskumných článkov, ktoré to dokázali."

from: The man said: "I checked out the beautiful people in the room."
to: Muž povedal: "Pozrel som si krásnych ľudí v miestnosti."

from: The man said: "I cooked a dinner and patiently waited for them to come home."
to: Muž povedal: "Uvaril som večeru a trpezlivo som čakal, kým prídu domov."

from: The man said: "I called my friend for help."
to: Muž povedal: "Zavolal som svojho priateľa na pomoc."

from: The man said: "I couldn't do it, so I wept."
to: Muž povedal: "Nedokázal som to, tak som plakal."

from: The man said: "I walked the dog, because my partner had no time."
to: Muž povedal: "Venčil som psa, pretože môj partner nemal čas."

from: The man said: "I have never been afraid of criticism."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa nebál kritiky."

from: The man said: "I like to fight people I don't like."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád bojujem s ľuďmi, ktorých nemám rád."

from: The man said: "Why would I say something if it only leads to arguments?"
to: Muž povedal: "Prečo by som niečo hovoril, ak to vedie len k hádkam?"

from: The man said: "I always had a high pain threshold."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som mal vysoký prah bolesti."

from: The man said: "Last week I went to a restaurant my partner chose."

from: The man said: "I always enjoyed long baths."

from: The man said: "I have all the qualities that I am supposed to have as a leader."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám všetky vlastnosti, ktoré by som mal mať ako vodca."

from: The man said: "When I'm with her, I'm angry."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som s ňou, som nahnevaný."

from: The man said: "I had to control myself not to hurt anyone."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som sa ovládať, aby som nikomu neublížil."

to: Muž povedal: "Prijal som ďalšiu prácu, aby som si vygeneroval dodatočný príjem, čím som zabezpečil, že budú splnené finančné potreby mojej rodiny."

from: The man said: "When was the last time you cried?"
to: Muž povedal: "Kedy si naposledy plakal?"

from: The man said: "I kept a neat and well-organized workspace, with everything in its designated place for easy access and efficiency."
to: Muž povedal: "Zachoval som čistý a dobre organizovaný pracovný priestor so všetkým na svojom určenom mieste pre ľahký prístup a efektivitu."

from: The man said: "I focused on making enough money for my daughter to study at a good college abroad."
to: Muž povedal: "Sústredil som sa na to, aby som zarobil dosť peňazí, aby moja dcéra mohla študovať na dobrej vysokej škole v zahraničí."

from: The man said: "I could easily carry those wooden logs by myself."

from: The man said: "I preferred travelling in groups."

from: The man said: "I consistently downplayed my achievements or talents when receiving praise."
to: Muž povedal: "Dôsledne som bagatelizoval svoje úspechy alebo talenty, keď som dostával pochvalu."

from: The man said: "For my sixtieth borthday I asked my partner for a Lego."

to: Muž povedal: "Môj šéf ma tak nahneval, že som sa zamkol v kancelárii a rozplakal som sa."

from: The man said: "They've told me that I look confident."

to: Žena povedala: "Mala som husté kučeravé hnedé vlasy a dlhé tmavé mihalnice, ľudia si často mysleli, že som Španielka alebo Talianka."

from: The woman said: "I thought cheating was a normal part of a relationship."
to: Žena povedala: "Myslela som si, že podvádzanie je normálna súčasť vzťahu."

from: The woman said: "I didn't want to cause any trouble so I kept my mouth shut."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechcela som spôsobiť problémy, tak som držala jazyk za zubami."

from: The woman said: "I am not much more mature than I was when I was a teen although I am almost forty."
to: Žena povedala: "Nie som oveľa zrelšia, ako som bola, keď som bola tínedžerkou, hoci mám takmer štyridsať."

from: The woman said: "I offered to do this job."
to: Žena povedala: "Ponúkla som túto prácu."

from: The woman said: "My partner's lower sex drive created a mismatch in our desires and I had to look elsewhere."
to: Žena povedala: "Nižší sexuálny apetít môjho partnera spôsobil nesúlad v našich túžbach a musela som hľadať inde."

from: The woman said: "I bought a lucky charm, although my friend told me it's a scam."
to: Žena povedala: "Kúpila som si talizman, hoci môj priateľ mi povedal, že je to podvod."

from: The woman said: "They didn't wanna go to dinner with me, so I cried and they went."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechceli ísť so mnou na večeru, tak som sa rozplakala a oni išli."

from: The woman said: "As an architect, I drafted detailed blueprints, collaborated with clients to understand their vision, and oversaw construction projects."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako architektka som vypracovala podrobné plány, spolupracovala som s klientmi, aby som pochopila ich víziu, a dohliadala na stavebné projekty."

from: The woman said: "I was on a diet."
to: Žena povedala: "Držala som diétu."

from: The woman said: "I found it challenging to perform simple tasks like opening jars or lifting objects due to my physical weakness."
to: Žena povedala: "Pre moju fyzickú slabosť bolo pre mňa náročné vykonávať jednoduché úlohy, ako je otváranie pohárov alebo zdvíhanie predmetov."

from: The woman said: "I could have taken care of your children when youre on holidays."

from: The woman said: "I challenged them to a fight, but they laughed me off."
to: Žena povedala: "Vyzvala som ich na súboj, ale vysmiali ma."

from: The woman said: "Hopefully they will notice that I put an extra effort into the cleaning today."
to: Žena povedala: "Dúfam, že si všimnú, že som dnes venovala upratovaniu viac úsilia."

from: The woman said: "I was invited to the theatre, but played an online match with a friend instead."

from: The woman said: "I always believed in myself."

from: The woman said: "I made sure everyone was listening to my commands."

from: The woman said: "I only went to the wedding for the cakes."

from: I felt the situation was totally out of my control.
to: Cítil som, že situácia je úplne mimo moju kontrolu.

from: I engaged in meaningful conversations and provided companionship to the elederly residents.

from: My partner prefers animals, but I wouldn't be able to live without human company.

from: I didn't fear any threats.

from: The man said: "I was not afraid of the exam, I knew I was very good at it and I didn't even have to study much."
to: Muž povedal: "Nebál som sa skúšky, vedel som, že som v nej veľmi dobrý a ani som sa nemusel veľa učiť."

from: The man said: "If I go a few days without sex, I get grumpy."
to: Muž povedal: "Ak zostanem pár dní bez sexu, som nevrlý."

from: The man said: "I gave my old car to my brother who is still in college."
to: Muž povedal: "Dal som svoje staré auto môjmu bratovi, ktorý ešte študuje."

from: The man said: "I tried to explain to them that it’s important to know what material to wear at what time of year."
to: Muž povedal: "Snažil som sa im vysvetliť, že je dôležité vedieť, aký materiál nosiť v ktorom ročnom období."

from: The man said: "I had to dress extra nicely for the sponsors meeting."
to: Muž povedal: "Na stretnutie sponzorov som sa musel obliecť extra pekne."

from: The man said: "I tried the extra spicy food."
to: Muž povedal: "Skúsil som extra korenené jedlo."

from: The man said: "I knew I should have been kinder, because kindness is essential in life."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedel som, že som mal byť láskavejší, pretože láskavosť je v živote nevyhnutná."

from: The man said: "I did not listen because I got distracted easily."
to: Muž povedal: "Nepočúval som, pretože som sa nechal ľahko rozptýliť."

from: The man said: "When I started working at the gas station, I bought some tear spray."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som začal pracovať na čerpacej stanici, kúpil som si slzný sprej."

from: The man said: "I feel that my looks could get me a lot of attention when I was young."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám pocit, že môj vzhľad by mi mohol pritiahnuť veľa pozornosti, keď som bol mladý."

from: The man said: "No, why would I wait until after another date to become more intimate?"
to: Muž povedal: "Nie, prečo by som mal čakať až po ďalšom rande, aby som sa stal intímnejším?"

from: The man said: "I have always been a hard worker."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som bol tvrdo pracujúci."

from: The man said: "Even though I didn't do anything wrong, the boss was angry at me, but I decided to stay quiet."
to: Muž povedal: "Aj keď som nič zlé neurobil, šéf sa na mňa hneval, ale rozhodol som sa zostať ticho."

from: The man said: "I organized the hunting trip."
to: Muž povedal: "Zorganizoval som tú poľovačku."

from: The man said: "When I'm feeling down, I like to act like a fool to feel better."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď sa cítim na dne, rád sa správam ako blázon, aby som sa cítil lepšie."

from: The man said: "I felt the situation was totally out of my control."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítil som, že situácia je úplne mimo mojej kontroly."

from: The man said: "I always wore the latest fashion pieces and people appreciated that I was so fashionable."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som nosil najnovšie módne kúsky a ľudia oceňovali, že som taký módny."

from: The man said: "I am a scientist, I specialise in marine biology."
to: Muž povedal: "Som vedec, špecializujem sa na morskú biológiu."

from: The man said: "I was desperate, because I was late."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som zúfalý, pretože som meškal."

from: The man said: "I can see that I've put on muscle mass."
to: Muž povedal: "Vidím, že som nabral svalovú hmotu."

from: The man said: "I repeatedly engaged in self-destructive behaviors."
to: Muž povedal: "Opakovane som sa zapájal do sebadeštruktívneho správania."

from: The man said: "I never worried too much."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa príliš nebál."

from: The man said: "I would always listen to everything the teacher said."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy by som počúval všetko, čo povedal učiteľ."

from: The man said: "I spent a lot of mental effort to finally speak up."
to: Muž povedal: "Vynaložil som veľa duševného úsilia, aby som konečne prehovoril."

from: The man said: "I have always found it important to know my employees, their strengths and weaknesses and work with that appropriately."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som považoval za dôležité poznať svojich zamestnancov, ich silné a slabé stránky a vhodne s tým pracovať."

from: The man said: "I listened attentively to my friend as they shared their struggles."
to: Muž povedal: "Pozorne som počúval svojho priateľa, keď sa podelili o svoje zápasy."

from: The man said: "When I worked in a restaurant, I only carried two plates because they were too heavy."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som pracoval v reštaurácii, nosil som len dva taniere, pretože boli príliš ťažké."

from: The man said: "I thought I could do the whole workout, but I was wrong."
to: Muž povedal: "Myslel som si, že zvládnem celý tréning, ale mýlil som sa."

from: The man said: "I found it difficult to focus on work because I think of sex all the time."
to: Muž povedal: "Je pre mňa ťažké sústrediť sa na prácu, pretože neustále myslím na sex."

from: The man said: "I carried a lucky charm with me at all times."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som so sebou nosil talizman pre šťastie."

from: The man said: "I was cleaning the windows for three hours."
to: Muž povedal: "Tri hodiny som čistil okná."

from: The man said: "I have always tried to create ideal conditions for my employees."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som sa snažil vytvárať ideálne podmienky pre svojich zamestnancov."

from: The man said: "I survived the first year of college on frozen pizzas."
to: Muž povedal: "Prvý ročník vysokej školy som prežil na mrazených pizzách."

from: The man said: "I preferred to deal with it by myself."
to: Muž povedal: "Radšej som to riešil sám."

from: The man said: "I often remained silent in uncomfortable situations not to displease anyone."
to: Muž povedal: "Často som mlčal v nepríjemných situáciách, aby som sa nikomu nepáčil."

from: The man said: "I could hold my breath for seven minutes."
to: Muž povedal: "Mohol som zadržať dych na sedem minút."

from: The man said: "During a workout session, I struggled to complete the exercises."
to: Muž povedal: "Počas tréningu som sa snažil dokončiť cvičenia."

from: The man said: "I apologized even when I wasn't at fault."
to: Muž povedal: "Ospravedlnil som sa, aj keď som nebol na vine."

from: The man said: "I did not take sides when my friends were arguing, I wanted to stay objective."
to: Muž povedal: "Nestaval som sa na žiadnu stranu, keď sa moji priatelia hádali, chcel som zostať objektívny."

from: The man said: "They say I'm very easily influenced."
to: Muž povedal: "Hovorí sa, že som veľmi ľahko ovplyvniteľný."

from: The man said: "I’m the last one to believe such lies."
to: Muž povedal: "Som posledný, kto verí takýmto klamstvám."

from: The man said: "I had to extend my office hours as there were too many students who wanted to consult their work with me."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som predĺžiť ordinačné hodiny, pretože bolo príliš veľa študentov, ktorí chceli so mnou konzultovať svoju prácu."

from: The man said: "My friend told me I looked nice yesterday."
to: Muž povedal: "Môj priateľ mi povedal, že som včera vyzeral pekne."

from: The man said: "I calmly handled an unexpected setback at work by analysing the situation."
to: Muž povedal: "Nečakaný neúspech v práci som pokojne zvládol analýzou situácie."

from: The man said: "I was so angry I was shaking."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som taký nahnevaný, až som sa triasol."

from: The man said: "I could see she wasn’t feeling well, so I made her some hot chocolate."
to: Muž povedal: "Videl som, že sa necíti dobre, tak som jej urobil horúcu čokoládu."

from: The man said: "I enjoy visiting the older neighbours and giving them company."
to: Muž povedal: "Baví ma navštevovať starších susedov a robiť im spoločnosť."

from: The man said: "Undeterred by the rough sea, I plunged into the depths."
to: Muž povedal: Nenechal som sa odradiť rozbúreným morom a ponoril som sa do hlbín.

from: The man said: "I apologized all the time not to seem impolite."
to: Muž povedal: "Celý čas som sa ospravedlňoval, aby som nevyzeral neslušne."

from: The man said: "I have sociable nature and it makes me an excellent host and event organizer."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám spoločenskú povahu a to zo mňa robí vynikajúceho hostiteľa a organizátora podujatí."

from: The man said: "I haven't cried in 20 years."
to: Muž povedal: "Neplakal som 20 rokov."

from: The man said: "I never liked small talk between me and my employee."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nemal rád malé reči medzi mnou a mojím zamestnancom."

from: The man said: "I walked up to my boss and told him my opinion."
to: Muž povedal: "Prišiel som k svojmu šéfovi a povedal som mu svoj názor."

from: The man said: "I conquered the challenging obstacle course, feeling an indescribable sense of accomplishment and pride in my physical capabilities."
to: Muž povedal: "Zdolal som náročnú prekážkovú dráhu, cítil som neopísateľný pocit úspechu a hrdosti na moje fyzické schopnosti."

from: The man said: "I wasn't even nervous before my big presentation."
to: Muž povedal: "Nebol som ani nervózny pred mojou veľkou prezentáciou."

from: The man said: "I burst into tears over a minor setback."
to: Muž povedal: "Rozplakal som sa kvôli menšiemu neúspechu."

from: The man said: "It took me a long time to realise which people are not worth investing energy in."
to: Muž povedal: "Trvalo mi dlho, kým som si uvedomil, do ktorých ľudí sa neoplatí investovať energiu."

from: The man said: "I don't know how, but my co-worker always inspires me when I feel unmotivated."
to: Muž povedal: "Neviem ako, ale môj spolupracovník ma vždy inšpiruje, keď sa necítim motivovaný."

from: The man said: "I engaged in meaningful conversations and provided companionship to the elederly residents."
to: Muž povedal: "Zapojil som sa do zmysluplných rozhovorov a poskytoval som spoločnosť starším obyvateľom."

to: Muž povedal: "Dal som príkaz."

from: The man said: "The hockey players were in good shape."

from: The man said: "I took my grandmother to see the flower exhibition."

from: The man said: "I led the team towards victory."
to: Muž povedal: "Viedol som tím k víťazstvu."

from: The woman said: "I was not afraid of the exam, I knew I was very good at it and I didn't even have to study much."
to: Žena povedala: "Nebála som sa skúšky, vedela som, že som v nej veľmi dobrá a ani som sa nemusela veľa učiť."

from: The woman said: "I survived the first year of college on frozen pizzas."
to: Žena povedala: "Prvý ročník vysokej školy som prežila na mrazených pizzách."

from: The woman said: "I always wore the latest fashion pieces and people appreciated that I was so fashionable."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som nosila najnovšie módne kúsky a ľudia oceňovali, že som taká módna."

from: The woman said: "I was constantly involved in some kind of mischief."
to: Žena povedala: "Neustále som bola zapletená do nejakého neplechu."

from: The woman said: "I would never want my kids to fend for themselves."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som nechcela, aby sa moje deti starali samy o seba."

from: The woman said: "I wouldn't trade my naturally brown hair for the world."
to: Žena povedala: "Nevymenila by som svoje prirodzene hnedé vlasy za svet."

from: The woman said: "I killed a lion in the jungle."
to: Žena povedala: "Zabila som leva v džungli."

from: The woman said: "It took me a long time to realise which people are not worth investing energy in."
to: Žena povedala: "Trvalo mi dlho, kým som si uvedomila, do ktorých ľudí sa neoplatí investovať energiu."

from: The woman said: "If I go a few days without sex, I get grumpy."
to: Žena povedala: "Ak zostanem pár dní bez sexu, som nevrlá."

from: The woman said: "I tried to explain to them that it’s important to know what material to wear at what time of year."
to: Žena povedala: "Snažila som sa im vysvetliť, že je dôležité vedieť, aký materiál nosiť v ktorom ročnom období."

from: The woman said: "I never learned to cook because I didn’t have to."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som sa nenaučila variť, pretože som nemusela."

from: The woman said: "I would always listen to everything the teacher said."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy by som počúvala všetko, čo povedal učiteľ."

from: The woman said: "I argued with the policeman about the parking ticket."
to: Žena povedala: "Hádala som sa s policajtom o parkovací lístok."

from: The woman said: "I gave my old car to my brother who is still in college."
to: Žena povedala: "Dala som svoje staré auto môjmu bratovi, ktorý ešte študuje."

from: The woman said: "I am determined to protect my loved ones."
to: Žena povedala: "Som odhodlaná chrániť svojich blízkych."

from: The woman said: "I knew I should have been kinder, because kindness is essential in life."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedela som, že som mala byť láskavejšia, pretože láskavosť je v živote nevyhnutná."

from: The woman said: "I wanted to be part of the army since I was young."
to: Žena povedala: "Odmalička som chcela byť súčasťou armády."

from: The woman said: "I tried the extra spicy food."
to: Žena povedala: "Vyskúšala som extra korenené jedlo."

from: The woman said: "I preferred to deal with it by myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Radšej som to riešila sama."

from: The woman said: "I realized that my career is less important than my family."
to: Žena povedala: "Uvedomila som si, že moja kariéra je menej dôležitá ako moja rodina."

from: The woman said: "I haven't cried in 20 years."
to: Žena povedala: "Neplakala som 20 rokov."

from: The woman said: "I planned, managed and executed the project."
to: Žena povedala: "Projekt som naplánovala, spravovala a zrealizovala."

from: The woman said: "I engaged in meaningful conversations and provided companionship to the elederly residents."
to: Žena povedala: "Zapojila som sa do zmysluplných rozhovorov a poskytovala som spoločnosť starším obyvateľom."

from: The woman said: "I carried all the luggage."
to: Žena povedala: "Nesla som všetku batožinu."

from: The woman said: "I have sociable nature and it makes me an excellent host and event organizer."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám spoločenskú povahu a to zo mňa robí vynikajúceho hostiteľa a organizátora podujatí."

from: The woman said: "I often remained silent in uncomfortable situations not to displease anyone."
to: Žena povedala: "Často som mlčala v nepríjemných situáciách, aby som sa nikomu nepáčila."

from: The woman said: "I told you I'd hurt you."
to: Žena povedala: "Povedala som ti, že ti ublížim."

from: The woman said: "I didn't fear any threats."
to: Žena povedala: "Nebála som sa žiadnej hrozby."

from: The woman said: "I don't know how, but my co-worker always inspires me when I feel unmotivated."
to: Žena povedala: "Neviem ako, ale moja spolupracovníčka ma vždy inšpiruje, keď sa necítim motivovaná."

from: The woman said: "I didn't raise my hand, because I was afraid to speak aloud."
to: Žena povedala: "Nezdvihla som ruku, pretože som sa bála hovoriť nahlas."

from: The woman said: "I always wanted to try new things in bed."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som chcela v posteli skúšať nové veci."

from: Why were you paying for the coffee, when I told you I'll pay?
to: Prečo si platil za kávu, keď som ti povedal, že zaplatím?

from: I wanted to smash that cake like a child.
to: Chcel som tú tortu rozbiť ako dieťa.

from: I slept with so many people.
to: Spal som s toľkými ľuďmi.

from: I calmly confronted a misunderstanding .
to: Pokojne som čelil nedorozumeniu.

from: I got so angry after they accused me of sexual assault.
to: Bol som tak nahnevaný, keď ma obvinili zo sexuálneho napadnutia.

from: I wish I had more time to keep this flat clean.
to: Prial by som si, aby som mal viac času udržiavať tento byt čistý.

from: I've always been a friend to my employees rather than a boss.
to: Vždy som bol pre svojich zamestnancov skôr kamarát ako šéf.

from: I liked when my partner complimented my appearance.
to: Páčilo sa mi, keď môj partner pochválil môj vzhľad.

from: I like vacuuming whilst listening to music.
to: Rád vysávam pri počúvaní hudby.

from: I never hid my dirty mind.
to: Nikdy som neskrýval svoju špinavú myseľ.

from: I always knew I was born for this job.
to: Vždy som vedel, že som sa narodil pre túto prácu.

from: I am stunning.
to: Som ohromujúci.

from: As I stepped into the room, everyone was looking at me.
to: Keď som vošla do izby, všetci sa na mňa pozerali.

from: I navigated the professional setting with ease, engaging in discussions with self-assurance.
to: V profesionálnom prostredí som sa pohyboval s ľahkosťou, do diskusií som sa zapájal so sebaistotou.

from: I'm friendly.
to: Som priateľský.

from: I always strived for a promotion.
to: Vždy som sa snažil o povýšenie.

from: I received numerous compliments from friends and strangers alike, acknowledging that I was good-looking.
to: Dostal som veľa komplimentov od priateľov aj neznámych ľudí, ktorí uznali, že vyzerám dobre.

from: I bought tickets for the hooligans sector.
to: Kúpil som si lístky do sektora chuligánov.

from: I knew it was rational to let them go, but I wanted to make it harder for them.
to: Vedel som, že je racionálne nechať ich ísť, ale chcel som im to sťažiť.

from: I didn't know how to hang the painting, because the nail was too high.
to: Obraz som nevedela zavesiť, lebo klinec bol príliš vysoký.

from: I made the best choice based on the available data.
to: Na základe dostupných údajov som sa rozhodol najlepšie.

from: When I retired, I ordered a silly goodbye cake for my colleagues.
to: Keď som odišiel do dôchodku, objednal som pre kolegov hlúpu tortu na rozlúčku.

from: When I was younger, I was one of the die-hard fans of that band, I would cry when seeing their concert.
to: Keď som bol mladší, patril som k zarytým fanúšikom tej kapely, pri pohľade na ich koncert som plakal.

from: I feel so pretty today.
to: Dnes sa cítim tak krásne.

from: I don't need to carry guns with me because I'm strong enough to defend myself.
to: Nepotrebujem so sebou nosiť zbrane, pretože som dosť silný na to, aby som sa ubránil.

from: We were too scared to go outside by ourselves so we stayed at home.
to: Príliš sme sa báli ísť von sami, tak sme zostali doma.

from: Would you like to go to that party with me?
to: Chcel by si ísť so mnou na tú párty?

from: I like the feeling of providing for others.
to: Mám rád pocit, keď sa starám o druhých.

from: I was in the US for a year and people had no problem talking to me even though they didn’t know me.
to: Bol som rok v USA a ľudia nemali problém sa so mnou rozprávať, aj keď ma nepoznali.

from: I did as they asked me to.
to: Urobil som, ako ma požiadali.

from: I saved up a lot of money for the wedding.
to: Ušetrila som veľa peňazí na svadbu.

from: I didn’t want to break up, but I didn’t want to show my sensitive side either.
to: Nechcel som sa rozísť, ale ani som nechcel ukázať svoju citlivú stránku.

from: It was easy for me to make friends on the first day of university.
to: Prvý deň na univerzite som si ľahko vytvoril priateľov.

from: I love bachelor parties.
to: Milujem rozlúčky so slobodnými.

from: If something happened I would have just panicked and ran away.
to: Keby sa niečo stalo, spanikáril by som a utiekol.

from: I don't like to meddle in people's problems, but if someone attacks my loved ones I don't hesitate for a second.
to: Nerád sa miešam do problémov ľudí, ale ak niekto napadne mojich blízkych, neváham ani sekundu.

from: I felt like going out that night.
to: V tú noc som mal chuť ísť von.

from: I established an emergency fund to cover unexpected expenses, providing a safety net for my family.
to: Založil som núdzový fond na pokrytie neočakávaných výdavkov a poskytol som záchrannú sieť pre moju rodinu.

from: I joined the military.
to: Vstúpil som do armády.

from: I chose the car based on the specs, not the looks.
to: Auto som si vybral na základe špecifikácií, nie vzhľadu.

from: I started a successful business venture, which provided for my family.
to: Rozbehol som úspešný biznis, ktorý zabezpečil moju rodinu.

from: I enjoyed it when they took their clothes off.
to: Bavilo ma, keď sa vyzliekali.

from: I never let anybody be dominant when having sex with me.
to: Nikdy nikomu nedovolím, aby bol pri sexe so mnou dominantný.

from: I was elected in the last elections.
to: Bol som zvolený v posledných voľbách.

from: I knew it made my skin look really good.
to: Vedela som, že vďaka tomu moja pleť vyzerá naozaj dobre.

from: I had to get rid of the stain immediately.
to: Musel som sa okamžite zbaviť škvrny.

from: I like it when I can clean alone and my partner is relaxing at that time.
to: Mám rada, keď môžem upratovať sama a partner v tom čase relaxuje.

from: I have often received compliments about my good looks and now I am confident.
to: Často som dostával komplimenty za môj dobrý vzhľad a teraz som si istý.

from: I like to dress nicely.
to: Rada sa pekne obliekam.

from: I had to defrost the freezer, just like I do every few months.
to: Musel som odmrazovať mrazničku, tak ako to robím každých pár mesiacov.

from: I would be the best president this country has ever seen.
to: Bol by som najlepším prezidentom, akého táto krajina kedy videla.

from: I donated a lot of money to various charities.
to: Venoval som veľa peňazí rôznym charitatívnym organizáciám.

from: When they told me to act my age, I told them off.
to: Keď mi povedali, aby som sa správal v mojom veku, povedal som im to.

from: I was my duty to provide for them materially.
to: Mojou povinnosťou bolo ich materiálne zabezpečiť.

from: They have always praised my gentle spirit, and I tried to live up to it.
to: Vždy chválili môjho jemného ducha a ja som sa snažil podľa toho žiť.

from: I communicated effectively with the team, displaying professionalism.
to: S tímom som komunikoval efektívne, prejavoval som profesionalitu.

from: I feel that I'm good at solving problems.
to: Mám pocit, že som dobrý v riešení problémov.

from: I snapped at my friend when they innocently asked a question, even though I knew it was irrational to get angry over such a small matter.
to: Vyštekol som na svojho priateľa, keď sa nevinne opýtali, aj keď som vedel, že je iracionálne hnevať sa kvôli takej maličkosti.

from: I protected everyone.
to: Chránil som všetkých.

from: I don't like to talk about commitments.
to: Nerád hovorím o záväzkoch.

from: I went to a conference.
to: Išiel som na konferenciu.

from: I can be very annoyed when someone is chewing with their mouth open.
to: Dokáže ma veľmi rozčuľovať, keď niekto žuje s otvorenými ústami.

from: Why do you think you are not confident enough?
to: Prečo si myslíš, že nie si dostatočne sebavedomý?

from: I mobilised others to come together for a common cause and make a positive impact on society.
to: Zmobilizoval som ostatných, aby sa spojili pre spoločnú vec a mali pozitívny vplyv na spoločnosť.

from: I didn't panic and immediately gave them first aid.
to: Nespanikáril som a hneď som im poskytol prvú pomoc.

from: I toughed it although they told me not to.
to: Potvrdil som to, aj keď mi povedali, aby som to nerobil.

from: I like to have my coffee on the table at 9.00 AM every day, can you do it?
to: Mám rád kávu na stole každý deň o 9:00, dokážeš to?

from: I called a meeting so we could discuss the strategic plan.
to: Zvolal som stretnutie, aby sme mohli prediskutovať strategický plán.

from: I always knew what I wanted and what I had to do to get it.

from: They've been telling me that I'm beautiful, but I'm more than that.

from: I don't like condoms.

from: I received special attention at social events, with many individuals expressing their admiration for my good looks.

from: I could not commit.
to: Nemohol som sa zaviazať.

from: I paid the interns even though I did not have to.

from: When I make a lot of money, I feel happy because I know my family will not suffer.
to: Keď zarobím veľa peňazí, cítim sa šťastný, pretože viem, že moja rodina nebude trpieť.

from: I had sex at various public places.

from: I pushed the huge rock aside so we could pass.
to: Obrovský kameň som odsunul nabok, aby sme mohli prejsť.

from: On weekends I worked in a nursing home.

from: I don't like to make rash decisions - they would only harm my reputation.

from: My friend was having a bad day, so I bought some food and went to see her.

from: I played with lego and had fun although I was an adult.

from: I was frequently approached by strangers who wanted to strike up conversations based on my good looks, so I knew I looked good.

from: I knew that my contributions were valuable for the company.
to: Vedel som, že moje príspevky sú pre spoločnosť cenné.

from: I am always empathetic to people close to me.

from: Wait, don't spill it, I cleaned the room an hour ago.

from: I felt that I should try to be a good student.

from: I am very proud when people in my community are doing well.

from: I'm proud that I inspire others on their fitness journey with my hard work.

from: I could immediately sense something was wrong.

from: The woman said: "I am very proud when people in my community are doing well."
to: Žena povedala: "Som veľmi hrdá, keď sa ľuďom v mojej komunite darí."

from: The woman said: "I called a meeting so we could discuss the strategic plan."
to: Žena povedala: "Zvolala som stretnutie, aby sme mohli prediskutovať strategický plán."

from: The woman said: "I had a bad feeling about them the second I saw them."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som z nich zlý pocit, keď som ich videla."

from: The woman said: "I didn't like the situation, but I preferred to stay quiet."
to: Žena povedala: "Nepáčila sa mi situácia, ale radšej som zostala ticho."

from: The woman said: "I like the feeling of providing for others."
to: Žena povedala: "Páči sa mi ten pocit, keď sa starám o druhých."

from: The woman said: "I didn't panic and immediately gave them first aid."
to: Žena povedala: "Nespanikárila som a hneď som im poskytla prvú pomoc."

from: The woman said: "I never let anybody be dominant when having sex with me."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy nikomu nedovolím, aby bol dominantný, keď má so mnou sex."

from: The woman said: "I would be the best president this country has ever seen."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola by som tým najlepším prezidentom, akého táto krajina kedy videla."

from: The woman said: "I bought tickets for the hooligans sector."
to: Žena povedala: "Kúpila som si lístky do sektora chuligánov."

from: The woman said: "I pushed the huge rock aside so we could pass."
to: Žena povedala: "Odsunula som obrovský kameň nabok, aby sme mohli prejsť."

from: The woman said: "Would you like to go to that party with me?"
to: Žena povedala: "Nechceli by ste ísť so mnou na tú párty?"

from: The woman said: "I knew it made my skin look really good."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedela som, že vďaka tomu moja pleť vyzerá naozaj dobre."

from: The woman said: "I don't need to carry guns with me because I'm strong enough to defend myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Nepotrebujem so sebou nosiť zbrane, pretože som dosť silná na to, aby som sa ubránila."

from: The woman said: "I could immediately sense something was wrong."
to: Žena povedala: "Okamžite som cítila, že niečo nie je v poriadku."

from: The woman said: "I'm friendly."
to: Žena povedala: "Som priateľská."

from: The woman said: "I did as they asked me to."
to: Žena povedala: "Urobila som, ako ma požiadali."

from: The woman said: "When I was younger, I was one of the die-hard fans of that band, I would cry when seeing their concert."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som bola mladšia, bola som jedným zo zarytých fanúšikov tejto skupiny, plakala som, keď som videla ich koncert."

from: The woman said: "I am stunning."
to: Žena povedala: "Som ohromujúca."

from: The woman said: "I snapped at my friend when they innocently asked a question, even though I knew it was irrational to get angry over such a small matter."
to: Žena povedala: "Vyštekla som na svojho priateľa, keď sa nevinne spýtali otázku, aj keď som vedela, že je iracionálne hnevať sa kvôli takej maličkosti."

from: The woman said: "When I make a lot of money, I feel happy because I know my family will not suffer."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď zarábam veľa peňazí, cítim sa šťastná, pretože viem, že moja rodina nebude trpieť."

from: The woman said: "I mobilised others to come together for a common cause and make a positive impact on society."
to: Žena povedala: "Mobilizovala som ostatných, aby sa spojili pre spoločnú vec a mali pozitívny vplyv na spoločnosť."

from: The woman said: "I've always been a friend to my employees rather than a boss."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som bola pre svojich zamestnancov skôr priateľkou ako šéfkou."

from: The woman said: "I started a successful business venture, which provided for my family."
to: Žena povedala: "Začala som úspešné podnikanie, ktoré zabezpečilo moju rodinu."

from: The woman said: "As I stepped into the room, everyone was looking at me."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som vošla do miestnosti, všetci sa na mňa pozerali."

from: The woman said: "It was easy for me to make friends on the first day of university."
to: Žena povedala: "Bolo pre mňa ľahké nájsť si priateľov v prvý deň na univerzite."

from: The woman said: "I never hid my dirty mind."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som neskrývala svoju špinavú myseľ."

from: The woman said: "I am always empathetic to people close to me."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som empatická k ľuďom, ktorí sú mi blízki."

from: The woman said: "I played with lego and had fun although I was an adult."
to: Žena povedala: "Hrala som sa s legom a bavila som sa, hoci som bola dospelá."

from: The woman said: "I got so angry after they accused me of sexual assault."
to: Žena povedala: "Veľmi som sa nahnevala, keď ma obvinili zo sexuálneho napadnutia."

from: The woman said: "I would often imagine having sex with strangers."
to: Žena povedala: "Často by som si predstavovala sex s cudzími ľuďmi."

from: My friends have told me that I am empathetic, and I have been very touched by that.
to: Moji priatelia mi povedali, že som empatický a veľmi sa ma to dotklo.

from: With each step deeper into the haunted house, I explored its eerie corridors, unafraid of the lurking shadows.
to: S každým krokom hlbšie do strašidelného domu som skúmal jeho strašidelné chodby, nebál som sa číhajúcich tieňov.

from: I like it when the hairdresser massages my head.
to: Mám rada, keď mi kaderník masíruje hlavu.

from: I bought a castle to renovate it.
to: Kúpil som si zámok, aby som ho zrekonštruoval.

from: The muscles in my arms and back flexed as I rowed through the calm waters.
to: Svaly na rukách a chrbte sa mi napli, keď som vesloval cez pokojné vody.

from: I signed up for a medieval swording workshop.
to: Prihlásil som sa do stredovekej šermiarskej dielne.

from: When they called and told me what had happened, I collapsed.
to: Keď mi zavolali a povedali mi, čo sa stalo, zrútila som sa.

from: I knew that he was acting rude, but it is just because he's had a hard time at work.
to: Vedel som, že sa správal neslušne, ale je to len preto, že mal ťažké časy v práci.

from: I had no doubt.
to: nepochyboval som.

from: I have paid a personal trainer to help me with my workouts.
to: Zaplatil som si osobného trénera, ktorý mi pomáhal s tréningom.

from: I locked myself out, so I had to break down the door.
to: Zamkol som sa, tak som musel vylomiť dvere.

from: I always went everywhere ahead of time.
to: Vždy som chodil všade v predstihu.

from: I hated when my partner was washing the dishes because I knew that I could do it better.
to: Neznášala som, keď môj partner umýval riad, pretože som vedela, že to viem urobiť lepšie.

from: I was in charge of the whole project.
to: Mal som na starosti celý projekt.

from: I was never good at sports.
to: Nikdy som nebol dobrý v športe.

from: I impulsively quit my job without a backup plan.
to: Impulzívne som dal výpoveď bez záložného plánu.

from: I kept the kitchen area clean to prevent a buildup of dirty dishes
to: Kuchynský priestor som udržiaval čistý, aby som predišiel nahromadeniu špinavého riadu

from: I frequently deferred to others' opinions and preferences.
to: Často som sa podriaďoval názorom a preferenciám iných.

from: As a lawyer, I meticulously researched case precedents and prepared persuasive arguments for the courtroom
to: Ako právnik som starostlivo skúmal precedensy a pripravoval presvedčivé argumenty do súdnej siene

from: I earned a lot more than my partner, and now my partner is a stay-at-home parent.
to: Zarobil som oveľa viac ako môj partner a teraz je môj partner rodičom v domácnosti.

from: I attended a photoshoot where the photographer captured my natural beauty, boosting my self-esteem.
to: Zúčastnil som sa fotenia, kde fotograf zachytil moju prirodzenú krásu, čím som zvýšil moje sebavedomie.

from: I evaluated all the costs and benefits before making the decision.
to: Pred rozhodnutím som zhodnotil všetky náklady a prínosy.

from: I have been taught to smile even when I am sad or angry.
to: Naučili ma usmievať sa, aj keď som smutný alebo nahnevaný.

from: I had to throw away the hoodie because it had a stain on it that I could not get rid off.
to: Mikinu som musela vyhodiť, pretože bola na nej fľak, ktorého som sa nevedela zbaviť.

from: I liked to play computer games and lived in my mom's basement although I was an adult.
to: Rád som hral počítačové hry a býval som v pivnici mojej mamy, hoci som bol dospelý.

from: I could not keep up with their tempo.
to: Nedokázal som držať krok s ich tempom.

from: I thought I was the most beautiful at the event.
to: Myslel som si, že som bol najkrajší na podujatí.

from: I got bitten by a snake but I remained calm.
to: Uštipol ma had, no zostal som pokojný.

from: I know it's important to be alone with yourself, but I just couldn't do it.
to: Viem, že je dôležité byť sám so sebou, ale ja som to jednoducho nedokázal.

from: I'd like to trade football cards, but I don't have anyone to trade them with.
to: Rád by som vymenil futbalové karty, ale nemám ich s kým vymeniť.

from: I am dedicated.
to: Som oddaný.

from: I could easily beat you in tennis.
to: Pokojne by som ťa mohol poraziť v tenise.

from: I never interfered in my employees personal lives.
to: Nikdy som nezasahoval do osobného života mojich zamestnancov.

from: It is stressful to work here at this position, but I'm good at handling it.
to: Pracovať tu na tejto pozícii je stresujúce, ale zvládam to dobre.

from: I was nervous, because I had no time to clean the bathroom.
to: Bol som nervózny, pretože som nemal čas upratať kúpeľňu.

from: I have to look good, even if I'm just going to take out the trash.
to: Musím vyzerať dobre, aj keď idem len vyniesť smeti.

from: Taking care of my children is the least I can do for my family.
to: Starostlivosť o deti je to najmenej, čo môžem pre svoju rodinu urobiť.

from: As a software engineer, I consistently demonstrated a strong work ethic and attention to detail.
to: Ako softvérový inžinier som dôsledne preukazoval silnú pracovnú morálku a zmysel pre detail.

from: I couldn't look, it made me feel sick.
to: Nemohla som sa pozerať, prišlo mi z toho zle.

from: I had to cheer others up.

from: I felt helpful because I could host a party.

from: I always thought that life is a game and you have to enjoy it.
to: Vždy som si myslel, že život je hra a treba si to užívať.

from: I did what they told me to do to fit in.
to: Urobil som, čo mi povedali, aby som zapadol.

from: I’d like to be pretty like Hollywood stars.
to: Chcela by som byť pekná ako hollywoodske hviezdy.

from: I like to divide the tasks.
to: Rád rozdeľujem úlohy.

from: I liked speaking in front of a huge audience.
to: Páčilo sa mi hovoriť pred veľkým publikom.

from: I led my team to success.
to: Viedol som svoj tím k úspechu.

from: I made a resolution not to buy leather clothes or shoes because it is insensitive to animals.
to: Dal som si predsavzatie, že nebudem kupovať kožené oblečenie alebo topánky, pretože je to necitlivé k zvieratám.

from: I invested my money so that I have some passive income.
to: Peniaze som investoval, aby som mal nejaký pasívny príjem.

from: I validated my friend's emotions, providing reassurance during a challenging situation.
to: Potvrdil som emócie môjho priateľa a poskytol som mu istotu v náročnej situácii.

from: I was scared because there was a spider in my shower.
to: Bál som sa, pretože v sprche bol pavúk.

from: I spent hours in front of the mirror.
to: Strávil som hodiny pred zrkadlom.

from: I rented the house for them.
to: Prenajal som im dom.

from: I like being in charge.

from: I put on this new perfume today and everyone is turning around to see me.
to: Dnes som si nasadil tento nový parfém a všetci sa otáčali, aby ma videli.

from: I made coffee for everyone in our team before we started the team meeting.
to: Pred začatím tímového stretnutia som pripravil kávu pre všetkých v našom tíme.

from: I was always the one who did most of the work in group assignments.
to: Vždy som bol ten, kto robil väčšinu práce v skupinových úlohách.

from: It was comforting for me, that I cooked for my family.
to: Bolo pre mňa upokojujúce, že som varil pre svoju rodinu.

from: I established an emergency fund to protect my family from unexpected expenses.
to: Založil som núdzový fond na ochranu mojej rodiny pred neočakávanými výdavkami.

from: I liked the way you walked.
to: Páčilo sa mi, ako si kráčal.

from: I have never left the house messy, I have to clean everything first.
to: Nikdy som neodišla z domu neporiadna, najskôr musím všetko upratať.

from: My immature mindset prevented me from commiting in a relationship.

from: I advocated for causes and initiatives I believed in, inspiring others to join in.
to: Obhajoval som veci a iniciatívy, ktorým som veril, a inšpiroval som ostatných, aby sa pridali.

from: I swam naked.
to: Plával som nahý.

from: I drank very heavily.

from: My boss is influential and has a significant impact on others.

from: I wanted to make more friends.

from: I was elected as the new mayor of the town.

from: I didn't feel affected by criticism at all, I didn't take it personal.
