to: Muž povedal: "Nevedel som sa rozhodnúť, ktoré tričko si kúpiť, tak som si kúpil všetky tri."

from: The man said: "I made a resolution not to buy leather clothes or shoes because it is insensitive to animals."
to: Muž povedal: "Dal som si predsavzatie, že nebudem kupovať kožené oblečenie alebo topánky, pretože je to necitlivé k zvieratám."

from: The man said: "I like to divide the tasks."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád rozdeľujem úlohy."

from: The man said: "I could easily beat you in tennis."
to: Muž povedal: "V tenise by som ťa ľahko porazil."

from: The man said: "I liked to play computer games and lived in my mom's basement although I was an adult."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád som hral počítačové hry a býval som v pivnici mojej mamy, hoci som bol dospelý."

from: The man said: "As a software engineer, I consistently demonstrated a strong work ethic and attention to detail."
to: Muž povedal: "Ako softvérový inžinier som neustále preukazoval silnú pracovnú etiku a zmysel pre detail."

from: The man said: "I liked the way you walked."
to: Muž povedal: "Páčilo sa mi, ako si kráčal."

from: The man said: "My friends have told me that I am empathetic, and I have been very touched by that."
to: Muž povedal: "Moji priatelia mi povedali, že som empatický, a veľmi sa ma to dotklo."

from: The man said: "I have never left the house messy, I have to clean everything first."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som neodišiel z domu neporiadny, najprv musím všetko upratať."

from: The man said: "I was scared because there was a spider in my shower."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som vystrašený, pretože v mojej sprche bol pavúk."

from: The man said: "I was forced to sign up for a self-defence course."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som nútený prihlásiť sa na kurz sebaobrany."

from: The man said: "I never interfered in my employees personal lives."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nezasahoval do osobného života mojich zamestnancov."

from: The man said: "I liked speaking in front of a huge audience."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád som hovoril pred veľkým publikom."

from: The man said: "I locked myself out, so I had to break down the door."
to: Muž povedal: "Zamkol som sa, tak som musel vylomiť dvere."

from: The man said: "I attended a photoshoot where the photographer captured my natural beauty, boosting my self-esteem."
to: Muž povedal: "Zúčastnil som sa fotenia, kde fotograf zachytil moju prirodzenú krásu, čím som zvýšil moje sebavedomie."

from: The man said: "Despite being in a committed relationship, I found it difficult to resist strangers."
to: Muž povedal: "Napriek tomu, že som bol v oddanom vzťahu, bolo pre mňa ťažké odolávať cudzím ľuďom."

from: The man said: "I earned a lot more than my partner, and now my partner is a stay-at-home parent."
to: Muž povedal: "Zarobil som oveľa viac ako môj partner a teraz je môj partner rodičom v domácnosti."

from: The man said: "My immature mindset prevented me from commiting in a relationship."
to: Muž povedal: "Moje nezrelé zmýšľanie mi zabránilo zaviazať sa vo vzťahu."

from: The man said: "I impulsively quit my job without a backup plan."
to: Muž povedal: "Impulzívne som opustil svoju prácu bez záložného plánu."

from: The man said: "I did what they told me to do to fit in."
to: Muž povedal: "Urobil som, čo mi povedali, aby som zapadol."

from: The man said: "I never talked about my feelings with my friends."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nehovoril o svojich pocitoch so svojimi priateľmi."

from: The man said: "I like it when the hairdresser massages my head."
to: Muž povedal: "Páči sa mi, keď mi kaderník masíruje hlavu."

from: The man said: "I have to look good, even if I'm just going to take out the trash."
to: Muž povedal: "Musím vyzerať dobre, aj keď idem len vyniesť smeti."

from: The man said: "I felt helpful because I could host a party."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítil som sa nápomocný, pretože som mohol usporiadať párty."

from: The man said: "I put on this new perfume today and everyone is turning around to see me."
to: Muž povedal: "Dnes som si nasadil tento nový parfém a všetci sa otáčajú, aby ma videli."

from: The man said: "I presented my innovative idea with unwavering conviction."
to: Muž povedal: "Prezradil som svoj inovatívny nápad s neochvejným presvedčením."

from: The man said: "I led my team to success."
to: Muž povedal: "Priviedol som svoj tím k úspechu."

from: The man said: "Taking care of my children is the least I can do for my family."
to: Muž povedal: "Starostlivosť o moje deti je to najmenej, čo môžem pre svoju rodinu urobiť."

from: The man said: "I made coffee for everyone in our team before we started the team meeting."
to: Muž povedal: "Skôr ako sme začali tímovú poradu, pripravil som kávu pre všetkých v našom tíme."

from: The man said: "I bought a castle to renovate it."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpil som zámok, aby som ho zrekonštruoval."

from: The man said: "As a lawyer, I meticulously researched case precedents and prepared persuasive arguments for the courtroom"
to: Muž povedal: "Ako právnik som starostlivo skúmal precedensy a pripravoval presvedčivé argumenty pre súdnu sieň."

from: The man said: "I rented the house for them."
to: Muž povedal: "Prenajal som im dom."

from: The man said: "I hated when my partner was washing the dishes because I knew that I could do it better."
to: Muž povedal: "Neznášal som, keď môj partner umýval riad, pretože som vedel, že to viem urobiť lepšie."

from: The man said: "I signed up for a medieval swording workshop."
to: Muž povedal: "Prihlásil som sa do stredovekej mečiarskej dielne."

from: The man said: "I validated my friend's emotions, providing reassurance during a challenging situation."
to: Muž povedal: "Potvrdil som emócie môjho priateľa a poskytol som mu istotu v náročnej situácii."

from: The woman said: "I got bitten by a snake but I remained calm."
to: Žena povedala: "Uštipol ma had, ale zostala som pokojná."

from: The woman said: "I never talked about my feelings with my friends."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nehovorila o svojich pocitoch so svojimi priateľmi."

from: The woman said: "I liked speaking in front of a huge audience."
to: Žena povedala: "Páčilo sa mi hovoriť pred veľkým publikom."

from: The woman said: "I was thinking about you and me having sex, what do you say?"
to: Žena povedala: "Myslela som na to, že my a ty máme sex, čo povieš?"

from: The woman said: "I led my team to success."
to: Žena povedala: "Priviedla som svoj tím k úspechu."

from: The woman said: "My boss is influential and has a significant impact on others."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj šéf je vplyvný a má významný vplyv na ostatných."

from: The woman said: "The last time I had a fight with my parents, I locked myself in the attic for the day."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som sa naposledy pohádala s rodičmi, zamkla som sa na celý deň v podkroví."

from: The woman said: "I attended a photoshoot where the photographer captured my natural beauty, boosting my self-esteem."
to: Žena povedala: "Zúčastnila som sa fotenia, kde fotograf zachytil moju prirodzenú krásu, čím som zvýšil moje sebavedomie."

from: The woman said: "It is stressful to work here at this position, but I'm good at handling it."
to: Žena povedala: "Je to stresujúce pracovať tu na tejto pozícii, ale dobre to zvládam."

from: The woman said: "The muscles in my arms and back flexed as I rowed through the calm waters."
to: Žena povedala: "Svaly na mojich rukách a chrbte sa napínali, keď som vesloval cez pokojné vody."

from: The woman said: "I could not keep up with their tempo."
to: Žena povedala: "Nedokázala som držať krok s ich tempom."

from: The woman said: "I like it when the hairdresser massages my head."
to: Žena povedala: "Páči sa mi, keď mi kaderník masíruje hlavu."

from: The woman said: "I did what they told me to do to fit in."
to: Žena povedala: "Urobila som, čo mi povedali, aby som zapadla."

from: The woman said: "I knew that he was acting rude, but it is just because he's had a hard time at work."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedela som, že sa správal neslušne, ale je to len preto, že mal ťažké časy v práci."

from: The woman said: "I have paid a personal trainer to help me with my workouts."
to: Žena povedala: "Zaplatila som osobnému trénerovi, aby mi pomohol s tréningom."

from: The woman said: "I never interfered in my employees personal lives."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nezasahovala do osobného života mojich zamestnancov."

from: The woman said: "I presented my innovative idea with unwavering conviction."
to: Žena povedala: "Prezradila som svoj inovatívny nápad s neochvejným presvedčením."

from: The woman said: "I’d like to be pretty like Hollywood stars."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela by som byť pekná ako hollywoodske hviezdy."

from: The woman said: "With each step deeper into the haunted house, I explored its eerie corridors, unafraid of the lurking shadows."
to: Žena povedala: "S každým krokom hlbšie do strašidelného domu som skúmala jeho strašidelné chodby bez strachu zo číhajúcich tieňov."

from: The woman said: "I couldn’t decide which shirt to buy, so I bought all three."
to: Žena povedala: "Nevedela som sa rozhodnúť, ktorú košeľu si kúpiť, tak som si kúpila všetky tri."

from: The woman said: "I advocated for causes and initiatives I believed in, inspiring others to join in."
to: Žena povedala: "Obhajovala som veci a iniciatívy, ktorým som verila, a inšpirovala som ostatných, aby sa pridali."

from: The woman said: "I made coffee for everyone in our team before we started the team meeting."
to: Žena povedala: "Pre všetkých v našom tíme som pripravila kávu predtým, ako sme začali tímovú poradu."

from: The woman said: "As a lawyer, I meticulously researched case precedents and prepared persuasive arguments for the courtroom"
to: Žena povedala: "Ako právnička som starostlivo skúmala precedensy a pripravovala presvedčivé argumenty pre súdnu sieň."

from: The woman said: "It was comforting for me, that I cooked for my family."
to: Žena povedala: "Bolo to pre mňa upokojujúce, že som varila pre svoju rodinu."

from: The woman said: "I have been taught to smile even when I am sad or angry."
to: Žena povedala: "Naučili ma usmievať sa, aj keď som smutná alebo nahnevaná."

from: The woman said: "I frequently deferred to others' opinions and preferences."
to: Žena povedala: "Často som sa podriaďovala názorom a preferenciám iných."

from: The woman said: "I made a resolution not to buy leather clothes or shoes because it is insensitive to animals."
to: Žena povedala: "Dala som si predsavzatie, že nebudem kupovať kožené oblečenie alebo topánky, pretože je to necitlivé k zvieratám."

from: The woman said: "I know it's important to be alone with yourself, but I just couldn't do it."
to: Žena povedala: "Viem, že je dôležité byť sama so sebou, ale ja som to jednoducho nedokázala."

from: The woman said: "I called the vet immediately after I noticed that the bird was limping."
to: Žena povedala: "Zavolala som veterinára hneď, ako som si všimla, že vták kríva."

from: The woman said: "I wanted to focus on my career, family life could wait."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som sa sústrediť na svoju kariéru, rodinný život môže počkať."

from: The woman said: "My immature mindset prevented me from commiting in a relationship."
to: Žena povedala: "Moje nezrelé zmýšľanie mi zabránilo zaviazať sa vo vzťahu."

from: The woman said: "I validated my friend's emotions, providing reassurance during a challenging situation."
to: Žena povedala: "Potvrdila som emócie môjho priateľa a poskytla som mu istotu v náročnej situácii."

from: The woman said: "Taking care of my children is the least I can do for my family."
to: Žena povedala: "Starostlivosť o moje deti je to najmenej, čo môžem pre svoju rodinu urobiť."

from: The woman said: "I spent hours in front of the mirror."
to: Žena povedala: "Strávila som hodiny pred zrkadlom."

from: The woman said: "I swam naked."
to: Žena povedala: Plávala som nahá.

from: The woman said: "I have never left the house messy, I have to clean everything first."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som neodišla z domu neporiadna, najprv musím všetko upratať."

from: The woman said: "I could easily beat you in tennis."
to: Žena povedala: "Kľudne by som ťa mohla poraziť v tenise."

from: The woman said: "I have to look good, even if I'm just going to take out the trash."
to: Žena povedala: "Musím vyzerať dobre, aj keď idem len vyniesť smeti."

from: The woman said: "I signed up for a medieval swording workshop."
to: Žena povedala: "Prihlásila som sa do stredovekej mečiarskej dielne."

from: The woman said: "My friends have told me that I am empathetic, and I have been very touched by that."
to: Žena povedala: "Moji priatelia mi povedali, že som empatická, a veľmi sa ma to dotklo."

from: The woman said: "I rented the house for them."
to: Žena povedala: "Prenajala som im dom."

from: The woman said: "I always thought that life is a game and you have to enjoy it."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som si myslela, že život je hra a treba si to užívať."

from: The woman said: "I evaluated all the costs and benefits before making the decision."
to: Žena povedala: "Pred rozhodnutím som zhodnotila všetky náklady a prínosy."

from: The woman said: "I always went everywhere ahead of time."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som chodila všade v predstihu."

from: The woman said: "I earned a lot more than my partner, and now my partner is a stay-at-home parent."
to: Žena povedala: "Zarobila som oveľa viac ako môj partner a teraz je môj partner rodičom v domácnosti."

from: The woman said: "I established an emergency fund to protect my family from unexpected expenses."
to: Žena povedala: "Založila som núdzový fond na ochranu mojej rodiny pred neočakávanými výdavkami."

from: The woman said: "I liked to play computer games and lived in my mom's basement although I was an adult."
to: Žena povedala: "Rád som hrala počítačové hry a bývala som v pivnici mojej mamy, hoci som bola dospelá."

from: The woman said: "I ought to do some summer clean-up."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala by som urobiť nejaké letné upratovanie."

from: The woman said: "I was never good at sports."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nebola dobrá v športe."

from: The woman said: "I drank very heavily."
to: Žena povedala: "Veľmi som pila."

from: The woman said: "I felt helpful because I could host a party."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítila som sa užitočná, pretože som mohla usporiadať párty."

from: The woman said: "I kept the kitchen area clean to prevent a buildup of dirty dishes"
to: Žena povedala: "Kuchyňu som udržiavala čistú, aby som predišla nahromadeniu špinavého riadu."

from: The woman said: "I was scared because there was a spider in my shower."
to: Žena povedala: "Bála som sa, pretože v mojej sprche bol pavúk."

from: The woman said: "I was nervous, because I had no time to clean the bathroom."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som nervózna, pretože som nemala čas upratať kúpeľňu."

from: The woman said: "Despite being in a committed relationship, I found it difficult to resist strangers."
to: Žena povedala: "Napriek tomu, že som bola v oddanom vzťahu, bolo pre mňa ťažké odolávať cudzím ľuďom."

from: The woman said: "I put on this new perfume today and everyone is turning around to see me."
to: Žena povedala: "Dnes som si nasadila tento nový parfém a všetci sa otáčajú, aby ma videli."

from: The woman said: "I was forced to sign up for a self-defence course."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som nútená prihlásiť sa na kurz sebaobrany."

from: The woman said: "My partner never truly listens to what I'm saying and I find it childish."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj partner nikdy skutočne nepočúva, čo hovorím, a zdá sa mi to detinské."

from: The woman said: "I'd like to trade football cards, but I don't have anyone to trade them with."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada by som vymenila futbalové karty, ale nemám ich s kým vymeniť."

from: The woman said: "I wanted to make more friends."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som si nájsť viac priateľov."

from: The woman said: "I am dedicated."
to: Žena povedala: "Som oddaná."

from: The woman said: "I locked myself out, so I had to break down the door."
to: Žena povedala: "Zamkla som sa, tak som musela vylomiť dvere."

from: The woman said: "I was always the one who did most of the work in group assignments."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som bola tá, ktorá robila väčšinu práce v skupinových úlohách."

from: The woman said: "I had to throw away the hoodie because it had a stain on it that I could not get rid off."
to: Žena povedala: "Musel som vyhodiť mikinu, pretože na nej bola škvrna, ktorej som sa nevedela zbaviť."

from: The woman said: "I couldn't look, it made me feel sick."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som sa pozerať, prišlo mi z toho zle."

from: The woman said: "As a software engineer, I consistently demonstrated a strong work ethic and attention to detail."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako softvérová inžinierka som dôsledne preukazovala silnú pracovnú etiku a zmysel pre detail."

from: The woman said: "When they called and told me what had happened, I collapsed."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď mi zavolali a povedali mi, čo sa stalo, skolabovala som."

from: The woman said: "I had to cheer others up."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som ostatných rozveseliť."

from: The woman said: "I thought I was the most beautiful at the event."
to: Žena povedala: "Myslela som si, že som na tom podujatí najkrajšia."

from: The woman said: "I had no doubt."
to: Žena povedala: "Nepochybovala som."

from: The woman said: "I impulsively quit my job without a backup plan."
to: Žena povedala: "Impulzívne som dala výpoveď bez záložného plánu."

from: The woman said: "I like to divide the tasks."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada rozdeľujem úlohy."

from: The woman said: "I was elected as the new mayor of the town."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som zvolená za nového starostu mesta."

from: The woman said: "I was in charge of the whole project."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som na starosti celý projekt."

from: The woman said: "I like being in charge."
to: Žena povedala: "Páči sa mi, že som vo vedení."

from: The woman said: "I didn't feel affected by criticism at all, I didn't take it personal."
to: Žena povedala: "Vôbec som sa necítila dotknutá kritikou, nebrala som to osobne."

from: The woman said: "I invested my money so that I have some passive income."
to: Žena povedala: "Investovala som svoje peniaze, aby som mala nejaký pasívny príjem."

from: The woman said: "I bought a castle to renovate it."
to: Žena povedala: Kúpila som zámok, aby som ho zrekonštruovala.

from: The woman said: "I liked the way you walked."
to: Žena povedala: "Páčilo sa mi, ako si kráčal."

from: The woman said: "I hated when my partner was washing the dishes because I knew that I could do it better."
to: Žena povedala: "Neznášala som, keď môj partner umýval riad, pretože som vedela, že to viem urobiť lepšie."

from: I couldn't open the pickles, so I asked my roommate to do it.
to: Ohorky sa mi nepodarilo otvoriť, tak som požiadal spolubývajúceho, aby to urobil.

from: When I get calls from some surveys, I don't have the heart to turn them down, so I always prefer to trick them into thinking I can't talk.
to: Keď mi volajú z niektorých prieskumov, nemám to srdce ich odmietnuť, takže ich vždy radšej oklamem, aby si mysleli, že nemôžem hovoriť.

from: I wasn't happy in Slovakia, even though I didn´t know why. So one day I just packed up and flew to Spain.
to: Na Slovensku som nebola šťastná, aj keď som nevedela prečo. A tak som sa jedného dňa len tak zbalil a odletel do Španielska.

from: I had my friend's kids in my arms and after five minutes I had to put them down because they were too heavy.
to: Mal som na rukách kamarátkine deti a po piatich minútach som ich musel dať dole, pretože boli príliš ťažké.

from: I always knew that it's important to have a good skincare routine.
to: Vždy som vedela, že je dôležité mať dobrú rutinu starostlivosti o pleť.

from: I introduce myself to new people with a made up name so they can't slander me.
to: Predstavujem sa novým ľuďom s vymysleným menom, aby ma nemohli ohovárať.

from: I tried to be celibate for a month, but I couldn't do it.
to: Skúšal som byť mesiac v celibáte, ale nepodarilo sa mi to.

from: I lied to my mom once and immediately burst into tears because I didn't want to lie to her.
to: Raz som mame klamal a hneď som sa rozplakal, lebo som jej nechcel klamať.

from: I don't like being told how to do my job.
to: Nemám rád, keď mi niekto hovorí, ako mám robiť svoju prácu.

from: I couldn't listen to those ridiculous conspiracy theories any longer.
to: Už som nemohol viac počúvať tie smiešne konšpiračné teórie.

from: I haven't been on a proper shopping spree in a long time.
to: Už dlho som nebola v poriadnej nákupnej horúčke.

from: I don't like to rely on others, I do things best on my own anyway.
to: Nerád sa spolieham na druhých, aj tak robím veci najlepšie sám.

from: I'm so happy it makes me feel guilty.
to: Som taká šťastná, že sa cítim vinná.

from: I like to talk openly with employees, I don't have time to waste.
to: So zamestnancami sa rád otvorene porozprávam, nemám čas na rozhadzovanie.

from: I don't want to be financially dependent on anyone.
to: Nechcem byť na nikom finančne závislý.

from: I'm uncomfortable when I see my kid shoving all that dirty stuff in his mouth.
to: Je mi nepríjemné, keď vidím, ako si moje dieťa strká všetky tie špinavé veci do úst.

from: I didn't want them to feel bad, so I was quiet.
to: Nechcel som, aby sa cítili zle, tak som bol ticho.

from: I couldn't handle it mentally and had to seek a professional help.
to: Psychicky som to nezvládol a musel som vyhľadať odbornú pomoc.

from: Is it okay that I peeked into my partner's phone?
to: Je v poriadku, že som nakukla do telefónu partnera?

from: I've been told to smile more.
to: Bolo mi povedané, aby som sa viac usmieval.

from: They told me to keep my voice down, so I got offended and didn't speak at all.
to: Povedali mi, aby som stíšil hlas, tak som sa urazil a vôbec som nehovoril.

from: I'm sure I'll get the job.
to: Som si istý, že tú prácu dostanem.

from: I am happy to provide for my family's basic needs.
to: Rád zabezpečím základné potreby svojej rodiny.

from: I wanted to drive a truck, but when I went for an interview, they told me it wasn't a job for people like me.
to: Chcel som šoférovať kamión, ale keď som išiel na pohovor, povedali mi, že to nie je práca pre ľudí, ako som ja.

from: I bought LEGO even though I'm an adult.
to: LEGO som si kúpil aj keď som dospelý.

from: I get up at four o'clock so I can work out before work.
to: Vstávam o štvrtej, aby som si pred prácou mohol zacvičiť.

from: I wanted to go swimming, but I didn't have time to shave my legs.
to: Chcel som si ísť zaplávať, no nestihol som si oholiť nohy.

from: I'm shy and can't keep eye contact.
to: Som hanblivá a nedokážem udržať očný kontakt.

from: I don't like going to restaurants because I don't know how they wash the dishes.
to: Nerád chodím do reštaurácií, lebo neviem, ako umývajú riad.

from: I don't want my partner to work.
to: Nechcem, aby môj partner pracoval.

from: Whenever I'm sad, I put on sad songs and it makes me feel even worse.
to: Vždy, keď mi je smutno, pustím si smutné pesničky a cítim sa ešte horšie.

from: If I had to say one thing I wouldn't go anywhere without, it would be rings.
to: Ak by som mal povedať jednu vec, bez ktorej by som nikam nešiel, boli by to krúžky.

from: They want me to show emotion, but I've never done that before.
to: Chcú, aby som ukázal emócie, ale to som ešte nikdy neurobil.

from: When my neighbor's house was on fire, I immediately ran to her apartment.
to: Keď horel dom mojej susedky, okamžite som utekal do jej bytu.

from: They asked me if I could help them, and I couldn't say no.
to: Pýtali sa ma, či im môžem pomôcť, a ja som nedokázal povedať nie.

from: I vacuum every day, I guess I'm addicted to it.
to: Vysávam každý deň, asi som na tom závislá.

from: I'm sore because I was lifting heavy weights yesterday.
to: Bolí ma to, pretože som včera dvíhal ťažké činky.

from: I don't like to pick flowers, I feel sorry for them.
to: Nerada trhám kvety, je mi ich ľúto.

from: I could never have a dog, I couldn't stand the hair.
to: Nikdy som nemohla mať psa, nezniesla som vlasy.

from: I'm simply the best.
to: Som jednoducho najlepší.

from: I'm addicted to sex.
to: Som závislý na sexe.

from: I like expensive clothes because they don't get ruined so quickly.
to: Mám rada drahé oblečenie, pretože sa tak rýchlo nezničí.

from: I had to explain to them that I won't tolerate any back talk.
to: Musel som im vysvetliť, že nebudem tolerovať žiadne spätné reči.

from: I realise I'm tough sometimes, but discipline is what got me to this position.
to: Uvedomujem si, že som niekedy tvrdý, ale disciplína je to, čo ma dostalo do tejto pozície.

from: I don't like to beat around the bush.
to: Nerád sa bijem do kríkov.

from: I'm looking for a good job so I can give my family what they deserve.
to: Hľadám si dobrú prácu, aby som mohol dať svojej rodine to, čo si zaslúži.

from: I found out that when I'm not with my friends, I feel miserable.
to: Zistil som, že keď nie som s kamarátmi, cítim sa mizerne.

from: I didn't know how to cook pasta, so I was hungry.
to: Nevedel som uvariť cestoviny, tak som bol hladný.

from: They never ask me for help because they say I couldn't handle it.
to: Nikdy ma nepožiadajú o pomoc, pretože hovoria, že by som to nezvládol.

from: I'm hurt, no one has ever treated me like this.
to: Som zranený, nikto sa ku mne takto nikdy nesprával.

from: When I'm hungry, I get grumpy.
to: Keď som hladný, som nevrlý.

from: Apparently, I'm the only one who thinks flip-flops are disgusting.
to: Očividne som jediný, kto si myslí, že šľapky sú hnusné.

from: I never leave things to the last minute, I'm too responsible for that.
to: Nikdy nenechávam veci na poslednú chvíľu, som za to príliš zodpovedný.

from: I had to get a job, or we wouldn't have anything to eat.
to: Musel som sa zamestnať, inak by sme nemali čo jesť.

from: I heard they're opening a new clothing store.
to: Počul som, že otvárajú nový obchod s oblečením.

from: I'm happiest when my whole apartment is tidy.
to: Najšťastnejšia som, keď mám uprataný celý byt.

from: People around me know that if they need something, I'm happy to help.
to: Ľudia v mojom okolí vedia, že ak niečo potrebujú, rád pomôžem.

from: I don't like gossiping, it's a waste of time.
to: Nemám rád ohováranie, je to strata času.

from: I don't like watching videos of abandoned puppies, it makes me cry.
to: Nerada pozerám videá opustených šteniatok, je mi z toho do plaču.

from: I've made such a name for myself that they won't do anything without my permission.
to: Spravil som si také meno, že bez môjho dovolenia neurobia nič.

from: I'm too experienced to waste my time here.
to: Som príliš skúsený na to, aby som tu strácal čas.

from: When someone calls me to go out, I'm always happy to say yes.
to: Keď mi niekto zavolá, aby som išiel von, vždy rád poviem áno.

from: They say I'm insensitive, but I call it sensible.
to: Hovoria, že som necitlivý, ale ja to nazývam rozumným.

from: People think of me as a wimp just because I'm good to others.
to: Ľudia ma považujú za slabocha len preto, že som dobrý k ostatným.

from: I wouldn't hurt a fly.
to: Neublížil by som ani muche.

from: I'm the only one who does anything in this household.
to: Som jediný, kto v tejto domácnosti niečo robí.

from: I don't like to argue with others because I can't hold back my tears.
to: Nerád sa hádam s ostatnými, pretože nedokážem zadržať slzy.

from: I've been waiting so long for this game to come out.
to: Tak dlho som čakal, kým táto hra vyjde.

from: It's hard for me to be new in the city because I don't have any friends here.
to: Je pre mňa ťažké byť v meste nový, pretože tu nemám žiadnych priateľov.

from: I couldn't have an office just for myself, I'd go crazy in there.
to: Nemohla by som mať kanceláriu len pre seba, tam by som sa zbláznila.

from: They always tell me I work a lot, but that's just the way I am.
to: Vždy mi hovoria, že veľa pracujem, ale taký som.

from: They say what they appreciate most about me is that I'm modest.
to: Najviac si na mne vravia, že som skromný.

from: I couldn't even open a bottle.
to: Nemohol som ani otvoriť fľašu.

from: I'm used to coming home from work and play games on PlayStation.
to: Som zvyknutý prísť z práce domov a hrať hry na PlayStation.

from: Maybe I'm too formal, but I maintain my respect that way.
to: Možno som príliš formálny, ale zachovávam si tak rešpekt.

from: I ordered dumbbells that are too heavy and I can't workout with them.
to: Objednal som si činky, ktoré sú príliš ťažké a nemôžem s nimi cvičiť.

from: Sorry about the mess, I didn't get a chance to clean it up.
to: Ospravedlňujem sa za neporiadok, nemal som možnosť ho upratať.

from: I couldn't set up a business, I need a boss to tell me what to do.
to: Nemohol som si založiť živnosť, potrebujem šéfa, ktorý mi povie, čo mám robiť.

from: I'm the only one qualified for this job.
to: Som jediný kvalifikovaný na túto prácu.

from: I'm no beginner to be annoyed because of little things like that.
to: Nie som začiatočník, ktorý by ma rozčuľoval kvôli takýmto maličkostiam.

from: I'm good at combining colours and patterns on clothes.
to: Som dobrá v kombinovaní farieb a vzorov na oblečení.

from: Since I've been eating more protein, I feel much stronger.
to: Odkedy jem viac bielkovín, cítim sa oveľa silnejší.

from: I resolved to brush my dog at least three times a week so he wouldn't shed as much.
to: Rozhodol som sa, že budem svojho psa čistiť aspoň trikrát týždenne, aby toľko nesypal.

from: I'm aware of my qualities.
to: Som si vedomý svojich kvalít.

from: I couldn't stand being cooped up at home for another day.
to: Nemohol som vydržať byť zavretý doma ďalší deň.

from: I'm extremely communicative and love to meet new people.
to: Som mimoriadne komunikatívna a rada spoznávam nových ľudí.

from: I never thought I'd be the one to turn him in to the police.
to: Nikdy som si nemyslel, že to budem ja, kto ho vydá polícii.

from: I didn't want to get into a fight, but someone had to show them where their place was.
to: Nechcel som sa biť, ale niekto im musel ukázať, kde je ich miesto.

from: I've discovered that the colour of this season is red.
to: Zistil som, že farbou tejto sezóny je červená.

from: I want to have as much fun with others as possible while I'm young.
to: Chcem si užiť čo najviac zábavy s ostatnými, kým som mladý.

from: I'm going to the bar tonight, I've been too tense lately.
to: Dnes večer idem do baru, v poslednej dobe som príliš napätá.

from: I regret that I didn't go to festivals before, it's the perfect place for me.
to: Ľutujem, že som na festivaly nechodila skôr, je to pre mňa ideálne miesto.

from: I like to play chess, I've been good at it since I was a kid.
to: Rád hrám šach, odmalička mi to ide.

from: I've never been afraid of anything and I don't plan to start now.
to: Nikdy som sa ničoho nebál a ani teraz neplánujem začať.

from: I was going to buy a watermelon, but I couldn't manage to take it home.
to: Chcela som si kúpiť melón, ale nestihla som si ho vziať domov.

from: If I had to, I wouldn't be afraid to face him.
to: Keby som musel, nebál by som sa mu čeliť.

from: I don't like to judge others.
to: Nerád súdim iných.

from: It's no surprise that I won this election.
to: Nie je prekvapením, že som vyhral tieto voľby.

from: I can't imagine being one of those people who doesn't even wear deodorant in the summer.
to: Neviem si predstaviť, že by som patrila medzi ľudí, ktorí v lete nenosia ani deodorant.

from: I'm the last one to believe such lies.
to: Som posledný, kto verí takýmto klamstvám.

from: I could see she wasn't feeling well, so I made her some hot chocolate.
to: Videl som, že sa necíti dobre, tak som jej urobil horúcu čokoládu.

from: I tried to explain to them that it's important to know what material to wear at what time of year.
to: Snažil som sa im vysvetliť, že je dôležité vedieť, aký materiál nosiť v ktorom ročnom období.

from: I never learned to cook because I didn't have to.
to: Nikdy som sa nenaučil variť, pretože som nemusel.

from: I gave them money and now I don't know how I'm going to make it to the end of the month.
to: Dal som im peniaze a teraz neviem, ako to stihnem do konca mesiaca.

from: I didn't want to break up, but I didn't want to show my sensitive side either.
to: Nechcela som sa rozísť, ale nechcela som ani ukázať svoju citlivú stránku.

from: I babysat my sister's kids last weekend.
to: Minulý víkend som strážil deti mojej sestry.

from: I was in the US for a year and people had no problem talking to me even though they didn't know me.
to: Bol som rok v USA a ľudia nemali problém rozprávať sa so mnou, aj keď ma nepoznali.

from: I couldn't decide which shirt to buy, so I bought all three.
to: Nevedela som sa rozhodnúť, ktorú košeľu si kúpiť, tak som si kúpila všetky tri.

from: I'd like to be pretty like Hollywood stars.
to: Chcela by som byť pekná ako hollywoodske hviezdy.

from: For some reason I wasn't happy, so one day I just packed up and flew to Spain.
to: Z nejakého dôvodu som nebol šťastný, a tak som sa jedného dňa jednoducho zbalil a odletel do Španielska.

from: This make no sense, I screamed.
to: To nedáva zmysel, kričal som.

from: Let me lift that for you, I wouldn't be happy if something happened to you.
to: Dovoľte mi to zdvihnúť za vás, nebol by som šťastný, keby sa vám niečo stalo.

from: Let me bake the pie, I insisted.
to: Nechaj ma upiecť koláč, trval som na tom.
